40001001	Izibir natoon izrk iya aYeso Kiristi
40001002	Ibrahim ne a nye atek Ishaku ne Ishaku tes aYakub. aYakub ne a nye atek aYahuda be ribir ronyining wu.
40001003	aYahuda ne a tes aPeres be aZera, anyining ba tEnye aTamar. Ne aPeres ne a nye atek aHeruna, ne aHeruna tes Aram.
40001004	Aram ne a nye atek Aminadap. Ne Aminadap tes aNashon, aNashon ne a nye atek aSalmon.
40001005	aSalmon nye atek aBowas, anyining wu tEnye aRahap, aBowas ne a nye atek aBida, anyining tEnye aRut, ne aBida tes aZhese.
40001006	aZhese ne a nye atek aDauda a tEnye agwm. aDauda ne a tes aSolomon anyining wu tEtsang a nye abining aYuriya.
40001007	aSolomon ne a nye atek aRahobom, ne aRahobom nye atek Abizha. Abizha ne a nye atek Asa.
40001008	Asa ne a nye atek aYehoshafa, ne aYehoshafa tes aYoram, ne aYoram ne a nye atek aYuziya.
40001009	Ne aYuziya tes aYotam. aYotam ne a nye atek Ahas, ne Ahas tes aHezekiya.
40001010	aHezekiya ne a nye atek aManasa, ne aManasa tes Amon. Amon ne a nye atek aYosiya.
40001011	aYosiya ne a nye atek aZhekoniya be ribir aronyining wu nizen iya a tEkok ner aYahuda nong a tEse te sam ni iben aBabila.
40001012	Nama kutseng ba na aBabila: aZhekoniya se tes aSheltiyel, ne aSheltiyel tes aZarubabel.
40001013	aZarubabel ne a nye atek Abiyud, ne Abiyud tes Aliyakim. Aliyakim ne a nye atek Azuro.
40001014	Azuro ne a nye atek aZadok, ne aZadok tes Akim. Akim ne a nye atek Aliyudu.
40001015	Aliyudu ne a nye atek Aleyara, ne Aleyara tes aMatana, ne aMatana ne a nye atek aYakub.
40001016	Ne aYakub tes aYusufu a tEnye amitek aMarya aya a tEtes aYeso, aya a tEku yis ye aKiristi.
40001017	Kamok anong, izam se kusk be anaas kum be izen Ibrahim ma nizen aDauda. Izam se kusk be anaas kum be izen aDauda ma izen a tEtseng ni iben aBabila. Izam se kusk be anaas be izam a tEne na aBabila ma nizen a tEtes aKiristi gip.
40001018	Ana ne kutes aYeso Kiristi se. Nizen iyong anyining nye kanamang kusam aYusufu, a be kafa kum ne an nye kuwnng'e ba, a be kafa'me be Kabik Kazhl'e.
40001019	Acam wu aYusufu'me nye aner atek nashn Adakunom, iyong a shim nong a tEte aMarya isum nashn nerawe ba, iyong a nye kanyk nong a tEwon kyn.
40001020	A tEse kayr kanyk kayong, iyong amaleka Adakunom b nufu kayr nabos nong a tEf be wu ye, aYusufu, igon aDauda, sang tu fok inyim kusk aMarya kanamang kusam wan ba, kamok kafa wu'me nye kafe Kabik Kazhl'e.
40001021	A tEtes igon, wan tEku te riyerek ye aYeso, kamok wu ne a tEshesh nerawe kayr rinn ba.E
40001022	Cei ikr na nye nong a tEshining ikng iya Adakunom tEf nanu aner kuzarap, a tEf ye,
40001023	Di yin, kanamang tEbe kafa, a tEtes igon, a tEku yis ye Imanuwel. (Imanuwel sor, Adakunom se mak be yir.)E
40001024	Nizen aYusufu tEshiming ni ida, a nye kyndi amaleka Adakunom'me tEku tak ayong a sok abining wu nong a tEtseng'e.
40001025	Amma aYusufu tsang a ku ren kyndi aner abining ba, ma nama a tEtes igon'e, a tEku yis ye aYeso.
40002001	Nama a tEtes aYeso na aBetalami ni iben aYahuda, nizen aHiridus tEnye agwm. ner akak afe EtEren ikng ikak natoon adar ne nabas kuwuruk kunom nong EtEb na aUshalima.
40002002	ta se rip ye, Agwm ner aYahuda aya a tEtes ame se ak ? Yir di yir adar wu nabas kuwuruk kunom, iyong ne yir m b yir nong tEku ya yir iben.E
40002003	Nizen aHiridus tEfa fok anong, iyong a n kayr kudaam didng, anong ne nerawe aUshalima cicr.
40002004	Ayong a tusung gbang atsi ne ner kubsp amok cei, a tEku rip ba kar a tEku tes aKiristi'me.
40002005	Ayong a tEku tak ye, Na aBetalami ni iben aYahuda, kamok anong ne aner kuzarap akak zibir ye,
40002006	EYin ner aBetalami ni iben aYahuda, yin nye yin ayiik'e kayr gwm aYahuda. kamok kayr yin ne a ta s agwm aya a tana fek ner'i Isarela.EE
40002007	Ayong aHiridus yis tsen ame kyn nong a tEku rip ba izen iya adar'e tEwuruk dim. Nama EtEku tak,
40002008	iyong a tEtom ba na aBetalami'me ye, Tseng se tsr yin igon'e whiwh. Kum ke yin tu s yin ne yin b tin tak yin, nong mi tEtseng tEsu ku ya iben gip.E
40002009	Nama a tEfok ikng iya aHiridus'e tEf, iyong Eya kashn be kutseng ba akon ba, ne adar ba tEtsang Edi nabas kunom tu ku wuruk ame se nashn, ay ba karp. Adar'e nyeseng dim nar kaya igon'e tEku se.
40002011	Be kub ba nasa'me, ne Edi igon'e be anyining wu aMarya, iyong Etiguum kaben nong EtEku ya iben. bisik acer ba nong EtEnk izinariya be name ikn a tEyis ye amuur .
40002012	A tsang a kutak ba kayr nabos ye, sang EtEgor nufe aHiridus baba ba. Iyong EtEbun nuwp ba ni iren ikak.
40002013	Nama tsen ame tEku bun, amaleka Adakunom b nufe aYusufu kayr nabos, a tEf be wu ye, Dorok, sok igon'e be anyining'e nong tEteng tEbe yin ni iben aMasar. Sor yin azong ma izen iya ne mi f be wan, kamok aHiridus tEtsr igon'e nong a tEfr.E
40002014	Ayong aYusufu dorok, a tEsok igon ame be anyining'e natuk'ong nong EtEbe na aMasar.
40002015	sor azong ma izen iya aHiridus tEku. I se anong, nong a tEshining ikng iya Adakunom tEtsang a f be aner kuzarap wu akak ye, Mi yis igon mi kayr aMasar.E
40002016	Nizen iya aHiridus tEren ye tsen ame tEku wk, ayong riy wu beseng. Ayong a sak ye a ra fs inoon atek'e kayr aBetalami ne iwp iya i ta se bubarak cicr, naya na ta se ay afa be kutes ne ya a ta ru raar anong. Kum be izen afe a tEdi adar ame.
40002017	Nizen iyong ne ikng iya a tEzibir kayr kufumung Irimiya aner kuzarap shining: A tEf ye,
40002018	A fok kut kayr kuwp aRama, kut kanak ne kufe riym didng, aRahila ne a sen tos kamok inoon wu, a rawu kutsesek, kamok na tEkus.E
40002019	Nizen aHiridus tEku, amaleka Adakunom b nufe aYusufu na aMasar kayr nabos ye,
40002020	Dorok, tEsok igon'e be anyining wu nong tEku bun yin ni iben Isarela, kamok ya afe a tEtsr kutser igon ame n kus.E
40002021	Ayong a dorok, a tEsok igon'e be anyining'e nong a tEbun ni iben Isarela.
40002022	Amma nizen iya a tEfok ye Akilayus ne ngarak natoon rigwm atek wu aHiridus ni iben aYahuda, a fok inyim a tEku bun amma Adakunom tEku krk kuto na nabos'e, ayong a tirr a tEbe ni iben aGalili.
40002023	Ne a tseng a tEse sor nuwp a tEyis ye aNazaret. Anong ne a shining ikng iya ner kuzarap kak tEf ye, A tEku yis ye, afu Nazaret.E
40003001	Nizen iyong aYohana aner abatisma b a san kutaas rif Adakunom katse ni iben aYahuda.
40003002	Ne a f ye, Shishing yin kuse yin, kamok rigwm kaza m b bubarak.E
40003003	Ayu ne a nye aya Ishaya aner kuzarap tEf itak wu ye, Kut aner akak yis kayr katse ye, Nye yin Agwm gwm iren, ku nye yin iren'e cop.EE
40003004	Ares aYohana'me tEtes a nye be nakuyng arakumi, ne a rosom kudun kukpa nutin wu. Naya wu nye kubep be ashi ritong.
40003005	nerawe aUshalima be fe p aYahuda cicr fe a tEse nikyim Ishng aUrdun ame cicr bs nufu.
40003006	bs ne Etaas rinn ba ne a ku nye ba abatisma ni Ishng aUrdun ame.
40003007	Nizen wu tEdi ner aFarisi be ner aSadusi whr tEbs nar wu tEse be kunye abatisma'me, a f be ba ye, Yin naban fomong, angan tEtak yin ye, i ru ku teng yin amok Adakunom a tEsaase ?
40003008	Nye yin itomong i tana tonong ye yin n shishing yin kuse yin.
40003009	Sang yin tu wk yin ace yin be kutrng ye, Ibrahim nye ada yirEba. Won ta ka tak yin, Adakunom ta kyem a sok ata na nong a tin nye Ibrahim inoon.
40003010	Kanu katm se ritin kakon'e, koakye kakon ka ta tes kutes kutek ba, a tEtmng a ta te nurng.
40003011	Mi ta nye yin abatisma be ashi nong i ta tonong ye yin n shishing yin kuse yin. Amma aner a tana b nama mi ti nar be kukyem, aya mi tana kyem i ra akpatak wu gum ba. A tEka nye yin abatisma be Kabik Kazhl'e ne kurng.
40003012	Kube wu se nubk wu. A tEtas wh'me ne a korok iwng'e kayr ingm ne a shosh awh'me be kurng kuya sang ku tana ku ba.E
40003013	Nizen iyong aYeso dorok na aGalili a ta be ni Ishng aUrdun nong aYohana tEsu ku nye abatisma.
40003014	aYohana shim a tEku roon'e, iyong a f ye, Gyr ke mi b nufuan nong wan tin nye abatisma, ne wan bun i b nunaan ingya a?E
40003015	Amma aYeso f be wu ye, I se gyr ta nye yir anong; kamok be anong ne a tEshining yir ikng iya Adakunom ta shim.EAyong aYohana tEku shim'me.
40003016	Kum a tEfa nye aYeso abatisma ame ne a wuruk kayr ashi'me, ne kaza wor ka karak ne a di Kabik Adakunom kyndi abp ti tiik ni wu.
40003017	Ne kut kukak wuruk naza ye, Wan ne inye Igon'i kaya mi ta shim. Mi fok kusas wu didng.E
40004001	Iyong Kabik Kazhl tseng be aYeso kayr katse ne Ishetan su ku bmng.
40004002	Nama aYeso tEnye azumi kuks isk inaas, katuk be kunom iyong izong tEku r.
40004003	Ishetan b a tEf be wu ye, Ke wan ne i nye Igon Adakunom, t, f be ata na nong Eta te abiredi.E
40004004	Ayong aYeso f be wu ye, Ise ni izibir ye: Sang anerawe ta sor be naya tsek ba, amma be koakye kuri rif ri ta wuruk nanu Adakunom.EE
40004005	Ne Ishetan ame tseng be wu kayr kuwp aUshalima kuzhl'e ne a ku sak a ta nyeseng nar ka ta se ring ring natoon agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben.
40004006	Ne a f be aYeso'me ye, Ke wan ne i nye Igon Adakunom, t, furuk ma kaben. Kamok ise ni izibir ye: EA tEf be maleka wu be agbang kut nong EtEka tnng, ne Eka tor be ibk, fan wan bu rus kutak nuta.EE
40004007	Ayong aYeso f be wu ye, Ise ni izibir gip ye: Sang wan tu bmng Agwm gwm wan Adakunom ba.EE
40004008	Ne Ishetan ame bun a tseng be wu natoon rifan ri ta se garang didng gbak, nong a tEku tosong rigwm kazatse ne kuyiik'e cicr.
40004009	Ne a f be aYeso'me ye, Ikr na cicr mi tEka nk, ke wan tEkpa kaben nong i tin ya iben.E
40004010	aYeso f be wu ye, Kam be mi Ishetan! Kamok ise ni izibir ye, Agwm gwm wan Adakunom ne wan tEku ya iben ne i ku nye itomong wu zr tsek.EE
40004011	Iyong Ishetan tEku won. maleka b nong a tin sak riy na aYeso ame.
40004012	Nizen aYeso tEfok ye an te aYohana ni itsm, iyong a tEku bun ni iben aGalili.
40004013	A won aNazaret nong a tEbe na aKapanum be kusor, ku tase nanu kudung, ni igak kaben aZebulun ne aNaptali,
40004014	nong a tEshining ikng iya Ishaya tEf, ye:
40004015	Kaben aZebulun ne kaben aNaptali, yin i tEse yin nabas agbang kudung, a ta tar Ishng aUrdun. Ne kaben aGalili nabas aya sang a tEnye ner aYahuda ba.
40004016	fe a ta sor na awhi an di agbang akanang; fe a ta sor na nawu riku akanang min wuruk ni ba.E
40004017	Kum be izen iyong aYeso san awazi, ye; Shishing yin kuse yin kamok rigwm kaza m b bubarak.E
40004018	Nizen aYeso tEse be kutseng nukim Kudung aGalili, iyong a di aner be aronyining, aSiman a tEku yis ye aBitrus ne aronyining wu Adarawus. sen te agunung ba kayr kudung, kamok ba nye fe kuyising izos.
40004019	Ne aYeso f be ba ye, B, ni kuus yin, mi tEka sak yin tin bs yin be nerawe.E
40004020	Gbashak, Ewor Ewon agunung ba ame, nong Eta kuus aYeso.
40004021	aYeso tEfa ya kashn be kutseng ne a di aner be aronyining, aYakub igon aZabedi ne aronyining wu aYohana. se kayr kukpara ashi be ada ba aZabedi'me, Eta se be kunye kanyk agunung ba, ne aYeso ku yis ba,
40004022	ne a wor a won kukpara ashi ame be ada ba nong Eta kuus aYeso.
40004023	aYeso gorok kaben aGalili cicr ne a bsp nerawe'me kayr atu aduwa ba, ne a ku taas ba Rif Ritek natoon rigwm kaza. Ne a sak fe irk iriri me tEte atser.
40004024	Anong, itak wu tseng cei ma ni iben aSuriya ne Eku bs be fe irk zr zr cicr ne fe Eta se risam didng, ne fe amaan nabik be fe kurk kucicirim ne fe a tEw abas azining. A tEsak ba EtEte atser.
40004025	Rigwm nerawe whr nes na aGalili ne kaben ka ta be iwp kusk be afa ne fe aUshalima be fe iben aYahuda ne fe a ta tar Ishng aUrdun cicr bs nufu.
40005001	aYeso tEfa di rigwm nerawe whr tEnyim, iyong a ngarak natoon kawhanang kakak nong a tEsonong. limazhiri wu tseng nufu,
40005002	ayong a san ku kabsp ba'me ye:
40005003	ner riy rikan ne Enye aner aya a ta ren kuraar ba kayr kabik, kamok rigwm kaza nye rifuba.
40005004	ner riy rikan ne Enye aner aya a ta se kayr riy riwe, kamok Adakunom tEku tsesek ba.
40005005	ner riy rikan ne Enye aner aya a ta mees rice ba, kamok ba ne EtEya kazatse.
40005006	ner riy rikan ne Enye aner aya a ta be ifeng ne Eshim kunye ikr iya i ta se gyr nashn Adakunom, Adakunom tu ku nk ba ikr ife ba tEshim'e.
40005007	ner riy rikan ne Enye aner aya a ta be kur riy kamok Adakunom tEr riy ba gip.
40005008	ner riy rikan ne Enye aner aya ay ba ta se zhl, kamok ba ne a tEdi Adakunom.
40005009	ner riy rikan ne Enye aner aya a ta shim kugung rice, kamok a tEku yis ba ye inoon Adakunom.
40005010	ner riy rikan ne Enye aner aya a tu ku tabak ba kamok ba nye ikr iya i ta se gyr nashn Adakunom, rigwm kaza nye rifu ba.
40005011	ner riy rikan ne Enye ner aya nerawe ta ka kas yin, ne Eka nk yin risam, ne Eti bs abs natoon yin, kamok mi.
40005012	Nye yin adidngdng be riy rikan kamok agbang ishorong yin se naza, kamok anong ne Etabak ner kuzarap aya a tEbs nashn yin.
40005013	Yin ne i nye yin itk kazatse. Ke itk kam be kurereng wu, a ta nye ne an nong i ta bun i rereng ? A ta bin nye ikng ikak ba, ma ke a ta nyosong, ne nerawe shsh.
40005014	Yin ne i nye yin akanang kazatse, kuwp kuya a tEnk na agarang ku ta buruk ba.
40005015	A te kurng na apitila, ne a bun a whn ba. A sak na agarang nong koangan a tana n ta di akanang'e.
40005016	Kamok anong, won akanang yin tu ya kanang nashn nerawe, nong ke Edi kunye yin kutek ne EtEkerek Ada yin a ta se kayr kaza.
40005017	Sang yin tu di yin ye mi b nong ta be birik ikng iya Itsi aMusa ta f be rif ner kuzarap agbugbang'e ta f ba, Mi b nong ta birik ba, amma nong ta shining rif ba'me.
40005018	Katsak'e, ne mi ta ka tak yin, kaza be kaben tEgang, ko kaban ikng ikak ihiir'e kayr afumung na ta wei ba, ma koakye a ta f shining.
40005019	Koangan ne a won ikng ikak ihiir'e kayr Itsi na nong a ta bsp nerawe'me anong, a tEku yis ye, kaba hiir'e kayr rigwm kaza, amma aner aya ne a ta kuus ikr'me cei ne a bsp nerawe'me anong, a tEku yis ye, agbang aner kayr rigwm kaza.
40005020	Won ta ka tak yin, sang ke kunye yin kutek nar kufe ner kubsp Itsi be ner aFarisi ba, T, yin tEn yin kayr rigwm kaza ba ko cik.
40005021	Yin fok yin a tEf be nerawe agbugbang ye, 'Sang tu fr akak ba, aner aya ne a fr akak, a tEku t amok!
40005022	Amma mi f be yin kyrna'me ye, aner aya ne riy wu beseng be aronyining wu, a tEku t amok. Koangan ne a f be aronyining wu ye a nye Azizik'eEa tEtseng be wu nashn kk kashn. Koangan ne a yis afudang ye, Afunam akak,Ea kyem ke a n kayr kasa kurng.
40005023	Kamok anong, ke wan sen nk abeko wan nashn abagadi'me, wan ra yiring ye aronyining wan be ikng ikak be wan,
40005024	T, ne wan sak abeko wan'ong azong nizham, nong ta be nufe aronyining wan'e, sen sak yin nizham, ne i ma b nk abeko'me.
40005025	Ke akak sen tseng be wan nar amok, nye zizirik nong tin sak yin be wu ni iren nizham ta ra n yin nutu amok'e. Ke anong ba a ta tseng be wan nar amok'e ne aner amok'e ka won nubk fe itomong wu, kashim ne a ka te ni itsm.
40005026	Katsak'e, ne mi ta tak, wan ta kyem i wuruk ba, ma ke wan karang kutiming'e cei nizham.
40005027	Yin fok yin a tEf ye, Sang tu nye rikuna ba.E
40005028	Amma kyrna'me, mi ta tak yin ye, koangan ne a di aner abining a shim kayr riy wu ye ke wu men be wu, a nye rikuna be wu kayr riy wu.
40005029	Ke rinyisi abas kubk riya wan tEsak nong tEnye rinn, tun nong ta barak! I tEnar wan ti wei ribir kurm wan be kurm wan cicr tana n kayr kasa kurng.
40005030	Ke kubk riya wan tEsak wan tEnye rinn, tun nong ta barak. I tEnar wan ti wei ribir kurm wan be kurm wan cicr tana n kayr kasa kurng.
40005031	A bun a f ye, Koangan ne a tEkam be abining wu, a ru ku nk kufumung kukam kuwnng dim.E
40005032	Amma kyrna'me, ikng iya mi ta sen f be yin se ye, ke aner akak kam be abining wu ye, sang ke ise ye abining'e nye rikuna ba, t, i te kyndi wu ne a tu te kayr rikuna'me ingya. Aner aya ne a sok abining'e, a nye rikuna.
40005033	Anong gbak, yin fok yin a f be tukop yir ye, Sang tu shu natoon abs ba, amma shining kunk kut wan tEnye be Agwm gwm.E
40005034	Amma ikng iya mi ta f yin se ye, Sang tu shu yin ba ko cik, ko be kaza, kamok kaza nye kar itsik rigwm Adakunom.
40005035	Sang tu shu ko be kaben ba, kamok kaben nye ikng kusaas atak Adakunom, ko be aUshalima kamok azong ne a nye kuwp Agbang Agwm.
40005036	Sang tu shu be rice wan ba, kamok wan ta kyem i sak kakuyong kazining ta te kakan ka kawe ba.
40005037	Ikng iya yin tana f yin tsek nye, EiEka WayoEayi. Koakye i ta bun i nar anong ne nufe Amaan aner.
40005038	Yin fok yin a tEf ye, Rinyisi natoon rinyisi, rinyi natoon rinyi.E
40005039	Amma ikng iya mi ta f be yin kyrna se ye, Sang tu rayin aner aya a tEka nye yin anyas ba. Ke aner akak ta rus nufok kukak, ne wan ku kirik kufe afa.
40005040	Ke aner akak tseng be wan nar amok, a ti shan kukpiin wan, ne wan ku nk ma be agbang kukpiin wan gip.
40005041	Ke aner akak f ye ma wan ra su ku sak ni iren akilomita azining, ne wan tseng be wu akilomita afa.
40005042	Ke aner akak ta rip ikng ikak, ku nk. Ke aner akak b kutsr ikp nufuan, sang tu won dar i ku nk ba.
40005043	Yin fok yin a tEf ye, Shim ferim wan ne i di mudn wan kyr.E
40005044	Amma mi f be yin kyrna'me ye: Shim yin mudn yin, ne nye yin fe Eta ka tabak yin aduwa.
40005045	Kamok be nong ne yin tEte yin inoon Ada yin afe a ta se kayr kaza. Wu nk maan anerawe ne ner atek akanang kunom cicr, ne a nyesek iza natoon nerawe wu ya a ta be kuse kutek be ya a ta nye amaan'e.
40005046	Kamok ke yin shim yin ya a ta ka shim yin tsek, ishorong aky ne yin ta s yin nufe Adakunom ? Anong ne fe kushashang itsm iben nye gip.
40005047	Ke yin nye shou yin ferim yin tsek, t, aky ne yin nye yin ife ita nar ife ribir nerawe ? furin gip Enye anong.
40005048	Kamok anong, shining yin, kyndi Ada yin afe a ta se kayr kaza ta shining.
40006001	Nye yin tatan, fan kunye kutek yin bu se nong nerawe tEdi. Ke yin nye yin anong yin ta s yin ishorong nufe Ada yin aya a tase kayr kaza ba.
40006002	Kamok anong, izen iya ne yin nk yin aner aya a ta se kayr kutsr, sang tu tsang i taas yin kyndi kardak ner ta nye natu aduwa ni ikim iren nong Eta s kuyiik nufe nerawe ba. Won ta ka tak yin katsak'e, ba n s ishorong ba cei nakuruk.
40006003	Amma ke yin ta tobok yin aner aya a tase kayr kutser, t, sang akak tu ren ikng iya wan ta sen nye'me ba,
40006004	nong as kutobok yin ta se nunrng. Ada yin afe a ta di ikng iya a tEnye nunrng tEka nk yin ishorong yin.
40006005	Izen iya ne yin tEnye yin aduwa, sang tu nye yin kyndi kardak ner ta nye ba, kamok ba shim kunye aduwa nunyeseng kayr atu aduwa ba ni ikim iren nong nerawe ta ka di ba. Won ta ka tak yin katsak'e, ba n shan ishorong ba cei nakuruk.
40006006	Amma ke wan tEnye aduwa, n kayr kutu wan ne i whn kanukutu ne i nye aduwa wan be Ada wan aya a tu ku di ba. Ada wan aya a ta di ikr iya a tEnye nunrng, tEka nk wan ishorong wan.
40006007	Ke ta nye yin aduwa, sang tu yiir itoos yin ikng izining ba, kyndi furin ta nye ba, ba di ye EtEku fok ba kamok ba ta nye aduwa asp.
40006008	Sang tu nye yin kyndi ba ba, kamok Ada yin ren ikng iya yin ta shim yin nizham yin tEru ku rip yin.

40006010	rigwm wan tu b, a tu nye ikng iya wan ta shim kayr kazatse, kyndi a ta nye kayr kaza.
40006011	Ni nang yir naya kuya koakye katuk,
40006012	Ni rng yir rinn yir, kyndi yir tErng yir ya afe a tin nye yir rinn.
40006013	Sang tu tseng be yir nar kaya yir tana taam yir ba, ni shesh yir nubk Amaan Aner. [Kamok rigwm be kukyem ne kuyiik nye kufuan ma izen izen. Anong!]E
40006014	Kamok ke yin rng yin ya afe a ta ka nye yin rinn, Ada yin afe a ta se kayr kaza tEka rng yin rife yin gip.
40006015	Amma ke yin rng yin nerawe'me ba. Ada yin tEma ka rng yin rinn rife yin ba.
40006016	Izen iya ne yin ta nye yin azumi, sang tu rosom yin kanyisi yin kyndi kardak aner ta nye ba. Kamok ba rosom kanyisi ba nong Eta tonong nerawe ye ba sen nye azumi. Won ta ka tak yin katsak'e, ba n s ishorong ba cei nakuruk.
40006017	Amma ke wan sen nye azumi, t, ne i kusu kanyisi wan nong ti te name nanu,
40006018	nong fan nerawe bu ren ye wan sen nye azumi. Ada wan aya a tu ku ba, amma a di ikng iya a tEnye nunrng, ta ka nk ishorong wan.
40006019	Sang tu tusung yin kurum yin kayr kazatse, nar hs be s tana beseng'e ba ka nar kaya kpatang tana fo nong a tEkok ba.
40006020	Amma tusung yin kurum yin kayr kaza, nar iwhs be its tana ya ba, nar kpatang tana fo nong Eta kok ba.
40006021	Kamok kar kaya ne kurum wan tu ku se, azong ne riy wan tEse.
40006022	Anyisi se kyndi apitila kurm. Ke anyisi wan nye atser, kurm wan cicr ta se na akanang.
40006023	Amma ke anyisi wan nye atser ba, kurm wan cicr ta se na awhi, kamok anong ke akanang a ta se be wan te whi, awhi'me ta se didng.
40006024	Koakak kuse a tana kyem a nye tekasa afa itomong ni izen izining ba. Ke a nye anong, a ta shim akak ne a rawu akak, ka ne a tiyiik akak ne a zhsh akak. Yin ta kyem i ti te yin riy ni ikuus Adakunom ne i bun i ni te yin riy ni itsm ba.
40006025	Kamok anong, mi f be yin ye, sang yin tu daam yin ka an ne yin tEsor yin ba, natoon ikng iya yin tana ya yin ka ikng iya yin tana s yin ba, ka ikng iya yin tana te yin ba. Kutser nar naya, ne kurm nar ares aa?
40006026	Yrk yin nanon ta di yin, ba tsk ka Etusung ni ingm ba, amma gip be anong, Ada yin afe a ta se kayr kaza tu ta ba. Yin tu ku nar yin ba yiik aa?
40006027	Angan kayr yin kamok kudaam wu ne a ta kyem a tin barang kaban izen cik nutser wu ?
40006028	T, kamok aky yin ti daam yin be ares yin ta tes yin ? Yrk yin kurasak fure katse ta di yin. nye itomong ka Etos ares ba.
40006029	Gip be anong, won ta ka tak yin, ko aSolomon a tEnye agwm be kuyiik wu, a kun nye izem iya i ta nar azining kayr ba ba.
40006030	Ke i nye ye Adakunom nye agam iwng izem anong, aya a ta di katuur amma natson ne a te kayr kurng shita yin a? Yin fe sang kunk katsak yin ta gop ba.

40007001	Sang tu t yin akak amok ba, fan a ba ka t yin'e.
40007002	Kamok amok kuri amok afe yin tEt yin nerawe'me, kuri ayong ne a tEma ka t yin'e gip. Kuri kures afe yin ti maas yin nerawe'me, kuri kuyong ne a tEma ka maas ko yin'e gip.
40007003	Aky sak wan yrk ikuk i ta se rinyisi afudang wan ne i won agbirik kayr rinyisi rifuan ?

40007007	Yiir irip yin'e, a tEnk yin; yiir itsr yin'e, ta s yin; yiir itsor yin kanukutu'me a tEka karak yin'e.
40007008	Kamok koangan afe a tErip a tEku nk, koangan afe a tEtsr a ta s, koangan afe a tEtsor a tu ku karak'e.
40007009	Ka aner akak kuse kayr yin tek inoon, afe ke igon wu tu ku rip abiredi, ne wu ku nk kuta ?
40007010	Ka, ke igon'e tu ku rip izos ne wu ku nk iwhen ?

40007012	Kamok anong, koakye afe yin ta shim yin nerawe tEka nye yin'e, yin gip, ku nye yin ba'me. Kamok iyong ne inye kunik Itsi aMusa ne kubsp ner kuzarap.

40007015	Nye yin tatan be ner kuzarap fe abs. bs nufe yin be kuse itsamang, amma katsak'e, Ese kyndi maan gabu katse.
40007016	Yin tEku ren yin ba be kuri itomong ba. Yin kun di yin nerawe tan b kutes anap ritin ikiritsan a? Ka kutes atafo ritin aduruduk ?

40007020	Kamok anong, yin tEren yin ner kuzarap fe abs na be itomong ba.
40007021	Sang koangan afe a tin yis ye, Agwm gwmEne a tEn kayr kaza ba, ma ke aya a tEnye ikng iya Ada mi aya a ta se kayr kaza ta shim.

40013037	aYeso f be ba ye, Aya a ta nas izha itek'e nye Igon Anerawe.
40013038	Rik'me nye kazatse, ne izha itek'e sor inoon rigwm Adakunom. Agam'me nye inoon amaan aner'e.
40013039	Ne amudn aya a ta nas naya'me nye Ishetan. Ishamang'e nye izen afe kazatse tana gang, ne fe kutsk'e nye maleka.
40013040	Kyndi a ta tusung agam nong a ta te nurng, anong ne i ta se nizen kazatse tana gang.
40013041	Igon Anerawe tEtom maleka wu, EtEku tusung cicr fe a ta sak nerawe tEnye rinn ne ya a tEnye amaan kunye cicr.
40013042	Ne Eku barak ba kayr kurng kufe izen izen, Eta tos ne Eya anyi azong.

40014001	Nizen iyong, aHiridus tEfok itak aYeso.

40017025	aBitrus f be wu ye, Ei, a karang.E Nizen iya aBitrus tEn kayr kasa'me, aYeso f be wu ni imsng'e ye, aBitrus, wan di an ? gwm kazatse shashang itsm iben angan ? shashang nufe inoon ba ka nufe kak zr ?E

40017027	Gip be anong, nong fan nerawe bu beseng ay be yir, tseng nudung ta se te agunung wan. Sok izos ife imsng'e wan ta yiir nong ta ngamang kanu'me, wan tEs ica itsm kayr'e. Sok tEsu ku karang mo ba itsm inaan be ifuan.E
40018001	Nizen iyong, limazhiri'me b nufe aYeso nong EtEku rip ye, Angan nar yiik cicr kayr rigwm kaza ?E
40018002	Ayong aYeso yis igon kakak kahiir'e nong a tEku sak a tEnyeseng natite ba.
40018003	Ne a f be ba ye, Won ta ka tak yin katsak'e, sang ke yin shishing yin kuse yin nong i tEte yin kyndi inoon nazhizhk'e ba, yin tEn yin kayr rigwm kaza ba.
40018004	Koangan afe a ta sok rice wu kyndi igon na, wu ne a nar yiik kayr rigwm kaza.
40018005	Koangan afa a ta shan igon kahiir'e kyndi kayu na kayr riyerek mi, mi ne ti shan.
40018006	Ke aner akak sak azining kayr azhizhk'e na, aya a tEmin nk katsak natoon'i, ta nye rinn, i tu ku nar a tu ku roos agbang kuta ak nong a tu ku barak kayr agbang kudung tsik.
40018007	Aw be kazatse kamok ikr i ta sak nerawe ta nye rinn. Ikr'me tEbs dim, amma aw be aner aya a tana sak akak ta nye rinn.
40018008	Ke kubk wan ka kutak wan tEsak wan ta nye rinn ne i tn nong ta barak. I ta ka nar wan tEs kutser kufe izen izen dar kubk ka kutak be wan tana n nurng kufe izen izen be ibk ifa ka be atak afa ayi.
40018009	Ke rinyisi wan tEsak wan tEnye rinn, ne i tun ta barak. I ta ka nar wan ta s kutser izen izen be rinyisi rizining be a tana ka barak kayr kurng kufe izen izen be anyisi afa.
40018010	Sak yin riy sang yin tu zhsh yin azining kayr azhizhk'e na ba, kamok mi kun ka tak yin ye, maleka ba kayr kaza yiir iyrk kanyisi Ada mi a ta se kayr kaza.
40018011	[Kamok Igon Anerawe b nong a ta shesh ikng iya i tEwei.]
40018012	T, yin di yin an ? Ke aner akak be itsamang kusk inyak ne izining wei. A ta won isk katonbk be katonbk'e nong a ta tseng ni itsr izining i ta wei'e aa?
40018013	Won ta ka tak yin katsak'e, izen iya ne a s, a ta nye riy rikan kamok izining'ong ne a nar isk katonbk be katonbk'e i ta rusek.
40018014	Anong ne Ada yin aya a ta se kayr kaza shim, azining kayr inoon nazhizhk'e na ta wei ba.
40018015	Ke aronyining wan ta ka nye rinn, ne wan tseng nufu awan yin afa nong ta su ku tak rinn wu. Ke a fok rif wan, i nye ye, wan tu bun be aronyining wan niren.
40018016	Amma ke a ta fok ba, ne wan tseng be aner azining ka afa ayi, nong a ta sor asheda ner afa ka ataar ayi.
40018017	Ke a gaar ku ka fok ba ne wan tak fikuus; ke a bun a gaar rif fikuus'e gbak ne a ku sok kyndi afurin, aya a ta gaar kushishing kuse wu.
40018018	Won ta ka tak yin katsak'e, koakye ikng ne yin roos yin aze nazatse i ta se nurosom kayr kaza. Koakye ikng ne yin bisik yin nazatse i ta se nubisik kayr kaza.
40018019	Mi bun i f be yin gbak ye, ke ner fa kayr yin ya kutrng ba ta se kuzining rip ikng ikak, Ada mi afe a ta se kayr kaza ta ka nye ba'me.
40018020	Kamok kar afe ner afa ka ataar tu ku nyim kayr riyerek'i, mi se azong mak be ba.E
40018021	Ayong aBitrus b nufe aYeso a tEku rip ye, Atekasa, kutak kumang ne mi ta nye aronyining mi igaas ? Kutak kanataar a?E
40018022	aYeso f be wu ye, Won ta ka tak, kutak kanataar tsek ba, amma isk kanataar be kanataar.
40018023	Kamok anong a kyem a maas rigwm kaza be agwm akak a tEshim sam wu tu ku karang ikng ife wu tEku kuus ba.
40018024	Nizen iya a ta san kufa'me a tu bn aner akak wu tEku kuus itsm atalen izungu kusk (10,000).
40018025	Kamok asam'me ta kyem a karang kuta a tu ku kuus'e ba, yong atekasa'me f ye, a ra rp asam'me be abining wu ne inoon wu be ikr wu cicr nong a tin karang kuta'me.
40018026	Ayong asam'me kpa nashn atekasa wu ame a tEf be wu ye, Mi ta ka nye izong. Te kuta riy, mi ta ka karang cicr ikng wan tin kuus.E
40018027	Atekasa wu'me fok kur riy wu, yong a tEwon kuta'me ne a ku won a ta tseng.
40018028	Amma nizen asam ame tEwuruk a sen tseng iyong a nyim be afudang wu asam akak wu tEku kuus kuta itsm aDinari kusk inyak. A tu ku yiir kpa ne a f be wu ye, Ni karang kuta itsm'i.E
40018029	Asam afudang wu ame kpa kaben nong a tEf be wu ye, Mi ta ka nye izong. Te kuta riy, mi ta ka karang.E
40018030	Amma asam ame rawu tanka, yong a tseng be wu nitsm ma nizen a tu ku karang kuta wu ame.
40018031	Nizen iya sam kak tEdi anong, riy ba beseng didng yong Ese tak agwm ba ikr'me cei.
40018032	Ayong atekasa ame yis asam ame kayr'e a tEf be wu ye, Wan amaan asam, mi tEka won kuta mi tEka kuus cei kamok wan tin nye izong.

40018034	Riy agwm ba'me beseng didng yong a sak a tu ku te nitsm ma a karang kuta a tEku kuus.
40018035	Anong ne Ada mi a ta se kayr kaza ta nye be koangan afe a ta nye fudang wu igaas be riy rizining.E

40021032	Kamok aYohana b nong a tEka tonong yin iren katsak, yin ti nk yin katsak ni wu ba. Amma ner fe kushashang itsm iben ne yak gwm Eti nk katsak. Yin tEdi yin ikr'ong ka yin shishing yin kuse yin nong i tin nk yin katsak ba.E
40021033	aYeso f be ba gbak ye, Fok yin kumaas kukak: Aner ikap akak tuse a ta tuus a kakon anap; a tEgorok rik'me ne a ta ribong a tanin fi ashi anap'e, a nye kar garang nong aner kutor rik'me tin sor. Ne a nk aner akak rik'me nong Etu ku ras mo ikng ikak ne a be nutseng nuwp kukak.

40021035	fe itomong rik'me yiir sam wu ame nong EtEtsor azining ne Efr akak, EtEbarak afe ataar'e be ata.
40021036	Ayong a bun a tom sam kak gbak, ya a ta nar fe imsng nufu ba, ne fe itomong'e bun Enye be ayong kyndi EtEnye be fe imsng ame.
40021037	Ni igang'e makong, a tom igon wu nufu ba ne a t riy wu ye, ta te yiik igon'i.E
40021038	Amma fe a tEkbk rik ame tEfa di igon'e, Enye ibrng ye, Ayu ne a nye aya kutse wu, i ku fr yir nong ta ya yir kutse'me.E
40021039	Iyong EtEyiir EtEfr ne Ebarak nama rik'me.
40021040	Kamok anong, izen iya ne atek rik'me b, a ta nye an be fe a ta kbk rik'me ?E
40021041	Ne ba f be aYeso ye, A tEfs maan aner'ong ne a nk kak itomong'e, ya a tana ku nk kanu kafu nizen ishamang.E
40021042	aYeso f be ba ye, Aser, yin fa yin kayr rif Adakunom aa? EKuta kuya fe rink tEraba kuyong ne ku te itsik ribor'e. Adakunom ne a nye anong. Iyu nye ikng azhing nufe yir.E
40021043	Kamok anong, won ta ka tak yin, a tin shan rigwm Adakunom nufe yin nong a tEnk ya a tana nye kunye kutek.

40022001	aYeso bun a tEtak ba rif rikak kayr kumaas gbak ye,
40022002	A ta kyem a maas rigwm kaza be agwm akak a tEnye igon wu kanyk riy rikan kuwnng.
40022003	A tom sam wu kak ye, Era se yis ya a tu ku tak ba riy rikan'e ye, Era b amma ner'e raba ku b.
40022004	Iyong Ebun Etom sam kak gbak ye, Era se yis ya wu tu ku tak ba riy rikan'e ye, wu nye naya, an tsek inyak be izha, koakye n te, Era b riy rikan kuwnng'e.
40022005	Amma ko Eti tar kuto ba. tseng akn ba, akak be rik wu ne akak be nar rizhik wu.

40022014	Kamok nerawe whr ne a yis amma cik ne a kasa.E
40022015	A sen sor ne ner aFarisi se nye ibrng nong Eta di ka aYeso tEtaam kayr rif wu.

40022021	tEku shim'e ye, Nafe aKaisar.E Ayong aYeso f be ba ye, T, nk yin aKaisar ikng iya i ta nye ife aKaisar ne i nk yin Adakunom ikng iya i ta nye ife Adakunom.E
40022022	Nizen ba tEfa fok anong, Ete zhing, ne Ewon aYeso Eta tseng.

40023015	Aw be yin ner kubsp nerawe Itsi ne ner aFarisi, yin kardak ner! Yin tseng i gorok yin iwp zr zr ne i tEsak yin agbang ishng ni itsr aner azining aya a tana kuus iren yin. Ke i tu s yin ne yin te yin be wu kyndi a ta nar yin kunye rinn.
40023016	Aw be yin kpatn, ya a ta kok nerawe kus. Yin f yin ye, Koangan ne a shu be agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben, i daam ba. Amma aner aya ne a shu be izinariya iya i ta se kayr agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben'e, kushu'me tEku ya.E

40023019	Yin kpatn kak! Inyaka nar, ikng iya a ta bn'e ka kar a ta nye kamok asidaka kaya ka ta sak asidaka'me ta te zhl ?
40023020	Kamok anong, aner a ta shu be kar a ta nk nong a tin nye asidaka, a shu kamok kar'me ne koakye i ta se natoon kar'me.

40024021	Kamok risam izen iyong ta nar koakye kuri risam afe yin ta kun di yin kum nizen a tEnye kazatse ma nizen iyu. A ta ba bun a s kuri risam'me ba.

40024025	T, mi ma ka tak yin nakuruk.

40024027	Kyndi akanang ta samang nabas kunom tu ku wuruk ma nabas rikpa kunom, anong ne kub Igon Anerawe ta se.
40024028	Kar afe amushi tu ku kpa azong ne wan tEdi zhanga nyim.

40024030	Nizen iyong ne yin tEdi yin kub Igon Anerawe naza, nerawe kazatse cicr tEkorok ibk nut. ta di Igon Anerawe ta saase kayr ann be kukyem ne kuyiik didng.
40024031	A ta tom maleka wu nong Eta fp rigba ri ta wng didng ne Etusung aya a tEkasa nikes kazatse inaas, nikes kuyu ma nigang kazatse.
40024032	Yrk yin atafo ta di yin, izen iya ne ato'me suruk, ke i san kufunung yin tEren yin ye kushik m b bubarak.
40024033	Anong ne i se gip ke yin di yin ikr iyong cicr yin ta ren yin an b bubarak, a se nanukutu.
40024034	Katsak'e ne mi ta ka tak yin, nerawe izam na ta kus ba, ma a nye ikr na cei nizham.
40024035	Kaza be kaben ta gor, amma ko rif mi sen gor zr ba.
40024036	Ko akak ren ikng ikak natoon kunom'e ka izen'e ba, ko maleka kayr kaza, ka Igon'e ren ba, Ada'me wu zr tsek ne a ren.

40024040	Nizen iyong ner fa ta se rik, Eta sok azining ne a won azining.
40024041	nyining fa ta se be ak nuta ak kuzining, Eta sok azining ne Ewon azining.
40024042	Kamok anong, sor yin be kanyk kamok yin ren katuk Agwm gwm'me tana b ba.
40024043	Amma ren yin ye, ke a fa f ye, atekasa ren katuk kaya akpatang tana b nasa wu, ke a tor kasa'me fan akpatang bu fo nong a ta n kayr'e.
40024044	Kamok anong, yin gip nye yin kanyk, kamok yin ren yin izen Igon Anerawe tana b ba.
40024045	Angan ne a nye asam a ta be katsak ne a be kukyem, aya atekasa wu tu ku sak ye, a rin sak riy na sam wu ne a ku nyesek ba naya nizen i ta se gyr ?
40024046	Aner riy rikan ne a nye asam aya atekasa wu tana b a tEku s a sen nye itomong wu gyr.
40024047	Katsak'e ne mi ta ka tak yin, atekasa'me tu ku sak, nong a tin sak riy ni ikr wu cicr.
40024048	Amma ke asam'me nye amaan'e, a tEt riy wu ye, Atekasa mi tEsor izen didng nizham a ta ra b.E
40024049	Ne asam'me tsosok sam afudang ne a ya ne a s mak be ya a ta shim Eta s didng.
40024050	Atekasa'me tEb nizen afe asam'me ta ren ye a ta b ba, ka nunom afe wu tEren ba.
40024051	Atekasa'me tu ku yiir ne a ku tsor ma kurm ta tasak, a tu ku gung mak be kardak ner, kayr kar a tana tos ne Eya anyi.
40025001	Nizen iyong rigwm kaza ta se kyndi nanamang kusk na tEsok apitila ba nong Eta tseng Eta sen shan aner akak a tEsok abining afas.
40025002	Atoon kayr ba be kukyem ba, ne atoon be.
40025003	fe dar kukyem ame tseng be apitila ba, ko a ti be name nakak ba.
40025004	fe kukyem ame ti be name nakak.
40025005	Aner a ta sok abining afas'e b zizirik ba, ma ba cicr san kuyising ida ne Emereng ida.
40025006	Natite katuk ne ba fok akililiu ye, Aner a tEsok abining afas ame saase, wuruk yin, tu ku shan yin niren.E
40025007	Iyong nanamang kusk ame dorok nong a tEnye irng ba.
40025008	ya a ta se dar kukyem ame f be fe kukyem ame ye, Ni nang yir name yin cik; irng yir sen kus.E
40025009	fe kukyem ame f be ba ye, Wayo, na tin kyem yir ma be yin ba. Ban se shan yin nafe yin.E
40025010	Ba ta fa dorok Esen tseng, ne aner a tana sok abining afas'e b. Nanamang naya na tEtsang Enye kanyk'e n nar kunye riy rikan'e mak be wu ne a whn kutu'me.
40025011	Nizen ribir atoon ame tEb, ne Ef ye, Atekasa! Atekasa! Ni karak yir kanukutu!E

40025024	Ayong aya a tEku nk ishika izining ame b ne a tEf ye, Atekasa, mi tEren kuse wan r, wan shim ta tsk nar kar wan ta tuus ba, ne i tusung nar wan tu ku nas ba.

40025027	T, gyr ke wan ti sak itsm'e nar kaya ke mi b, mi tin s ikng ikak natoon'e.
40025028	EKamok anong ni shan yin ishika izining'ong nufu nong ta nk yin aya a ta be hika kusk ame.

41007004	Ke ne nar rizhik wor yas ba, ma so. Ne bun kuus ign ikak whr kyndi kukusu akp ne agbang akpan ne nafeneng atsm.

41007006	Ne aYeso f be ba ye, Ishaya f gyr nizen iya a t nye kuzarap natoon yin kardak ner kyndi i ta se ni izibir ye, ner na tin tiyiik be nanu ba tsek, amma ay ba se gugk be mi.
41007007	Ku ya iben ba sor ikng ikak ba, ikng ba ta bsp nerawe'me nye ign nerawe tsek.
41007008	Yin won yin Itsi Adakunom nong i ta kuus yin ign anerawe.
41007009	Ne aYeso f be ba ye, Yin won yin Itsi Adakunom nong i ta kuus yin ign yin.
41007010	Kamok aMusa f ye, Tiyiik ada be ang wan. Koangan ne a kas ada ka ang wu, a tu ku fr dim.
41007011	Amma yin won yin aner aya afe sang a tin sak riy na atek be anyining wu nizen iya tek'e ta se nutser ba', ne aner'e f ye, Ikng iya i tase ye mi t ka tobok mo yin mi n nk Adakunom.
41007012	Be anong yin t ku tnng yin kutobok atek be anyining.
41007013	Natoon anong ne yin ti sak yin rif Adakunom tin te kpdng, be kuri ign yin ta bsp yin inoon yin'e. Ne yin nye yin ikr didng kyndi iyu na.
41007014	Ayong aYeso bun a yis rigwm nerawe'me nong a t f be ba ye, Wesek yin kuto tin fok yin gyr.
41007015	Sang ikng iya i ta ne nufang, i ta n nanu anerawe ne i t ku sak a t won dar a se zhl ba, amma iya i ta wuruk nanu wu ne i t ku sak a t won dar a se zhl.
41007016	Aya ne a be ato kufok a ra fok.
41007017	Nama a t won rigwm anerawe ame, a t n nasa kakak, limazhiri wu t nye ku rip natoon kumaas kuyong.
41007018	aYeso f be ba ye, Aser, yin gip, yin ren yin ikng iya mi tin f a'a? Yin ren yin ye, ikng iya i ta n nafa anerawe i t ne nufang ikyem i t sak anerawe ta won dar a se zhl ba a?
41007019	Kamok i n kayr riy wu ba amma kayr kafa wu, ne i bun i wuruk nama'me. (Rif aYeso na tonong ye a ta kyem a ya koakye kuri naya.)
41007020	Ne a ya kashn ye, Ikng iya i ta wuruk nanu anerawe ne i t sak a ta won dar a se zhl.

41007022	ne kuyrk, be anyas ne kuwrk anerawe, ne rinyisi rikan, ne rishishim, be naborok, ne kuka be rifunam.
41007023	Cicr amaan kunye na nes kayr riy anerawe ne i ku sak a ta won dar a se zhl.
41007024	aYeso won kar kayong nong a ta be niben aTaya be aSidon. A n nasa kakak a shim akak Sang tu ren ba, gip be anong a kyem a nr rice wu ba.
41007025	Abining akak, angas wu ta be amaan kabik, a fok itak aYeso yong a wor a b nong a ta be kpa natak wu.

41007032	Azong ner kak tu bn aner akak a ta nye agbato ne kuf kanu ku r. Aner'e ne a nye aYeso kusuk ye a rin sak kubk ni wu.

41008023	aYeso kk kubk aner ame nong a ta tseng'e nama kuwp. A tin ta ac nanyisi aner ame ne a ni sak ibk natoon wu, ne a ku rip ye, Wan di ikng ikak aa?

41010029	aYeso f be ba ye, Katsak ne mi ta ka tak yin, akak kun won kasa wu ka ronyining wu ka ngasnyining wu ka ang wu ka ada wu inoon wu ne ak wu kamok mi ne rif mi,

41014001	T, a t won inom ifa ne a nye Riy Rikan aPasova ne izen Kuya aBiredi Dar Ayisti, gbang atsi ne ner kubsp Itsi se be kutsr iren tana yiir aYeso be ritseng nong tu ku fr.
41014002	Amma yong f ye, Amma sang nizen riy rikan na ba, fan nerawe bin dorok natoon yir be kuren.
41014003	Nizen iya aYeso ta se na aBetani nasa aner akak a t ku yis ye, aSiman a t nye akparng. aYeso t se be iya naya azong ne abining akak b nufu be kudu name, a t nye be awan atsip ikng ikak a t yis ye anad, na ta be ikon itek didng ne na be itsm didng. 42001011	Ayong amaleka Adakunom ti wuruk na aZakariya'me, a nyeseng nabas kubk riya kyndi kar a t ku shosh ikr ikn'e.
42001012	Nizen iya aZakariya t ku di, a te febek, ne inyim ku r didng.
42001013	Amaleka'me f be wu ye, Sang tu fok inyim ba, aZakariya, an fok aduwa wan. Abining wan Alisabatu t ka tes igon, wan t ku te riyerek ye aYohana.
42001014	A t sor ikng riy rikan didng nufuan. nerawe whr t nye riy rikan kamok kutes wu.
42001015	Kamok a t se yiik nashn Adakunom, a t s kugbr ka ikng iya i tana ku sak a t feng ba. A t ku shining be Kabik Kazhl'e kum nutes wu.
42001016	A t sak nerawe Isarela whr t ku bun nufe Adakunom ba.
42001017	A t tseng nashn Agwm gwm kayr kabik be kukyem kuri kufe Iliya nong a t sak ay tek inoon t ku bun ni inoon ba, ne a sak ya a ta shonong, ta kuus kutseng aner a ta se gyr nashn Adakunom. A t sak nerawe t nye kanyk kamok Agwm gwm.
42001018	Ayong, aZakariya rip amaleka'me ye, Mi t san an t ren ye iyu nye katsak ? Mi n kop, abining'i gip an b ay didng.
42001019	Ne amaleka'me f be wu ye, Mi ne i nye aGyebel. Mi se nashn Adakunom. A min tom nufuan nong t ka tak Rif Ritek na.
42001020	Kyrna, wan t te agbanu, t kyem i f kanu ba, ma izen iya ne rif na shining, kamok wan ti nk katsak rif mi ba, ri t shining be katsak ke izen'e nye.
42001021	nerawe daam didng be kutor aZakariya, kamok aZakariya'me mak a sor didng kayr agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben'e.
42001022	Nizen iya a t wuruk, a ba kyem a f kanu be ba ba. nerawe ma ren ye Adakunom mu ku tonong ikng ikak kayr agbang kutu'me, kamok a kpaan kuf be ibk, a kyem a f kanu ba.
42001023	Izen kunye itomong wu t fa gang, a t bun kari.
42001024	Nama izen cik ne abining wu Alisabatu be kafa, yong a yiir insk rice wu ma ifn itoon.
42001025	Ayong Alisabatu'e f ye, Agwm gwm ne a ti nye iyu, nizen na ne a ti tonong ritek wu ne a ni tun kayr isum nashn nerawe.
42001026	Nizen iya kafa Alisabatu'me t se ifn igataar, Adakunom tom amaleka wu aGyebel na aNazaret, kayr kuwp kukak niben aGalili,
42001027	nufe agbik kanamang kakak, ka t tsang ka sak ka t nye kuwnng be aner akak riyerek wu t nye aYusufu. A nye aner kasa aDauda, a t nye agwm. Riyerek agbik kanamang'e nye aMarya.
42001028	Amaleka'me tseng nufu a t se f be wu ye, Dazha, Agwm gwm se mak be wan, a ma ka nk agbang ritek wu.
42001029	aMarya daam didng be rif wu'me, a yiir kut'me ka aky kuri ashou'ong'e.
42001030	Ayong amaleka'me f be wu ye, Sang wan tu fok inyim ba, aMarya, wan n s ritek Adakunom.
42001031	Wan t shan kafa, t tes igon kamitek'e, a t ku te riyerek ye, aYeso.
42001032	A t se yiik, ne a ku yis ye, Igon Adakunom ayiik'e. Agwm gwm yir Adakunom t ku nk itsik rigwm atukop wu aDauda.
42001033	A tin i nye rigwm nasa aYakub ma izen izen, rigwm wu t gang zr ba.
42001034	Ayong aMarya t ku rip ye, I t san'e an i t se anong, sang mi tan ren aner amitek ba ?
42001035	Ayong amaleka'me f be wu ye, Kabik Kazhl'e tin tiik natoon wan ne kukyem Adakunom ka kis. Kamok anong, a t yis azhl'e ayong, wan tana tes'ong ye Igon Adakunom.
42001036	Afuri wan Alisabatu, t s igon ko be rikp wu'ong gip, wu aya sang a t kun tes ba, se be kafa, kufn wu kufe igataar na.
42001037	Kamok ikng ikak nar agap Adakunom ba.
42001038	Ayong aMarya f be wu ye, Mi nye asam Adakunom, won i tu se anong be mi kyndi wan t f. Ne amaleka'me tseng a t ku won.
42001039	Nizen iyong aMarya dorok a t nye kanyk nong a t tseng zizirik nuwp kukak kayr nawhanang iben aYahuda.
42001040	A n nasa aZakariya nong a t nye Alisabatu ashou.
42001041	Alisabatu t fa fok ashou aMarya'me ne igon'e, naka borok be agap kayr kafa wu. Ne a shining Alisabatu be Kabik Kazhl'e.
42001042	Ayong Alisabatu t kut, a t f ye, Wan nye aner aya i ta s ritek Adakunom kayr nyining, igon wan tana tes nye aner aya a ta s ritek Adakunom gip.
42001043	Aky sak mi s ritek Adakunom ana, ang Agwm gwm mi kusum t b nunaan ?
42001044	Kum mi t fa fok ashou wan, ne igon ka ta se nafa mi naka borok be riy rikan.
42001045	Aner aya a ta s ritek Adakunom ne a nye wan aya i tin nk katsak ye, ikng Agwm gwm t f be wan t shining.
42001046	Ayong aMarya f ye, Riy mi sen kerek Adakunom mi.
42001047	Ne kabik'i nye riy rikan be Adakunom aner kashesh'i.
42001048	Kamok wu ti sak riy ni imees rice asam wu tin se kayr'e. Kyrna ma izen izen, koakye izam tin yis ye, aner aya a ta s ritek Adakunom.
42001049	Kamok wu aya a ta nye ayiik'e min nye agbang ikr, riyerek wu se zhl.
42001050	Kur riy wu se natoon fe a ta fok inyim wu, ma izam izam.
42001051	A nye ayiik ikr be ibk wu. A sak fe a ta be kuka tsik kayr ay ba n te shaam.
42001052	A tisik gwm natoon tsik rigwm ba, a tiyiik fe a ta mees rice.
42001053	A sak fe a ta fok izong ta whas be ikr itek, a ro rum dar ikng ikak.
42001054	A min s asam wu Isarela, ne a yiring be wu a ta fok kur riy wu,
42001055	ne Ibrahim be nabon wu ma izen izen, kyndi wu t f be da yir.
42001056	aMarya sor be Alisabatu kyndi ifn itaar nizham a t ra kubun kari.
42001057	Izen t fa nye Alisabatu tana tes igon'e, yong a tes igon kamitek'e.
42001058	fegbak wu ne afe iri wu t fa fok ye, Agwm gwm n fok kur riy wu didng, yong t s mo be riy rikan.
42001059	Nama inom ikara be kutes'e, b nong t nye igon'e izhak, shim ke t yis be riyerek atek wu, aZakariya.
42001060	Amma anyining igon'e f ye, Wayo, a t ku yis ye, aYohana.
42001061	Ayong f be wu ye, Akak kuse kayr afe iri wan ta be riyerek'ong baŔ
42001062	Ayong rip atek igon'e be ibk ye ka wu shim a t yrk igon'e angan ?
42001063	A f ye a ru ku nk ikng izibir, ne a zibir ye, Riyerek'e nye aYohana. Koangan te zhing.
42001064	Nizen iyong aYohana bun a kpaan kuf kanu, yong a san kukerek Adakunom.
42001065	fegbak'e te zhing. nerawe yiir kuf itak natoon ikr na cei niwp i ta se nawhanang niben aYahuda.
42001066	Koangan aya a t fok itak'e daam kayr riy wu, ne a ma t ye, K igon'e t te aky ? Kamok kukyem Adakunom se mak be wu.
42001067	A shining ada wu aZakariya be Kabik Kazhl'e yong a nye kuzarap ye,
42001068	Nakerek nye nafe Ada Adakunom ner Isarela, kamok an b an shesh nerawe wu.
42001069	A min nk yir aner kashesh aya a ta be kukyem, kayr kasa asam wu aDauda.
42001070	Kyndi wu t f ni nanu ner kuzarap wu azhl'e agbugbang'e.
42001071	Ye, wu tin shesh yir nubk mudn yir ne ya a tin di yir kyr cei.
42001072	A fok kur riy da yir, ne a yiring be rif wu rizhl'e riya sang a tana bur ba,
42001073	be kushu a t nye be ada yir Ibrahim ye,
42001074	a tin shesh yir nubk mudn yir, nong a tin sak yir t ku nye yir itomong dar inyim
42001075	kayr kuse kuzhl'e ne kunye kutek nashn wu nusor yir cei.
42001076	Wan, igon'i, a t ka yis ye aner kuzarap Adakunom Ayiik'e, wan t tseng nashn Agwm gwm nong t nye kanyk iren kamok wu.
42001077	A t nk nerawe wu kuren itak kashesh kayr kurng rinn ba,
42001078	kamok kur riy Adakunom yir, ne akanang kashesh a ta ne naza tin wuruk ni yir
42001079	nong ku ta tonong fe a ta se kayr awhi be fe a ta se na nawu riku akanang. Ne a ni tonong yir iren i ta b be kameneng riy.
42001080	Ne igon'e rasak, ne ka kpa agap kayr Kabik. A sor kayr katse ma izen iya a tin wuruk kanang natoon nerawe Isarela.
42002001	Nizen iyong agbang agwm a t ku yis ye aKaisar Agusta nk itsi ye a ra fa nerawe niben aRom cicr.
42002002	Iyu ne i nye imsng ifa nerawe a t nye nizen iya aKiriniyus t nye agwmna niben aSuriya.
42002003	Koangan be nuwp wu nong a t su ku fa.
42002004	Ayong aYusufu gip a dorok na aNazaret niben aGalili, a t be niben aYahuda nuwp aDauda, a ta yis ye aBetalami, kamok wu nye aner kasa aDauda.
42002005	A tseng azong nong t su ku fa be aMarya, kanamang kusam wu ame, ne ka se be kafa.
42002006	Nizen t se azong, izen kutes'e nye,
42002007	yong a tes acam, igon imsng wu. A kunung be tan ares nong a t mees nukpara a tin korok itsamang naya, kamok ba s kasa nar tsen t ku tisik ba.
42002008	fe kufek tuse t sor niwng bubarak azong ne yrk tsamang ba natuk.
42002009	Amaleka Adakunom ti wuruk niba ne akanang kuyiik Adakunom ku gorok ba ma inyim t r ba didng.
42002010	Amma amaleka'me f be ba ye, Sang tu fok yin inyim ba, mi ma ka bn yin Rif Ritek rif riy rikan didng, riya ri ta nye rif nerawe cicr.
42002011	Katuur a ma ka tes yin aner kashesh nuwp aDauda, wu ne a nye aKiristi, aya a ta nye Agwm gwm.
42002012	Ikng iya yin tana san i di yin nye, igon a tan kunung be tan ares nameneng kayr kukpara a tin tes itsamang naya.
42002013	Nizen izining rigwm maleka fe a ta se kayr kaza wuruk nong t kerek Adakunom mak be amaleka ame ye,
42002014	Kuyiik nye kufe Adakunom aza kayr kaza, nazatse kameneng riy kuse nufe ner fe wu ta shim.
42002015	Nizen iya maleka'me t ku won ba nong t ku bun naza, fe kufek ame f ye, I tseng yir na aBetalami nong ta se di yir ikng Adakunom t min tak yir na.
42002016	Iyong tseng zizirik ne se s aMarya be aYusufu be igon ame an mees kayr kukpara a tin tes itsamang naya ame.
42002017	Nizen fek ame t di igon'e yong tsang taas ikng iya ba t fok natoon igon'e.
42002018	nerawe ya a t fok itak cicr korok ibk nafok ne te zhing.
42002019	aMarya sak ikr'me cei kayr riy wu, ne a ni t natoon'e.
42002020	fek ame t bun ne tsang tiyiik Adakunom ne ku kerek kamok ikr ba t fok ne di cei, kyndi a t ku tak ba.
42002021	Nama inom ikara be kutes'e, izen a tana ku nye izhak t fa nye, yong a t ku te riyerek ye, aYeso, riyerek riya amaleka t tsang a ku te'me kum ne an be kafa wu ba.
42002022	Izen a tana ku kusu ba nama kutes t nye, kyndi Itsi aMusa ta f, yong aYusufu be aMarya tseng be aYeso na aUshalima nong a t nk nashn Agwm gwm.
42002023	Kyndi i t se kayr izibir Itsi Agwm gwm ye, Koakye igon kamitek'e kafe imsng'e t sor Kazhl'e kafe Agwm gwm.
42002024	Ne nye asidaka bp afa ka zip ifa ayi kyndi Itsi Agwm gwm t f ye ra nye.
42002025	T, aner akak tuse na aUshalima a t ku yis ye aSiman, afe a t se gyr nashn Adakunom, ne a nye Adakunom itomong. A se be kutor afe a tana b a tsesek Isarela. Kabik Kazhl'e se mak be wu.
42002026	Kabik Kazhl'e tsang ka ku tonong ye sang wu t tsang a ku ba, ma a di aKiristi'me, aya Agwm gwm t kasa.
42002027	Kabik'e t ku ra riy, yong a n nubang agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben, izen iya atek igon'e t b be igon ba aYeso ame, nong a t ku nye ikng iya Itsi ba t f.
42002028	Ayong aSiman t shan a t ku kunung, ne a kerek Adakunom ne a f ye,
42002029	Agbang Agwm gwm, kyndi wan t tsang i f, kyrna won asam wan tu tseng caang.
42002030	Kamok mi n di kashesh wan be anyisi mi,
42002031	Kaya wan t nye kanyk'e nanyisi nerawe cei.
42002032	A ta nye akanang afe a tana tonong ner aya sang a ta nye ner aYahuda ba, katsak, ne a bn nerawe wan Isarela kuyiik.
42002033	Atek igon be anyining'e te zhing be ikng iya a t f natoon igon'e.
42002034	Ne aSiman ku te ba kuc a t f be aMarya anyining igon'e ye, Adakunom tsang a sak igon na t sak nerawe Isarela akak tu ku bun kama, ne a sak kak ta ya kashn. A t sor ikng nerawe tanin f imaan'e natoon wu,
42002035	nong a s a t ts kutrng nerawe whr, ne ikng'e t ya riy didng gip.
42002036	Abining akak a t nye kuzarap tuse azong gip, riyerek wu nye aHanatu angas aPanuwel irem Ashiru. A tsang a kop didng, a te ay kanataar be amitek wu
42002037	ne amitek'e ku. A sor akumung ma ay isk ikara be anaas, a kam be agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben zr ba. A yiir ya Adakunom iben katuk be kunom ne a nye azumi be aduwa.
42002038	A b nufuba nizen iyong, a t kerek Adakunom, ne a f rif natoon igon'e nufe ya a t sor ne tor t di aya a tana sheshek aUshalima.
42002039	Nizen aYusufu be aMarya t fa gang i nye ikr Itsi Adakunom t shim cei, t bun na aGalili t be nuwp ba na aNazaret.
42002040	Igon'e rasak ne ka kpa agap a t shining be kukyem ne ritek Adakunom se mak be wu.
42002041	Koakye riy tek aYeso tseng na aUshalima kamok riy rikan izen aPasova.
42002042	Nizen aYeso t se ay kusk be afa, atek wu tseng be wu nar riy rikan kyndi ign ba t f.
42002043	Nama t gang riy rikan'e, tek aYeso'me t sen kubun kari, aYeso tu fan na aUshalima, ba ren ba.
42002044	sor ye a se mak be ba, ma woso kutseng ne san i ku tsr kayr fe iri be ferim ba.
42002045	t fa ku di ba, ne kubun na aUshalima nong t su ku tsr.
42002046	Nama inom itaar t s kayr agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben nusonong natite ner kubsp, ne a ka foos ba ne a ku risim ba.
42002047	Koangan afe t ku fok, te zhing kamok kuren ikng wu be kuri kushiish wu t shiish.
42002048	Atek wu t fa ku di ne a te zhing, ne ang wu f be wu ye, Igon'i, aky sak wan ti nye yir'e ana ? Yir be ada wan i kun daam yir be ku ka tsr yir makiyi.
42002049	Ayong a t ku rip ba ye, Aky sak yin tsang i ni tsr yin ? Yin ren yin ye gyr ke mi se nasa Ada mi aa?
42002050	Amma ba ren ikng wu tin f natoon'e ba.
42002051	Ayong a tseng na aNazaret mak be ba ne a kuus ikng iya ba t f. Ang wu saas ikr'me kayr riy wu cei.
42002052	Ayong aYeso ti barang kurasak ne kukyem, ne a kpa kati kaseng nashn nerawe ne Adakunom.
42003001	Nizen aKaisar aTibariya ta se kayr riy rif kusk be atoon be rigwm wu, aBuntus Bilatus nye agwmna iben aYahuda, ne aHiridus nye agwm iben aGalili ne aronyining wu aFilibus nye agwm iben Ituriya be aTarakunitus, ne aLisaniya nye agwm iben Abiliya.
42003002	Nizen iya aHanana be aKayafas t nye gbang tsi, rif Adakunom b nufe aYohana igon aZakariya kayr katse.
42003003	A tsang a tseng niben aUrdun cei ne a f rif natoon abatisma kushishing kuse nong a t ku rng ba rinn.
42003004	Kyndi i ta se ni izibir kayr kufumung Ishaya aner kuzarap ye, Kut aner akak yis kayr katse ye, Nye yin Agwm gwm iren, ku nye yin iren'e cop.
42003005	Nar na ta se surung a t shining be iben, Koakye kawhanang be agung a t yirik. Iren i ta se gordok, i t te riyong, Iren i ta risik i t te itek.
42003006	nerawe cei t di kashesh Adakunom.
42003007	aYohana f be rigwm nerawe a t bs nufu nong a tu ku nye ba abatisma ye, Yin naban afomong! Angan t tees yin ye i ra teng yin amok Adakunom a t saase ?
42003008	Nye yin kunye kuya ku tana tonong ye yin n shishing yin kuse yin, sang tu wk yin rice yin ye Ibrahim ne a nye ada yin ba. Mi ta tak yin, Adakunom ta kyem a sok ata na, a tin nye Ibrahim inoon.
42003009	Kanu katm se ritin kakon'e kyrna, koakye kakon ka ta tes kutes kutek ba, a t tmng a t te nurng.
42003010	Ne rigwm nerawe'me ku rip ye, T, aky ne yir ta nye yir ?
42003011	Ayong aYohana f ye, Aner aya a ta be akpiin afa a ra kabak be afe a ta be ba, afe a ta be naya ra nye anong gip.
42003012	fe kushashang itsm iben bs nong t ka nye ba abatisma gip, ne rip ye, Aner kubsp, aky ne yir ta nye yir ?
42003013	Ayong a f be ba ye, Sang tu ba shan yin ikng i ta gor iya a t f ye i ri shashang yin ba.
42003014	Ne sozha kak ku rip ye, Aky ne yir t nye yir ? Ne a f be ba ye, Tin shashang yin itsm nufe akak be agap ka tin bs yin naborok na nerawe ba, nifan yin nitsm a ta ka karang yin.
42003015	nerawe se be kutor kub aKiristi, ne nibrng kayr ay ba ye ka aYohana ne a nye aKiristi'me ?
42003016	aYohana f be ba ye, Mi ta nye yin abatisma be ashi, akak afe a ta be kukyem ne a ni nar, t b, afe mi tana kyem i bis idun akpatak wu ba. A t ka nye yin abatisma be Kabik Kazhl'e ne kurng.
42003017	Kube wu se nubk wu, a tanin tas alikama a tan shsh, ne a tusung iwng'e kayr ingm, ne a shosh wh'me be kurng kuya sang a tana riming ba.
42003018	aYohana nk nerawe iriri itabak be agap ne a ku nye ba awazi.
42003019	aYohana tigba aHiridus a t nye agwm, kamok aHiridus'e sok aHirudiya a ta nye abining aronyining wu ne ikr imaan'e ikak wu tan nye.
42003020	aHiridus ti barang amaan kunye ne a te aYohana nitsm.
42003021	Nizen iya a t nye nerawe'me abatisma cei, a nye aYeso'me gip. aYeso ta se be i nye aduwa, kaza karak,
42003022	ne Kabik Kazhl'e kyndi abp ni tiik ni wu. Ne kut ne naza ye, Wan ne i nye Igon'i kaya mi ta shim. Mi fok kusas wan didng.
42003023	Nizen iyong aYeso se ay isk itaar a t san itomong wu. A nye igon aYusufu, nutrng rinerawe, aYusufu nye igon aHeli.
42003024	aHeli nye igon aMatat, aMatat nye igon aLawi, ne aLawi nye igon aMelki. aMelki nye igon aYana, ne aYana nye igon aYusufu.
42003025	aYusufu nye igon aMatatiya, ne aMatatiya nye igon Amos. Amos nye igon aNahum, ne aNahum nye igon Azaliya. Azaliya nye igon aNaya,
42003026	ne aNaya nye igon aMaat. aMaat nye igon aMatatiya, ne aMatatiya nye igon aShimeya. aShimeya nye igon aZhose, ne aZhose nye igon aZhod.
42003027	ne aZhod nye igon aZhowanan. aZhowanan nye igon aRafaya, ne aRafaya nye igon aZarubabel. aZarubabel nye igon aSheltiyel, ne aSheltiyel nye igon aNeri.
42003028	aNeri nye igon aMelki, ne aMaki nye igon Adi. Adi nye igon aKosam, ne aKosam nye igon Almadam. Almadam nye igon Ar,
42003029	ne Ar nye igon aZhoshuwa. aZhoshuwa nye igon Aliyeze, ne Aliyeze nye igon aZhorim. aZhorim nye igon aMatat, ne aMatat nye igon aLawi.
42003030	aLawi nye igon aSaminu, ne aSaminu nye igon aYahuza. aYahuza nye igon aYusufu, ne aYusufu nye igon aZhonam. aZhonam nye igon Aliyakim,
42003031	ne Aliyakim nye igon aMaleya. aMaleya nye igon aManana, ne aManana nye igon aMatata. aMatata nye igon aNatan, ne aNatan nye igon aDauda.
42003032	aDauda nye igon aZhese, ne aZhese nye igon aObida. aObida nye igon aBowas. aBowas nye igon aSalmon, ne aSalmon nye igon aNashon.
42003033	aNashon nye igon Aminadap, ne Aminadap nye igon Aram. Aram nye igon aHeruna, ne aHeruna nye igon aPeres. aPeres nye igon aYahuda, ne
42003034	aYahuda nye igon aYakub. aYakub nye igon Ishaku, ne Ishaku nye igon Ibrahim. Ibrahim nye igon aTera, ne aTera nye igon aNahor.
42003035	aNahor nye igon aSeruk, ne aSeruk nye igon aReyu. aReyu nye igon aPelek, ne aPelek nye igon Aber. Aber nye igon aShela, ne
42003036	aShela nye igon aKana. aKenan nye igon Afazad, ne Afazad nye igon aShem. aShem nye igon aNuhu, ne aNuhu nye igon aLamek.
42003037	aLamek nye igon aMetusela, ne aMetusela nye igon aEnok, aEnok nye igon aYarek ne aYarek nye igon aMahalale, ne aMahalale nye igon aKenan.
42003038	aKenan nye igon Anosh, ne Anosh nye igon aShitu. aShitu nye igon Adamu, ne Adamu ma nye igon Adakunom.
42004001	aYeso dorok ni ishng aUrdun. An shining be Kabik Kazhl'e, ne Kabik Kazhl'e tseng be wu kayr katse,
42004002	azong ne Ishetan su ku bmng, inom isk inaas, ko a yas ba. Ni igang'e izong tu r, kamok sang a t ya naya ba.
42004003	Ishetan f be wu ye, Ke wan ne i nye Igon Adakunom, t, f be kuta na nong ku ta te abiredi.
42004004	Ne aYeso f be wu ye, I se ni izibir ye, Sang be naya ne anerawe tin sor tsek ba.
42004005	Iyong Ishetan bun a tseng be wu nar kakak ring ring, nong a t su ku tonong rigwm kazatse cei kayr izen cik.
42004006	Ne a bun a f be aYeso'me ye, Mi t ka nk iren nong tin nye rigwm natoon ikr na cei ne kuyiik ikr'me sor i kufuan, kamok a min nk ikr na cei. Kamok anong mi ta kyem i nk aner aya mi ta shim.
42004007	Kamok anong, ke wan ti ya iben, ikr na t te ifuan cei.
42004008	aYeso f be wu ye, I se ni izibir ye, Agwm gwm wan Adakunom ne wan t ku ya iben ne i ku nye itomong tsek.
42004009	Iyong Ishetan tseng be wu na aUshalima, ne a ku sak a t nyeseng nar ka ta se ring ring natoon agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben. Ne a f be aYeso'me ye, Ke wan ne i nye Igon Adakunom, ne i furuk ma kaben.
42004010	Kamok i se ni izibir ye, Adakunom t f be maleka wu be agbang kut nong ta ka tnng,
42004011	ne ka tor be ibk, fan wan bu rus kutak nuta.
42004012	Ayong aYeso f be wu ye, I se ni izibir ye, Sang wu tu bmng Agwm gwm wan Adakunom ba.
42004013	Nizen iyong Ishetan t fa gang kubmng aYeso'me cei, ne a dorok a t ku won ma a bun a s izen.
42004014	Ayong aYeso t bun na aGalili be kukyem Kabik Kazhl'e ne itak natoon wu tseng koak.
42004015	A yiir ku kubsp ba'me kayr atu aduwa, ne koangan ku kerek.
42004016	A be na aNazaret nar a t ku ta, a se n kayr kutu aduwa katuk Asabar kyndi a tan m ne a nye. A dorok a nyeseng nong a t fa kufumung.
42004017	Iyong t nabak kukpa Ishaya, a t fa bisik, ne a s kar a t zibir ye,
42004018	Kabik Adakunom se mak be mi, kamok anong a mi n kasa nong t taas fe rizor Rif Ritek. A min tom nong ta taas fe a ta se nitsm ye ra sor washak ne i karak akpatn anyisi, ne i sak fe a t ka mr ba ta sor nk.
42004019	Ne i tak izen iya Adakunom tana tonong nerawe ritek wu.
42004020	Ne a kunung kukpa ame nong a t nk aner aya a tin sak riy, ne a sonong. Koangan afe a ta se kayr kutu aduwa ame ti sak anyisi ni wu.
42004021	Ne aYeso f be ba ye, Katuur rif na shining nato yin.
42004022	Koangan f itek natoon wu, ne te zhing be Rif Ritek ri t wuruk nanu wu. Ne na risim ye, Igon aYusufu na aa?
42004023	Ayong aYeso f be ba ye, Mi ren yin tin tak yin karr rif na ye, Abok, bok rice wan! Nye ikng iya yir t fok yir ye wan nye na aKapanum aze nuwp wan.
42004024	Ne aYeso ya kashn be rif ye, Katsak'e, mi ta ka tak yin. Aner kuzarap be kuyiik nuwp wu ba.
42004025	won ta tak yin katsak'e, kumung tuse whr niben Isarela nizen iya Iliya t nye kuzarap, iza t gaar kukpa ay ataar be ribir, a nye izong didng kayr iben'e cei.
42004026	Gip be anong, Adakunom tom Iliya nufe akak ba ba, ma nufe akumung afe a ta se na aZerifat niben aSidon.
42004027	nerawe tuse whr t nye kparng nizen Ilisha aner kuzarap, gip be anong a sak akak ba te atser ba, ma aNaaman aner aSuriya tsek.
42004028	nerawe ta se kayr kutu aduwa'me cei nye riy kubeseng didng nizen iya t fok anong.
42004029	dorok t ku ro ma nama kuwp'e nong t tseng be wu ring ring natoon kawhanang kaya a tin nk kuwp'e, nong as ta su ku tomong ma kaben.
42004030	Amma aYeso'me n natite nerawe a t tseng akn wu.
42004031	Ayong a be na aKapanum nuwp kukak niben aGalili, ne a san kubsp nerawe'me katuk Asabar.
42004032	nerawe'me te zhing be kubsp wu kamok rif wu be kukyem.

42004034	Yeye! Aky ne wan tsr be yir ? Wan m b nong tin fs yir a? Mi ta ren, wan nye azhl'e afe Adakunom!
42004035	Ayong aYeso t ku tigba ye, Tigbik! Wuruk kayr wu. Ne amaan kabik'e barak aner ame kaben nashn ba cei nong a ta wuruk dar ku kuman.
42004036	nerawe'me cei te zhing, ne naka risim ye, Aky kuri kubsp na ? A f be amaan nabik be kukyem ne agbang kut ne wuruk!
42004037	Ikng aYeso t nye na tseng koak.
42004038	aYeso won kutu aduwa'me nong a t tseng nasa aSiman, anyining abining aSiman'e se be kurm kuzhoosh didng, ne a f be aYeso ye a ra b a tin sak kubk ni wu nong a t te atser.
42004039	Ayong aYeso tiguum bubarak be wu nong a t tigba kurm kuzhoosh'e, yong a te atser. A wor a dorok a ta kpaan i ku nyes ba.

42004041	tseng gip i wuruk kayr nerawe whr, ne i tasak ye, Wan nye Igon Adakunom. Amma a tu tigba ba, ne a ka roon ba kuf kanu, kamok ba ren ye wu ne a nye aKiristi.
42004042	Kadiding t fa karak ne aYeso dorok nuwp'e nong a t be nar kakak wu zr. nerawe yiir itsang ku tsr. t fa b nar kaya a t kuse, ne tsr iren fan a bu tseng a ta ka won ba.
42004043	Amma a f be ba ye, Ma mi taas Rif Ritek natoon rigwm Adakunom ni iwp ikak gip, kamok ikng i ta sak a tin tom'ong.
42004044	Ne a yiir inye awazi kayr atu aduwa na aGalili.
42005001	Katuk kakak aYeso se nunyeseng nanu kudung aZhanisarat yong nerawe'me t ku firik nong t fok rif Adakunom.
42005002	A di akpara ashi afa nukim kudung'e, aya fe kuyising izos tan sak, t sen kusu agunung ba.
42005003	Ayong aYeso n kayr kukpara'me kukak, ku ta nye kufe aSiman, a t f be wu ye, a ra sees be kukpara ame kayr ashi'me nong a tin sonong kayr'e nong a t s kar a t ku bsp nerawe'me.
42005004	A t fa gang kuf kanu, ne a f be aSiman ye, Sees be kukpara'me nar kudung'e ta se tsik nong ta barak agunung'e t s izos.
42005005	Ayong aSiman f be aYeso ye, Atekasa, yir ks yir itomong, i s yir ikng ikak ba. Amma kum wan t f anong, won yir ta barak yir agunung'e.
42005006	t fa nye anong ne yising izos whr ma gunung'e kpaan kusarak.
42005007	Ne yis fudang t se kayr kukpara kukak be ibk nong t b tu ku s mo ba. tusung izos'e zung zung kayr akpara'me ma ku san kuns kayr ashi.
42005008	aSiman Bitrus t fa di anong, ne a tigbok akuur wu kaben nashn aYeso nong a t f ye, Kam be mi Agwm gwm, mi nye aner rinn.
42005009	Kamok wu be fudang wu cei fok azhing be kuri izos ba t yising,
42005010	anong ne aYakub be aYohana inoon aZabedi, ferim itomong aBitrus'me. Ayong aYeso f be aSiman ye, Sang tu fok inyim ba, kyrna wan t ma yising nerawe makong kyndi wan ta yising izos.
42005011	Iyong kk akpara ba t saas nukim kudung'e, nong t won koakye, t ku kuus.
42005012	Nizen iya aYeso ta se kayr kuwp kukak, aner akak rikparng t tsang ri kuya didng, a t fa di aYeso ne a kpa kaben a t ku nye akusuk ye, Atekasa, ke wan shim, wan ta kyem i ni sak ta te zhl.
42005013	Ayong aYeso nabak kubk nong a ta ra aner ame, ne a f be wu ye, Mi shim, te zhl! Ne rikparng'e wor ri ku won.
42005014	Ne aYeso f be wu ye, Sang tu tak akak ba, tseng t se tonong rice wan nufe atsi, ne i nye asidaka aya aMusa t f ye a ra nye kamok kute zhl wan nong i ta sor ikng ife koangan tana ren.
42005015	Gip be anong, itak natoon aYeso ti barang kutseng gugk ma rigwm nerawe bs nong t ku foos, ne a ku sak ba t te atser.
42005016	Amma aYeso yiir itseng ninar nakak nong a t se nye aduwa kama wu gak.
42005017	Katuk kakak aYeso t se be kubsp ner aFarisi'me be fe kubsp Itsi, fe a t nes ni iwp izhizhk'e niben aGalili be ife aYahuda ne aUshalima se nusosok azong. Kukyem Adakunom tuse azong nong as aYeso t sak fe irk t te atser.
42005018	ner akak b be akun akak natoon ikng kameneng, shim t n be wu kayr kasa'me nong t ku mees nashn aYeso.
42005019	Ba t kyem s iren kun be wu ba, kamok nerawe t nar agap, yong ngarak natoon kutu ku ta se kyndi azhrng, nong t ku tiik nikng kameneng wu ame. ta sak katoon kutu'me nong ta tiik be wu natite nerawe ma nashn aYeso.
42005020	aYeso t fa di kunk katsak ba, yong a f ye, Ar, a ma ka rng rinn wan.
42005021	ner aFarisi be fe kubsp Itsi ame, kpaan kut nay ba ye, Angan ne a zhsh Adakunom na ? Angan ta kyem a rng anerawe rinn wu, sang ke Adakunom ba ?
42005022	aYeso t ren ikng iya ba ta t kayr ay ba yong a f be ba ye, Kamok aky yin t yin anong kayr ay yin ?
42005023	Inyaka r ne i nar ? A tana f ye, A ma ka rng rinn wan, ka a ta f ye, Dorok, ta tseng ?

42005025	Aner ame wor a dorok nashn ba, nong a t sok ikng kameneng wu ame. A t be kari, ne a tsang a kerek Adakunom.

42005037	A korok ashi anap afas kayr ariding kukpa kuzen ba. Ke a nye anong, ashi anap afas'e ta feneng ma ka ta sarak ariding'e ne ka nyosong. LB00145b.tif

42006001	Katuk Asabar akak aYeso ku sen gor kayr rik alikama, ne limazhiri wu kpaan bs ace alikama'me, ne tirip be ibk nong t ya ica'me.
42006002	Ayong ner aFarisi kak t ku rip ye, Aky sak yin nye yin ikng iya Itsi ta roon kunye'me katuk Asabar ?
42006003	Ayong aYeso f be ba ye, Yiring yin ikng iya aDauda t nye nizen wu be nerawe wu t fok izong.
42006004	A t n nar a t ku ya Adakunom iben, a t sok abiredi azhl'e, aya ta se gyr ke ba ya ba, ma ke tsi tsek. A t nk fudang kutseng wu gip.
42006005	Ne aYeso f be ba ye, Igon Anerawe ne a ti nye rigwm natoon Asabar.
42006006	Katuk Asabar akak gbak aYeso n kayr kutu aduwa a ta se be kubsp nerawe'me. Aner akak tuse azong aya kubk riya wu t w.
42006007	ner aFarisi be fe kubsp Itsi se be kutsr iren a tana s aYeso be rinn. Iyong ti sak anyisi ni wu nong t di ka a t sak akak ta te atser katuk Asabar'e.
42006008	aYeso ren ikng ba ta sen t'me yong a f be aner kubk'e t w ame ye, Dorok ta nyeseng nashn nerawe. Ayong aner ame dorok a t nyeseng.
42006009	aYeso f be ba ye, Won mi ta ka rip yin. Aky ne Itsi Adakunom f natoon Kunom Asabar ? I se gyr a ta nye ikng itek ka a ta nye ikng imaan'e ? I se gyr a ta shesh kutser ka a ta fr ?
42006010	A kirik a t ku yrk ba cei, ne a f be aner ame ye, Nabak kubk wan. A nabak kubk'e, ne kubk'e te kutser gyr.
42006011	Ay ba beseng didng yong a kpaan ibrng awan ba natoon ikng iya a tana nye be aYeso.
42006012	Katuk kakak, kayr inom iyong aYeso ngarak natoon kawhanang nong a t nye aduwa. A ks i nye aduwa'me.
42006013	Kadiding t fa karak, ne a yis limazhiri wu, a kasa kusk be afa kayr ba nong t te manzo. A yrk ba na:
42006014	aSiman aya a tin te riyerek ye aBitrus, be aronyining wu Adarawus, ne aYakub be aYohana, ne aFilibus, be aBatalomi.
42006015	Be aMatiyu, ne aToma, be aYakub igon aZabedi, ne aSiman aya a t ku yis ye aner a t be rifup kaben wu.
42006016	Be aYahuda igon aYakub, ne aYahuza Iskariyot, aya a t sok aYeso a t nk.
42006017	aYeso tiik be manzo ame nar ka ta se nk. Rigwm nerawe tuse azong ya a t nye alimazhiri wu, ne nerawe aya a nes niben aYahuda be aUshalima ne fe iben aTaya be aSidon.
42006018	bs nong t ku foos, ne a ka sak ba nong t te atser. aYeso turung amaan nabik kayr ya a t be.
42006019	Koangan shim a t ku ra kamok kukyem wuruk kayr wu, ne a ku sak ba nong t te atser cei.
42006020	Ayong aYeso kirik a t yrk limazhiri wu ne a f ye, ner riy rikan ne nye yin fe rizor kamok rigwm Adakunom nye rif yin.
42006021	ner riy rikan ne nye yin fe izong ta ka r yin kyrna, kamok yin t whas yin. ner riy rikan ne nye yin i ta tos yin kyrna, kamok yin t mas yin.
42006022	ner riy rikan ne nye yin nerawe t ka di yin kyr, ne kam be yin ne ka kas yin, ne ka ranyin kyndi ikng imaan'e, kamok Igon Anerawe.
42006023	Nye yin riy rikan katuk'ong ne i to yin nato riy rikan, kamok agbang ishorong yin se naza. Anong ne da ba nye be ner kuzarap.
42006024	Aw be yin fe i ta nye yin rum, kamok yin n s yin ikng i tana ka shirim yin ay.
42006025	Aw be yin fe i ta whas yin kyrna, kamok izong t ka r yin. Aw be yin fe i ta mas yin kyrna, kamok yin t nye yin riy riwe ne i tos yin.
42006026	Aw be yin fe koangan tin f Rif Ritek natoon yin, kamok anong ne da ba nye be ner kuzarap afe abs.
42006027	Kyrna, mi f be yin ye, yin fe i tin foos yin ye i ra shim yin mudn yin ne i tonong yin fe a ta ka ranyin yin ritek.
42006028	F yin itek natoon ya a ta ka kas yin, ne i nye yin fe a ta ka nyeen yin aduwa.
42006029	Ke aner akak ta rus nufok kukak, ne i ku kirik kufe afa'me gip, ke akak ti shan ikng ku naka kis wan, tu ku roon kukpiin wan ba.
42006030	Koangan ne a ta rip ikng ikak, ku nk. Ke aner akak sok ikng iya i t nye ifuan, tu f ye a ra bun a ka nk ba.
42006031	Nye yin nerawe ikng iya yin ta shim yin ba ta ka nye yin'e.
42006032	Ke yin shim yin awan fe a ta ka shim yin tsek, ishorong aky ne yin ta s yin nufe Adakunom ? Ko fe rinn gip shim fe a ta ka shim ba.
42006033	Ke yin nye yin fe a ta ka nye yin kunye kutek tsek, aky ne yin nye yin'ong ? Ko fe rinn nye anong gip.
42006034	Ke yin nyesek yin fe yin ta ka shim yin ba ikp, ne bun ka karang ko yin, aky ne yin nye yin'ong ? fe rinn naka nyesek ikp gip, ne shim ta ka karang ko ba'me cei.
42006035	Shim yin mudn yin ingya, ku tonong yin ba ritek. Ku nyesek yin ba ikp dar ku ni te riy ye t ka karang yin, nong ishorong yin t se whr, ne i te yin inoon Ada Adakunom ayiik'e, kamok wu se gyr be fe a ta won dar tonong riy rikan ba, ne ya a ta nye imaan'e.
42006036	Be yin kur riy kyndi Ada yin ta be kur riy.
42006037	Sang tu t yin akak amok ba, fan a ba ka t yin'e. Sang tu tn yin akak amok ba, fan a ba ka tn yin'e. Rng yin kak rinn ba, nong a t ma ka rng yin rif yin.
42006038	Nk yin nong yin gip a t ma ka nk yin whr, kumaas kutek a ta ysp ne a zr ma i nyos ne a ka krk'e nibk. Kuri kures kufe yin tin maas yin akak'e, kuri kuyong ne a t ma ka maas ko yin'e.
42006039	A bun a t tak ba kumaas na ye, Akpatn ta kyem a kk afudang ishn a? Ke nye anong, t kpas ba cicr kayr ribong aa?
42006040	Aner a ta sen bsp ikng kun nar aner a tu ku bsp'e ba, amma koangan a t ku bsp'e gyr t te kyndi aner a t ku bsp'e.
42006041	Aky sak wan yrk ikuk i ta se rinyisi afudang wan ne i won agbirik rinyisi rifuan ?
42006042	Aky sak wan t f be afudang wan ye, Won mi ta ka tun ikuk rinyisi, nong wan be rice wan t kyem i di kugbirik kuya ku ta se rinyisi wan ba ? Wan, akardak aner, san ku tun ikng i ta se rinyisi wan nizham ta ra kyem i di gyr ne i tun iya i ta se rinyisi afudang wan.
42006043	Kakon katek tes kutes kumaan'e ba, ka kakon kamaan'e tes kutes kutek ba.
42006044	A ren koakye kakon be kutes wu. A s kutes atafo ritin ikiritsan ba, ka a s kutes kakon katek na amaan ritin kakon ba.
42006045	Aner atek f Rif Ritek kamok kutrng wu nye kutek, amma amaan aner f amaan rif kamok kutrng wu t nye kumaan'e. Kamok ikng iya i ta se kayr riy ne i wuruk nanu.
42006046	Aky sak yin ti yis yin ye, Agwm, Agwm, ka i ra nye yin ikng iya mi t f ba ?
42006047	Mi t ka tonong yin kuri kuse aya afe a ta b nunaan, ne a fok rif mi, ne a ninye itomong.
42006048	A se kyndi aner aya a ta se be rink. A rum kar tsik nong a tin barak ribor'e natoon agudong. Ashi t fa ta ne a carak kasa'me, a kyem a zuur ba, kamok ribor'e ta se gyr.
42006049	Aner aya a ta fok rif mi, sang a tin nye itomong ba, a se kyndi aner aya a ta nk kasa dar ribor ritek, izen iya ashi ta, ne a carak kasa'me, ne kasa'me t wor ka kpa ne ka yirik cei.
42007001	aYeso t fa gang kuf ikr'ong cei ne nerawe foos, ne a be na aKapanum.
42007002	Aritek sozha akak tuse azong, afe asam wu t nye atser ba, an te kyndi a t ku. Asam'me se yiik didng nufe atekasa wu.
42007003	Aritek sozha'me fok itak aYeso yong a tom kk kashn ner aYahuda nufu nong t su ku nye izong ye a ra b sak asam wu t te atser.
42007004	t fa b nufe aYeso, ne ku nye akusuk ye, I ta se gyr ke wan b sak asam aner na ta te atser,
42007005	kamok a shim ner yir, ma a min nk yir kutu aduwa.
42007006	Ayong aYeso tseng be ba. A se gugk be kasa'me ba, ne aritek sozha'me tom ferim wu nufe aYeso ye ra se f be wu ye, Atekasa, sang tu daam ba, mi kyem ke wan b nasa mi ba.
42007007	Ikng i t sak mi t kyem i b nufuan'ong ba, frng tsek asam'i t te atser.
42007008	Kamok mi gip, akak ti nye rigwm ni mi ne mi min i nye rigwm na kak. Ke mi f be ayu ye, a ra tseng, ne a tseng, ne i f be akak ye, a ra b, ne a b. Ke mi f be asam mi ye, a ra nye iyu, ne a nye.
42007009	aYeso t fa fok anong ne a te zhing, ne a kirik a t f be rigwm nerawe a t ku kuus ame ye, Mi ta ka tak yin, mi kun di aner akak kayr ner Isarela afe a ta be kunk katsak be agap kyndi aner na ba.
42007010	ner a t tsang ku tom ba ame tu ku bun kari'me, ne se s asam'me n te atser.
42007011	Nama anong, aYeso be nuwp kukak a t yis ye aNayin ne limazhiri wu be rigwm nerawe tseng mak be wu.
42007012	A t fa b bubarak be kanu kuwp'e, ne a nyim sen wuruk be kukom acam akak, afe a ta se zr na anyining wu. Anyining'e nye akumung. nerawe whr t se nuwp'e se mak be wu.

42007018	Nizen iya limazhiri aYohana t ku taas ikr'me cei, yong a yis ner afa kayr ba
42007019	nong a t ku tom ba nufe aYeso ye, ra su ku rip ye, Wan ne a nye aya a t f ye a t b ame ka ba ra tor akak zr ?
42007020	ner ame t fa b nufe aYeso, ne f be wu ye, aYohana aner abatisma min tom yir nufuan ye i ra b ta ka rip yir ye, Wan ne a nye aya a ta f ye a ta b ame ka ba ra tor akak zr ?
42007021	Nizen iyong aYeso sak fe a t nye atser ba, be fe iriri irk whr t te atser, ne a turung amaan nabik, ne a sak kpatn whr t di kar.
42007022	Ne a f be ner a t ku tom ba ame ye, Ku bun yin, ta su ku tak yin aYohana ikr yin t di yin ne i foos yin, akpatn s kudi kar, ne kun tseng gyr, kparng te atser, gbato fok kuto, ikom dorok be kutser, ne a taas fe rizor Rif Ritek.
42007023	Aner riy rikan ne a nye aner aya a tin be agak riy natoon mi ba.
42007024	Nama tom aYohana ame t ku bun, aYeso san kutaas nerawe'me itak natoon aYohana ye, Aky ne yin se di yin katse ? Aner aya a ta se kyndi agam kuwun ta zim a?
42007025	Sang ke anong ba, yin se di yin aky ? Aner a t te ares atek a? Wayo, fe a t tes ares itsm ne fok kusas kusor sor nazuri rigwm.
42007026	T, aky ne yin se di yin ? Aner kuzarap a? Ei, mi ta tak yin a nar aner kuzarap.
42007027	Ayu ne a nye aya a t zibir itak natoon wu ye, Di, mi t tom atom'i nashn wu aya a tana ka nye iren.
42007028	Mi ta ka tak yin, kayr kutes nyining, akak kuse a t nar aYohana ba, gip be anong, aya a ta nye igang'e kayr rigwm Adakunom tu nar yiik.

42007030	ner aFarisi be fe a t ren Itsi didng raba kanyk Adakunom natoon ba, kamok sang aYohana tsang a ku nye ba abatisma ba.
42007031	Be aky ne mi tin maas nerawe izam iyu ? se kyndi aky ?

42007035	A ren kukyem be ikng iya ku ta nye.
42007036	Aner aFarisi akak f be aYeso ye, ra se ya naya kari wu, yong tseng nasa aner'e nong a ta se yas.
42007037	Abining akak a t sor kusor wu kayr rinn kayr kuwp'e t fa fok ye, aYeso sen yas nasa aner aFarisi'me, yong a b be name ikn itek nudu, a t nye be ikng ikak a ta yis ye alabasta.
42007038	A t te cing na atak aYeso a t tos, ne nanyisi wu ni kpas natak aYeso, ne a rng nanyisi'me be nakuyng wu, a kunung atak aYeso'me nong a tin kon name ikn itek ame.

42007043	Ayong aSiman f be aYeso ye, Mi di ye afe a t ku won itsm'e whr ne a nar. aYeso f ye, Wan f gyr.
42007044	aYeso kirik nabas afe abining ame, a t f be aSiman ye, Wan di abining na a? Mi b kari wan, wan ti nk ashi tanin kusu atak'i ba, amma wu shu atak'i be nanyisi wu, a t rng be nakuyng wu.
42007045	Wan ti tonong kushim didng ba, amma abining na, kum nizen iya mi t b, a won kukur atak'i ba.
42007046	Wan ti korok name rice ba, amma wu ti kn name ikn itek natak.
42007047	Kamok anong mi ta ka tak ye, a mu ku rng rinn wu ri ta se whr kamok a tonong kushim didng. Amma afe a t ku rng rinn wu cik, tonong kushim cik mama tsek.

42007050	Ne aYeso f be abining'e ye, Kunk katsak wan ma ka shesh, tseng caang.
42008001	Nama anong, aYeso tsang a tseng ni iwp igbang'e be izhizhk'e, ne a taas Rif Ritek natoon rigwm Adakunom, limazhiri kusk be afa ame se mak be wu.

42008003	be aZhowana abining aKuza afe a t nye itomong nasa aHiridus be aSuzana ne kak whr. nyining na tu ss mo ba be ku ka nyesek ba ikr didng kayr ikr ba t be.
42008004	Nizen rigwm nerawe t sen nyim, kak nes ni iwp zr zr nong t bs nufe aYeso. Ayong a t tak ba kumaas na ye,
42008005	Aner ikap akak be ni nas izha naya. Nizen iya a t se be kunas'e, ca'me ikak kpas niren ne shesh, ne nanon tang.
42008006	ca'me kak kpas nifang agudong, i t fa tang ne i koor kamok sang kar'me t be iben didng ba.
42008007	kak kpas kayr ikiritsan, ne ikiritsan'e rasak mak be ba, ne i ku tnng ba.

42008009	Iyong limazhiri wu t rip ikng ife kumaas'e ta sor.
42008010	aYeso t tak ba ye, A ma ka nk yin kukyem kuren ikr rigwm Adakunom i ta se nunrng, amma be kak mi ta f ne i ninye kumaas, nong a s ta yrk gyr tatan, amma t ra di ba. t foos gyrtatan, t ra ren ikng iya tin f ba.

42008017	Ikng ikak kuse i ta se nunrng ife sang a tana won dar a ren ba, ka ikng ikak kuse nukis ife sang a tana won dar a ts na akanang ba.

42008019	Ang aYeso be ronyining wu tseng nong t f ku kanu be wu, kyem b bubarak be wu ba, kamok rigwm nerawe.
42008020	Ayong aner akak f be wu ye, Ang wan be ronyining wan se nufang shim ta f kanu be wan.

42008023	t se be kutseng'e, ne ida sok aYeso. Kuwun dorok be agap na agbang kudung'e, ne ashi san kuns kayr kukpara'me, ma ba n kayr kudaam didng.

42009003	A f be ba ye, Sang tu sok yin ikng ikak kamok kutseng yin'e ba, ko ishn, ka ishika, ka naya, ka itsm, ka tu be yin akpiin afa ba.

42009017	Cicr ba ya ma whas, ne limazhiri'me tusung ribir kpis'e cip ni derse kusk be ifa.
42009018	Katuk kakak aYeso t se be kunye aduwa wu zr, yong limazhiri wu b t s. Ne aYeso t rip ba ye, nerawe f ye mi nye angan ?

42009020	Ayong aYeso t rip ba ye, T, yin ne ? Yin di yin ye, mi nye angan ? Ayong aBitrus f ye, Wan ne i nye aKiristi afe Adakunom t tom.
42009021	aYeso t kpam ba ye sang t tak akak ba.

42009023	Ayong aYeso f be ba cicr ye, Koangan afe a ta shim a tin kuus, a ra rawu rice wu nong a ta sok kukon a tana ku tigak mo koakye kunom nong a tin kuus.
42009024	Koangan afe a ta shim a ta shesh kutser wu, a tin wei. Afe a tin wei nutser wu kamok'i, a t shesh kutser wu.
42009025	Aky kuri ikng itek ne anerawe ta s, ke a s kazatse na cei, ne a rin wei nutser wu ?
42009026	Koangan afe a ta fok isum mi be rif mi, Igon Anerawe ta fok isum wu nizen iya wu tana b kayr kuyiik wu be kuyiik Ada wu ne kufe maleka azhl'e.
42009027	Katsak'e ne mi ta ka tak yin, kak fe a ta se aze t tsang kus ba, ma di rigwm Adakunom nizham.

42009030	Ayong ner kak ba afa ti wuruk ni wu be kuyiik, ner'e nye aMusa be Iliya,
42009031	ne f be aYeso itak riku wu a tana kam be kazatse, izen'e tan b bubarak i ta shining na aUshalima.
42009032	Ida yising aBitrus be fudang wu, t fa te kparak, ne di kuyiik aYeso be ner afa ame nunyeseng be wu.

42009034	Nizen iya a t ru f kanu, kunn wuruk ku t ku kis ba, ne inyim ka r ba.
42009035	Ne kut kukak wuruk kayr kunn'e ye, Ayu ne a nye igon'i, mi tan kasa. Ku fok yin kuto.
42009036	Nama kut'me t te yu, ne di aYeso wu zr. limazhiri'me sak ikr'ong kayr ay ba, tak akak ikng ikak natoon'e nizen iyong ba.

42009040	Mi nye limazhiri wan akusuk ye ru ku tun'e, ra kyem tun ba.
42009041	Ayong aYeso f ye, Ka. Yin nerawe izam na, I ta shonong ne i won dar i nk yin katsak, mi ta sor ma an nong tana ka tsesek be yin ? Bn igon wan'e aze.
42009042	Nizen igon'e t saase, amaan kabik'e t barak kaben ne a tiim, iyong aYeso tigba amaan kabik'e ne a sak igon'e t te katser ne a nk atek'e.

42011033	Akak te kurng na apitila ne a kis, ka ne a sak ribong agadu ba, amma a sak nagarang nong fe a ta bs kayr kasa'me ta di akanang'e.

42016009	Mi t ka tak yin ye i rin nye yin itomong be kurum kazatse nong tin s yin ferim, nong as ke kurum'e gang, a t ka shan yin nar kafe izen izen.
42016010	Koangan ne a nye katsak nikng ihiir'e, a t kyem a nye katsak nigbang'e gip. Koangan ne a nye katsak nikng ihiir'e ba, a t nye katsak nigbang'e gip ba.
42016011	Kamok anong, ke yin nye yin katsak nikng kazatse na ba, angan ne a t ka nk yin kurum kufe katsak nong tin sak yin riy ?
42016012	Ke yin nye yin katsak nikr akak ba, angan t ka nk yin ikr ife yin ?
42016013	Akak ta kyem a nye atek kasa afa itomong ba. A ta shim akak ne a rawu akak, ka ne a tiyiik akak ne a zhsh akak. Wan ta kyem i nye Adakunom ne Itsm itomong nizen izining ba.
42016014	ner aFarisi ta shim itsm didng t fa fok anong, ne ni kk acoop na aYeso.
42016015	aYeso f be ba ye, Yin ne i shim yin nerawe ta ka di yin ye yin nye yin ner katsak, amma Adakunom ren ay yin. Ikr nerawe ta di yiik i se fr nufe Adakunom.
42016016	A taas nerawe Itsi aMusa ne rif ner kuzarap Adakunom agbugbang'e ma nizen aYohana aner abatisma. Amma kum a ta taas Rif Ritek natoon rigwm Adakunom, koangan gaas kar nong a ta n kayr'e.

42016019	Arum akak tuse afe a t tes ares atek afe itsm, ne a fok kusas kusor yr yr kamok kurum wu t be.

42019041	aYeso t fa b bubarak be aUshalima, a sok anyisi a ta yrk kuwp'e, yong a tos kamok kuwp'e. HK00379b.tif 
Horace Knowles; The British & Foreign Bible Society Agbang kuwp aUshalima
