42023003	Ayong aBilatus rip aYeso ye, Wan ne i nye agwm ner aYahuda a? aYeso f be wu ye, Ei, wan ne i f anong.

42023005	Amma nerawe'me yiir'e kar kar ye, Ay nerawe niben aYahuda cei n dorok naza be kubsp wu. A san'e na aGalili yong a n b ma aze.
42023006	aBilatus t fa fok anong ne a rip ye, A nye aner aGalili a?
42023007	A t fa fok ye aYeso se niben ife aHiridus t ku nye rigwm, yong a f ye a ra tseng be wu nufe aHiridus, a ta se na aUshalima nizen iyong gip.
42023008	Nizen aHiridus t di aYeso riy wu karp didng, kamok an shim ku ku di gbugbang. A shim ke a t di kamok ikr wu t foos natoon wu, nong a t nye ikr ikak ife azhing.
42023009	A yiir ku risim iriri ikr didng, ka aYeso t sak ko'me ba.
42023010	gbang tsi ne fe kubsp Itsi ya a t se nunyeseng azong bs be rif natoon wu.
42023011	aHiridus be sozha wu tn be wu fr, ne ku kok ko'me. t te kukpiin gwm ta tes, t bun tseng be wu nufe aBilatus.
42023012	Katuk kayong ne aBilatus be aHiridus te aner be aferim, t tsang nye aner be amudn.
42023013	aBilatus yis gbang tsi ne fe rigwm be ribir nerawe cei,
42023014	nong a t f be ba ye, Yin ti bn yin aner na ye a tees nerawe nong ta kn be rigwm. Mi mu ku risim nashn yin mi t s be rinn ikng ikak kyndi yin t f yin ba.
42023015	Anong ne aHiridus gip, a t s be rinn ba, iyong ne i sak a t bun ko nufe yir. Yin di yin gip, ko a nye ikng i ta tas ke a ku fr ba.
42023016	Kamok anong mi tu ku whereng ne i ku won.
42023017	[Ni ign ba, koakye izen aPasova aBilatus ta tun aner akak nitsm.]
42023018	Amma nerawe cei ta kut ye, A ku fr, ne a ni tun yir aBarabas.
42023019	aBarabas nye aner a t ku te nitsm kamok a t sak nerawe t kn be rigwm iben kayr kuwp ma a ti fr aner akak.
42023020	aBilatus shim ke a won aYeso yong a bun a f be ba gbak,
42023021	amma nerawe'me bun yiir tang kut ye, A ku tigak! A ku tigak!
42023022	Ayong aBilatus bun a f be ba kutak kufe ataar gbak ye, Kamok aky ? A nye rinn aky ? Sang mi t s be rinn ri ta kyem a t ku fr ba. Kamok anong mi t sak a tu ku whereng nong a tu ku won.
42023023	yiir kutasak kar kar ye a ru ku tigak, kutasak ba sak ma a kuus rifuba.
42023024	aBilatus t di anong a t nye ba ikng iya ba t shim.
42023025	A t won ba aner aya a t tsang a ku te nitsm kamok kuren a ta sak nerawe ta kn be rigwm iben ma ti fr aner akak, ayong a t nk ba aYeso nong tin nye ikng iya ba t shim.
42023026	Nizen t sen tseng be aYeso, nyim be aner aSirin akak, a t ku yis ye aSiman. A se be kutseng wu, a ta n kayr aUshalima. t sak ye ma a ra cer kukon a tanin tigak aYeso nong a tin kuus aYeso nama.
42023027	nerawe whr ti kuus na aYeso'me. kak nye nyining fe a t nye riy riwe, ne tsang tos.
42023028	Ayong aYeso kirik a t f be ba ye, nyining aUshalima, tu tos yin kamok'i ba, tos yin kamok rice yin ne inoon yin.
42023029	Kamok izen saase iya nerawe tana f yin ye, ner riy rikan ne nyining ya sang t kun tes ba, ya a t nye asang igon, ka ya a t kun ngasa igon ba.
42023030	Nizen iyong, nerawe t f be nawhanang ye, Ni kpas yin natoon yir. Ne f be agung ye, Ni kis yir.
42023031	Ke i se ye nerawe ta nye ikr na be kakon ne ka ruresek kashirim, t an ne t nye ke kakoor ?
42023032	tseng be ner kak ba afa t nye rinn nong t su ku fs ba mak be aYeso.
42023033	t fa b nar a ta yis ye Ahkark Ace, ne tigak aYeso'me azong mak be fe rinn ame, azining nubk riya, ne afe afa nubk rimen.
42023034	Ne aYeso f ye, Ada, ku rng ba'me, kamok ren ikng ba ta nye ba. Ne kasap ares wu be ku ni barak ica ikiriwhr.
42023035	nerawe nyeseng nong tu ku yrk, ne kk kashn'e ku kok'e, ne f ye, A shesh kak, a ra shesh rice wu, ke wu ne a nye aKiristi afe Adakunom t kasa.
42023036	Sozha gip b bubarak nong t ku kok'e, ne ku nk ashi anap aya a t se kpukpak.
42023037	Ne f be wu ye, Ke wan ne i nye agwm aner aYahuda ne i shesh rice wan.
42023038	Izibir tuse nukon'e dim rice wu, i t f ye,
42023039	Azining kayr aya a t ku tigak ba mak, t barak amaan rif ye, Wan ne i nye aKiristi aa? Shesh rice wan ne i ni shesh yir.
42023040	Amma afe afa'me t zhr a t f ye, Wan fok inyim Adakunom aa? Wan di wan ta sen s risam kuri rifu aa?
42023041	Risam a tin nk yir se gyr, kamok kunye yir nye kumaan'e, aner na nye rinn ikng ikak ba.
42023042	Ayong a bun a f be aYeso ye, Yiring be mi kayr rigwm wan.
42023043	aYeso f be wu ye, Won ta ka tak katsak'e, katuur wan t se mak be na aParadis.
42023044	Nabas itsm kusk be afa nunom, kar te whi koak nazatse ma nabas itsm itaar nunom,
42023045	kamok sang kunom tar ba. Alaple a t se kayr agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben sarak natite.
42023046	aYeso t kut naza a t f ye, Ada, nubk wan, ne mi won kutser mi. A t fa f anong, ne a krk isong wu ife igang'e.
42023047	Izen iya aritek sozha'me akak t fa di anong yong a kerek Adakunom, ne a f ye, Katsak'e aner na nye azhl'e.
42023048	fe a t b nong ta di kutigak aYeso, t fa di ikr'ong, korok ibk nut nong t ku burung.
42023049	Amma cicr fe a t ren aYeso'me ne nyining t tsang ku kuus kum na aGalili nyeseng gugk nong t yrk ikr'ong cei.
42023050	Aner Arimatiya akak tuse riyerek wu t nye aYusufu niben aYahuda, a nye azining kayr kk kashn aner aYahuda. A nye aner atek, ne a se gyr nashn Adakunom.
42023051	A shim ibrng be ikng iya ba t nye ba. A se be kutor kub rigwm Adakunom.
42023052	A be nufe aBilatus a t se f ye, a ra ku nk kukom aYeso.
42023053	A tiik'e a t kunung be kures kukan a t yis ye alilin a t se nr kayr kurk a t ta nifang agudong kuya sang a t kun ni nr akak ba.
42023054	I se nawhshirim, izen kunye kanyk kunom Asabar.
42023055	nyining ya a t kuus aYeso kum na aGalili ame tseng mak be aYusufu, nong t se di kar kurk'e be kar a t ku sak kukom'e.
42023056	Nama anong nyining'e t bun kari, ta se nye ikr i ta be ikn itek nong t sen te nukom'e. fan katuk Asabar kyndi Itsi Adakunom ta f.
42024001	Bop nadiding katuk imsng'e na asate, nyining ame sok ikr ikn itek ame nong t tseng nurk'e.
42024002	se s an biring kuta ku ta se nanu kurk'e.
42024003	Izen iya ba t n, s kukom Agwm gwm yir aYeso ba.
42024004	Kum ne ba ru t natoon'e, ne ner kak ba afa be ares akan t gysm ti wuruk nukim ba.
42024005	nyining'e te cing be ace kaben kamok inyim, ne ner ame f be ba ye, Aky sak yin tsr yin aner atser kayr fe a tan kus ?
42024006	A kuse ba, an dorok. Yiring yin ikng iya a t ka tak yin, nizen a t rusek be yin na aGalili.
42024007	A t f ye, Ma a ta sok Igon Anerawe a ta nk nubk fe rinn, a tu ku tigak, ne a bun a dorok nurk katuk ife ataar.
42024008	Iyong nyining ame yiring'e be rif aYeso t ku tak ba.
42024009	Nizen t ne nurk'e b, taas limazhiri kusk be azining be ribir nerawe ikr'me cei.
42024010	nyining t tak manzo ikr'me nye aMarya abafe aMagadaliya be aZhuwana ne aMarya anyining aYakub be kak t se mak be ba.
42024011	Ka ti nk katsak rif nyining'e ba, kamok rif'me t sor ba kyndi iwhas.
42024012	aBitrus dorok be itsi, a t be nurk'e. A t fa tiguum ne a di awan ares a t ku kunung mo, yong a t bun ne a tsang a t ka aky ne i nye ?
42024013	Kunom kuyong'e ner afa kayr ya a t kuus aYeso tseng be nabuwp kukak ta yis ye Imawus. Atsik'e be aUshalima ta se kyndi akilomita kusk be azining.
42024014	sen tsang f natoon ikr i ta nye cei.
42024015	Nizen ba t sen tsang f itak'e ne aYeso be rice wu b a t s ba nong a t tseng mak be ba.
42024016	Amma a sak ba t ren baba ba.
42024017	Ayong aYeso t rip ba ye, Aky ne yin sen tsang i f yin ne i tseng yin ? Iyong nyeseng kyn t tsibik nyisi ba.
42024018	Azining kayr ba riyerek wu ta nye aKiliyopas t rip ye, Wan ne i nye aner atsen na aUshalima tsek, i ta dun ikng i t nye azong kayr inom na a?
42024019	Ayong a tu rip ba ye, Aky kuri ikr ? Ne f be wu ye, Natoon aYeso aner aNazaret. A nye aner kuzarap Adakunom. A be kukyem ku ninye ikr ne kuf kanu nashn Adakunom ne nerawe cicr.
42024020	gbang tsi be gwm yir t sok t nk nong as t ku tn amok riku, ne ku tigak.
42024021	Amma yir tsang i ni te yir riy yir ye, wu ne a nye afe a tana shesh ner Isarela. T, di kunom kufe ataar be kunye ikr na.
42024022	Gip be anong nyining kak ba afa t se mak be yir bun ti nk yir azhing. ne nurk'e bop nadiding na,
42024023	se s kukom'e ba. b ti tak yir ye ba di maleka afa t f be ba ye a nye atser.
42024024	fudang yir kak tseng nurk'e, se di'me kyndi nyining'e t f, amma t ku di ba.
42024025	Ne aYeso f be ba ye, Yin funam kak, aky kuri ay ne yin be yin i ta won dar i ni nk yin katsak nikr ner kuzarap Adakunom t f ?
42024026	Aser, sang ma aKiristi s risam ikr na cicr, a ta ra s kuyiik wu aa?
42024027	A san i ku taas ba ikr i ta se kayr Afumung rif Adakunom cei natoon rice wu, kum nizen aMusa ma nizen fe kuzarap'e cei.
42024028	t fa b bubarak be kaban kuwp kaya ba tu ku be, ne aYeso nye kyndi wu t wesek nashn.
42024029	t nye akusuk, ne f be wu ye, Kusuk, ks be yir kamok kunom n b bubarak ku ta kpa. Ayong a tseng mak be ba.
42024030	Nizen aYeso t se be iya naya mak be ba, a sok abiredi, a t tonong Adakunom riy rikan, ne a tsng ne a san ku nyesek ba.
42024031	Iyong nyisi ba ma karak, tu ren, ne ni ti zhau niba.
42024032	naka risim ye, Nizen iya a t se be kuf kanu be yir niren, ne a karak fumung rif Adakunom, ma ay yir shirim caang aa?
42024033	ner afa'me wor dorok gbashak nong t be na aUshalima. Azong ne se s manzo kusk be azining ame be fe a ta se be ba naka tusung.
42024034	sen f be ba ye, I nye katsak! Agwm gwm n dorok ma an tonong rice wu nufe aSiman.
42024035	Ne ner afa ame ku tak ba ikng i tu ku s ba niren, be kuri iren iya ba t kyem ren ye a nye aYeso nizen a t tsng abiredi.
42024036	Kum ne ru f itak'e ne aYeso be rice wu wor a ti wuruk natite ba. A t f be ba ye, Kameneng riy se mak be yin!
42024037	Iyong te febek be inyim, sor ye ikng iya ba ta di nye itseng.
42024038	Ayong aYeso f be ba ye, Aky sak yin daam yin ? Yin ti be yin agak riy ?
42024039	Di yin ibk'i be atak'i. Mi na be rice mi! Ni ra yin ta fok yin, itseng be kurm be ikup kyndi yin ta di yin mi ta be ba.
42024040	A t fa f anong, ne a ku tonong ba ibk be atak wu.
42024041	Gip be anong ti nk katsak ba, kamok riy rikan be azhing. Ayong a t rip ba ye, Yin be yin ikng kuya aze aa?
42024042	Iyong t nk izos a tan reer.
42024043	Ayong aYeso shan a t ya, ne ba yrk.
42024044	Ne a f be ba ye, Ikng mi ta ka tak yin'ong, kum ne mi rusek be yin, ye ma a shining koakye i ta se ni izibir natoon'i kayr Itsi aMusa t zibir be afumung ner kuzarap Adakunom ne aZabura.
42024045	Ayong a t sak ba ta ren ikng afumung'e ta f.
42024046	Ne a bun a f be ba ye, Ikng i ta se ni izibir na ye. aKiristi'me t s risam, a t ku, ne a dorok nurk katuk afe ataar.
42024047	A ta taas nerawe ninar zr zr itak natoon kushishing kuse be kurng rinn kayr riyerek wu, A ta san'e na aUshalima.
42024048	Yin ne i di yin ikr na, yin ne i ta tas yin kak.
42024049	Mi t ka tom yin ikng Ada mi t tsang a ni sak ye a t ka nk yin, amma sor yin kayr kuwp na, ma a t kis yin be kukyem kuya ku ta ne naza.
42024050	Ayong aYeso t kk ba kashn nong t wuruk niren bubarak be aBetani, ne a sok ibk naza a t ku te ba kuc.
42024051	Kum ne an gang ku ka te ba kuc'me ba, nong a ta kam be ba. A t sok a t tseng'e kayr kaza.
42024052	Iyong tu ya iben, ne ku bun na aUshalima be riy rikan didng.

43001001	Ni imsng'e nye Rif, Rif'me se be Adakunom, Rif'me nye Adakunom.
43001002	Wu ne a se mak be Adakunom kum ni imsng'e.
43001003	Be wu ne a nye koakye ikng, ikng ikak kuse ife a tEnye dar wu ba.
43001004	Kayr wu kutser kuse, kutser na bn be akanang nufe nerawe.
43001005	Akanang'e ya kayr awhi, amma awhi'me tEku ren ba.
43001006	Aner akak b afe Adakunom tEku tom: riyerek wu ta nye aYohana.
43001007	A b nong a tEb taas katsak natoon akanang'e, nong as kamok wu ne nerawe cicr tin nk katsak.
43001008	Sang wu aYohana'me ne a nye akanang'e ba, amma a b nong a tEf itak natoon akanang'e tsek.
43001009	Akanang afe katsak aya a ta nyeseng nerawe akanang cicr kayr kazatse saase.
43001010	Rif'me se kayr kazatse gbugbang, kamok be wu ne a tin nye kazatse, gip be anong kazatse'me tu ku ren ba.
43001011	A b nufe iya i tEnye afu, amma fu'me tu ku shan ba.
43001012	Amma cicr fe a tEku shan ne Eni nk katsak riyerek wu, a tEnk ba iren kute inoon Adakunom.
43001013	Sang inoon naya a tEtes kuri rife rinerawe ba, ka kayr kushim kurm tsek ba, ka nushim aner tsek ba, amma Adakunom be rice wu ne a nye Ada ba.
43001014	Rif'me te anerawe ne a sor kayr yir. Yir n di yir kuyiik wu, kuyiik kuya ku ta nye kufe asuzr Igon ku ta ne nufe Ada wu tsek, a ta shining be ritek ne katsak.
43001015	aYohana f itak natoon wu. A tEkut nong a tEf ye, Ayu ne a nye aya mi tEf itak natoon wu nizen iya mi tEf ye, Aya a tana b nama mi, a ti nar, kamok wu tuse nizham a tErin tes.EE
43001016	Kayr ritek wu ri ta se didng ne yir cicr s yir ritek natoon ritek.
43001017	Kamok Itsi b nubk aMusa, amma ritek be katsak b nubk aYeso aKiristi.
43001018	Aner akak kun di Adakunom ba. Amma asuzr ke Igon wu tsek, aya a ta se rifam Atek wu, ne a sak yir tEku ren yir.
43001019	Iyu ne i nye ikng ife aYohana tEf nizen iya ner aYahuda aya a tase na aUshalima tEtom tsi ne ner aLawi ye Era su ku rip ye, Wan nye angan ?E
43001020	aYohana ton ne ba, amma a tEtak ba kanang ye, Sang mi ne i nye aKiristi'me ba.E

43001022	Ni igang'e Ebun a tEku rip ye, T, wan nye angan ? Ni tak yir nong as tEse tak yir ya a tin tom yir. Wan f ye wan nye angan ?E
43001023	Ne aYohana ku tak ba be rif Ishaya aner kuzarap, a tEf ye, Mi ne i nye kut kuya ku ta yis kayr katse ye, Nye yin iren cop kamok Agwm gwm.EE
43001024	yong aner aYahuda aya a tEse kayr kugung rice aFarisi ya a tEku tom ba,
43001025	rip aYohana'me ye, Iyong aky sak wan ta nye abatisma ke wan nye aKiristi, ka Iliya ka Aner Kuzarap'e ba ?E
43001026	Ne aYohana f ye, Mi nye abatisma be ashi, amma nunyeseng aze be yin akak kuse aya yin tu ku ren yin ba.
43001027	Wu ne a nye aya a tana b nama mi, idun akpatak wu mi ta kyem i bis ba.E
43001028	A nye ikr na cei na aBetani, nunyi ishng aUrdun, nar aYohana tEku nye abatisma.
43001029	Katuk afe afa aYohana di aYeso saase nufu, yong a f ye, Di yin, Aturuk Adakunom, aya a tan n sok rinn kazatse!
43001030	Ayu ne a nye aya afe mi tin f natoon wu ye, Aner aya a tana b nama mi a ti nar kamok wu se nashn'i.E
43001031	Mi tsang i tEren gbugbang ba, amma mi b be kunye abatisma be ashi nong ta sak ner Isarela tu ku ren.E
43001032	Ayong aYohana nk a sheda na ye, Mi di Kabik Kazhl'e ta ne naza kyndi abp ka tin tiik natoon wu.
43001033	Mi tsang i ku ren ba, amma Adakunom afe a tin tom nong ta nye abatisma be ashi ti tak ye, Aner aya wan di Kabik ti tiik ne a ni sonong natoon wu t, wu ne a nye aner kunye abatisma be Kabik Kazhl'e.E
43001034	Mi di anong, kamok anong mi ta kyem i f koakye natoon wu ye, wu ne a nye Igon Adakunom.E
43001035	Naya katson'e aYohana se azong be limazhiri wu afa.

43001037	Nizen iya limazhiri afa ame tEfa fok anong, yong Ekuus aYeso.

43001040	Adarawus, aronyining aSiman Bitrus, nye akak kayr ner afa fe a tEfok ikng iya aYohana tEf ne a kuus aYeso.
43001041	Ikng ife imsng'e Adarawus ta nye, nye a tsr aronyining wu aSiman, a tu ku tak ye, Yir n s yir aKiristi (wu nye a nye aMasihu ).E
43001042	Iyong a b be aSiman nufe aYeso. aYeso tEyrk ne a f be wu ye, Wan ne i nye aSiman igon aYohana a? A tEka yis ye aKefasE(i ta sor aBitrus).
43001043	Kadiding tEfa karak ne aYeso nye kanyk ku be na aGalili. Ayong a se s aFilibus ne a f be wu ye, Ni kuus.E
43001044	aFilibus nye aner kuwp aBatseda, kuwp kuzining be Adarawus be aBitrus.
43001045	Iyong aFilibus s aNataniyel ne a f be wu ye, Yir n s yir aner aya aMusa tEzibir itak wu ne ner kuzarap bun zibir natoon wu, aner nye aYeso afu Nazaret, igon aYusufu.E
43001046	Ayong aNataniyel f ye, I se ye ikng ikak itek tEwuruk na aNazaret a?E Ne aFilibus f be wu ye, B ta di.E

43001048	Ayong aNataniyel rip aYeso ye, Wan nye an i tin ren ?ENe aYeso ku shim'e ye, Mi tEdi kum nizen wan tErusek ritin atafo, nizham aFilibus tEra ka yis.E
43001049	Iyong aNataniyel f ye, Aner kubsp, wan ne i nye Igon Adakunom; wan ne i nye agwm Isarela.E
43001050	Ne aYeso f ye, Wan ti nk katsak kamok mi tEka tak ye mi tEdi ritin atafo a? Wan tEdi ikr azhing iya i ta nar iyong.E
43001051	Iyong aYeso bun a f be wu ye, Mi ta ka tak katsak'e, wan tEdi kaza nukarak, ne maleka Adakunom ngarak naza ne Etisik natoon Igon Anerawe.E
43002001	Katuk afe ataar a nye riy rikan kuwnng nuwp aKana niben aGalili. Anyining aYeso tuse azong
43002002	A tak aYeso be limazhiri wu kuwnng'e gip.
43002003	Ashi anap tEfa gang, yong anyining aYeso f be wu ye, Ashi anap ba n gang cei.E
43002004	Iyong aYeso f be wu ye, Ang, aky sak wan f be mi ? Izen'i n nye ba.E
43002005	Iyong anyining aYeso f be sam'me ye, Nye yin koakye ikng a tana f ye i ru nye yin.E
43002006	Nafeneng igataar nafe a tEnye be ata tuse bubarak azong, kuri naya ner aYahuda tin nye itomong ni ign ku naka kusu ba nong Eta te zhl. Koakye kafeneng'e ta sok galon isk ifa ka itaar ayi. LB00135b.tif 
Horace Knowles; The British & Foreign Bible Society Aner akak sen korok ashi ni nafeneng
43002007	Iyong aYeso f be sam'me ye, Shishing yin nafeneng'e be ashi.EIyong ba shishing nafeneng'e be ashi cip cip.
43002008	Ne a f be ba ye, T, kyrna b yin ashi'me nong ta se nk yin aner a tin sak riy nuwnng'e.E Ne ba nye anong.
43002009	Ne aner a tin sak riy nuwnng'e fok ashi'me tEkirik a tan te afe anap. A ren kar afe a tEku ne ba, amma sam fe a ta bn ashi'me ren. Iyong a yis aner a ta sok abining afas'e nukim.
43002010	A f be wu ye, Koangan san ku bn ashi anap aya a tEta ni imsng'e, nong izen iya ne tsen s didng, ne a bn be aya a ta mak a ta ba nama. Amma wan won aya a tEta didng ma kyrna!E
43002011	Iyu ne i nye ikng azhing ife imsng aYeso tEnye, a nye nuwp aKana niben aGalili. A tonong kuyiik wu azong, yong limazhiri wu ti nk katsak ni wu.

43002018	Ne kk kashn ner aYahuda b nufu ne Eku rip ye, Aky kuri itomong azhing ne wan ta kyem i ni tonong yir nong yir ta ren yir ye wan ta kyem i nye anong cei ?E

43002021	Agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben aYeso tin f'me nye kurm wu.

43002023	Nizen aYeso tErusek na aUshalima, nizen aPasova, nerawe whr di itomong azhing wu tEnye ne Eni nk katsak ni wu.

43002025	Wu shim akak tu ku tak ikng ikak natoon akak ba, kamok wu ren ikng i ta se kayr riy anerawe.
43003001	Aner akak tuse EtEku yis ye, aNikodimus, akak kayr kk kashn ner aYahuda, a tEse kayr kugung rice aFarisi.
43003002	A tseng nufe aYeso natuk a tEf be wu ye, Aner Kubsp, yir ren yir ye wan nye aner kubsp i ta ne nufe Adakunom. Kamok akak ta kyem a nye itomong azhing afe wan tEnye ba, sang ke Adakunom se mak be wu ba.E
43003003	Ayong aYeso f be wu ye, Katsak'e ne mi ta ka tak, akak kusa a ta kyem a n kayr rigwm Adakunom ba, sang ke a bun a tu ku tes kutes dim ba'.E

43003005	aYeso f be wu ye, Katsak'e ne mi ta ka tak, sang ke a bun a tes anerawe be ashi ne Kabik ba, a ta kyem a n kayr rigwm Adakunom ba.
43003006	Anerawe tes anerawe afudang, amma Kabik tes afe Kabik.

43003008	Kuwun fsm ne ku tseng nabas aya ku ta shim wan ta fok nawor'e, amma wan ta kyem i ren kar ku ta ne ka kar ku tEku be ba. Anong ne i se be koangan afe a ta be kutes Kabik.E

43003011	Katsak'e ne mi ta ka tak, yir f yir natoon ikr yir ta ren yir, ne iya yir ta di yir, gip be anong yin ti nk yin katsak nikng ife yir ta f yir ba.
43003012	Ke mi f be yin natoon ikr kazatse yin ti nk yin katsak rif mi ba, yong an ne yin tin nk katsak ke mi f be yin natoon ikr kaza ?
43003013	Akak kun tseng naza ba, ma ke aya a ta ne naza, wu ne a nye Igon nerawe.
43003014	Kyndi aMusa tEsok iwhen naza kayr katse anong ne a tEsok Igon Anerawe naza dim.
43003015	Nong koangan afe a tin nk katsak ni wu tEs kutser kufe izen izen.

43003017	Kamok sang Adakunom tom Igon wu kayr kazatse nong a tEb a t kazatse amok ba, amma nong kazatse tin s kashesh ni wu.

43003019	Iyu ne i nye amok'e, akanang b kayr kazatse, amma nerawe raba akanang'e nong Eta shim awhi ingya, kamok kunye ba nye kumaan'e.
43003020	Koangan afe a ta nye imaan'e, a rawu akanang'e. A ta shim kub na akanang'e ba, fan kunye wu bu wuruk ds.

43003022	Nama anong, aYeso be limazhiri wu tseng ni iben aYahudiya, a sor cik azong be ba, ne a nye abatisma azong.

43003024	(Nizen iyong a tsang a te aYohana kayr itsm ba.)

43005019	Iyong aYeso tEshim ba'me ye, Katsak'e ne mi ta ka tak yin, Igon'e nye ikng ikak be rice wu ba, a nye ikng ife wu ta di Ada wu ta nye tsek, kamok ikng ife Ada'me ta nye ne Igon'e nye gip.
43005020	Kamok Ada'me shim Igon'e, ne a ku tosong ikr ife wu ta nye cei. A tu ku tosong ikr igbang'e iya i ta nar iyu ma a ta ka te yin zhing.
43005021	Kyndi Ada'me ta dorok ya a tan kus ne a ka nk ba kutser, anong ne Igon'e nyesek aya riy wu ta shim kutser.

43005023	nong as nerawe cicr tEtiyiik Igon'e kyndi ba tEtiyiik Ada'me.
43005024	Katsak'e, mi ta ka tak yin, koangan ne a ta fok rif mi, ne a ni nk katsak ni wu aya a tin tom, a be kutser kufe izen izen. A tu ku t amok ba, kamok an wher riku a ta s kutser.
43005025	Katsak'e, mi ta ka tak yin, izen saase, n nye gip ma iya ya a tan kus tana fok kut Igon Adakunom, ya a tana fok ta s kutser.
43005026	Kyndi Ada'me ta nye iren kutser, anong ne a sak Igon wu ta sor iren kutser.
43005027	Ne a ku nk iren kut amok, kamok wu ta nye Igon Anerawe.

43005029	ne Ewuruk, ya a tEnye kunye kutek tEdorok be kutser, ne ya a tEnye kunye kumaan'e ta dorok nong a tEku t ba amok.
43005030	Mi kyem i nye ikng ikak be rice mi zr ba. Mi t amok'i kyndi Adakunom tin tak ye i ra nye. Kamok anong amok'i nye afe katsak, kamok mi nye ikng mi ta shim tsek ba, amma ife aya a tin tom.
43005031	Ke mi f rif natoon rice mi, t, i nye ye rif'me yong nye katsak ba.
43005032	Amma akak kuse a ta f rif natoon'i, mi ren ikng ife wu ta sen f'me natoon'i nye katsak.
43005033	Yin tom yin nufe aYohana, wu tEtak yin katsak'e.
43005034	Sang i se ye mi shim anerawe ta f natoon'i ba. Amma mi f anong, nong yin tEs yin kashesh.
43005035	aYohana se kyndi apitila aya a tEya, a tEse kanang, yin ti nye yin riy rikan be akanang wu nizen cik.
43005036	Mi be ayiik rif natoon'i rif i ta nar rif aYohana, kamok itomong iya Ada tin nk ye i ra gang, iyong ne mi sen nye'me ne i f ye, Ada ti tom.
43005037	Ada'me afe a tin tom'e, f natoon'i, yin kun fok yin kut wu ka yin kun ku di yin ba.
43005038	Rif wu kuse nay yin ba, kamok yin ti nk yin katsak naya wu ta tom ba.
43005039	Yin yiir bsp yin Afumung rif Adakunom, kamok yin di yin ye yin tEs yin kutser kufe izen izen kayr ba. Ba f rif natoon'i.
43005040	Gip be anong, yin gaar yin kub nunaan nong tEs yin kutser.
43005041	Mi tsr nakerek nufe nerawe ba.
43005042	Amma mi ta ren yin, yin be yin kushim Adakunom nay yin ba.
43005043	Mi b riyerek Ada mi, amma yin ti shan yin ba, amma ke akak b kub rice wu, ne yin ku shan yin.
43005044	An ne yin tEnk yin katsak'e, yin ta tsr yin nakerek nufe nerawe, amma sang i tsr yin nakerek nufe Adakunom wu zr ba ?
43005045	Amma tu di yin ye mi tEtseng kukun yin nufe Ada mi ba. Aner amok yin nye aMusa, aya yin tin te yin riy.
43005046	Ke a fa nye ye yin tin nk yin katsak na aMusa ke yin tin nk yin katsak ni mi, kamok wu zibir natoon'i.
43005047	Amma kum yin tin nk yin katsak nikng wu ta zibir ba, an ne yin tin nk yin katsak nikng mi ta f ?E
43006001	Nama izen cik, aYeso tar agbang kudung aGalili a tEyis ye kudung aTibariya.
43006002	Ne nerawe whr tEku kuus kamok ba di ikr azhing iya a tEnye natoon fe irk.
43006003	Ayong aYeso ngarak natoon kawhanang nong a tEse sonong azong be limazhiri wu.
43006004	Izen afe ner aYahuda tana nye riy rikan aPasova tsang b bubarak.
43006005	aYeso tEfa sok anyisi naza ne a di nerawe whr EtEsaase nufu ayong a f be aFilibus ye, Ak ne yir tEs yir naya nong tEshan yir kamok nerawe na nong EtEya EtEwhas ?E
43006006	aYeso rip aFilibus anong, nong a tEku bmng tsek, kamok wu tsang a ren ikng iya wu tana nye.
43006007	Ayong aFilibus f be wu ye, Ko, itsm itomong alebura ife ifn ikara ta kyem kushan naya nong koangan ta s ikpis'e ba.E
43006008	Amma azining kayr limazhiri wu'ame, aya a tEku yis ye, Adarawus aronyining aBitrus f ye,

43006010	Ne aYeso f be limazhiri wu'me ye, Sak yin nerawe'me ta sosok kaben.EAgam tEse whr nar'me, yong nerawe'me sosok. nerawe'me se kyndi izungu itoon.
43006011	Ayong aYeso sok abiredi'me nong a tEnye aduwa, a tonong riy rikan wu, ne a kasap nerawe EtEsosok kyndi ba tEshim. A nye anong be izos'e gip.

43006015	aYeso tEren ye ba se be kanyk nong a tEku sak a tEte agwm be agap, ayong a bun a tEbun natoon kawhanang wu zr.

43006017	ta n nukpara ashi nong EtEtar kudung'e EtEbe na aKapanum. Nizen iyong katuk tsang ka nye. aYeso tsang a b nufu ba nizham ba.
43006018	Ne amaan kuwun dorok natoon ashi'me be agap ma ashi'me tang agung.

43006020	Ne aYeso f be ba ye, Sang tu fok yin inyim ba. Aner'e nye mi.E
43006021	Ayong ba shim EtEsok kayr kukpara ashi'me. Kukpara'me tseng be ba zizirik nar afe ba tEku be.
43006022	Kadiding tEfa karak, rigwm nerawe tEtsang a se nunyi kudung'e ren ye kukpara kuzining ne kuse azong. Ba ren ye aYeso n n mak be limazhiri wu ba, amma ba tseng a ku wan ba.
43006023	Ne akpara kak a ta nye azhizhk'e a tEne na aTibariya b azong bubarak be kar kaya nerawe tEku ya abiredi aya aYeso tin nye aduwa natoon ame.
43006024	Nizen rigwm nerawe'me tEren ye, aYeso ka limazhiri wu tEse azong ba, yong En kayr akpara ashi ame nong Eta be na aKapanum ni itsr aYeso.
43006025	Nizen iya EtEku s nunyi kudung'e, EtEku rip ye, Aner Kubsp, aky izen ne wan b aze ?E
43006026	aYeso f be ba ye, Katsak'e, mi ta ka tak yin, yin tsang ni itsr yin, kamok yin tEya yin abiredi ame i tEwhas yin amma sang kamok yin tEdi yin itomong azhing iya mi tEnye ba.
43006027	Sang tu s yin risam ni itomong naya nafe na tana beseng ba, amma nye yin itomong natoon naya nafe na tana nk kutser kufe izen izen. Iyuna ne i nye kuri naya Igon Anerawe tana ka nk yin. Kamok Ada yir Adakunom min te iziz wu ni wu.E
43006028	Ayong nerawe rip aYeso ye, Aky ne yir tEnye yir nong ta shining yir ikng iya Adakunom ta shim ?E
43006029	Ne aYeso f be ba ye, Ikng ife Adakunom ta shim yin ta nye yin nye: Ni nk yin katsak naya afe wu tEtom.E
43006030	Iyong nerawe'me tErip ye, Aky kuri ikng azhing ne wan ta nye nong yir ta di yir nong tin nk yir katsak ni wan ? Aky ne wan tEnye ?

43006032	Ne aYeso f be ba ye, Katsak'e, mi ta ka tak yin, sang aMusa ne a tEka nk yin naya na tEne natoon kaza'ong ba, amma Ada mi ne a tEka nyesek yin naya nafe katsak na ta ne naza.
43006033	Naya Adakunom nye aya a tEne naza a tEtiik kaben ne a nk kazatse kutser.E

43006035	Ayong aYeso f be ba ye, Mi ne i nye naya naya na ta nyesek kutser. Aner aya a ta b nunaan, a ba tEfok izong ba. Aya a ti nk katsak natoon'i, a tEba fok kut kukoor ba.
43006036	Kyndi mi tEka tak yin, yin min di yin, gip be anong yin ti nk yin katsak ba.

43006046	Akak kun di Ada'me ba, ma ke aya a ta ne nufe Adakunom, wu tsek ne a kun di Ada'me.

43006050	Amma ayu ne a nye naya naya na ta ne naza, ke akak ya a tEku ba ma izen izen.

43006052	Ayong ner aYahuda ame san nanan awan ba be agap ye, Aner na ta nye an a tin nk yir rinam kurm wu nong ta ya yir ?E

43006055	Kamok rinam kurm mi nye kunik naya ne nask'i nye kunik'e.

43006059	aYeso f rif na nizen a tEse be kubsp nerawe'me nutu aduwa na aKapanum.

43007001	Nama anong, aYeso tsang a gorok aGalili. Amma shim a tEtseng kayr aYahudiya ba, kamok ner aYahuda EtEse azong shim a tEku fr.

43008014	aYeso f be ba ye, Ko ke mi fa f natoon rice mi, rif mi nye katsak, kamok mi ren kar kaya afe mi tEku ne, be kar kaya afe mi tEku be. Amma yin ren yin kar kaya afe mi tEku ne ka kar kaya afe mi tEku be ba.
43008015	Yin t yin amok be kudi rinerawe. Mi t akak amok ba.

43008020	aYeso f rif na nizen iya a tEse be kubsp kayr agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben, bubarak be kar a tEku saas abeko. Amma gip be anong, ko akak tEyiir ba, kamok izen wu tsang i nye ba.
43008021	Ayong aYeso bun a f be ba ye, Mi ta tseng, yin tin tsr yin, ta kus yin be rinn yin. Yin tEkyem i tseng yin nar mi tu ku be ba.E
43008022	Iyong sak ner aYahuda f ye, A tEfr rice wu a? A tEf ye, Kar kaya mi tEku be yin ta kyem i tseng yin ba a?EE
43008023	Amma aYeso ya kashn be rif ye, Yin ne yin kaben; Mi ne naza. Yin nye yin fe kazatse na, mi nye afe kazatse na ba.
43008024	Kamok anong, mi f be yin ye yin tEkus yin be rinn yin. Kamok ke yin tin nk yin katsak ye Mi Ne I aya wu aya mi tEka tak yin ba, yin tEkus yin be rinn yin.E

43010001	Katsak'e ne mi ta ka tak yin, aner aya ne sang a n naming samang, nanu kaming'e ba, amma a ngarak ni iren ikak, i nye ye, a nye akpatang. LB00014b.tif 
Horace Knowles; The British & Foreign Bible Society Itsamang kayr kaming ba be fk ba
43010002	Aner aya a ta gor nanu kaming'e nye afek itsamang'me.
43010003	Aner aya a ta tor kaming itsamang'me ta karak afek itsamang'me kaming'e. Ne itsamang'e fok kut afek ba. A yis itsamang wu'me be ayerek ba. Ne a ku tun ba nufang.
43010004	Nizen iya ne a tun ifu cicr, ne wu tseng nashn ne itsamang'me ku kuus kamok ba ren kut wu.
43010005	Itsamang'me tEkuus aner atsen ba, i tu ku teng kamok ba ren kut aner atsen'e ba.E

43010009	Mi ne i nye kanukutu'me, aner aya a gor nunaan a tEs kashesh. A tEn kayr'e ne a bun a wuruk, a ta s kar kufek katek.

43010011	Mi ne i nye afek atek. Afek atek nk rice wu kamok itsamang wu.
43010012	Aner aya a tu ku sok kamok kufek, sang itsamang'me wor i te ifu ba. Kamok anong, izen iya ne wu di ab saase, ne wu teng a ta won itsamang'me. Ne ab nikpa ni itsamang'me ne a ku fo ba.

43010014	Mi ne i nye afek atek. Mi ren inaan ne inaan min ren.
43010015	Kyndi Ada'me tin ren, anong ne mi ren Ada'me. Mi nk rice mi kamok itsamang'me.

43015007	Ke yin sor kayr'i ne rif mi se kayr yin, yin tErip yin koakye ikng yin ta shim yin, a tEka nye yin'e.
43015008	Nye yin itomong iya Adakunom ta shim nong tEtonong yin ye yin nye yin limazhiri wu, kamok iyu ne i tEb be Ada'me kuyiik.
43015009	Kyndi Ada'me tin shim anong ne mi ma ka shim yin. T, sor yin kayr kuri kushim kuya mi ta ka kushim yin.
43015010	Ke yin kuus yin Itsi mi, yin tEsor yin kayr kushim'i, kyndi mi tEkuus Itsi Ada mi ne i sor kayr kushim wu.
43015011	Mi f anong nong as riy rikan'i tEse kayr yin, nong riy rikan yin tEshining.
43015012	Itsi mi se ye: Naka shim yin kyndi mi tEka shim yin.
43015013	Kushim kukak kuse ku ta nar kufe anerawe tana nk kutser wu kamok ferim wu ba.
43015014	Yin nye yin ferim mi ke yin kuus yin Itsi mi.
43015015	Mi tEba ka yis yin ye sam ba, kamok asam ren kutrng atekasa wu ba. Mi ta ka yis yin ye ferim mi makong, kamok koakye ikng iya mi tEbsp nufe Ada mi, mi ma ka taas yin.
43015016	Sang yin ne i ti kasa yin ba, amma mi ne i tEka kasa yin, nong ta se tes yin kutes kutek, kuya ku tana sor ma izen izen. Be anong ne Ada mi tEka nk yin koakye ikng iya yin ta rip yin kayr riyerek'i.
43015017	Itsi mi se ye: Naka shim yin.
43015018	Ke kazatse ta ka rayin, t, ren yin ye ka tin ramin kum ni imsng'e.
43015019	Ke a fa f ye yin nye yin fe kazatse, ke kazatse ta shim yin kamok yin ta nye yin fu. Kyndi i ta se, yin nye yin fe kazatse ba, amma mi ma ka kasa yin kayr fe kazatse. Iyong ne i sak kazatse ta ka rayin yin.
43015020	Yiring yin be rif mi tEf be yin ye: Asam akak nar atekasa wu ba.EKe Eti tabak, t, EtEka tabak yin gip. Ke ba kuus rif mi a tEkuus rif yin gip.
43015021	Ba tEnye be yin anong kamok riyerek'i, kamok ba ren aya a tin tom ba.
43015022	Mi fa b i tEku tak ba ba, ke Edi rinn ba ba. Amma kyrna, ba be iren kuwhr natoon rinn ba ba.
43015023	Aner aya a tin ramin, a rawu Ada mi gip.
43015024	Mi nye ikng didng iya nerawe tEba, kayr ba. Ke a fa f ye mi nye ba', ke a di rinn ba ba. Amma kyrna ba n di itomong azhing iya mi tEnye, gip be anong, ba ti ramin ne Eraba Ada mi.
43015025	Amma iyu se anong, nong a tEshining ikng iya a ta zibir kayr afumung Itsi aMusa ye: ti ramin kpdng tsek.E
43015026	Izen iya ne Aner Kutobok'ong b, aya a tana ne nufe Ada. Wu ne a nye Kabik kafe katsak. A tEf itak natoon'i.
43015027	Yin gip yin tEf yin itak natoon'i dim, kamok yin se yin mak be mi kum ni imsng'e.
43016001	Mi tEtaas yin ikr na cei nong fan yin bu ku bun yin kama.
43016002	tEka turung yin kayr atu aduwa. Katsak'e, izen saase iya ke aner akak a ta fr yin, a tEdi ye wu sen nye itomong Adakunom.
43016003	tEnye ikr iyong kamok sang ba n ren Ada ka mi ba.
43016004	Mi ta ka tak yin ikr na, nong ke izen'e nye yin tEyiring yin ye, mi ma ka krk yin kuto. Mi ta tak yin iyu ni imsng'e ba, kamok mi se mak be yin.
43016005	Kyrna, mi be nufe aya a tin tom, gip be anong akak yin ti rip ye, Wan be ak ?Eba.
43016006	Yin nye yin riy riwe ye kamok mi tEf ikr na.
43016007	Amma katsak'e ne mi ta ka tak yin: Kutseng'i tEka sor yin ikng itek kamok ke mi tseng ba, Aner Kutobok ame tEb ba. Amma ke mi tseng mi tEse ka tom yin'e.
43016008	Ke Aner Kutobok'e b, a tEts rinn kazatse be ikng iya i tana tonong kuse kuzhl'e be amok Adakunom.
43016009	Kutrng ba se gyr ba' natoon rinn', kamok ba gaar ku nink katsak ni mi.
43016010	Kutrng ba se gyr ba' natoon kuse kuzhl'e, kamok mi be nufe Ada mi, yin ta bin di yin ba.
43016011	kutrng ba se gyr ba' natoon amok, kamok a tsang an tn aner fe tin nye rigwm nazatse na amok.
43016012	Mi be rif didng tana ka tak yin, amma yin ta kyem i na tsesek yin ta fok yin kyrna ba.
43016013	Amma izen iya ife Kabik kafe katsak'e b, a tEka tonong yin iren katsak cei kamok sang, a tEf rif rice wu ba. Ikng iya wu ta foos tsek ne wu tEf. A tEbun a tEka taas yin ikr iya i ta rusek, nong a tEra nye.
43016014	A tin tiyiik, kamok a tEkok ikr iya i ta nye inaan ne a ka taas yin.
43016015	Ikr iya i ta nye ife Ada'me cei nye inaan. Ikng iya i tEsak mi tEf ye, Kabik tEkok ikr inaan ne a ka taas yin.
43016016	Nizen cik yin tEbin di yin ba, amma nama izen cik, ne yin bun i ni di yin.E
43016017	Iyong limazhiri wu kak f awan ba ye, Rif wu na sor aky, a ta f ye, Nizen cik yin tEbin di yin ba, amma nama izen cicr ne yin bun i ni di yin'e? Ne a bun a f ye: Kamok mi ta be nufe Ada'me āEE
43016018	yiir ku naka risim ye, Aky sak a tEf ye, Amma nama izen cikE? Yir ren yir ikng iya wu tin f ba.E
43016019	aYeso tEren ye limazhiri wu shim EtEku rip natoon ikng'ong, ayong a f be ba ye, Yin sen na ka risim yin ikng iya rif mi tEsor, mi tEf ye, Nizen cik yin tEbin di yin ba, amma nama izen cik ne yin bun ni di yinEa?
43016020	Katsak ne mi ta ka tak yin, yin tEtos ne i nye yin riy riwe ne kazatse nye riy rikan. Yin tEnye yin riy riwe, amma riy riwe yin tEkubun ri ta te riy rikan.
43016021	Aner abining a ta sen tes igon fok kur'me, kamok izen kutes wu tan nye. Amma izen iya ne a tes igon wu, ne a tiburum risam'me kamok a be riy rikan wu tan tes igon nazatse.
43016022	Anong ne i se be yin gip, kyrna ne i nye izen riy riwe yin. Amma mi tEbun i ka di yin ne i nye yin riy rikan, akak ta kyem a ka roon yin riy rikan yin ba.
43016023	Katuk kayong yin tEbin rip yin ikng ikak baba ba. Katsak ne mi ta ka tak yin, Ada'me tEka nk yin koakye ikng yin tana rip yin kayr riyerek'i.
43016024	Ko kyrna yin min rip yin ikng ikak kayr riyerek'i ba. Rip yin, yin ta s yin nong riy rikan yin tEshining.
43016025	Mi ta taas yin ikr na cei be kumaas gyr tatan, izen saase mi tana ba f be yin be kumaas ba. Amma mi tEf be yin kanang natoon Ada mi.
43016026	Katuk'ong yin tEnye yin izong kayr riyerek'i. Yin tErip yin Ada be rice yin sang mi ne ta ka rip yin'e ba.
43016027	Wayo, Ada'me ta shim yin be rice wu, kamok yin ti shim yin ne i nk yin katsak ye, mi ne nufe Adakunom.
43016028	Mi ne nufe Ada'me, i ta b nazatse. Kyrna mi sen won kazatse'me nong tEku bun nufe Ada'me.E
43016029	Ayong limazhiri wu f ye, Yawa, kyrna ne wan ma f rif kanang dar kumaas.E
43016030	Kyrna ne yir ma ren yir ye wan ren koakye, sang ma akak tErip ba. Iyuna sak yir ti nk yir katsak ye wan ne nufe Adakunom.
43016031	aYeso f be ba ye, Aser, ma kyrna ne yin ra min nk yin katsak a?E
43016032	Amma izen saase, n b gip ma, yin tana te yin shaam. Koangan tEku bun kari wu, yin cei tin won yin mi zr. Gip be anong, mi ta se mi zr ba, kamok Ada mi se mak be mi.
43016033	Mi ta taas yin ikr na, kamok kayr riyerek'i yin tEs yin kusor caang. Yin tEs yin risam kayr kazatse na, amma na ka tsesek yin. Mi canang kazatse na.E
43017001	Nama aYeso tEf ikr na, ne a sok rice wu naza a tEyrk kaza nong a tEnye aduwa ye, Ada, izen'e n nye. Tiyiik Igon wan, nong wu gip a tEka tiyiik.
43017002	Kamok wan tEku nk rigwm natoon nerawe cei, nong a ta nk aya wan tEku nk cicr, kutser kufe izen izen.
43017003	Kutser kufe izen izen'e nye ye, nerawe ra ka ren ye, wan zr ne i nye Adakunom afe katsak, ne Eren aYeso Kiristi aya wan tEtom.
43017004	Mi tEbn kuyiik kayr kazatse be itomong iya wan tin nk i tEnye cei.
43017005	T, kyrna Ada, ni tiyiik be kuyiik kuya mi tEbe nashn wan nizham a tEra nye kazatse.
43017006	Mi n sak nerawe fe wan tin nk nazatse ma ka ren. nye fuan, wan ne i tEsok ba i tin nk. Ba ma kuus rif wan.
43017007	Kyrna ba ren ye koakye wan ta min nk ne nufuan.
43017008	Kamok rif, wan tin nk ne mi tEku taas ba ne ba shan, ne Eren be katsak ye mi ne nufuan, ne ba ni nk katsak ye wan ne i ti tom.
43017009	Mi nye aduwa kamok ba. Sang kamok nerawe kazatse ne mi ti nye aduwa na ba, amma mi nye aduwa'me kamok fe wan tEmin nk, kamok ba nye afuan.
43017010	Koakye mi ta be cei nye ifuan, ne ikr wan ta be cei nye inaan. Mi n s kuyiik kamok ba.
43017011	Mi saase nufuan, mi tEba sor nazatse na baba ba. Amma ba ruresek kayr kazatse na nizham. Ada Azhl'e, ku fek ba be riyerek wan rif kukyem, riyerek riya wan tin nk, nong ba tEsor azining kyndi mi ta se be wan.
43017012	Nizen iya mi tEse be ba, mi tEku fek ba, ne mi ni sak riy ni ba be riyerek riya wan tin te'me. Akak wei ba, ma ke azining kayr ba aya a tEte kpdng nong as a tEshining Kufumung Rif Adakunom.
43017013	Mi saase nufuan kyrna.Amma mi ta nye izong ikr na kum ne mi ruresek kayr kazatse, nong as ba tEshining be kuri riy rikan riya mi tEbe kayr ba.
43017014	Mi mak nk ba rif wan yong kazatse tEraba ba, kamok ba nye fe kazatse ba, kyndi mi ta nye afe kazatse ba.
43017015	Sang i se ye mi nye aduwa'me ye wan ra ka tun ba kayr kazatse ba, amma ye wan ru ku fek ba nubk Amaan Aner.
43017016	Ba nye afe kazatse ba, kyndi mi ta nye afe kazatse ba.
43017017	Ku sak ba Etu sor zhl be katsak, rif wan ne rinye katsak.
43017018	Kyndi wan tin tom kayr kazatse, anong ne mi ka tom ba kayr kazatse.
43017019	Kamok ba ne mi nk rice mi zhl nong as ba gip ta s kute zhl kufe katsak.
43017020	Aduwa mi se kamok awan ba tsek ba Amma mi nye aduwa kamok ya a tanin nk katsak ni mi gip, kamok rif ba.

43017022	Mi ma ka nk ba kuyiik afe wan tin nk, nong as ba tEte azining kyndi yir ta se yir be wan.
43017023	Mi sor kayr ba ne wan kayr'i. Won ba tEgung rice didng, nong as kazatse tEren ye wan ti tom, ne ka ren ye mi tEshim ba kyndi wan tin shim.
43017024	Ada, mi shim fe wan tEmin nk tu se mak be mi nar kaya mi tu ku se, ne Edi kuyiik'i, kuyiik kuya wan tin tiyiik mo kamok wan tin shim nizham a tEra nye kazatse.

43018001	Nama aYeso tEgang i nye aduwa'me, a dorok be limazhiri wu nong EtEtar ishng aKidiron. Rik rikak tuse azong ri tEbe nafar, ayong aYeso n kayr'e be limazhiri wu.

44002017	Adakunom f ye, kayr inom igang'e, mi t shining nerawe cicr be Kabik Kazhl'e. Inoon yin atek be nyining t nye kuzarap, Adakunom t tonong cam be nanamang katsak wu. shn t ren katsak Adakunom kayr nabos ba.

44002020	Kunom t shining ku t te whi ne kufn seng kyndi nask. Ikr azhing t wuruk cei nizham agbang kunom  Agwm gwm t ra nye.

44002022	ner Isarela fok yin rif na, aYeso a t nye afu Nazaret nye aner aya Adakunom t ka tom yin'e. Adakunom nye itomong azhing be ife kukyem kayr wu nashn yin, yin ren yin anong be rice yin.
44002023	Adakunom tsang a ni sak kayr kushim wu ye a ta nk aYeso nubk yin, maan aner ta ka s mo yin nong yin t ku tigak yin nukon, a t ku.
44002024	Adakunom t ku dorok nurk be kutser, a t ku kam be amaan risam riku kamok riku kyem ri t ku yiir ba.
44002025	aDauda f rif natoon wu ye, Mi di Agwm gwm nashn mi koakye izen wu se nubk riya mi iyong sak mi t fok inyim ba.
44002026	Kamok anong riy mi karp, mi t ku kerek be kanu mi. Mi t sor kayr kazatse ma izen izen ba gyrtatan, gip be anong riy mi se nk kamok mi min te riy ni ikng iya Adakunom tanin nye'me.
44002027	Kamok wan t tiburum be kutser'i kayr kurk ba, ka t won Azhl'e afuan t bus ba.
44002028	Wan n min tonong iren kutser. Wan tin shining be riy rikan nashn wan.
44002029	roneng, ner Isarela, mi f be yin be riy rizining ye atukop yir aDauda ku ma a t ku nr. Kurk wu se aze mak be yir ma katuur ana.
44002030	Amma a nye aner kuzarap, a ren ye Adakunom tsang shu ye wu t sak aner akak kayr kuri wu t te agwm kyndi wu.
44002031	aDauda t fa di anong yong a f rif natoon kudorok aKiristi nurk, ye sang a t ku won kayr kurk ba. Kurm wu t bus ba.
44002032	aYeso'me ayong ne Adakunom t ku dorok nurk be kutser, yir cicr yir ren yir ye i se anong dim.
44002033	Adakunom dorok aYeso nong a t ku sak nubk riya wu kufe kuyiik ne a ku nk Kabik Kazhl'e kyndi wu t tsang a f. Ikng iya yin ta di yin ne i fok yin kyrna'me nye kunang kuya aYeso t min nk yir.
44002034	Sang aDauda be rice wu ngarak kayr kaza kyndi aYeso ba, gip be anong a f ye, Agwm gwm f be Agwm gwm'i ye, Sonong nubk riya mi
44002035	ma mi sak mudn wan ta kpa natak.
44002036	Kamok anong, won yin ner Isarela cicr tu ren yin ye, aYeso aya yin t ku tigak yin nukon ame ne Adakunom mu ku sak an te Agwm gwm ne a nye aKiristi.
44002037	nerawe t fa fok anong, rif'me t ku ra ba nay ma a daam didng. Ne f be aBitrus ne ribir manzo'me ye, roneng, yir ta nye yir an ?
44002038	Ayong aBitrus f be ba ye, Shishing kuse yin nong a ta ka nye yin abatisma kayr riyerek aYeso. A ta ka rng yin rinn yin, nong ta s yin Kabik Kazhl'e kaya Adakunom ta nyesek.
44002039	Adakunom f ye wu t ka nk, Kabik Kazhl'e, kamok yin be inoon yin ne ner aya a ta se gugk, ne ya Agwm gwm yir Adakunom tana ku yis ba.
44002040	Ayong a f rif gaan be ba ne a ka krk ba kuto ye, Shesh yin ace yin kayr amaan kunye kazatse na.
44002041	ner aya a t shan rif wu se whr yong a t ku nye ba abatisma. Katuk kayong nerawe'me ta bubarak ner izungu itaar ti barang niba.
44002042	ti te rice ba nikng iya manzo t ka bsp ba'me ne nyiis nar kazining ne ya Azhibi nar kazining ne a nye aduwa mak.
44002043	Inyim r koangan didng kamok Adakunom t nye itomong azhing didng ne ikr azhing didng be manzo'me.
44002044	fikuus cicr ya kashn be kunyiis ne koakye ba te izining.
44002045	rs nar be ikr iya ba t be nong t kasap itsm'me be ner aya a t se nutser.

44003001	Katuk kakak aBitrus be aYohana tseng a be nar kuya Adakunom iben, nizen aduwa nitsm itaar ife kunom.
44003002	T, aner akak tuse azong a t ku tes akun'e. A t ku kok ne a se saas nanukutu agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben'e, a t yis ye Kanukutu Kusas. Koakye katuk ne a ku sok a t su ku sak azong nong a t nye izong nufe ner aya a tana gosok ne ns kayr agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben'e.
44003003	A t fa di aBitrus be aYohana n b bubarak t n, yong a t ku rip ba itsm.
44003004	aBitrus be aYohana ti sak anyisi ni wu, ne aBitrus f be wu ye, Ni yrk yir.

44003007	Ayong aBitrus t ku krk kubk riya nong a t nyeseng tsik, ne atak be akuur aner ame wor a kpa agap.

44003009	nerawe t ku di a ta tsang tseng ne a kerek Adakunom.
44003010	Ba ren ye aner aya a t tsang a sosok ne a nye izong nanukutu a t yis ye Kanukutu Kusas ame. yong te ba zhing be ikng azhing iya ba t di.
44003011	nerawe cicr te zhing ne wor wuruk be itsi ta b s aner ame an yiir aBitrus be aYohana nubang a t yis ye kubang aSolomon.
44003012	aBitrus t fa di anong, yong a f be ba ye ner Isarela, kamok aky yin te yin zhing ana ? Kamok aky yin ti yrk yir kyndi yir ne i sak yir aner na t tseng be kukyem rice yir ka kamok yir ta ren i kuus yir rif Adakunom gyr ?
44003013	Adakunom aya a ta nye afe Ibrahim ne a nye afe Ishaku ne a nye afe aYakub, Adakunom atukop yir, wu ne a tiyiik asam wu aYeso. Yin t ku sok yin i t nk yin kk kashn nong t ku fr. Yin t ku rayin nashn aBilatus, aBilatus'e shim a t ku won gyrtatan.

44003015	Yin fr yin aner aya wu ne a ta Ritin kutser amma Adakunom t ku dorok nurk. Yir t ku di yir be anyisi yir.

44003017	roneng, mi ren yin nye yin anong kayr kudun kuren kyndi kk kashn yin ta nye.

44004001	Nizen iya aBitrus be aYohana t se be kuf kanu be nerawe yong atsi be kk kashn ner aya a ta fek kutu kuya Adakunom iben ne ner aSadusi kak b nufe ba.

44005010	Nizen iyong a wor a kpa kaben natak aBitrus, a t ku. cam aya a t nr amitek wu'me t fa n ne di a tan ku, yong t ku sok t se nr nukim kurk amitek wu.
44005011	fikuus be ribir anerawe aya a t fok itak'e wor fok inyim makiyi.
44005012	manzo ame nye ikr azhing be ife kukyem didng kayr nerawe. Ne fikuus cicr nyiis nubang kukak nutu aduwa ta yis ye, Kubang aSolomon.
44005013	nerawe t ka yrk ba yiik gyrtatan, akak ra kyem a tsibik riy nong a tin n kayr ba ba.
44005014	Gip be anong, nerawe didng ti barang ku nink katsak na Agwm gwm ma fikuus te whr.
44005015	Itomong manzo t nye sak nerawe bs be fe irk ne ku saas ba ni ikr kameneng nong as nawu aBitrus tin kpa natoon ba nizen iya tana gor.
44005016	nerawe didng nes ni iwp i ta se bubarak be aUshalima a t bs be fe irk be ya a ta be amaan nabik, ayong a t ka sak ba te atser cicr ba.
44005017	Iyong agbang atsi be fudang aya a t nye ner aSadusi kpaan rishishim itomong manzo ta nye didng.
44005018	Kamok anong, nong a t yising manzo'me, a tase ka te ba nitsm.
44005019	Amma natuk amaleka Agwm gwm b a t ka karak ba kanukutu itsm'e, a t ka tun ba nufang,
44005020	a t f be ba ye, Tseng yin kayr kubang agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben nong t taas yin nerawe Rif Kutser na.
44005021	Kadiding t fa karak ne ba se n kayr kubang agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben ne kpaan kubsp nerawe'me. Agbang atsi t fa b be fudang wu ne yis kanyim kk kashn ne shn ner Isarela cicr, a t tom ye ra tun manzo ni itsm nong a ta ka bn ba'me.
44005022	Amma ner aya a t ka tom ba ame t fa tseng nutu itsm'e ko s manzo ame ba. Ayong a t ku bun t se tak kut'me ye,
44005023	Yir se s yir an tikpaf kutu itsm'e, ner aya a t fek kutu itsm'e se be kufek nanukutu gip gyr. Nizen iya yir t karak yir nanukutu'e, ko yir s yir akak kayr'e ba.
44005024	Akk kashn fe a t fek agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben'e ne ner aSadusi t fa fok anong, daam didng ne t ye ka aky ne n s manzo'me ?
44005025	Ayong ner kak b f be ba ye, ner aya yin t ka te yin ba nitsm ame sen bsp nerawe'me nubang agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben.
44005026	Nizen iyong akk kashn fe a t fek agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben tseng be fek'e akak nong ta se bn be manzo ame, amma sang t ku tonong ba agap ba, kamok fok inyim fan nerawe ba ka barak ba be ata.
44005027	Nizen iya t bn manzo'me ne tseng be ba nashn kusong kk kashn ne shn ner Isarela. Ayong agbang atsi kpaan rif be ba ye,
44005028	Yir f yir be yin ye, sang tu bsp yin nerawe'me kayr riyerek na ba, gip be anong, yin n n yin koak kayr aUshalima ne i bsp yin nerawe'me. Yin shim tin tomong yir rinn aner na ye nask wu se nubk yir.
44005029	Ayong aBitrus be ribir manzo ame f ye, Yir ta kuus yir ikng iya Adakunom ta f dim, sang ife anerawe ba.
44005030	Adakunom tukop yir dorok aYeso nurk, aya yin t ku fr yin, i t ku tigak yin nukon.
44005031	Adakunom tu nk kuyiik a tu ku sak nubk riya wu nong a ta sor kk kashn ne a sor aner kashesh nong a ta sak ner Isarela ta shishing kuse ba ne a ka rng ba rinn ba.
44005032	Yir ne i nye yir fe ku taas ikng iya Adakunom t nye kamok yir di yir be anyisi yir, Kabik Kazhl'e kaya Adakunom ta nk fe a ta kuus rif wu f anong gip.
44005033	kk kashn ame t fa fok anong ne ay ba fuus ma ti sak ye a ta ka fs ba.
44005034	Amma aner aFarisi'me akak aya a ta bsp itsi a t ku yis ye aGamaliya, aya nerawe cicr t ku di yiik, a dorok a t nyeseng nar kanyim'e a t f ye, a ra tun manzo'me nufang cik nizham.
44005035	A f be ba ye, Aroneng ner Isarela, nye yin tatan be ikng iya yin ta shim ta nye yin be ner name.
44005036	Kayr ay afe a t gor, aner akak aya a t ku yis ye aTudas b a t tonong ye wu nye akak'e. nerawe kyndi kusk inyak inaas kuus kama wu, amma nizen iya a t ku fr, nerawe'me te shaam ne rifuba gang azong.
44005037	Nama anong, aner aGalili akak aya a t ku yis ye aYahuda bun a b nizen iya a tana fa nerawe. A sak nerawe whr t kuus kama amaan kunye wu. Wu gip a t fr, ner aya a t kuus kama wu cicr te shaam.
44005038	Kamok anong, natoon iyu name, mi t ka nk yin ibrng. Ka won yin ba kyn. Ke ikng iya ba ta nye na nye ife kurm tsek, t, i t gor.
44005039	Amma ke ikng iya ba ta nye na ne nufe Adakunom, yin t kyem i ka roon yin ba'me ba. Yin ta kn yin be Adakunom kpdng tsek.
44005040	Ikng iya aGamaliya t f'ong n kayr ay ba, ayong shim rif wu. Ayong a yis manzo'me kayr'e, a t sak a t ka whereng ba, nong ta f be ba ye tu ba f ikng ikak kayr riyerek aYeso ko cik ba. Ne ku won ba t tseng.
44005041	manzo dorok azong be riy rikan kamok a t di ba kyem a ta ka nk ba risam kamok riyerek aYeso.
44005042	Koakye katuk manzo yiir tsang ns ninasa nerawe ne kayr kubang agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben ne taas Rif Ritek ye aYeso ne a nye aKiristi'me.
44006001	Nizen iyong, limazhiri ti barang kute whr, yong ner aYahuda aya a t fok irem aHeleni kpaan anyinym be fudang ba ner aYahuda aya a t fok Aramiya. ner aYahuda aya a t fok irem aHeleni kpaan anyinym ye izen iya ne a dorok i kasa naya sang a yiring be nyining ba ya atek ba tan kus ba.
44006002	Iyong manzo kusk be afa ame yis fikuus cicr nar kazining nong t f ye, I se gyr yir ta won awazi rif Adakunom, nong tu ku bun yir ni itak naya ba.
44006003	Kamok anong roneng, kasa yin ner kanataar kayr yin aya a ta ren ikng ne be kuse kutek ne Kabik Kazhl'e. Yir t ka won yir ba itomong kukasap naya.
44006004	Yir tin te yir rice ni inye aduwa be kubsp nerawe rif Adakunom.
44006005	fikuus'e cicr fok kusas ibrng iya ba t nk, ayong kasa aFilibus ne aPurokorus be aNikano ne aTimon be aParmenas ne aNikolas a t nye aner Antakiya, aya sang a t nye aner aYahuda, amma a n ni ikuus ign ba.

44006008	Aner akak a t ku yis ye Itifanus, a nye aner a t ritek ne kukyem Adakunom t se mak be wu didng, a nye ikr azhing ne itonong iya i t kukyem Adakunom nashn nerawe.
44006009	ner aYahuda akak aya a t ne niben aSirin ne na Alekzandiriya ya a t ns nutu aduwa a t yis ye kutu fe kuse Washak, nyim kanu be fudang ba aya a t ne niben aKilikiya ne na Asiya nong t ya nanan be Itifanus.
44006010	Amma Kabik Adakunom nk Itifanus kukyem kuri kukak kuya a tin f kanu be ba, akak ba kyem a ya nanan be wu ba.
44006011	Ayong whap ner akak kyn ye ra f ye, Yir t ku fok Itifanus ta sen zhsh aMusa ne Adakunom.
44006012	A t fa nye anong ne whap nerawe didng be kk kashn ne fe kubsp Itsi ma ay beseng. Ayong a yiir Itifanus a ta tseng be wu nashn kk kashn ne shn aner Isarela.
44006013	Ayong kk kashn anerawe ame bs be naborok nakak ye, Aner na koakye izen a yiir i f kpdng be azhl kar na ne natoon Itsi aMusa.

44006015	Koangan afe a t se azong ti sak anyisi natoon kayr fe kusonong ame Itifanus, ne di kanyisi wu t te kyndi kanyisi amaleka.
44007001	Ayong agbang atsi ame rip Itifanus ye, Rif riya nerawe t f natoon wan na nye katsak a?
44007002	Amma Itifanus f ye, shn be roneng, wesek yin kuto tin fok yin. Adakunom a ta nye ayiik'e, ti wuruk na ada yir Ibrahim kum ne a rusek na aMasopotamiya nizham a t ra se sor na aHaran.
44007003	Adakunom f be wu ye, Dorok won kaben wan, be nerawe wan, t tseng kayr kaya mi tana ka nk.
44007004	Iyong a dorok niben aCaldiya a t se sor niben aHaran. Nama ada wu t ku, Adakunom t ku sak a ta be niben yin tin se yin kyrna.
44007005	Amma Adakunom nk Ibrahim kutse rice wu aze ko cik ba. Adakunom ban a f ye wu tu ku nk kar be nabon wu. Nizen iyong Ibrahim be igon gum ba.
44007006	Adakunom f be wu ye, Inoon be nabon wan t se sor tsen niben ikak. A t se te sam, a t ka nyeen ba ma ay isk inyak inaas.
44007007	Adakunom f ye, Mi ta nk ner kaben kaya ta sak nabon wan t te asam'ong risam. Nama anong, t bun wuruk a t b tin ya iben aze nar na.
44007008	Adakunom nk Ibrahim kushu kunye izhak nong a tin yiring be ikng iya ba tin sak. Kamok anong, nizen iya Ibrahim t tes Ishaku a t nye izhak nunom kufe ikara be kutes wu. A fa sor wh ne Ishaku tes aYakub, aYakub ne a tes tukop yir ba ner kusk be afa.
44007009	tukop yir kpaan rishishim be aYusufu yong a t ku sok a t rp a t se te asam niben aMasar. Amma Adakunom se mak be wu.
44007010	A t ku tun kayr koakye risam wu tin n. Adakunom nk aYusufu kukyem kuya ku ta sak a tin s ritek nufe aFiruna a ta nye agwm aMasar, be kasa ne ikr wu cicr.
44007011	Amaan izong n niben aMasar ne niben aKenan, nerawe n kayr risam didng, tukop yir kyem s naya baba ba.
44007012	Nizen iya aYakub t fok ye naya kuse na aMasar yong a tom inoon wu, kutseng ba t tseng na aMasar kufe imsng'e yong.
44007013	Nutseng ba kufe afa, aYusufu wuruk kanang a t tak ronyining kunik wu. Nizen iyong ne aFiruna ra ma ren kuri aYusufu gip.
44007014	Nama anong, ne aYusufu tom ye ada wu ra b be inoon wu ne nabon wu niben aMasar cicr. Nizen iyong ne ba se ner isk kanataar be atoon.
44007015	Ayong aYakub tseng na aMasar, azong ne a se ku, tukop yir kus azong gip.
44007016	A kok ikom ba a t ku bun'e a se nr'e na aShekem nar ark Ibrahim t nk itsm ikak nong a tin shan kar'me nubk inoon aHamor na aShekem.
44007017	Izen t fa b bubarak Adakunom tana shining ikng iya wu t f ye wu t nye Ibrahim'e, ne nerawe yir, aner Isarela, tibarang kute whr didng ni iben aMasar.
44007018	A fa sor wh, ne aner akak ya rigwm na aMasar.
44007019	A nk ner yir ner Isarela risam didng ne a ka sak ba ye ra barak izk inoon ba nong as na t kus.
44007020	Nizen iyong dim ne a tes aMusa, a nye igon afe a t sas didng. A t ku nr nong a tin sak riy ni wu kayr kasa atek wu ifn itaar.
44007021	Nizen a t ku tun nufang, angas aFiruna t sok a t ku ta kyndi a nye igon wu.

44007024	A t fa di aner aMasar akak ta sen nyeen be ronyining wu aner Isarela akak, yong a tseng a t su ku shan ne a fr aner aMasar ame a t karang.
44007025	aMusa sor ye ronyining wu ner Isarela ta ren ye Adakunom sen ninye itomong be wu a t ka shesh ba nubk ner aMasar. Amma ner Isarela ame ra ren anong ba.

44007041	Nizen iyong ne ba nk ikng ikak kyndi igon inyak nong a t ku nye asidaka ne a to nato riy rikan nashn ikng iya ba t nye be ibk ba ame.

44009018	Nizen iyong ikng ikak kyndi kuku ikng'e wor i wuruk nanyisi Ashawulu i ta kpas kaben, yong a bun a kpaan kudi kar. A dorok ne a ku nye abatisma.

44009023	Nama inom cik, ner aYahuda nye ibrng ku fr Ashawulu,
44009024	amma Ashawulu fok ikng iya a ta tsr a t ku nye'me. yiir ku kufarang nanu kuwp'e koakye katuk be kunom nong as a tu ku fr.
44009025	Amma fe a t ku kuus t ku te kayr iderse natuk nong a t ku tun ribong rikak nubar kuwp'e nong a t tiik'e whiwh. LB00333b.tif 
Horace Knowles; The British & Foreign Bible Society A sen tiik aBulus niderse nama kuwp
44009026	Nizen iya Ashawulu t n na aUshalima, a shim ke a gun rice be fikuus, amma fikuus'e ra fok inyim wu kamok ba di kyndi an te afikuus be katsak'e ba.
44009027	Amma aBarnabas ne a ra b a tseng be wu nufe manzo. A t ku tak ba iren iya Ashawulu'me t di Agwm gwm niren, nizen a t se be kutseng wu, be iren iya Agwm gwm'me t f kanu be wu, be kuri awazi aya Ashawulu'me t nye kayr riyerek aYeso na aDamaskus dar inyim.
44009028	Kum be izen iyong Ashawulu ma kpaan kutsang tseng mak be ba kayr aUshalima be riy wu nk.
44009029	A f kanu ne a ya nanan be ner aYahuda aya a t fok irem aHeleni, amma ba shim t ku fr.
44009030	Nizen iya fikuus cicr t fa fok anong ne tseng be wu na aKaisariya ne kute niren a t tseng na aTarsus.
44009031	Be anong fikuus aya a t se niben aYahuda ne aGalili be aSamariya t ra ma fok kusas kusor. Afikuus ti barang kukpa agap, ne Kabik Kazhl'e ka nk ba ifeng ma a nye ne ni barang kute whr, nizen iya sor kayr inyim Agwm gwm.
44009032	Nizen iya aBitrus t tsang a tseng ninar zr zr kayr kaben'e, yong a tseng nong a ta se di zhl'e aya a t sor na aLidda.
44009033	A se s aner akak azong aya a t ku yis ye Iniyas. A te ay ikara nameneng kamok a t w nabas azining.
44009034	Ayong aBitrus f be wu ye, Iniyas aYeso Kiristi sak wan te atser. Dorok nong ta sok ikng kameneng. Ne Iniyas'me wor a dorok gbashak.
44009035	nerawe aya a ta se na aLidda ne aSharon ya a t ku di a t te atser, kirik nong t te afikuus.
44009036	Abining akak tuse na aZhopa a t nye abafe ifikuus'e, riyerek wu nye aTabita (ke a kirik'e ne a te aDokas). A tonong kuse kutek koakye izen ne a tobok fe rizor.
44009037	Kurk t yiir nizen iyong ma a ku, yong a sok kukom wu nong a t se sak'e nutu kukak natoon'e.
44009038	aLidda'me se bubarak be aZhopa. fikuus t fa fok ye aBitrus se na aLidda'me, ayong tom ner afa nufu nong a t su ku nye akusuk ye a ra b zizirik.
44009039	Ayong aBitrus dorok a t ka kuus ba. A t fa n ne a tseng be wu nutu ku ta se natoon'e ame. kumung akak whr mu ku gorok be nanak. tos ne a ku tosong ares kute ya aTabita t ku tos ba'me ne a ru nye atser.
44009040	aBitrus f be ba ye ra wuruk nufang cicr ba, yong a tigbok akuur kaben ta nye aduwa. A kirik a t yrk kukom'e ne a f ye, aTabita, dorok. Iyong aTabita karak anyisi wu. A t fa di aBitrus yong a dorok a t sonong
44009041	aBitrus nabak kubk nong a t ku s mo a t nyeseng. Iyong a yis fikuus ne kumung ame a t ku nk ba aTabita be kutser.
44009042	Itak'e n koak kayr aZhopa ma nerawe whr te fikuus.
44009043	aBitrus te inom gaan na aZhopa be aSiman aya a t nye itomong kuruk akpa.
44010001	Aner akak tuse na aKaisariya a t ku yis ye aKoneliyus. A nye aritek sozha aRom a t ka yis ba ye Agbang rigwm sozha Italiya.
44010002	Wu be fe kasa wu cicr nye fikuus'e, ne a fok inyim Adakunom. tobok fe rizor ya a t nye ner aYahuda didng, kam be kunye aduwa ba.
44010003	Katuk kakak, nabas itsm itaar nunom, a di amaleka Adakunom akak kyndi nabos, a b nufu, a t f be wu ye, aKoneliyus.
44010004	Iyong aKoneliyus'e tisak anyisi ni wu be inyim a t f ye, Aky d Agwm gwm ? Ayong amaleka'me shim ye Adakunom n yiring be wan, aduwa aya wan t nye be kutobok kuya wan ta tobok fe rizor n ngarak nufe Adakunom.
44010005	Tom aner akak kyrna na aZhopa nong a t se yis aner akak riyerek wu t nye aSiman a t bun a ku yis ye aBitrus.
44010006	A se numa aner akak a t nye itomong kuruk akpa aya a t ku yis ye aSiman. Kasa wu se bubarak be agbang kudung.
44010007	Nama amaleka'me t tseng, aKoneliyus yis sam wu afa be asozha akak aya a nye afikuus'e, ya t ku ss mo be itomong.
44010008	A t tak ba koakye ikng iya a t nye ne a ku tom ba na aZhopa.
44010009	Kaya katson'e nabas katite kunom, nizen iya ba t b barak a ta n nuwp'e, aBitrus ngarak natoon kar ka ta se nk natoon kutu nong a ta nye aduwa.
44010010	Izong t r, a shim ke a s ikng ikak nong a ta ya. Kum ne a ru rusek be anyes ne aBitrus rasak nabos.
44010011	A di kaza nukarak ne ikng ikak igbang'e kyndi ikng kunak kiis, a t sen tisik nikes'e kazatse inaas kaben.
44010012	Kayr ikng'e, koakye kuri ikewum t ku se. Ikak be atak anaas ne ikak wk be kafa ne nanon.
44010013	Iyong kut kukak f be wu ye, aBitrus, dorok ta fs ikr na nong ta ya.
44010014	aBitrus f ye, Wayo, Agwm Agwm, mi kun ya ikng ikak i ta won dar i se zhl ka ife i ta be narik ba.

44010016	Kut'me yiir f anong be aBitrus ma kutak kutaar ne a gaar, yong a sok kures ame a t bun'e naza.
44010017	aBitrus t ru t ka ikng iya wu t di ame nye aky, ne ner aya aKoneliyus t ka tom ba ame tsang tsr kasa aBitrus t ku se ma se. Iyong nyeseng nanu kari'me,

44010022	ner ame f ye, Akk kashn sozha aRom kak, aya a t ku yis ye aKoneliyus ne a min tom yir. A nye aner aya a ta se gyr nashn Adakunom ne a fok inyim Adakunom didng. ner aYahuda cicr t di yiik. 44010031	A t f ye, aKoneliyus, Adakunom n fok aduwa wan ne a yiring be kutobok kuya wan t tobok fe rizor.

44010033	Iyong ne mi wor i tom nufuan zizirik. I se gyr wan ta b. Kamok anong, yir na azena cicr yir nashn Adakunom nong ta fok ikng iya Agwm gwm t ka sak tin tak yir.
44010034	Ayong aBitrus kpaan rif ye, Kyrna ne mi ra ma ren ye i nye katsak, Adakunom kasa ba.

44011018	Ba t fa fok anong ne tigbik, kyem f ikng ikak ba. kerek Adakunom ne f ye, Aser, Adakunom n nk ner aya sang a ta nye aner aYahuda ba, iren gip nong a ta shishing kuse ba a ta s kutser.
44011019	T, fikuus aya a t te shaam kamok amaan kutabak a t tabak fikuus nama riku Itifanus tseng tsik ma ni iwp aFoneshiya ne aSipurus be Antakiya. tsang a nye awazi amma a nye awan ner aYahuda tsek.
44011020	Amma fikuus'e akak a t nye ner aSipurus be fe aSirin gip a tseng na Antakiya. A san kutaas ner aya sang a t nye ner aYahuda ba, Rif Ritek natoon Agwm gwm yir aYeso.

44011027	Nizen iyong ne ner kuzarap kak ne na aUshalima nong a t b na Antakiya.
44011028	Kabik sak akak kayr ba riyerek wu t nye Agabus dorok a nyeseng a t nye kuzarap. A f ye izong ta n didng nazatse na kusum (Iyu se nizen iya aKalaudiyus t nye agwm.)

44011030	Anong ne nye ba ne t tom Ashawulu be aBarnabas itsm'e nong ta se nk ashn ikilisiya aYahudiya.

44012002	aHiridus'e sak a t fr aYakub aronyining aYohana be kuwn kutsor.
44012003	Wu t fa di ner aYahuda fok kusas'e iyong a ya kashn a t yiir aBitrus. (A nye anong nizen a ta se be Riy Rikan Kuya aBiredi dar ayisti.)

44012005	Kamok anong aBitrus sor nuwhn nitsm. fikuus yiir kunye aduwa be Adakunom didng kamok wu.
44012006	Natuk katuk kaya aHiridus tana ku tun nong a t ku t amok nashn nerawe, aBitrus se be ida natite sozha afa. A t ku rosom be idun atsm nabas afa, sozha afa se nuyeseng nanu kutu'me a ta sen fek'e.
44012007	Gbashak amaleka Agwm gwm wor a wuruk azong kayr kutu itsm ame ne kar te kanang. Amaleka'me ra aBitrus napmng, a t ku shiming. A f be wu ye, Dorok gbashak. Iyong idun atsm ame wuruk cicr nibk aBitrus i t kpas kaben.
44012008	Ne amaleka ame f be wu ye, Te ares wan be akpatak wan. aBitrus t fa nye anong ne amaleka'me f be wu ye, Naka kis be kures wan nong tin kuus.
44012009	aBitrus t ku kuus t wuruk nutu itsm'e. A ra ren ye ikng iya amaleka t nye'ong nye katsak ba, wu di ye ikng'e nye nabos.
44012010	A gor t ku te rigwm sozha rif imsng'e ne a gor a ku te rif afa'me. ma b nanu kutu a t nye be atsm tanin wuruk a ta n kayr kuwp. Kanukutu'me karak be rice wu ne ba gor t wuruk. t fa tseng kashn gak, ne amaleka ame wor a ti zhau ne a won aBitrus azong.
44012011	Azong ne aBitrus ra ma te kparak makong a t f ye, Ma kyrna ne mi ra ma ren ye Agwm gwm ne a tom amaleka wu katsak'e nong a tin shesh nubk aHiridus be ner aYahuda kayr ikng iya ba t tsr tin nye'me.
44012012	aBitrus t fa di anong ne a tseng numa aMarya a t nye anyining aYohana a t bun a t ku yis ye aMarkus. nerawe tsang a nyim whr azong a ta se be kunye aduwa.
44012013	aBitrus t fa rus kanukutu kafe kufang yong kanamang kakak ka t nye asam riyerek wu ta nye aRoda b ka shim.
44012014	A t fa fok kut aBitrus a ren riy karp didng. Ayong a t ku bun be itsi dar kukarak kanukutu'me a t se f ye, aBitrus ne a se nanukutu.
44012015	Ayong nerawe'me f be wu ye, Wan tsr ta ririm a? Kanamang'e yiir'e karkar ye aner'e nye aBitrus. Ayong ba f ye, Aner'e ta nye amaleka wu gak ayi.
44012016	Amma aBitrus yiir kutsor kanukutu'me. Nizen iya ba t fa karak a t di ne te zhing.
44012017	aBitrus ma nye be kubk ye a ra te gbik, nong a t ku taas ba kuri iren iya Agwm gwm t ku tun nitsm'me. A f ye, Tseng se tak yin aYakub be ribir r afikuus. Ayong a dorok a t tseng nar kakak.
44012018	Kadiding t fa karak, ne sozha ame n kayr kudaam makiyi ma naka risim ye, aBitrus n n ak ?
44012019	Nama aHiridus t sak a t ku tsr a t s ba, yong sak a t ku risim ba ne a ku fs ba. aHiridus dorok na aYahudiya nong a t tseng na aKaisariya a se te inom ifa azong.
44012020	Nizen iyong, aHiridus be riy riwe be ner aTaya ne fe aSidon. Ayong ner aTaya be fe aSidon'me tseng mak nong ta se tsr igaas nufe aHiridus nama ba tan gorok nu aBilatus a t nye akak kayr fe kunye itomong kayr kasa aHiridus. ner aTaya be fe aSidon'e tsr igaas kamok naya kuya ba t nes niben aHiridus tin nye rigwm.
44012021	Iyong ti sak kunom. Katuk'e yong aHiridus te ares rigwm wu a t sonong ni itsik rigwm wu a t f kanu be nerawe cicr.
44012022	Ayong nerawe'me ta kut naza a t f ye, Kut na nye kufe adakunom akak sang kufe anerawe ba.
44012023	Zizirik amaleka Agwm gwm sak kurk t ku yiir aHiridus kamok a t shim nerawe t ku tiyiik ne nar Adakunom.
44012024	Amma rif Adakunom tibarang kun kayr nerawe ne fikuus nibarang kute whr.
44012025	Nizen aBarnabas be Ashawulu t gang itomong ba na Antakiya, ayong t bun na aUshalima mak be aYohana aya a t ku yis ye aMarkus.
44013001	ner kuzarap kak ne ner kubsp tuse kayr fikuus Antakiya. kak kayr ba nye aBarnabas be aSiman aya a t ku yis ye kukpa kuwe ne aLushiyos a t nye aner aKurane'me be aManayen (aya a t ta mak be aHiridus) ne Ashawulu. paul1.tif

44013002	Nizen ba t sen ya Adakunom iben ne nye azumi yong Kabik Kazhl'e f be ba ye, Ni sak yin aBarnabas be Ashawulu nukim nong as tin nye itomong iya mi tan sak ye ba tin nye'me.
44013003	T, nama t nye azumi be aduwa, yong ti saas ibk ritek natoon ace aBarnabas be Ashawulu nong t ma ku te ba niren.
44013004	Kabik Kazhl'e tom aBarnabas be Ashawulu yong tseng na aSalukiya a t se n nukpara ashi a t be na aSipurus.
44013005	t fa se n na aSalamis, yong kpaan kutaas rif Adakunom na ahiir kutu kuya Adakunom iben kuya ner aYahuda tin ns. aYohana ta s ba ninye itomong'e.
44013006	tsang tseng koak nuwp'e ma n na aPafos. Azong ne nyim be aner aYahuda'me akak a tu ku yis ye aBar-Zhoshuwa. A tsang a nye ikr azhing ne a bs abs ye wu nye aner kuzarap Adakunom.
44013007	A nye itomong nubk agwm kuwp'e a tu ku yis ye aSozhiyus aBulus afe a ta nye aner a ta ren ikng didng. Agwm'me tom ye a ru ku yis aBarnabas ne Ashawulu kamok a shim a ta sok rif Adakunom.
44013008	Amma aLimas a t nye aner a ta nye ikr azhing (aLimas'ong nye aner a ta nye ikr azhing nirem aner aHeleni) f nyinym be kub aBarnabas ne Ashawulu. A tsr a t roon agwm'me ku nink katsak rif aYeso.
44013009	Amma Ashawulu (aya a ta bun a t ku yis ye aBulus) a t mu ku shining be Kabik Kazhl'e, a ti sak anyisi ni wu a t f ye,
44013010	Wan nye igon Ishetan, wan shim ikng iya i ta nye itek nigaan'e ba. Wan mak i shim kuwrk nerawe nong ta ka mr ba. Wan ta won kuburuk katsak rif Adakunom aa?
44013011	Wan n n nubk Adakunom kyrna. Wan ta te akpatn'e ta ba di kar ba ma nizen ikak. Ne aLimas wor a di kyndi kunn tu ku kis ma kar te whi. Iyong a kpaan kukap ibk kyndi akpatn a tsang a tsr aner aya a tana ku kk kubk.
44013012	Nizen iya agwmna ame t fa di ikng iya i ta s aLimas ne a ni nk katsak natoon rif Adakunom, kamok wu fok azhing be kubsp wu t fok natoon rif Agwm gwm.
44013013	Ayong aBulus be mak be fudang kutseng wu dorok na aPafos nong a t n nagbang kukpara ashi ne tseng na aPerga a ta se niben aPamfiliya. aYohana aMarkus t won ba azong a t ku bun na aUshalima.
44013014	Ba wesek kashn a t tseng na Antakiya niben aBisidiya. Katuk Asabar se n nutu aduwa t sosok kayr'e.
44013015	Nama t fa afumung Itsi aMusa be fe ner kuzarap t zibir, ne kk kashn kutu aduwa tom ye a ra f be ba ye, roneng, ke yin be yin rif riya ri tanin barang nerawe agap ne i f yin kusuk tsek.
44013016	Ayong aBulus nyeseng a t sok kubk naza ye, nerawe ra te gbik. Iyong a f be ba ye, ner Isarela be yin ya i ta nye yin ner Isarela ba, ya i ta ya fok yin inyim Adakunom, wesek yin kuto nong t fok yin.
44013017	Adakunom afe ner Isarela kasa tukop yir a ta sak ba ta fuus nizen iya ba t nye sam niben aMasar. Adakunom t tun ba na aMasar be kukyem wu.
44013018	A ti sak riy natoon ba nizen ta se kayr katse ma te ay isk inaas.
44013019	A sak ba ya ner iben aKenan kanataar nitsom. A sok kaben ba a t nk nerawe wu nerawe Isarela nong a ta ya kutse'me.
44013020	A nye ikr na cei kayr ay a tana bubarak ay inyak isk inaas be isk itoon (450). Nama anong, Adakunom t nk ba ner a tana ku t ba amok ma nizen aSamela ta nye kuzarap.
44013021	Nizen ner Isarela t tsr ye a ra ka te na agwm, aSamela tu nk ba Ashawulu a ta nye arm aKish a ta nye aner izrk aBanyami. A nye rigwm ma ay isk inaas.
44013022	Nama Adakunom t sak Ashawulu won rigwm'e ne a sak aDauda ye, Mi n s aDauda a ta nye arm aZhese, aner afe mi ta shim kayr riy mi. A ta nye koakye kuri ikng ife mi ta shim ke wu nye.
44013023	Kayr kuri aDauda ne Adakunom tun aYeso a t nye aner kashesh Isarela kyndi wu ta tsang a f.
44013024	aYeso kpaan itomong wu nama aYohana t tsang a nye nerawe awazi rif ye a ra shishing kuse ba nong a ta ka nye ba abatisma.
44013025	Nizen iya aYohana t b barak a t gang itomong wu yong a f ye, Yin di yin ye mi nye angan ? Sang mi ne i nye aner aya yin ta sen tor yin'e ba. Aner ayong saase nama mi. Mi kyem ta bisik idun akpatak wu gum ba.
44013026	roneng, inoon atukop yir Ibrahim be yin ner i ta nye yin ner Isarela ba, ya i ta fok yin inyim Adakunom, kutom itak kashesh kuya Adakunom ta tom na'me nye kufe yir cicr.
44013027	ner aUshalima be gwm ba cicr ren ye aYeso ne a nye aner kashesh ba. Gip be anong, nizen iya a t ku fr, shining rif aner kuzarap riya a ta fa koakye Asabar.
44013028	kyem a tu s be rinn riya ri ta kyem a tana ku fr ba gyrtatan, gip be anong f be aBilatus ye a ru ku fr.
44013029	Nama t ku nye ikr iya a t tsang a zibir natoon wu peer ne a ku tiik nukon kuya a t ku tigak mo t ku mees nurk.
44013030	Amma Adakunom t ku dorok nurk'e.
44013031	A yiir tosong rice wu nufe ner aya a t tsang a tseng mak be wu na aGalili ma na aUshalima. Ba ne nye ner aya a tana taas nerawe yir katsak'e natoon wu.
44013032	Yir sen ka taas yin Rif Ritek na natoon ikng iya Adakunom t f ye wu ta nye atukop yir'e.
44013033	A min nye yir'e nabon ba kamok a dorok aYeso nurk. Kyndi i ta se ni izibir kayr kufumung aZabura afe afa ye, Wan nye Igon'i, katuur mi sor Ada wan.
44013034	Adakunom t dorok nurk a ta ba bun a ku nigaan'e ba. Kyndi i ta se nuzibir ye, Mi ta ka nk yin ritek riya mi ta f ye mi ta nk aDauda.
44013035	Kyndi a tan zibir ye, Wan t won asam wan azhl'e nong a ta bus ba.
44013036	Nizen iya aDauda ta nye itomong Adakunom ta shim, a ta fa ku ne a ku nr nar a ta nsk tukop wu, kurm wu bus.
44013037	Amma aYeso aya Adakunom t ku dorok kayr kurk, kurm wu bus ba.
44013038	Kamok anong roneng, mi shim ke yin ren yin ye ikng iya aYeso ta nye ne i sak a ta taas yin itak kurng rinn.
44013039	Mi shim ke yin ren yin ye kamok wu ne koangan azining afe a tin nk katsak ni wu ta s kashesh kaya Itsi aMusa ta kyem i nk ba.
44013040	Sak yin riy fan ikng iya ner kuzarap tan f bu ni shining natoon yin.
44013041	Wesek yin ato, yin fe kuzhsh kar. Zm yin ace yin amma t kus yin. Kamok mi t nye ikng ikak nizen yin iya yin tanin nk yin katsak ba ko a fa f ye akak ta tak yin.
44013042	Nizen iya aBulus be aBarnabas ta sen wuruk kayr'e kutu aduwa ner aYahuda yong nerawe f be ba ye ra bun b t ya kashn be rif natoon ikr iya ba tan f kanu natoon'e katuk Asabar afe kashn.
44013043	nerawe ta fa naka kaas, yong ner aYahuda be ya a ta nye ner aYahuda ba, ya a t won kukuus ign ba te ner aYahuda kuus aBulus be aBarnabas. Iyong aBulus be aBarnabas'e f be ba ye a ru ya kashn kayr ritek Adakunom.
44013044	Katuk Asabar afe kashn'e, nerawe ta sor kayr kuwp'e cicr nyim nong t fok rif Adakunom.
44013045	Amma ner aYahuda t fa di rigwm nerawe ta nyim, yong a kpaan rishishim didng ne f rimaan'e natoon ikng iya aBulus ta sen f'me.
44013046	Iyong aBulus be aBarnabas f be ba be riy rizining ye, Gyr ke yir san ku ka taas yin rif Adakunom nizham. Kum yin ta gaar yin i ta tonong yin kayr kuse yin ye yin raar yin tana s yin kutser kufe izen izen, iyong ne i sak ta ka won yin i ta kirik nufe ner aya a ta nye ner aYahuda ba.
44013047	Kamok Agwm gwm f be yir be agbang kut ye, Mi ma ka sak ta sor aya a tana tonong ner aya a ta nye ner aYahuda ba akanang. Wan ta tseng be kashesh ma nigang kazatse.
44013048	ner ya a ta nye ner aYahuda ba ta fa fok anong ne ay ba karp ne tiyiik rif Adakunom. ner ya Adakunom ta tsang a kasa nong ta s kutser kufe izen izen ti nk katsak.
44013049	Rif Adakunom ti barang kun koak kayr kaben cicr.
44013050	Amma ner aYahuda tees nyining akak a t nye ritek'e aya a t fok inyim Adakunom ne aritek kuwp'e. nk aBulus ne aBarnabas risam didng ne ku ro ba nuwp'e.
44013051	Iyong manzo ame waar ares ba nong i ta sor asheda natoon ba nong a t tseng na Ikoniya.
44013052	fikuus Antakiya nye riyrp didng ne a ka shining ba be Kabik Kazhl'e.
44014001	T, nizen iya aBulus be aBarnabas ta se na Ikoniya, a se n kayr kutu aduwa ner aYahuda kyndi tan m ne nye. Iyong a taas rif Adakunom azong be katsak ma nerawe whr t nye ner aYahuda be ya a ta nye ner aYahuda ba ti nk katsak na aYeso.
44014002	ner aYahuda ya a ta gaar ku nink katsak tees ner aya a ta nye ner aYahuda ma a ta sak ba di fikuus kyr.
44014003	aBulus be aBarnabas ta inom gaan azong ne a taas rif Adakunom be riy rizining. Adakunom tonong ye itak ritek wu nye katsak kamok a ta nk ba kukyem a tin nye ikr azhing be ife kukyem.
44014004	Aner kuwp'e naka kabak abas afa, akak kuus kama ner aYahuda ne kak kuus kama manzo.

44014006	manzo fok itak'e yong teng a be na aListira ne aDarbe ta nye wp aLikoniya be kaben ka ta se nukim.
44014007	se ya kashn be kutaas rif Adakunom azong.
44014008	Aner akak tuse na aListira aya a t ku tes akun'e, a kun kyem a tseng be atak wu nigaan'e ba.
44014009	A sonong a t foos ikng iya aBulus t f. aBulus ti sak anyisi ni wu yong a di aner ame t min nk katsak ye wu t te atser.
44014010	Iyong a f be wu ye, Dorok nong ta nyeseng be atak wan. Azong ne aner ame wor a furuk a ta kpaan kutseng.
44014011	nerawe ta fa di ikng iya aBulus ta nye ne a ta kut naza a ta f nirem ner aLikoniya ye, dakunom m b aze nufe yir kayr kurm anerawe.

44014014	Nizen aBulus be aBarnabas t fok anong ne sarak ares a ta se nirm ba nong ta dorok be itsi ta se s rigwm nerawe'me. Iyong a ta kut naza ta f ye,
44014015	Ar, aky sak yin ta nye yin ana ? Yir gip yir nye yir nerawe kyndi yin tsek. Yir ma ka bn yin Rif Ritek ye yin ru won yin kunye akpdng ikr na nong tu ku bun yin nufe Adakunom afe kutser aya a ta nye kaza be kaben ne ishng be ikr iya i ta se kayr'e peer.
44014016	Gbugbang, Adakunom won nerawe ta kuus ign ba tsek.
44014017	Gip be anong, Adakunom tonong katsak natoon rice wu kayr ikr itek iya wu ta nye. A ta nyesek yin iza kayr kuse kutek wu ne a sak naya te nishamang. A ta nyesek yin naya kuya ne a sak ay yin ta karp.
44014018	Gip be anong rif riya manzo t f, a can be nerawe nizham ta ra ka roon ba ku ka nye ba asidaka.
44014019	Iyong ner aYahuda kak ya a t ne na Antakiya ne Ikoniya b ta whap nerawe ma barak aBulus be ata. t kk t ku tun nuwp'e, ba sor ye an ku.
44014020	Nizen fikuus t nyim tu ku gorok, yong a dorok a tu ku bun kayr kuwp'e. Nayatson'e, aBulus be aBarnabas dorok a ta tseng na aDarbe.

44014022	ne tsang tsesek fikuus ne a ku nyesek ba itabak ye ra yiir rif riya ba ta min nk katsak be agap. Ne f ye Ma be risam didng nizham yir t ra n yir kayr rigwm Adakunom.
44014023	aBulus be aBarnabas t kasa ba kk kashn ikilisiya be kunye aduwa ne azumi ne ku won ba nubk Agwm gwm aya ba tin nk katsak.

44014027	t fa se n na Antakiya'me ne tusung fikuus ta ka taas ba ikr iya Adakunom tan nye nubk ba. t taas ba kuri iren iya Adakunom t karak nong as ner aya a t nye ner aYahuda ba tin nk katsak.
44014028	aBulus be aBarnabas te inom gaan azong be fikuus'e.
44015001	Yong ner akak ne na aYahudiya ta b na Antakiya nong se bsp fikuus'e ye, Sang ke a ta nye yin izhak kyndi aMusa t f ba, yin ta kyem i s yin kashesh ba.
44015002	Rif na sak aBulus be aBarnabas ya nanaan be ba didng. Iyong a tom aBulus be aBarnabas ne fikuus akak t tseng na aUshalima nong ta se rip manzo'me ne kk kashn ikilisiya akak itak'e.
44015003	fikuus t ku te ba niren, ne gor na aFoneshiya be aSamariya ne tsang a taas kuri iren iya ner aya sang a t nye ner aYahuda ba tin nk katsak na aKiristi. Itak'e sak fikuus cicr nye riy rikan didng.
44015004	Nizen ta se n ba na aUshalima, fikuus cicr ne manzo be kk kashn t ku shan ba niren. Iyong aBulus be aBarnabas t ku taas ba cicr ikr iya Adakunom ta nye be ba.
44015005	fikuus akak aya a t nye ner aFarisi dorok t f ye, Ma a nye ner aya sang a ta nye ner aYahuda ba izhak ne a ku sak ba nong t kuus Itsi aMusa dim nizham.
44015006	Iyong manzo ame ne kk kashn ikilisiya ame nyim nong as tin sak natoon itak'ong.
44015007	Nama t naka kk didng ne aBitrus dorok a nyeseng nong a t f be ba ye, roneng, yin ren yin ye Adakunom ti kasa kayr yin gbugbang nong ta taas ner aya sang a ta nye ner aYahuda ba awazi nong tin nk katsak.
44015008	Adakunom afe a ta ren kayr riy koangan tonong ye wu tu ku shan ba, kum a t ku nk ba Kabik Kazhl'e kyndi a tin nk yir.
44015009	Sang Adakunom ti tonong ye yir ner aYahuda se yir zr be ba ba, a sak ay ba te zhl kamok ba ti nk katsak.
44015010	T, aky sak yin shim yin ta bmng yin Adakunom be kunyeseng limazhiri acer aya yir ka tukop yir tan kyem cer ba ?
44015011	Yir ti nk yir katsak ye a min shesh yir kamok ritek Agwm gwm yir aYeso, anong ne ba gip.
44015012	Iyong nerawe whr tan nyim te gbik t foos aBarnabas be aBulus t taas ikr ife kukyem ne ife azhing iya Adakunom tan nye nubk ba kayr ner sang a t nye ner aYahuda ba.
44015013	Nizen iya t gang kuf kanu ne aYakub dorok a t f ye, roneng be ngasneng wesek yin kuto tin fok yin.
44015014	aSiman min taas yir kuri iren iya Adakunom t tonong kushim wu ni imsng'e a t kasa fu kayr aner aya sang t nye aner aYahuda ba.
44015015	Rif ner kuzarap t f nyim be riya a t zibir ye,
44015016	Nama anong, mi t bun i b nong ta bun ink kasa aDauda ka t tsang ka yirik. Mi t nk abor'e ne i sak kasa'me t dorok.
44015017	Be anong ne ribir nerawe tin tsr mi Agwm gwm, aner aya sang ta nye ner aYahuda ba, cicr ne aya a ta ka yis ba be riyerek'i t te anaan. Anong ne Agwm gwm f, wu afe a t nye ikr na,
44015018	wu afe a tu ku ren kum gbugbang.
44015019	Kamok anong, mi ye i se gyr nong ta firik yir ya sang nye ner aYahuda'me ba', aya a ta sen kuburung nufe Adakunom ba.
44015020	Gyr ke yir ban i ku zibir yir ba kufumung ingya nong tu ku tak yir ba ye, ra won kuya naya na aya a t kamok nye itsi, ra won rikuna ne kuya ikng iya be nask'e.
44015021	Kamok an taas nerawe rif natoon Itsi aMusa ta zibir kum gbugbang kayr koakye kuwp ne a fa kayr atu aduwa koakye Asabar.
44015022	Iyong manzo ne kk kashn ikilisiya ne ribir afikuus cicr di ye i se gyr nong a t kasa ner afa kayr ba nong a tu ku tom ba na Antakiya mak be aBulus ne aBarnabas. Ayong kasa aYahuda, aya a t ku yis ye aBarsaba ne aSila, aya a t tsang nye kk kashn kayr fikuus'e.
44015023	Kufumung a t ku nk ba ame se ye:
44015024	Yir fok yir ye ner akak ne aze nufe yir t b ka daam yin ne ka sak yin nudaam didng be kuri ikr iya ba t f. Sang yir ne i t sak yir ba ye ra nye anong ba.
44015025	Iyong ne yir ti sak yir i t kasa yir ner akak nong yir t ku tom yir ba nufe yin mak be roneng yir aBulus be aBarnabas,
44015026	a ta nye ner tan nk rice ba kamok itomong Agwm gwm yir aYeso Kiristi.
44015027	Kamok anong ne yir tom yir aYahuda ne aSila nufe yin, ba be ace ba t ka tas yin ikr na be kanu ba.
44015028	Yir di yir kyndi Kabik Kazhl'e ta di gip ye, i se gyr nong yir ta ka daam yin be ikng ikak i ta nar ikr iyiik'e na ba.
44015029	Won yin kuya rinam a ta min nye itsi, sang tu s yin nask ba, sang tu ya yin ikng ikak dar kutsr'e ba, sang tu nye yin rikuna ba. I se gyr yin ta won yin kunye ikr yir ta f yir na.
44015030	Ayong t ku te ba niren nong a t tseng na Antakiya'me. A t fa se tusung fikuus cicr kar kazining ne ku nk ba kufumung'e.
44015031	Nizen iya a t fa kufumung'e, ay ba karp be itabak a t ku zibir ba'me.
44015032	aYahuda be aSila t nye ner kuzarap be ace ba gip f rif didng riya ri ta sak fikuus Antakiya ti barang kus agap.
44015033	Nama ta te inom azong, fikuus afe azong t ku te ba niren be kuc kutek ne ashou nufe kamok ya a t ku tom ba.
44015034	(aSila tu fan azong.)
