47008018	Yir sen ku tom yir mak be aroneng akak aya fikuus tu ku kerek didng koakye kamok kuri itomong wu ife kutaas Rif Ritek.
47008019	Sang anong tsek ba, wu ne fikuus cicr tu ku kasa nong a ta tseng mak be yir nizen yir ta sen tseng yir be ikr i ta tusung yir nong tin tiyiik yir Agwm gwm ne i tonong yir kuri ifeng kutobok yir ta be yir.
47008020	Yir tu teng yir fan akak bin f yir natoon ikr nerawe ta nyesek whr na.
47008021	Kamok anong ne yir tsibik yir riy ta nye yir ikng i ta se gyr, sang na a wan anyisi Agwm gwm tsek ba, amma nanyisi nerawe gip.
47008022	Zr be anong, yir tu ku tom yir ba mak be aroneng yir akak aya yir t mu ku bsp yir niren zr zr. Yir tu s yir a be ifeng kutobok nerawe, a min te riy natoon yin didng ma a shim a t ka tobok yin gbak.
47008023	Yin ren yin aTitus nye aferim itomong'i nufe yin, ribir roneng'e nye ner aya fikuus tu ku kasa ba, itomong ba bn aKiristi kuyiik.
47008024	Kamok anong, ku tonong yin ba kushim ne ikng iya i ta sak yir tin ya yir kuka natoon yin nong fikuus'e cicr ta di.
47009001	Sang ma mi bun i ta zibir yin'e natoon kutobok na yin ta nye yin azhl'e ba.
47009002	Kamok mi ren ifeng yin ife ku tobok nerawe, mi ti ya kuka be yin nashn ner aMakidoniya. Mi f be ba ye yin ner Akaya yin tsang i nye yin kanyk kunk kum riy ri ta gor. Kuri ifeng yin ta be yin sak ba gip ma dorok tsik.
47009003	Kyrna, mi bun i sen tom roneng na nong i ta tonong ye kuya kuka yir tin ya yir natoon yin se kpdng ba, amma nong ta sor yin be kanyk kyndi mi t f.
47009004	Kamok ke mi b be ner aMakidoniya kak ne yir b i ta ka s yin dar kanyk, yir ta fok yir isum didng, yin gip isum ta ka r yin kamok mi n mak i ni te riy ni yin.
47009005	Kamok anong ne mi di ye, i ta se gyr mi ta nye roneng'e izong nong ta b nufe yin nizham mi ta ra b, nong ta nye kanyk ku tusung ikr yin tan sak ye ta nk yin. I t tonong ye be riy rizining ne yin nk yin, sang akak ne a ta te yin agap ba.
47009006	Yiring yin ye, aner aya a ta tuus ikng cik, cik tsek ne a ta ma s, amma aner aya a t tuus ikng whr, whr ne a t tsk.
47009007	Koangan ra nk ikng iya wu ta sok be riy wu ye wu ta nk, sang kayr riy kubeseng ka kamok a ta f be wu ye ma a ra nk ba, kamok Adakunom shim aner aya a ta nk be riy rikan.
47009008	Adakunom ta kyem a ka nk ritek wu ma ri ta nar ikng iya wan ta tsr, nong as koakye izen, yin ta s yin koakye ikng iya yin ta tsr yin, nong yin ta nye yin itomong itek didng.
47009009	Kyndi rif Adakunom t f ye, A nk ner aya a ta be ikng ikak ba ikr whr. Itomong ritek wu se ma izen izen.
47009010	Adakunom ne a nyesek aner ikap izha naya a tana tuus ne a ku nk naya kuya. Kamok anong, Adakunom ta ka nk yin izha naya nong t tuus yin, wu ne a t sak naya'me ta rasak. Wu ti barang ikng yin ta be yin nong yin ta kyem i tobok yin ya a ta se kayr kutsr.
47009011	Koakye izen a ta ka sak yin ta te yin rum nong ta sor yin fe ku nyesek ikr washak koakye izen. Be anong ne nerawe whr ta tonong riy rikan be Adakunom kamok kunk yin tana nk yin ku tana gor nubk yir.
47009012	Itomong yin ta nye yin na, nyesek ner Adakunom ikr ba ta tsr tsek ba, amma i sak nerawe whr tonong riy rikan didng be Adakunom.
47009013	Kamok itomong na ife yin ta min tonong yin rice yin, nerawe ta kerek Adakunom kamok yin kuus yin Rif Ritek aKiristi, ne i kasap yin ikr yin mak be ba ne ribir fikuus.
47009014	Kayr aduwa ba kamok yin, ta yiring be yin kayr ay ba, kamok agbang ritek Adakunom ta ka nk yin nar rif koangan.
47009015	Yir be yir riy rikan be Adakunom kamok kunk'ong, yir ta kyem i f yir ikng ikak ba.
47010001	Mi aBulus be rice mi, mi ta nye yin izong, mi aya nerawe ti sok ye, Aner kumees rice ke mi se mak be yin, amma Aner ku firik nerawe ke mi se be yin ba. Mi ta nye yin izong kayr kumees rice be kuse kutatan aKiristi,
47010002	mi ta nye yin izong ye, tin sak yin ta te aner ku ka firik yin ba, nizen iya mi tana b nufe yin. Kamok mi ta kyem i firik ya a ta tsang f ye yir sor yir be kuse rinerawe.
47010003	Gip be i ta se yir kayr kazatse, yir kn yir itsom kyndi fe kazatse ta kn ba.
47010004	Ikr itsom iya yir tin kn yir nye kuri ife kazatse ba. Wayo, i nye ife i ta be kukyem Adakunom, iya i tana kyem i yirik koakye kuri ikpaar mudn yir.
47010005	Yir yirik yir nanan be koakye kuri ikng ife kuka ta be nong a tin tnng kuren Adakunom ne i nye yir koakye kuri ikng iya i tana sak kutrng nerawe ta sor fe ku kuus rif aKiristi.
47010006	Yir se yir be kanyk koakye izen nong ta nes yir aner aya a ta shonong, ke yin ti fok yir kuto.
47010007	Yin yrk yin ikr bubarak tsek, ke aner akak di ye wu nye afe aKiristi, aner'e ra ren ye yir nye yir fe aKiristi kyndi wu gip.
47010008	Ke mi fa ya kuka be kukyem Agwm gwm tin nk nong ta ka nk mo yin, sang nong ta ka yirik mo yin ba. Mi be ikng ikak ife isum ba.
47010009	Mi shim yin tu di yin kyndi mi shim ta ka shirik yin be afumung mi t zibir ba.
47010010	Kamok kak f ye, Afumung wu r ne a be agap, amma ke wan tu di a tas aner a tana kyem a f ikng ikak be agap anong ba.
47010011	ner kuri ayong ra ren ye ikr yir t zibir yir kayr afumung yir'e se zr be kuse yir ba. Yir ta tonong yir kuse yir ke yir b yir.
47010012	Ta kyem yir ba, sang yir maas yir rice yir be ba ya a ta sok rice ba kyndi ba nye ikng ikak ba. kak kayr ba maas rice ba be fudang ba. ner kuri ayong ta maas rice ba be fudang'e be ritsng ba.
47010013	Yir, ta ya yir kuka ma ta gor yir kar'me ba, amma ta ya yir kuka nigak kar kaya Adakunom ta min nk yir kafe ka ta se ma nufe yin.
47010014	Sang yir ti ya yir kuka ma i ta gor yir kar kaya Adakunom tin nk yir ba, kamok yir ta ka nye yin awazi Rif Ritek aKiristi.
47010015	Kuka yir gor kar'me ba, i se natoon itomong ife kak ta nye ba, yir ti te yir riy ye kunk katsak yin ta rasak be anong ne rik itomong yir kayr yin tin barang kuya kashn.
47010016	Be anong ne yir ta kyem i nye yir awazi Rif Ritek kayr iben kak kashn yin, kamok yir shim tin ya yir kuka natoon itomong akak tan tsang an nye niben ikak ba.
47010017	Amma Won koangan a tana ya kuka ra ya kuka'me kayr Agwm gwm.
47010018	Kamok sang aner a ta kerek rice wu ne a tu kerek ba, ma ke aner aya Agwm gwm ne a tu ku kerek.
47011001	Mi mok ye yin tana ka tsesek yin be mi kayr rifunami. Ni barang yin kutsesek anong.
47011002	Mi be rifuup kamok yin, kuri rifuup riya Adakunom ta be natoon yin. Mi ma ka nye yin kanyk kuwnng mak be aKiristi, mi shim yin tu sor yin zhl nong mi ta ka nabak yin kyndi a ta nk abining afas zhl nashn amitek wu.
47011003	Amma mi fok inyim ye ikng iya i tase aHawa ta ka s yin. Iwhen tu wrk be ritsng wu ma a nye rinn. Anong ne a ta kyem a sak kutrng yin ta te kpdng, fan yin bun won dar i nk yin rice yin cicr nong ta se yin zhl nashn aKiristi ba.
47011004	Ke aner akak b nufe yin ye nong a ta ka taas yin itak aYeso akak zr be aYeso aya yir t ma ka taas yin ka ye yin ta shan kabik kakak zr be kaya yin tan shan yin ka be Rif Ritek rikak zr be riya yir t ma ka tak yin. Mi di kyndi yin ta shan yin.
47011005	Amma mi di kyndi mi ne i ti raar kayr manzo a ta ka sok ba ye ba ne nye ayiik ba.
47011006	Kashim kamok sang a tin bsp kuf rif ba, amma mi be kuren ikng. Yir n ma ka tosong yin kanang niren zr zr.
47011007	Yin di yin ye mi nye rinn, mi ta te fr be rice mi nong ta ka sok yin yiik, mi ta ka taas yin Rif Ritek Adakunom na awarak a?
47011008	Mi te kyndi mi mr fikuus kak kamok mi shan kutobok nufu ba nong mi tin nye itomong nufe yin.
47011009	Izen iya mi ta se mak be yin, mi be kudaam ikng ikak, gip be anong mi t ka daam yin ba. roneng fe a ta ne na aMakidoniya ne ti bn ikr mi ta tsr. Mi rosom riy fan mi ba ka sor yin kudaam, mi ta ya kashn be kunye anong.
47011010	Kamok katsak aKiristi ka ta se kayr'i, aner akak kuse niben Akaya afe a ta kyem a tin roon kuya kuka'ong ba.
47011011	Aky sak mi nye anong ? Kamok mi ta ka shim yin ba a? Adakunom ren ye mi ka shim yin.
47011012	Mi ta ya kashn be kunye ikng iya mi ta sen nye'me nong ta tnng ya a ta sen tsr iren kumaas rice ba titr be yir nikng iya ba tin ya kuka.
47011013	Kamok ner kuri ayong nye manzo abs, fe itomong abs. ta sok rice ba kyndi manzo aKiristi.
47011014	I nye ikng azhing ba, kamok Ishetan be rice wu gip, a sok rice wu kyndi amaleka akanang.
47011015	Kamok anong i nye ikng ikak ba, ke sam wu sok rice ba kyndi sam Adakunom fe katsak. Ni igang'e ta s ishorong itomong ba titr be kunye ba.
47011016	Mi bun i toos'e gbak, ye, sang akak tu sok'e, ye mi dun ritsng ba. Amma ke yin di yin ye mi be ritsng ba, t, ne i ni sok yin kyndi mi nye afunam'e, nong mi ta ma tsor kafok.
47011017	Natoon ku ni iya kuka be rice mi, sang mi f ikng iya Agwm gwm ta f ba, amma mi f kyndi aner ta se dar ritsng.
47011018	Kum nerawe whr ta sen ya kuka kyndi fe kazatse ta nye, mi ta nye anong gip.
47011019	Yin ya yin ta di yin ye yin be yin ritsng didng, amma yin ra shan yin aner aya a ta be ritsng ba, ibk ifa.
47011020	Katsak'e, yin kyem i naka tsesek yin, a ta sok yin kyndi sam, a ti shan ikng yin, t mr yin a t ka bas yin ibk.
47011021	Ikng isum mi ta ka tak yin ye yir kyem i nye yir anong ba. Amma ke akak ya kuka be ikng ikak, mi gip mi ta ya. Mi f aze kyndi aner a ta nye afunam'e.
47011022	Ke ba f ye ba nye ner Ibrani, mi gip mi nye. Ke ba f ye ba nye ner Isarela, mi gip mi nye.Ke ba f ye ba nye kuri Ibrahim, t, mi gip mi nye.
47011023	Ke ba di ye ba nye sam aKiristi, mi tu nar ba! (Mi f kyndi aner aya rice ta kirik s!) Mi n nye itomong ne i ka nar ba, a min tes nitsm ne a toos'e, ne a ni whereng didng, mi n dis riku niren zr zr.
47011024	Kutak kutoon ne ner aYahuda ni nye awhereng isk itaar be katonbk.
47011025	Kutak kutaar ne ner aRom ni tsosok be ishn ne a tin barak be ata kutak kuzining nong tin fr. Kukpara ashi kun fo be mi kutak kutaar. Mi kun ks ne i woso kayr ashi.
47011026	Kayr kutsang kutseng'i, mi nyim be kawei kayr gbang shng, mi n nyiis be gbang kpatang. Mi n di kawei be ner'i, ne i n nibk ner aya sang a ta nye ner aYahuda ba. Mi n di kawei kayr agbang kuwp, ne kayr katse, ne i di kawei kayr gbang adung, ne i n ni nibk roneng fe abs.
47011027	Mi n nye itomong didng, mi n s risam didng, mi n s kuks dar ida, mi n s kusor be izong be kut kukoor nizen ikak dar naya, kuwun ti shirim ne i sor ica'me.
47011028	Zr be anong, mi be kameneng riy ba kamok a tin daam yr yr be fikuus cicr.
47011029	Angan te gbrk nong sang mi ta te gbrk gip ba ? Angan ne a t sak a t nye rinn nong sang mi nye riy riwe ba ?
47011030	Ke mi ta ya kuka dim, mi tin ya kuka be ikr i tin tosong kuraar'i.
47011031	Adakunom ne a nye Ada Agwm gwm yir aYeso, aya a tana ku kerek ma izen izen, ren ye mi sen bs abs ba.
47011032	Nizen iya mi ta se kayr aDamaskus, agwmna aya a ta se nubk agwm Aretas, sak a ta fek kuwp aDamaskus nong as a tin yiir.
47011033	Amma, fudang'i tiik be mi kayr iderse na awindo kubar kuwp'e nong i t wher nibk wu.
47012001	Mi tin s ikng ikak ba, gyrtatan, amma mi ta ya kuka dim. Kyrna, mi ta ya kashn be kutaas ikr iya i ta bs kyndi nabos ne iya Agwm gwm tin tosong.
47012002	Mi ren aner akak a t nye afikuus aKiristi ay kusk be anaas a t gor, aya Adakunom t ku sok a t ngarak'e naza kafe ataar. Mi ren ka a se kayr kurm kuyu ka a n ba, Adakunom tsek ne a ren.
47012003	Mi bun i ren ye, aner na a t ku sok nong a t tseng'e naza kafe ataar, ka a se kayr kurm ka a n ba, amma Adakunom ren,
47012004	a tu ku sok a t tseng'e kayr aParadis. Azong a foos ikr a tana kyem a f ba, kuri iya sang anerawe tana kyem a f itak'e ba.
47012005	Mi ti ya kuka be aner kuri ayong, amma sang be rice mi ba, ma ke be kuraar'i.
47012006	Ke mi fa shim ta ya kuka, sang ke mi te kyndi afunam ba, kamok katsak'e ne mi ta f. Amma mi ta ya kuka ba, kamok mi shim akak tin sok ma i ta gor kar mi tu ku se ka ikng mi ta nye ba.
47012007	Nong fan mi bin ya kuka be ayiik ikr mi t dis'ong, ayong a ti tomong ikng ikak kyndi ikiritsan kayr kurm'i. Iyuna se kyndi aner kutom Ishetan nong a ta yiir ni nyesek risam.
47012008	Kutak kutaar mi nye Agwm gwm akusuk ye a rin kam be ikng iyong,
47012009	amma a f be mi ye, Ritek'i ta kyem, kamok kayr kuraar wan ne a ta di agap kukyem'i. Kamok anong, be riy rikan mi tin barang kuya kuka kayr kuraar'i na nong as agap kukyem aKiristi ta se mak be mi.
47012010	Iyong ne i sak, kamok aKiristi, mi nye riy rikan kayr kuraar'i, be ritok, ne risam mi ta s ne kuri kutabak a tin tabak, be kuri kufirik a tin firik. Kamok nizen iya ne mi se kayr kuraar ne mi s agap.
47012011	Mi te be rice mi kyndi afunam, amma yin ne i ti sak yin i ta te anong. Fa gy ke yin ne i ti kerek yin mi ti nye ikng ikak ba gyrtatan, gbang manzo yin'ong ti nar ba.
47012012	Ikr iya i ta tonong ye mi nye amanzo, mi nye kayr yin be kutatan. Itomong azhing be ikr azhing'ong tonong ye mi nye amanzo afe katsak.
47012013	Niren inyaka ne yin ti raar yin kayr ribir fikuus akak ? Ka kamok mi ta shim t te kyndi acer nufe yin ba ? Ni nye yin igaas kamok anong.
47012014	Kyrna, mi n nye kanyk ta bun i b nufe yin kutak kufe ataar. Mi shim ta ka sor yin acer ba, kamok yin ne mi shim sang ikr yin ba. Yin ren yin ye sang i se gyr nong inoon ta tusung ikr kamok atek ba ba, amma atek inoon tusung ikr kamok inoon ba.
47012015	Mi ta nye riy rikan ke mi ta fr koakye mi ta be, ma i ta nk rice mi kamok yin, nong ta ka tobok yin. Ke mi ta shim yin didng anong ne yin ra tk yin kufe yin a?
47012016	Yin be rice yin, yin ren yin ye, sang mi t sor yin acer ba. Amma mi be ritseng nong i ta ka wrk yin, ka anong ba !
47012017	Mi ta mr yin be ner mi t tom nufe yin a?
47012018	Mi nye aTitus izong ne aroneng akak afikuus'e ye ra b nufe yin. Yin ta f yin ye aTitus'e ta mr yin a? Aser, mi be wu sang kutrng kuzining ne yir be aa? Iren izining ne yir kuus yir aa?
47012019	Sang tu t yin kyndi nizen iyong cei, yir f yir nong tin tnng yir rice yir nashn yin ba. Adakunom ren, yir f yir katsak kyndi ya a ta se kayr aKiristi. roneng fe riy mi, koakye ikng yir ta nye yir, i nye yir nong yin tin s yin agap.
47012020	Kamok mi fok inyim ye kashim ke mi b, mi ta b t ka s yin kyndi mi ta shim ba, ne yin ni sok yin kyndi yin ta shim yin ba. Mi fok inyim ye mi ta b ta ka s yin riwng be rifuup ne riy kubeseng be ku won dar kugung rice, be ritok, ne imok, be rice ribun ne akpdng kusor.
47012021	Mi fok inyim ye ke mi bun i b nufe yin, Adakunom mi tin sak ta fok isum nashn yin. Mi ta nye riy riwe kamok whr kayr ya a t nye rinn, amma an tan shishing kuse ba ba, rinn kunye rikuna, ne kuwun kuya ba ta nye didng.
47013001	Iyu ne i ta nye ku b mi kufe ataar nufe yin. A ta s katsak koakye be rif ner afa ka ataar ayi kyndi rif Adakunom.
47013002	Izen mi ta b nufe yin ife afa mi t krk yin kuto. Mi bun i toos'e. Ke mi bun i b, mi ta won fe a tan nye rinn gbugbang t tseng warak ba, ko aner azining ba.
47013003	Kum yin ta sen tsr yin ikng iya i ta tonong ye aKiristi f kanu be mi. Wu ymng ba, amma a be agap a tana nye koakye ikng be yin.
47013004	Katsak'e nye ye, a tu tigak kayr kuymng kuri rif rinerawe, gip be anong ne wu ti sor kamok kukyem Adakunom. Anong ne yir ymng yir kayr wu, gip be anong ne kukyem Adakunom yir ta sor yir mak be wu nong a ta ka nye yin itomong.
47013005	Maas yin rice yin nong ta di yin ka yin kuus yin aYeso Kiristi kayr katsak'e, bmng yin rice yin, yin ren yin ye aYeso aKiristi se kayr yin, sang ke yin kpa yin kumaas ba.
47013006	Mi mok ye, yin ren yin ye, sang yir kpa yir kumaas'e ba.
47013007	Kyrna, yir nye yir aduwa be Adakunom ye yin ta nye yin ikng ikak imaan'e ba. Sang nong nerawe ta di ye yir n ya yir kumaas'e ba, amma nong yin ta nye yin ikng iya i ta se gyr, ke yir kpas yir.
47013008	Kamok yir ta kyem i nye yir ikng ikak tana tnng yir katsak ba, ma ke nong katsak'e ta ya kashn tsek.
47013009	Yir nye yir riy rikan ke yir se yir gbrk, amma ne yin se yin gbugbong. Yir nye yir aduwa ye yin ta shining yin.
47013010	Ikng i ta sak mi ta sen ka zibir yin ikr na, kamok mi ta se mak be yin ba, nong ke mi b, mi ta ba f be agap ba. Kukyem Agwm gwm tin nk na se nong ta ka nk mo yin sang nong tin yirik ba.
47013011	Ni igang'e, roneng, ma yin katuk kakak. Naka tsesek yin nong ta shining, fok yin izong'i, sor yin be riy rizining, sor yin caang. Be anong ne kushim Adakunom ne kameneng riy ta se mak be yin.
47013012	Na ka nye yin ashou be ku naka kur kuzhl'e.
47013013	zhl'e aze cicr ta ka nye yin ashou.
47013014	Ritek Agwm gwm yir aYeso Kiristi ne kushim Adakunom be kunyim rice Kabik Kazhl'e se mak be yin cicr.
48001001	Mi, aBulus, amanzo—aya sang akak ka nerawe ne a tin yis ba, amma aYeso Kiristi ne Adakunom a ta nye Ada, aya a ta dorok aYeso nurk
48001002	A roneng aya ta se aze cicr mak be mi ta nye yin ashou yin fikuus i ta se yin niben aGalati.
48001003	Ritek ne kameneng riy riya ri ta nes nufe Adakunom a ta nye Ada yir ne Agwm gwm yir aYeso Kiristi se mak be yin.
48001004	Wu aYeso aya a t nk rice wu kamok rinn yir, nong a tin shesh yir kayr amaan izam na. Iyu se anong kayr kushim Adakunom a ta nye Ada yir.
48001005	Kuyiik nye kufe Adakunom ma izen izen. Anong.
48001006	Ikng'e ti sor ikng azhing yin ta wor i sen won yin Adakunom afe a t ka yis yin be ritek aKiristi nong i ta sen kubun yin rif riduk zizirik anong.
48001007	Rif Ritek rika kuse zr be riyu ba. Mi f anong kamok kak kuse a tan sok kutrng yin ne a tsr iren a tana shishing katsak Rif Ritek aKiristi.
48001008	Amma mi fa f ye, akak kayr yir ka amaleka akak a ta ne naza ayi, ta tak yin Rif Ritek rikak zr be riya yir ta ma ka tak yin, won rimaan'e tu ku kuus ma izen izen.
48001009	Kyndi yir tan tsang f yir, anong ne mi bun i f kyrna gbak ye, koangan ne a ta ka nye awazi yin akak zr be aya yin ta min nk yin katsak, won rimaan'e tu ku kuus ma izen izen.
48001010	T, yong yin di yin ye, mi shim nerawe tin kerek ka Adakunom ? Ka yin di yin ye, mi shim ta karp nerawe riy a? Ke i fa nye ye mi ru shim ta karp nerawe riy, ke mi ba nye asam aKiristi ba.
48001011	Aroneng, mi shim yin tu ren yin ye Rif Ritek mi ta ka taas yin nye awazi anerawe ba.
48001012	Mi s nufe akak, ka akak ne a ti bsp'e ba, amma aYeso Kiristi be rice wu ne a ti tonong.
48001013	Yin n fok yin kuri kuse mi gbugbang, nizen iya mi ta ru kuus itsi ner aYahuda, kuri amaan risam riya mi t nk fikuus dar kur riy ma i tsr iren nong t tnng'e.
48001014	Mi nye kashn kayr fe ku kuus itsi ner aYahuda ne i nar ner aYahuda'me kak whr aya a t nye fe izam'i, ne i be ifeng kukuus ign ashn yir.
48001015	Amma Adakunom kayr ritek wu ti kasa kum ne a min tes ba, a bun a ti yis, ma a shim
48001016	nong a tin karak anyisi nong t ren Igon wu aYeso, nong as mi ta nye awazi Rif Ritek natoon wu nufe ner aya sang ta nye ner aYahuda ba. A t nye anong sang mi tsr ibrng nufe akak ba.
48001017	Mi tseng na aUshalima nong t se di fe a t nye manzo nashn mi ba, amma mi shishing i be niben Arabiya nong mi t ra ku bun na aDamaskus.
48001018	Nama ay ataar, mi be na aUshalima nong ta se di aSiman aBitrus, mi te kuks kusk be atoon be wu azong.
48001019	Mi di ribir manzo'me kak ba, sang ke aYakub aronyining Agwm gwm yir ba.
48001020	Mi be Adakunom mi, ikng iya mi ta sen ka zibir yin'e na nye abs ba.
48001021	Nama anong mi tseng niben aSuriya ne ife aKilikiya.
48001022	fikuus aKiristi ta se niben aYahuda ti ren ba.
48001023	fok itak'e ye, Aner a ta man ne a ni tabak yir ame sen taas itak kunk katsak kuya wu ta tser ke a tnng'e ame.
48001024	Iyong kerek Adakunom kamok'i.
48002001	Nama ay kusk be anaas mi t bun na aUshalima gbak, nizen iyong mi tseng be aBarnabas, mi bun i sok aTitus nong t tseng yir mak.
48002002	Mi tseng kamok Adakunom ti tonong ye i ra tseng. Mi su ku taas ba Rif Ritek mi t taas ner afe sang a t nye aner aYahuda ba. Amma na kyn mi taas fe a t nye kk kashn'e, kamok mi fok inyim ye kashim itomong iya mi ta sen nye'me be ife mi tan nye ta wei kpdng.
48002003	aTitus gip a ta se mak be mi nye aner aHeleni'me gyrtatan, a ra ku sak a t nye izhak ba.
48002004	Itak na dorok kamok fikuus abs kak ti n ni yir nong as tin farang yir nong ta di kanyk kusor yir ne kusor kutek yir ta s yir kayr aYeso Kiristi, nong a ti sak yir ta te yir sam.
48002005	Amma yir wor i tu ku shim yir ba'me ko cik ba, nong as katsak Rif Ritek aKiristi'me ta se mak be yin.
48002006	Amma ya a t nye kk kashn'e ti barang ikng ikak natoon Rif Ritek mi t ka taas ba ba, mi f anong kamok mi daam be kuyiik akak ba, Adakunom daam ye ka wan nye angan'e ba.
48002007	Ba gip ba di, Adakunom tin nk itomong kunye awazi nufe ya sang t nye ner aYahuda ba, kyndi a t nk aBitrus itomong kunye awazi nufe ner aYahuda.
48002008	Adakunom aya a tin te kubk ni itomong aBitrus ta nye kamok a ta nye amanzo nufe ner aYahuda, wu ne a ti te kubk ni itomong'i nufe ner aya a ta nye ner aYahuda ba.
48002009	aYakub be aBitrus ne aYohana ya a ta sor itsik'e ti shan be aBarnabas ibk ifa nizen iya ba t di ritek Adakunom tin nk yir. shim ye yir ri tseng yir nufe ner aya a ta nye ner aYahuda ba, nong ba ta tseng nufe ner aYahuda.
48002010	Ikng iya ba t f se ye, yir ra yiring yir be fe rizor, iyong ne i nye ikng iya mi ta shim ke mi nye'ong gip.
48002011	Nizen iya aBitrus ta b na Antakiya mi t ku zhr anyisi be anyisi, kamok amaan kunye wu'me se ts.
48002012	Kamok aBitrus'e n m ne a yas be ner aya sang t nye ner aYahuda ba, kum ne ner aya a ta se be aYakub t tsang b ba. Amma ner ta se be aYakub'me t fa b ne aBitrus na ka krk nong a t kam rice wu be ner aya a ta nye ner aYahuda ba, kamok wu fok inyim ner aYahuda ya a ta shim ye, koangan ra nye izhak.
48002013	Anong ne ribir ner aYahuda ya a t nye fikuus kuus kama wu natoon kunr kuse wu, kamok kuse'ong sak aBarnabas taam gip.
48002014	Nizen iya mi t di kunye ba tas ikng iya Rif Ritek aKiristi'me tin tonong yir ba, yong mi f be aBitrus nanyisi ba ye, Wan nye afu aYahuda, amma wan sor kusor wan kyndi ner fe a ta nye aner aYahuda ba. T, aky sak wan ta sak ner fe sang ta nye aYahuda ba, ye ma a ra kuus ign aner aYahuda dim ?
48002015	Yir ya afe i ta nye yir kutes ner aYahuda, sang Aduk ner fe rinn ba.
48002016	Yir ren yir ye sang nerawe te aner azhl'e nashn Adakunom ke a kuus Itsi aMusa ba, amma kamok ku nink katsak wu na aYeso Kiristi. Yir gip yir min nk yir katsak na aYeso Kiristi'me nong ta te yir zhl'e nashn Adakunom. Yir te yir zhl kamok ku ni nk katsak yir na Kiristi, sang kamok ku kuus Itsi ba. Kamok kukuus Itsi ne ku ta sak aner akak ta te azhl'e nashn Adakunom ba.
48002017	Ke i nye ye yir shim ta te yir azhl'e nashn Adakunom nizen iya yir ta te yir azining be aKiristi, (sang kamok kukuus Itsi ner aYahuda ba) amma bun ti yrk yir kyndi fe rinn iyong tonong ye aKiristi ti tk yir nong ta nye yir rinn a? I se anong ba. Ko cik!
48002018	Ke mi bun i san kukuus ikng iya mi ta tsang i won, iyong tonong ye mi taam ni imsng'e.
48002019	Kamok ni itsi aMusa mi te kyndi kukom'e nabik nong Itsi'me tin be ikng ikak natoon'i ba, nong mi ta sor kamok Adakunom.
48002020	A min tigak mak be aKiristi, sang mi ba sor kusor rice mi ba, amma aKiristi ne a sor kayr'i. Kusor mi ta sor kayr kurm, mi sor kamok mi min nk katsak ni Igon Adakunom, afe a tin shim ma a nk rice wu kamok'i.
48002021	Mi ramin ritek Adakunom ba, kamok ke a nye ye nerawe ta te zhl kamok ku kuus Itsi, i nye ye riku aKiristi be itomong ba.
48003001	Ka! Yin ner aGalati, yin yirim a? Angan sak yin te nye yin titak anong ? Yin ne a ta ka tak yin itak natoon kutigak aYeso Kiristi gyr gyr.
48003002	Mi shim ta ka rip yin ikng ikak izining, yin s yin Kabik Kazhl'e kamok yin ta kuus yin Itsi ka kamok yin tin nk katsak nikng iya yin t fok yin ?
48003003	Aser, yin se yin zizik anong a? Yin san yin'e gyr kayr Kabik, amma i bun i tsr ta gang yin be kurm a?
48003004	Aser, iriri risam yin ta s yin nye ku kpdng tsek a? Ka i nye kamok ikng ikak a?
48003005	Adakunom ta ka nk yin Kabik wu ne a nye itomong azhing kayr yin, kamok yin ta kuus yin Itsi ka kamok yin tin nk yin katsak nikng yin t fok yin ?
48003006	Yin di yin kuse Ibrahim, A ti nk katsak nikng Adakunom t f be wu, yong a t sok kyndi aner azhl'e.
48003007	Kamok anong, ren yin ye ya a ta nk katsak nye inoon Ibrahim.
48003008	Kufumung rif Adakunom tsang f ye, Adakunom ta sak ya sang ta nye aYahuda ba ta se gyr nashn Adakunom kamok kunk katsak ba, ne a tsang a tak Ibrahim Rif Ritek'e nakuruk ye, Kamok wan, nerawe kazatse cicr ta s ritek Adakunom.
48003009	Ibrahim tin nk katsak na Adakunom yong a t ku te kuc, anong ne koangan ne ke a ti nk katsak na Adakunom, a tu ku te kuc mak be Ibrahim.
48003010	An fiming cei fe a tin fereng ni ikuus Itsi aMusa, kamok i se ni izibir ye An fiming koangan fe a ta won dar yiir nye koakye ikng i ta se ni izibir kayr kufumung Itsi aMusa'me ba.
48003011	I se kanang ye sang akak ta se gyr nashn Adakunom ye kamok kuus Itsi ba I se ni izibir ye, ner azhl'e nashn Adakunom ta s kutser kamok kunk katsak ba.
48003012	Ikng ikak gung Itsi be kunk katsak ba, i ban i se ni izibir ye, Aner aya a ta nye ikr ife Itsi ta f ye cicr t s kutser kamok a kuus Itsi'me.
48003013	aKiristi ti shesh yir kayr kufiming afe i t be yir kamok Itsi, be kute aner a tu ku fiming kamok yir. I se ni izibir ye, Koangan afe a tu ku tigak, a t fiming.
48003014	aKiristi ti shesh yir nong ner fe a ta nye ner aYahuda ba ta s ritek a ta nk Ibrahim kamok aYeso Kiristi. Be kunk katsak yir, yir ta s yir Kabik Kazhl'e Adakunom ta tsang a nk kut ye wu tin nk yir.
48003015	Aroneng, mi f kuri rif rinerawe kyndi akak ta kyem a tk ka ti barang nikng nerawe ta tsang a sak ye a ta nye ba. Anong ne i se nitak na.
48003016	Ikng iya Adakunom t tsang a ni sak'e, a f be Ibrahim ne igon kakak kayr kuri wu nashn, sang kufumung rif Adakunom f ye, Be inoon ba. Rif'me se natoon nerawe ba amma natoon igon kakak kayr kuri wan Rif'me se natoon aner azining, a nye aKiristi.
48003017	Ikng iya mi tin f natoon'e nye, Itsi a t nk ay kusok inyak anaas be isok taar (430) nama Adakunom t tsang a nk kut be Ibrahim, kamok anong i sak Adakunom won i nk kut wu t tsang a nye nong ta birik'e ba.
48003018	Ke i nye ye a kyem a s kutser nikuus Itsi, t i nye ye wan kyem i s kamok kunk kut Adakunom t nye ba, amma Adakunom kayr ritek wu ne a nk Ibrahim kamok wu ne a nk kut'me.
48003019	T, Itsi'me nye ife aky makong ? A ti barang Itsi'me nong i ta tonong nerawe rinn ba. Itsi'me ya kashn be itomong ma izen iya kuri Ibrahim na b, aya be wu ne Adakunom ti nk kut. Adakunom tom maleka be Itsi'me nizen iyong nong i ta gor nubk aner akak a ta n natite nerawe be Adakunom.
48003020	Kamok nerawe ta kyem a n aner azining ba ma ner afa, t Adakunom se azining.
48003021	T, yong Itsi'me ta yirik kut Adakunom t tsang a nk a? Ko cik, i se anong ba, kamok ke i nye ye nerawe shan Itsi aMusa nong a tin s kutser t, i nye ye koangan ta kyem a te zhl nashn Adakunom be kukuus Itsi.
48003022	Amma kufumung rif Adakunom f ye rinn zim nerawe kazatse na cei, nong as ikng Adakunom ta tsang a ni nk kut, iya i ta b kamok kunk katsak na aYeso Kiristi, iya Adakunom ta nk aya a ti nk katsak.
48003023	Nizham kunk katsak na ta ra b yir se yir kyndi fe itsm kamok Itsi, yir se yir nuwhn ma izen iya a tin tonong yir kunk katsak.
48003024	Kamok anong Itsi ne a tu ku sak nong i tin bereng yir ma izen aKiristi tana b nong as a tin sak yir ta te yir azhl'e nashn Adakunom kamok kunk katsak yir.
48003025	T, kyrna, izen kunk katsak tan b, Itsi ba b ikng ikak natoon yir.
48003026	Yin nye yin inoon Adakunom cicr kamok yin ti nk yin katsak na aYeso Kiristi.
48003027	Kamok yin cicr fe i ta te yin azining be aYeso kayr abatisma ne yin sok yin kuse aKiristi.
48003028	Akak ba nye afu Yahuda ka aduk'e ba, akak ba nye asam ka a se washak ba, ne akak ba nye aner amitek ka aner abining'e ba, kamok cicr yin i nye yin aner azining kayr aYeso Kiristi.
48003029	Ke yin nye yin fe aKiristi t, i nye ye yin nye yin inoon Ibrahim, fe kuya kutse wu kyndi Adakunom t tsang a nk kut.
48004001	Mi f ye, kum ke i nye ye aya kutse'me rusek igon, t i nye ye a kam be asam ba, wu ne a ta ya kutse'me gyr gyrtatan.
48004002	Ne a rusek igon a se nibk fe ku ni sak riy ni wu be fe a tu ku won nibk ba, ma izen iya ada wu t ku sak'e.
48004003	Anong ne i se gip, nizen iya i ta ru nye yir inoon, i se yir kayr risam ku kuus ign kazatse na
48004004	Amma izen'e ta fa shining Adakunom tom igon wu, aner abining t tes nizen Itsi aner aYahuda t ru nye itomong,
48004005	nong as a ta shesh ya a ta kuus Itsi, nong yir ta sor yir inoon Adakunom.
48004006	Kamok yin ta nye yin inoon wu, yong Adakunom tom Kabik Igon wu kayr ay yir, Kabik'e ta kut ye Abba, Ada.
48004007	Kamok anong, wan ba nye asam baba ba, amma wan nye igon, kum wan ta nye igon, Adakunom ma ka sak wan n te aya kutse gip.
48004008	Nizen iya yin ta tsang i ren yin Adakunom ba, yin nye yin sam nikr iya nuse ba i ta nye Adakunom afe katsak ba.
48004009	Amma kyrna yin ta ren yin Adakunom be katsak, ka a ta f ye Adakunom ta ren yin, aky sak yin bun i sen kuburung yin na kpdng ign i ta won dar i be agap anong ? Yin bun i shim yin, ta te yin sam ba gbak a?
48004010	Yin ti yiik yin inom ikak ne ifn ikak ne izen ikak be ay akak ne i nar yin'e.
48004011	Anong ti nk inyim, mi di ye risam mi tin s ni yin te riduk'e.
48004012	roneng, mi ta nye yin izong, te yin kyndi mi, kamok mi n te kyndi yin. Yin min beseng yin ikng ikak ba.
48004013	Kyndi yin ta ren yin, kamok mi ta nye atser ba, ne mi b ni imsng'e nong ta ka tas yin Rif Ritek'e ba.
48004014	Kurk'i sor ikng kudaam nufe yin, gip be anong yin ti tonong yin akyr ka kuzhsh ba. Amma yin ban i ti shan yin ibk ifa, kyndi mi nye amaleka Adakunom, ka mi ne i nye aYeso Kiristi'me.
48004015	Yin se yin kayr riy rikan, yong aky ta s yin ? Mi ta kyem i taas ye ke a fa f ye yin ta kyem i turung yin nyisi yin tin nk yin, ke yin nye yin anong.
48004016	Mi n te amudn yin kyrna kamok mi ta ka taas yin katsak'e a?
48004017	fe kubsp nerawe abs'ong tonong ye ba ka shim yin amma kunye kufe katsak ba. Ikng ba ta shim nye nong ta ka kam yin be yir, nong as yin tu ku shim yin ba didng.
48004018	I se gyr kushim tuse anong ke kushim'e nye kufe katsak, i tuse anong aky izen, sang ma mi se be yin tsek ba.
48004019	Inoon'i naya mi ta sen nis risam kyndi aner abining ta ts ma yin te yin kyndi aKiristi.
48004020	Aky fa nye mi se mak be yin kyrna, ke mi ren ikng i tana f be yin, kamok mi daam be yin didng.
48004021	Ni tak yin, yin fe i ta shim yin Itsi tin nye rigwm natoon yin, yin ren yin ikng iya Itsi'me tin f aa?
48004022	I se ni izibir ye Ibrahim be inoon nafa. A tes kazining be kanamang kasa wu ne a tes kakak be atuk abining wu.
48004023	A tes igon wu be abining a t nye asam'me kyndi tan m ne tes inoon nakak tsek, amma a tes igon wu be atuk abining wu aSaratu'me nong a t shining ikng Adakunom t tsang a nk kut.
48004024	A ta kyem a sok ikr na kyndi kumaas kamok nyining afa na sor kushu kufa. Kushu kuzining Adakunom nk nawhanang aSinai, fe a ta kuus kushu'me nye sam. Kushu kuyu se kyndi aHazhara be inoon wu.
48004025	aHazhara'me sor kyndi kawhanang aSinai niben Arabiya, afe a tana bun a sor kyndi agbang kuwp aUshalima kufe kyr kamok kuwp aUshalima'me be inoon wu nye asam.
48004026	Amma aUshalima afe a ta se naza se nyk, wu ne a nye ang yir.
48004027	I se ni izibir ye, Nye riy rikan wan abining, afe sang i t tes ba. Ta kukun riy rika wan afe sang i ta kun fok kur kutes ba, kamok inoon abining aya amitek wu t ku won, se whr ne na nar nafe abining aya a ta be amitek.
48004028	T kyrna roneng, yin nye yin inoon nafe Adakunom tin nk kut natoon'e kyndi Ishaku ta se.
48004029	Nizen iyong igon kafe a t tes kyndi a tan m ne a tes mama tabak igon kafe a t tes be kukyem Kabik Adakunom anong ne i be yir kyrna gip.
48004030	Amma aky ne kufumung rif Adakunom f ? Rif ye, Ro abining afe a t nye asam'me be igon wu, kamok igon asam'me t ya kutse be igon atuk abining wan ba.
48004031	Kamok anong roneng, yir nye yir inoon abining afe a t nye asam ba, amma yir nye yir inoon nafe abining afe a t sor nk.
48005001	Kamok nong ta sor yir nk ne i sak aKiristi ti tun yir kayr kukuus Itsi. Kamok anong nyeseng yin be agap, sang tu ba sor yin kyndi sam baba ba.
48005002	T, yin di yin wa! Mi, aBulus, ne i f be yin, ke yin shim a ta ka nye yin izhak i nye ye yin s yin ikng ikak nufe aKiristi ba.
48005003	Mi bun i f be koangan afe a ta shim a tu ku nye izhak ye ke a ta kuus Itsi t, ma a ra kuus Itsi'me cicr dim.
48005004	Yin fe i ta shim ta sor yin kyndi azhl'e nashn Adakunom kamok i kuus yin Itsi, tonong ye yin kam yin be aYeso ne ritek Adakunom.
48005005	Yir te yir riy ye Adakunom ta sak yir ta te yir azhl'e ikng ife i ta sak yir ta tor yir nye Kabik Adakunom kaya ka ta nye itomong kayr kunk katsak yir.
48005006	Kamok ke yir se yir kayr aYeso Kiristi, ku nye yir izhak ka ku won dar ku nye'me, sor ikng ikak ba, ikng i ta nar nye kunk katsak a ta kyem a di kayr kushim.
48005007	Yin tsang i ya yin kashn gyr. Angan a ta roon yin kukuus katsak'e ?
48005008	Kunye kuri kuyong nye kufe Adakunom aya a ta ka yis yin ba.
48005009	Kyndi a ta man ne a f ye, Kabayisti cik ne ka sak ku abiredi kusum ta dorok.
48005010	Mi ti nk katsak na Adakunom be riy rizining ye yin ta kirik yin nong ta kuus yin rif rikak zr ba. Aner a ta sak yin ta te yin titak ta fok be amok, ko a tu nye angan.
48005011	roneng, ke mi ru nye awazi natoon kunye izhak, t, aky sak a ta ru ni tabak ? Ke i nye ye anong, i nye ye Rif Ritek mi ta f natoon riku aKiristi nakon ta sak akak tin tu atak ba.
48005012	Aky fa sak fe a ta ka daam yin'ong ta ya kashn nong a ta tsk rimetek ba nigaan'e.
48005013	roneng, a ta yis yin nong ta sor yin nk, amma sang tu sok yin kusor nk'e nong i ta sor iren afe yin tana nye yin ikr iya kurm yin ta shim ba, amma naka tobok yin kayr kushim.
48005014	Kamok Itsi f natoon ikng izining ye, Shim afegbak wan kyndi rice wan.
48005015	Amma ke yin yiir krng yin ne i naka ros yin kyndi agabu, sak yin riy ke anong ba, cicr yin ta wei yin.
48005016	Ikng mi tin f nye ye, i ri won yin Kabik Adakunom ta ka kk yin kus, nong fan yin bu kuus yin kuse rinerawe.
48005017	Kamok kuse rinerawe shim ikr iya i ta nye ife Kabik ba ne Kabik shim ikr iya i ta nye ife kurm ba. Kuse iri ifa na nye aner be amudn. Iyong ne isak yin kyem i nye yin ikr yin ta shim ke i nye yin ba.
48005018	Amma ke Kabik ne ka ta kk yin kus, Itsi ba be ikng ikak natoon yin ba.
48005019	Kuse rinerawe se ds, kunye ikr kyndi: rikuna be amaan kuse, ne kunye kyndi agabu,
48005020	ne kukuus ikr itsi be rikur. nerawe naka di kyr ne krng ne naka shishim, be riy kubeseng didng, ne kushim rice be ku naka kaa ne kuwon dar kugung rice,
48005021	be rishishim ne kufeng ne a na ka yis nar kazining nong a ta ya ne a s ne a nye kyndi agabu ne a nye ikr ikak kyndi anong. Mi ta krk yin kuto kyndi mi t tsang i f ye fe a ta nye ikr kuri iyuna ta n kayr rigwm Adakunom ba.
48005022	Amma kuse kuri kufe Kabik nye: kushim ne riy rikan be kameneng riy ne ku naka tsesek ne kuse kutek be kunye kutek ne kunye katsak,
48005023	be kuse whiwh ne ku yiir rice. Itsi ikak kuse i ta roon ikr na ba.
48005024	fe a ta nye afe aYeso Kiristi n fr kuse rinerawe be kunye amaan ikr iriri'me ne iya kurm ta shim.
48005025	Kum Kabik ne ka tin nk yir kutser, won kabik'e tin kk yir kus.
48005026	I tu kok yir rice yir naza ka ne i na beseng yir ay, ka ne i naka shishim yir ba.
48006001	roneng, ke yin s yin akak afe a ta yiir kunye rinn, yin fe i ta nye yin afe Kabik, ku bun yin be wu niren kayr awhiwh, amma sak yin riy be rice yin, ke anong ba, yin gip ta bun tin n yin kayr rinn'e.
48006002	Naka tobok yin kayr risam yin, be anong ne yin ta shining yin ikng iya Itsi aKiristi ta f.
48006003	Ke aner akak di ye wu nye ikng ikak, amma sang i ra se anong ba, a wrk rice wu.
48006004	Koangan ra yrk itomong wu a ta di, nizham a ta rin tsor kafok natoon'e, sang a tin maas rice wu be ife akak ba.
48006005	Kamok i se gyr koangan tin n na acer wu.
48006006	Koangan afe a tu ku bsp rif aKiristi, ra kasap ikr wu itek, be aner aya a tu ku bsp'e.
48006007	Sang tu wk yin rice yin ba, a ta kyem a wrk Adakunom ba. Ikng anerawe ta tuus, iyong ne a ta s.
48006008	Aner aya a ta tuus ikng kayr kuse rinerawe, iyong t tseng be wu riku. Amma aya ne a tuus kayr Kabik, a t s kutser kufe izen izen.
48006009	Kamok anong sang tu rn yir be kunye kutek ba, kamok izen saase ife i tana s yir ishorong itomong yir, ke yir te yir wa ba.
48006010	T, kamok anong, ke i s yir izen, i tonong yir koangan kuse kutek, abaan fikuus ba.
48006011	Di yin kuri izibir'i igbang'e mi ta ka zibir yin'e be kubk'i.
48006012	ner aya a ta shim yin tu ku di ba kyndi ba nye ikng ikak, a shim a ta ka sak yin ta nye yin izhak. Ikng i ta sak ba ta nye anong, nye fan a ba ka tabak ba kamok itak kutigak aKiristi.
48006013	fe a tu ku nye ba izhak'e gip, kuus Itsi'me ba, gip be anong ba shim ke yin nye yin nong ba tin nye kuka ni yin.
48006014	Adakunom rin roon kuka ma ke mi tin ya kuka be kutigak Agwm gwm yir aYeso Kiristi nukon, be riku wu ne mi ku ni ikr kazatse na, ne ikr kazatse ne ku ni mi.
48006015	Ke kunye izhak be ku won dar kunye'me nye ikng ikak ba, ikng iya i ta nye igbang'e nye nong ta te aner afas.
48006016	Won kusor kutek be kur riy Adakunom tu se be afe a ta kuus iren na, ba ne a nye aner Isarela afe Adakunom fe katsak.
48006017	Ni igang'e roneng, akak yin t ba daam ikng ikak ba, ye kamok bin ya mi ta be nurm mi ba. I tonong ye mi nye asam aYeso.
48006018	roneng, ritek Agwm gwm yir aYeso Kiristi se mak be yin cicr. Anong!
49001001	Mi aBulus, aya i ta te amanzo aYeso Kiristi nushim Adakunom, mi ne i sen ka zibir yin kufumung na yin zhl'e ya a ta se kayr kuwp Afisa, ya a ta kuus aYeso Kiristi be katsak.
49001002	Ritek be kameneng riy Adakunom a ta nye Ada yir ne Agwm gwm yir aYeso Kiristi se mak be yin.
49001003	Nakerek nye nafe Adakunom ne a bun a nye Ada Agwm gwm yir aYeso Kiristi, aya a tin nk yir ritek kayr rigwm wu kayr kaza ne a bun a tin nk yir koakye kuri ritek kufe kabik.
49001004	Kamok kum ne Adakunom n tsang a nye kazatse nizham ba, a tsang a ni kasa yir nong a tin gung yir mak be aKiristi, nong ta se yir zhl ne i se yir dar rizik nashn wu. Kamok wu tin shim yir,
49001005	iyong ne i sak wu ta tsang a ni kasa yir nong ta te yir inoon wu kamok itomong aYeso Kiristi. A nye anong nushim wu ne ritek wu.
49001006	A nye anong, nong yir t kerek yir kuyiik ritek wu, riya wu tin nk yir nawarak kamok Igon wu kaya wu ta shim.
49001007	Kamok wu Adakunom ti sheshek yir be kunyosong nask aYeso, ne yir s yir kurng rinn. A nye anong kamok agbang ritek wu,
49001008	riya a tin nk yir nawarak be kukyem ne kuren ikng cicr.
49001009	Adakunom sak yir ren yir ikng wu iya i ta se nunrng kyndi wu ta shim, iya a ta nye kanyk'e kayr aKiristi.
49001010	Kanyk wu se, ye ke izen'e nye dim, a t gung ikr cicr, ikr iya i ta se kayr kaza be iya i ta se kaben nong aner azining tin nye rigwm, aKiristi ne a tin nye rigwm'e.
49001011	Kamok wu ne Adakunom tsang a ni kasa yir nong ta te yir afu. Wu ne a nye koakye kyndi riy wu ta shim.
49001012	A nye anong, nong as yir ner aYahuda tin te yir riy na aKiristi ni imsng'e, ta sor yir fe ku ka kerek kuyiik Adakunom.
49001013	Kamok aKiristi, ne yin gip yin te yin fe Adakunom nizen iya yin t fok yin rif katsak ne Rif Ritek rife kutser. Izen iya yin ti nk yin katsak natoon aKiristi, Adakunom t nk yin Kabik Kazhl'e kyndi a t tsang a nk kut ye wu t nye anong, nong a t tonong ye yin nye yin afu.
49001014	Kabik Kazhl'e ne ka ti tonong yir ye Adakunom tin nk yir ikng iya a t tsang a nk kut ye wu t nk, ma nizen iya Adakunom tana sheshek afu. Iyuna se anong, nong anerawe ta kerek kuyiik wu.
49001015	Kamok anong, kum mi t fok itak kunk katsak yin natoon Agwm gwm yir aYeso be kuri kushim yin t shim yin zhl'e cicr.
49001016	Mi won kunye riy rikan be Adakunom kamok yin ba, ne i yiring be yin kayr aduwa mi.
49001017	Mi yiir kunye aduwa ye Adakunom afe Agwm gwm yir aYeso Kiristi, Ada yir ayiik'e ye a ra ka nk yin kabik kafe kukyem ne kafe kuren ikng nong as yin t ku ren yin didng.
49001018	Mi bun i nye aduwa ye Adakunom ra ka karak yin ay nong yin tin barang yin kuren ikng i ta sak yin tin te yin riy ni ikng wu t ka yis mo yin, ku ta bun kunye, kurum wu agbang kuya zhl'e tana ya kutse'me.
49001019	Mi bun i nye aduwa ye yin ta ren yin agbang kukyem wu kufe ya a tin nk katsak. Kukyem kuya ku ta nye itomong kayr yir se kuzining be kuyu.
49001020	Kukyem wu kuri kuya wu t tonong nizen wu t dorok aKiristi kayr ikom ne a ku sak a t sonong nubk riya wu kayr kaza.
49001021	Azong ne aKiristi ti nye rigwm natoon fe rigwm ne gwm ne fe agap ne koakye kuri ikng iya a tin te riyerek nashn, amma ma izen izen.
49001022	Adakunom won koakye nubk wu ne a ku kasa a tin nye rigwm natoon ikr cicr ne a te akk kashn ikilisiya.
49001023	fikuus'e nye kurm aKiristi. Kayr fikuus'e ne aKiristi shining, kyndi wu be rice wu ta shining koakye kuri ikng kayr koakye kuri iren.
49002001	Gbugbang yin tsang i se yin kyndi ikom'e, kamok kuraar yin ne rinn yin tin sor yin kayr'e,
49002002	riya yin tin se yin nizen iya yin t kuus yin kuri kutseng kazatse na ne i kuus yin agwm, aya a tin nye rigwm natoon nabik naya na tase natoon kaza. Wu ne a nye kabik kaya ka ta whap ay nerawe ya a ta gaar ku kuus Adakunom.
49002003	Yir cicr, yir i tsang i se yir kyndi ba gip ne i shim kunye yir ikr imaan'e iya ay yir ta shim ne i kuus yir kuse be kutrng yir. Kyndi koangan ta se, be anong kayr kuse rinerawe yir gip riy kubeseng Adakunom se natoon yir kyndi ri ta se natoon ba gip.
49002004	Amma Adakunom be kur riy didng, kushim wu natoon yir se makiyi,
49002005	iyong sak kun ne yir ru nye yir ikom'e kamok rinn yir, ne i sor yir be kutser mak be aKiristi. Kayr ritek wu ne yir ti s yir kashesh.
49002006	Adakunom ti dorok yir be kutser mak be aKiristi, kamok aYeso aKiristi'me ne yir ti s yir kar kusor kayr kaza.
49002007	Adakunom nye anong, nong as a t tonong izam ife i tana b kuri ritek riya sang ri ta be igak ba. A ti tonong yir anong kamok ritek wu kayr aYeso Kiristi.
49002008	Ei, kamok ritek Adakunom ne yin ti s yin kashesh ne kamok kunk katsak yin, sang kamok kunye yin ba, amma Adakunom ne a nk,
49002009	sang kamok itomong itek yin ba, nong akak tin ya kuka ba.
49002010	Kamok yir be rice yir, yir nye yir ikng iya Adakunom'me t nye. A tin shishing yir kamok aYeso aKiristi nong t nye yir itomong itek, iya Adakunom'me t tsang a sak ta nye yir.
49002011	Kamok anong, yiring yin kuri kusor yin agbugbang. Yin nye yin ner aYahuda ba nutes. Ba ya a ta yis rice ba ye, fe izhak'ong ne ka yis yin ye, ashurukur. Izhak'ong a nye be ibk natoon kurm tsk.
49002012	Yiring yin nizen iyong, yin tsang i se yin mak be aKiristi ba, a ta sok yin ye yin nye yin ner Isarela ba, ye, yin be yin ikng ikak kayr kushu Adakunom t nye be tukop yir ba. Kayr kazatse na yin se yin dar kute riy ne yin be yin Adakunom ba.
49002013	Amma kyrna kayr aYeso Kiristi, yin fe i t tsang i se yin aza gugk, a b be yin bubarak kamok nask aKiristi makong.
49002014	Kamok aKiristi be rice wu ne a ti bn yir kusor caang, wu ne a sak ner aya a ta nye ner aYahuda be ya sang ta nye ner aYahuda ba, ta te azining. Kubar ku t se natite ba, a yirik, ku t nye ku won dar ku naka shim.
49002015	A wobok Itsi ner aYahuda'ong be itsi wu ne ign wu be riku. A nye anong be kutes iri ifa'ong nong a t s kutes kuzining kufas. A nye anong, nong a ta bn kusor caang natite ba.
49002016	Kyndi kurm kuzining a tu bun be ba cicr afa'ong nufe Adakunom. A nye anong be riku wu natoon kukon nong a t tun rifub ri ta se natite ba.
49002017	A b a t ka taas yin, ya sang i ta nye yin ner aYahuda ba, ne yin ner aYahuda Rif Ritek rif kusor caang.
49002018	Kamok wu ne yir ti s yir iren ku be nufe Ada, iren izining, iya ita se kayr Kabik.
49002019	Kamok anong, kyrna yin ba nye yin tsen ka ner aduk ba, amma yin te yin azining be ner Adakunom ne ribir ner kasa Adakunom'me.
49002020	A t sak yin cicr natoon ritin'e, riya manzo be ner kuzarap t nk. aYeso aKiristi be rice wu ne a nye atuk agbang kuta itsik ribor'e.
49002021	Natoon wu ne a ti sok rink cicr nong ku ta te agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben kamok Agwm gwm.
49002022	Natoon wu ne a ta sak yin mak gip nong ta te yin kar kusor Adakunom kamok kukyem be Kabik wu.
49003001	Kamok anong, mi aBulus a min te nitsm kamok aYeso aKiristi ne kamok yin ya sang yin ta nye yin ner aYahuda ba.
49003002	Mi ren tsng tsng ye yin n fok yin kuri ritek Adakunom tin nk nong tin nye itomong na kamok yin.
49003003	Iyong ne i nye ikng Adakunom tin ts'e kayr kanyk wu kaya sang akak ta ren ba, kyndi mi t tsang i ka zibir yin'e cik.
49003004	Kum yin tan fa yin, yin ta kyem i s yin akanang ikng ife mi ta ren natoon kuse aKiristi.
49003005	Gbugbang sang a taas nerawe itak'e, kyndi Kabik Adakunom'me t taas manzo azhl ne ner kuzarap azhl'e kyrna ba.
49003006	Kanyk'e se ye kamok kutaas Rif Ritek Adakunom, nong ner aya a ta nye ner aYahuda ba ta s kuya kutse mak be ner Isarela. Ba te kyndi aner azining ne s kukap mak be ner Isarela, kayr ikng iya Adakunom t tsang a f ye wu ta nk kamok aYeso Kiristi.
49003007	Mi te asam kutaas Rif Ritek na kamok Adakunom tin sak ta nye anong kayr ritek be itomong kukyem wu.
49003008	Mi ne i ti raar didng kayr nerawe Adakunom cicr gyr tatan, gip be anong a ti nk ritek na nong ta taas ner aya a ta nye ner aYahuda ba, kuri kurum aKiristi kuya sang ku ta be igak ba,
49003009	Kamok Adakunom nye itomong be mi nong as a ta tonong kanyk itomong wu kanang kayr yin cicr. Kanyk Adakunom aya a ta nye ikr cicr, a ta nr fe izam agbugbang'e.
49003010	Adakunom nye anong be fikuus nong as fe rigwm be fe a ta nye rigwm natoon kaza ta ren kukyem Adakunom kayr koakye.
49003011	Iyong se titr be kushim riy Adakunom kuya a t nye kanyk'e kum nizham a ta ra nye kazatse, a shining be Agwm gwm yir aYeso Kiristi.
49003012	Kamok i ta se yir mak be wu ne kunk katsak yir natoon wu, yir ta kyem i tseng yir nashn Adakunom nk be riy rizining.
49003013	Kamok anong, mi ta nye yin akusuk ye, sang tu ku bun yin kama kamok yin ta di yin kuri risam mi ta s kamok yin ba. Katsak'e, risam'me ta ka bn yin kuyiik.
49003014	Kamok anong, mi tigbok akuur nashn Ada yir nong i ta nye aduwa,
49003015	wu aya a ta nye koakye irem naza be kaben cicr.
49003016	Mi nye aduwa ye kayr agbang kuyiik wu, a ta ka tsesek yin be kukyem wu, nong ta sor yin be agap kayr ay yin kamok Kabik wu,
49003017	nong as aKiristi ta sor kayr ay yin kamok kunk katsak yin. Mi nye aduwa ye, kushim ta nyeseng be agap kayr ay yin. Won kushim tu nye ritin'e,
49003018	nong ta s yin kukyem mak be zhl'e fe Adakunom cei nong yin ta ren yin ye kushim aKiristi se saa ne ku nye kusp ne ku se garang ne ku se tsik.
49003019	Ne yin ren yin kushim aKiristi kuya ku ta gor agap kuren anerawe nong as ta shining yin be kunik kuse Adakunom didng.
49003020	Kuyiik nye kufe wu aya a ta kyem a nye koakye be ikr iya yir tana ku rip yir ne iya yir tanin nye yir kutrng.
49003021	Kuyiik nye kufu kayr ikilisiya be kayr aYeso Kiristi ma izam izam cicr ma izen izen. Anong.
49004001	Kamok anong, mi aya mi ta se nitsm kamok mi ta kuus Agwm gwm, mi ta nye yin akusuk ye yin ra sor yin kusor kutek kuya ku ta se kyndi agbang kuyis kuya a t ka yis mo yin.
49004002	Mees yin rice yin ne i se yin tatan. Te yin ata nay ne i naka be yin kayr kutatan kushim.
49004003	Nye yin koakye yin tana kyem i nye yin nong ta ya yin kashn be kugung rice kayr Kabik kamok kusor caang ne ku ta ka gung yin.
49004004	Yir se yir kyndi kurm kuzining ne Kabik Kazhl'e se kazining. Anong ne yin be yin ku ni te riy kuzining kuya a t ka yis mo yin.
49004005	Agwm gwm se azining, kunk katsak se kuzining, abatisma se azining.
49004006	Adakunom se azining, wu ne a nye Ada yir cicr. Wu ne a se natoon yir cicr, ne a ninye itomong be yir cicr ne a se kayr yir cicr.
49004007	Amma a nk koangan yir kunang ritek aKiristi kayr kushim wu.
49004008	Kyndi rif Adakunom ta f ye, Izen iya a t ngarak naza a sok ya wu t yising ne a nk nerawe kunang iriri'me,
49004009	Aky nye ye a ngarak ? I tonong ye, ni imsng'e a se tsik ma kayr kaben!
49004010	Wu aya a t tiik'e ne a nye aya a t bun a ngarak ring ring natoon kaza, nong a ta shining koakye naza be kaben be kukyem wu.
49004011	Wu ne a nk kak kunang ku te manzo ne kak te ner kuzarap ne kak sor fe kutaas Rif Ritek ne kak te ner tanin sak riy na nerawe be ner kubsp nerawe'me.
49004012	A nye anong, nong a t nye kanyk ner Adakunom tu ku nye itomong ne a nk kurm aKiristi.
49004013	Be anong ne yir cicr i s yir kunk katsak kuzining natoon Agwm gwm ne i te yir azining natoon kuren Igon Adakunom. Yir ta te yir ner aya a tan te nerawe nong ta se yir natoon kagarang kaya ka ta se gyr kyndi aKiristi.
49004014	Yir ta ba se yir kyndi inoon nazhizhk'e, tana kuzim ba ba, a ta ka zim ba aze be aza be koakye kuri kubsp ne kuri rif ritsng a tin wrk nerawe ba.
49004015	I ban i f yir katsak kayr kushim ne i rasak yir cei kayr koakye kuri ikng kayr wu, aKiristi aya a ta se kyndi rice nurm anerawe.
49004016	Wu ne a gung ikap kurm'e cei, kurm'e sor nagung kamok koakye ifun be ikap kurm'e rasak ne i nk rice wu kayr kushim kamok koakye ikap kurm'e ta nye itomong wu.
49004017	Kamok anong, mi ta krk yin kuto kayr riyerek Agwm gwm ye, sang tu ba sor yin kyndi furin ta sor be kuri kutrng ba kufe rifunam ba.
49004018	Kuren ikng ba se whi ne be kutser kufas kuri kuya Adakunom ta nyesek ba, kamok kuri agbik rice ba ta be ne kushonong ba.
49004019	te be rice ba dar isum. nk rice ni inye ikr isum, be shim kunye ikr ife isum didng.
49004020	Iyong ne i nye ikng yin t bsp yin natoon aKiristi ba.
49004021	Katsak'e, yin a ta tak yin itak wu ne a ka bsp yin rif katsak natoon aYeso.
49004022	A t bsp yin'e natoon ye yin riwon yin kuri kuse yin kufe agbugbang nong ta kam yin be kuse yin kuzen ku ta nye kumaan'e, ku ta ka wrk yin i ta nye yin kushim riy yin ma ku ta ra beseng yin.
49004023	Fa gy ke yin shishing yin kutrng yin nong ku ta te kufas.
49004024	Sok yin kuse kufas'ong, kuya Adakunom ta nye, ku tu ku tas, ku ta se kayr katsak ne kuzhl kusor.
49004025	Kamok anong koangan kayr yin ra won naborok nong a t tak afegbak wu katsak, kamok cicr yir i nye yir ner aner azining.
49004026	Ke riy yin beseng sang tin nye yin rinn ba, sang akak tu won kunom tu kpa ne wu rusek be riy kubeseng'e ba.
49004027	Sang tu nk yin Amaan Aner iren, ko cik ba.
49004028	Aner a ta tsang a nye itsang tu ba nye ba, a ra nye itomong ne a nye ikng ikak itek be ibk wu nong a ta s ikng ikak a tana nang aya sang a t be ba.
49004029	Sang akpdng rif tu wuruk kayr kanu yin ba, amma f yin rif ritek riya ri tana nk kak kuya kashn natoon ikng ba ta sen tsr'e nong fe a ta ka foos'e ta s kutobok.
49004030	Sang tu beseng yin Kabik Adakunom Kazhl'e riy ba, kamok be wu ne a ta te mo yin iziz nong ta sor yin afu ma katuk a tana shesh nerawe.
49004031	Kam yin be koakye kuri riy riwe be riy rife ne riy kubeseng be kuren be ritok ne koakye kuri amaan kunye.
49004032	Sor yin gyr be fudang yin, naka di yin be kur riy ne i naka nye yin igaas kyndi Adakunom ta ka rng yin rinn yin kayr aKiristi.
49005001	Kamok anong, kum yin ta nye yin inoon na ya Adakunom ta shim, t, kuus yin an Adakunom.
49005002	Sor yin kusor ku naka shim kyndi aKiristi tin shim yir, a t nk rice wu kamok yir, kyndi asidaka aya a ta be ikn itek, aya a ta nye kamok Adakunom.
49005003	Kum yin ta nye yin fe Adakunom, sang a tu fok itak rikuna kayr yin, ko cik ba, ka kunye ikr isum ka rinyisi rikan kayr yin ba, kamok ikr kuri iyong nye itek kayr nerawe Adakunom zhl'e ba.
49005004	Ka a tu fok amaan kunye, ka akpdng rif ka amrzhk rif kayr yin ba, kamok i se gyr a ta foos rif kuri riyong kayr yin ba, amma ban yiir tonong yin Adakunom riy rikan ingya.
49005005	Kamok yin ren yin tseng tseng ye aner a ta nye rikuna ka aner a ta nye ikr isum ka aner a ta be rinyisi rikan (aner kuri ayong se kyndi aner a ta kuus itsi) be ishorong kayr rigwm aKiristi ka rife Adakunom ba, ko cik.
49005006	Sang tu won yin akak ta ka wrk yin be nadirik kamok be kuri rinn kuri riyong ne riy kubeseng Adakunom tin tiik natoon fe kushonong.
49005007	Kamok anong, ikng ikak ta ka gung yin be ba ba.
49005008	Kamok yin tsang i se yin na awhi gbugbang, amma kyrna yin se yin na akanang kamok Agwm gwm. Sor yin kyndi inoon akanang.
49005009	(Ritek a ta s nusor akanang nye kunye kutek be kusor kuzhl'e ne kunye katsak)
49005010	Ne i tsr yin ikng iya i tana karp Adakunom riy.
49005011	Kam yin be akpdng ikr awhi, ban i ts yin ikr'me ingya.
49005012	Kamok i nye ikng isum a tana f rif natoon ikng iya a ta nye na nunrng.
49005013	Kamok akanang'e ta ts koakye nong koangan ta di ne a ren.
49005014	Kamok akanang'e ne a sak a ta di koakye ds iyong ne i sak rif Adakunom ta f ye, Dorok, wan aya i ta se be ida, dorok kayr fe a tan kus ne akanang aKiristi tin samang natoon wan.
49005015	Kamok anong, sak yin riy be kuri kusor yin didng, sang tu sor yin kyndi fe a ta se dar ritsng ba, amma sor yin kyndi fe a ta be ritsng.
49005016	Ni nye yin itomong be koakye kuri izen iya yin ta s yin gyr kamok izen na nye imaan'e.
49005017	Kamok anong tu te yin funam'e ba, amma ren yin ikng iya i ta nye riy Agwm gwm.
49005018	Sang tu s yin kugbr ma ta feng yin'e ba, kamok iren kuwei ne i nye iyong, amma shining yin be Kabik Kazhl'e n ingya.
49005019	Ke yin sen f yin kanu ne i ninye yin itomong be kufumung aZabura ne abom riy rikan ne abom azhl'e. Yiir bom yin abom kayr riy yin kamok Agwm gwm.
49005020	Koakye izen, yiir tosong yin Ada Adakunom riy rikan kamok koakye, kayr riyerek Agwm gwm yir aYeso Kiristi.
49005021	Naka foos yin kamok kuyiik aKiristi.
49005022	Yin nyining iwnng kuus yin ikng atek yin ta f be yin kyndi yin ta kuus yin Agwm gwm.
49005023	Kamok atekasa ne a nye rice abining wu, kyndi aKiristi ne a ta nye akk kashn ikilisiya, ba ta nye kurm wu. Wu be rice wu nye aner kashesh'e.
49005024	T, kyndi fikuus ta kuus aKiristi anong ne nyining ta ma kuus atek ba kayr koakye.
49005025	Yin tek, afe i tan nye yin iwnng, shim yin nyining yin kyndi aKiristi ta shim fikuus ma a nk rice wu kamok'e,
49005026	nong a t sak a t te zhl be ku ka taas ba rif Adakunom riya ri t ka kusu ba kyndi ashi nong a ta forop.
49005027	A nye anong, nong a ta bn fikuus'e nashn wu yiik, dar rizik ka ikng ikak i ta risik, amma zhl dar ikng ikak imaan'e.
49005028	Kamok anong, i se gyr atek afe a tan nye iwnng tana shim nyining ba kyndi ba ta shim irm ba. Aner aya ne a ta shim abining wu, i nye ye a shim rice wu.
49005029	Kamok akak kuse a ta rawu kurm wu ba, amma a nyesek kurm wu naya ne a ni sak riy, kyndi aKiristi t nye be fikuus.
49005030	Yir ta nye yir ikap kurm wu.

49005033	Gip be anong, koangan kayr yin gip a ra shim abining wu dim kyndi a ta shim rice wu ne abining'e ma ti yiik amitek wu.
49006001	Yin inoon, kuus yin ikr iya da yin kayr Agwm gwm ta f be yin, kamok i se gyr yin ta nye anong.
49006002	Itsi Adakunom ife imsng'e iya a tin nk kut natoon'e f ye, Tiyiik ada wan be ang wan.
49006003	Ke wan nye anong Wan ta fok kusas kusor wan ne i bun i s kuks kusp nazatse.
49006004	Yin tek inoon, sang tu sak yin inoon yin ta nye riy kubeseng ba, amma ku kunees yin ba be itabak ne i kubsp yin ba iren Agwm gwm.
49006005	Yin sam, kuus yin ikng iya tekasa yin fe kazatse ta f be yin be inyim ne ikap kutiim be riy rizining kyndi aKiristi ne yin sen ku nye yin'e.
49006006	Sang tu nye yin nong ta ka karp yin ba ay ka kamok ba ta ka yrk yin tsek ba, amma kyndi sam aKiristi ne i nye yin ikng iya Adakunom ta shim be riy rizining.
49006007	Nye yin itomong yin be ifeng kyndi yin sen nye yin Agwm gwm'me sang anerawe ba.
49006008	Kamok yin ren yin ye Agwm gwm t nk koangan ishorong wu kamok koakye kuri ikng itek aner'e t nye ko a tu nye asam ka aya a ta sor washak.
49006009	Yin tekasa nye yin anong be sam yin gip. Sang ta ka shirik yin ba ba. Ren yin ye yin be ba cicr Atekasa yin se kayr kaza, wu kasa akak zr ba.

49006011	Te yin ares itsom kuri fe Adakunom cei nong as ta kyem i nyeseng yin be agap ne i tnng yin kanyk amaan aner.
49006012	Kamok sang kuren yir se be nask be rinam ba, amma be amaan nabik ta se natoon kaza ne fe rigwm ne fe kukyem ne ya rigwm awhi kazatse na ta se nubk ba.
49006013	Kamok anong, te yin ares itsom kuri fe Adakunom cei nong as ta kyem i nyeseng yin katuk amaan kunom'ong, nong ke yin gang yin koakye ne a ka s yin nunyeseng kpa.
49006014	Kamok anong, nyeseng yin be agap, katsak tu sor ikng kurosom kutin yin ne kuse zhl nye kukpiin kutsm kufe itsom yin.
49006015	Kanyk kutaas Rif Ritek, tu sor kyndi akpatak na atak yin.
49006016	Awan anong tsek ba, won kunk katsak tu sor ikpaar yin, iya yin tanin riming yin kurng afer amaan aner'ong.
49006017	Te yin kashesh yin kyndi ribong kutsm ne awn itsor ife Kabik Kazhl'e iya i ta nye rif Adakunom.
49006018	Yiir inye yin aduwa koakye izen kayr kukyem Kabik. Nye yin aduwa ne i rip yin koakye kuri ikng iya yin ta tsr yin. Sor yin be kanyk koakye izen ne i ya yin kashn be aduwa kamok zhl'e.
49006019	Nye yin aduwa kamok'i gip, nong as Adakunom tin nk ikng iya mi tana f nong mi t taas nerawe Rif Ritek riya ri ta se nunrng dar inyim dim.
49006020	Kamok Rif Ritek na ne mi te aner kutom, aya a ta se kayr izining. Nye yin aduwa nong as nizen iya mi ta sen taas kutom'e mi ta taas dar inyim kyndi mi ta shim.
49006021	aTikikus, agbang aronyining yir ne a bun a nye asam Agwm gwm, aya a ta be katsak, t b nufe yin nong a t ka tak yin koakye natoon kutser'i be kuri ikng mi ta sen nye'me aze.
49006022	Agbang ikng i ta sak mi ta sen ku tom nufe yin se, nong yin ta ren yin kutser yir ne wu bun a ka tsesek yin.

50001001	Mi, aBulus ne aTimoti, i ta nye yir sam aYeso Kiristi, ne i sen ka zibir yin kufumung na yin azhl cicr ya a t kuus aYeso Kiristi na aFilipi. Yir bun i nye shou yir kk kashn ikilisiya ne dikon.
50001002	Ritek be kameneng riy Adakunom a ta nye Ada yir ne Agwm gwm yir aYeso Kiristi se mak be yin.
50001003	Mi tonong Adakunom mi riy rikan yryr ke mi yiring be yin.

50001008	Adakunom ren kuri kut mi ta t natoon yin cei, be kuri kushim aYeso tin shim yir.

50001014	Ku ni te nitsm, sak kukap roneng afikuus ti barang kus agap nong ta taas rif Adakunom be riy rizining dar inyim.

50001016	yong nye anong kayr kushim, ne ren ye a ti kasa nong ta tonong katsak natoon Rif Ritek'e.
50001017	Amma ya a t taas rif aKiristi'me kayr kushim riy ba, sang kayr katsak ba, ba sor ye mi tin barang kufok risam nitsm.
50001018	T, i ta daam ba. Ke taas kayr katsak ka be amaan kut nay ba, mi ren itak aKiristi ne ba taas kayr koakye iren. Kamok anong, mi be riy rikan. Katsak'e, mi ta ya kashn be kunye riy rikan.
50001019	Kamok mi ren be aduwa yin ta nye yin ne kutobok afe Kabik aYeso Kiristi tin tobok, ni igang'e, a tin shesh.
50001020	Mi min te riy ne i mok ye, Adakunom ti te isum ba, amma mi ta s kutsesek didng, nong as kyrna be koakye izen, aKiristi ta s kuyiik kayr koakye mi ta nye, be kutser, ka be riku.

50003001	Ni igang'e roneng, nye yin riy rikan be Agwm gwm yir. I ti daam i ta bun ta ka zibir yin'e natoon ikr mi t tsang ka zibir yin'e gbak ba, amma nong yin t nyeseng yin be agap.
50003002	Nye yin tatan be gabu'ong, fe ta nye maan ikr. tsang tsk irm ba kpdng ye, ba sen naka nye izhak.
50003003	Kamok yir ne i nye yir ner a t ku nye ba izhak ife katsak ya i ta ya yir Adakunom iben kayr Kabik wu. Ne i ni tsor yir kafok nuyiik aYeso Kiristi, ya afe sang i tin fereng yir ni itomong kurm yir ba.
50003004	Mi f anong kamok, mi be rice mi, mi ta kyem i ni fereng ni itomong iya anerawe ta nye. Ke aner akak kuse a ta di ye, wu kyem a tin fereng ni itomong wu t kyem a nye, t, mi tu nar.
50003005	A ti nye izhak ne mi be inom ikara be kutes. Mi nye aner Isarela, kayr kasa aBanyami. Mi nye atuk kunik aner Ibrani. Natoon kukuus Itsi ner aYahuda, mi se nigung rice ner aFarisi.
50003006	Natoon kukuus Adakunom didng, mi tabak fikuus, natoon ku te zhl be kukuus Itsi aMusa, mi raar azong ba.
50003007	Amma gip be ikr'ong mi sor ye, mi tin s ishorong natoon'e, mi sok cei kyndi ikng ikak ba kamok aYeso Kiristi.
50003008	Aky nar anong'e, mi sok koakye kyndi ikng ikak ba ke mi ti maas be kuren aYeso Kiristi a ta te Agwm gwm mi. Mi nyosong ikr'ong cei kamok wu. Mi sok cei kyndi awha nong ta s aKiristi,
50003009	ne i te azining be wu, sang be kukuus Itsi mi nong ta te zhl ba. Mi s kamok kunk katsak na aKiristi, kuzhl kuya a ta s nufe Adakunom kamok kunk katsak.
50003010	Mi shim ta ren aKiristi, mi shim t ku ren be kukyem wu a tin dorok nurk ne mi gung rice be wu kayr risam wu ne riku wu.
50003011	Kamok nong, nong ko a tu nye an Adakunom tin dorok be kutser ke mi ku.
50003012	Sang i se ye mi n wor i s ikr'ong cei ka mi f ye mi n shining cei ba, amma mi ya kashn be kucan kayr kunk katsak'i, nong ta s ikng iya aYeso Kiristi tin yis mo.
50003013	roneng, sang mi f ye mi n wor n s ikng'e ba, amma ikng ikak kuse mi ta nye, mi nye burum be kama ne mi ni te isr nikng iya i ta se nashn.
50003014	Mi ya kashn be kuni te isr nong ke mi ya ne i s ishorong iya Adakunom tin yis mo kayr aYeso Kiristi a ta se naza.
50003015	Kamok anong, yir ya i tan te yir nerawe cicr kayr kabik, kutrng yir ra se anong. Amma ke akak yin be kutrng kukak zr, t, Adakunom t ka tonong yin.
50003016	Ikng iya i ta nye igbang'e nye, yir tu sor yir kyndi Adakunom ta shim.
50003017	roneng, kuus yin an mi cicr yin, ne i yrk yin kuse ya a ta kuus ikng iya yir t f yir be yin.
50003018	Kyndi mi t yiir ka taas yin, kyrna mi bun i f ma be nanyisi ye, kak yin n te kyndi mudn riku aKiristi natoon kukon.
50003019	Igang ba nye t wei, adakunom ba nye nafa ba. ni tsor kafok ni itomong isum ba. Ay ba se natoon ikr kazatse tsek.
50003020	Amma yir, yir nye yir fe kaza, azong ne yir min sak yir anyisi ye, aner kashesh t ne, a ta nye aYeso Kiristi Agwm gwm yir.
50003021	Wu ne a be kukyem a tanin nye rigwm natoon koakye. Be kukyem wu'me ne a tin shishing kuraar yir nurm nong ku t te yiik kyndi kufu.
50004001	Kamok anong, roneng afe riy mi, aya mi ta min te riy ke mi ka di yin ne mi ni be riy rikan ne mi niya kuka, ye i ra nyeseng yin kpa ni ikuus Agwm gwm yir aYeso. Yin ya mi ta shim.
50004002	Mi nye Ayodiya be aSintiki izong ye kutrng ba ra se kuzining natoon itomong Agwm gwm.
50004003	Ei, mi bun i f be wan afudang itomong'i afe katsak, ye i ra tobok nyining'ong kamok gung rice be mi ni itomong i taas Rif Ritek Adakunom, anong ne aKelemen be ribir fudang yir ya i ta nye yir itomong mak, ya ayerek ba ta se kayr kufumung kutser.
50004004	Nye yin riy rikan kayr Agwm gwm koakye izen. Mi bun i f be yin gbak, ye i ra nye yin riy rikan.
50004005	Won koangan tu di kutatan yin. Agwm gwm yir n b barak a ta b.
50004006	Sang tu daam yin be ikng ikak ba, amma kayr koakye tak yin Adakunom kudaam yin, be kunye aduwa ne kunye izong, mak be ku tonong riy rikan be Adakunom.
50004007	Be anong ne kameneng riy kuri kuya Adakunom ta nyesek kuya ku ta nar koakye kuri kuren nerawe, t sak ay yin be kutrng yin ta nyeseng kpa natoon aYeso Kiristi.
50004008	T, roneng, nigang'e, koakye ikng i ta nye katsak, koakye ikng nerawe ta di yiik ne koakye ikng i ta se gyr, be koakye ikng i ta se zhl ne koakye ikng nerawe ta shim be koakye ikng i ta be riyerek ritek, ka, koakye ikng kuse i ta nye itek didng ne i be nakerek. T yin natoon ikng kuri iyu.
50004009	Koakye yin t bsp yin nunaan ka i s yin nunaan ka i fok yin nunaan, ka iya yin t di yin nunaan, iyong ne yin t nye yin. Be anong ne Adakunom aya a ta nyesek kameneng riy ta se mak be yin.
50004010	Mi be riy rikan didng kayr Adakunom didng kamok yin ta bun i tonong yin kudaam yin natoon'i. Katsak'e mi ren yin daam yin be mi, amma yin ra s yin izen nong t nye yin ba.
50004011	Sang i se ye mi tsr ikng ikak yin ba, mi min m be kusor ko an.
50004012	Mi ren kuri kusor mi ta sor ke mi s ikng ife mi ta tsr ba, mi ren kuri kusor mi ta sor ke mi s didng. Mi n bsp kayr kusor kayr koakye iren iya ne mi s rice mi, be riwha ka be izong ka ke mi be whr ka i se kayr kutser.
50004013	Mi ta kyem i nye koakye kamok aKiristi aya a tin nyesek agap kunye'me.
50004014	Amma yin nye yin gyr i tin tobok yin kayr risam mi.
50004015	Yin fikuus aFilipi kyndi yin ta tsang i ren yin, kum a t san ku ka taas yin Rif Ritek ni imsng'e, nizen mi t won kaben aMakidoniya. Ikilisiya ikak kuse i ta gung rice be mi kayr itomong na be kunyesek ikr zr be yin ba.
50004016	Nizen iya mi t tsang i se kayr kuwp aTasalonika, yin ti tom yin be itsm sang kutak kuzining ka kutak kufa tsek ba nizen iya mi ta se nutser.
50004017	Sang i se ye mi f anong nong yin ta yiir ni nyesek yin ikr ba, amma mi shim ishorong Adakunom ta se natoon yin kamok mi.
50004018	A min karang cei, ma i nar ikng iya mi ta tsr. Mi ma s ikng mi ta tsr makong, kyrna mi ta shan ikr iya yin t nk yin Apafurotus. Ikr'me se kyndi name ikn itek, asidaka aya Adakunom ta shan ne a fok kusas'e.
50004019	Adakunom mi t ka nk yin koak yin ta tsr yin kayr kuyiik wu kuwhr'e kayr aYeso Kiristi.
50004020	Kuyiik nye kufe Adakunom yir ne a nye Ada yir ma izen izen. Anong.
50004021	Kunye shou yin azhl'e kayr aYeso Kiristi cicr. roneng ya a ta se aze be mi ta nye yin ashou.
50004022	fikuus aze cicr ta nye yin ashou, atuk fekasa aKaisar ba.
50004023	Ritek Agwm gwm yir aYeso Kiristi se mak be yin. Anong.
51001001	Mi aBulus, aya Adakunom t kasa nong a t te amanzo aYeso Kiristi, mak be aronyining yir aTimoti ne i ta zibir yin kufumung na,
51001002	yin roneng zhl'e, aya a ta be katsak ya a ta se na aKolosi. Ritek be kameneng riy Adakunom a ta nye Ada yir se mak be yin.
51001003	Yir tonong yir Adakunom riy rikan yir yryr, Ada Agwm gwm yir aYeso Kiristi, nizen iya yir t sen nye yir aduwa kamok yin.
51001004	Kamok yir n fok yir kuri kunk katsak yin ta be yin kayr aYeso Kiristi ne kuri kushim kuya yin ta shim yin zhl'e cicr.
51001005	Yin nye yin anong kamok yin min te yin riy natoon ikr itek iya a ta ma ka sak yin'e kayr kaza. Iyuna ne i nye itak katsak iya a t ka tak yin kum ni imsng'e, Rif Ritek, a t ka tak yin ame.
51001006	Rif Ritek na sak nerawe shining ne ya kashn kayr kazatse cei, kyndi ri t nye kayr yin kum nizen ife yin t san ku fok yin itak ritek Adakunom, ne i ren yin ye i nye katsak.
51001007	Abafaras, afudang itomong yir a t nye asam Adakunom kyndi yir gip, aya a ta be katsak kayr itomong aKiristi ne a b a t ka tak yin Rif Ritek'e, a nye itomong'e rice yir.
51001008	Wu ne a ti tak yir kuri kushim kuya yin ta shim yin anerawe kayr Kabik.
51001009	Kamok anong ne isak kum nizen iya yir t fok yir itak natoon yin, yir won kunye yir aduwa kamok yin ba. Yir nye yir izong ye Adakunom ra ka tonong yin ikng iya wu ta shim dim nong as yin ta s yin kukyem Kabik, ne i ren yin ikng kunye.
51001010	Yir nye yir aduwa nong as yin ta sor yin kusor kuri kuya ku ta tas kufe fikuus Agwm gwm ne i nye yin ikr iya i tana ku karp riy na koakye kuri iren. Kuri kusor yin ta sor yin ta tonong ye kuse kutek ne yin ni barang yin kurasak kayr kuren Adakunom.
51001011	Yir bun i nye yir aduwa ye yin ta te yin gbugbong be ayiik kukyem wu nong yin ta s yin ku naka tsesek ne i yiir yin ay. Won yin tu sor yin fe riy rikan,
51001012	ne i yiir nye yin riy rikan be Ada, kamok wu ne a sak yir ta kyem i te yir fe kuya kutse ikr na, iya a t nye kamok zhl'e kayr rigwm akanang.
51001013	Kamok wu ne a ti tun yir kayr rigwm awhi, a t tseng be yir kayr rigwm Igon wu kaya wu ta shim.
51001014	Kamok wu ne yir tin s yir kashesh a tin rng yir rinn yir.
51001015	aKiristi ne a nye aner aya a ta tas Adakunom afe sang a tu ku di ba, wu ne a nye igon imsng'e kayr ikr Adakunom t nye cicr.
51001016	Kamok be wu ne Adakunom nye ikr cicr, iya i ta se kayr kaza be iya i ta se kayr kazatse, iya a ta di be iya sang a ta kyem a di ba. Be wu ne Adakunom nye koakye ikng i ta be kukyem kayr kaza, be kk kashn ne fe rigwm cei ne ikr Adakunom t nye cicr, a nye mak be wu ne kamok wu.
51001017	aKiristi tu se ni imsng'e nizham a t ra nye koakye, kamok wu ne ikr cicr se na gung.
51001018	Wu ne a nye rice kurm'e ku ta nye fikuus cicr. Wu ne a nye ritin'e ne a nye imsng'e kayr ya a t san kudorok nurk, nong a s kayr koakye wu ne a ta nar be kuyiik.
51001019	Adakunom be riy rikan kamok kuse wu cicr ta se kayr Igon wu.
51001020	Kamok wu ne Adakunom bun a tu ku bun be ikr wu t nye cicr nufu, ikr i ta se kayr kazatse be kayr kaza. A ti bn yir kameneng riy be kunyosong nask Igon wu natoon kukon.
51001021	Gbugbang, yin tsang i se yin gugk be Adakunom ma i te yin mudn wu kayr ay yin kamok amaan kunye yin.
51001022	Amma kyrna Adakunom mu ku bun be yin kamok riku aKiristi nurm nong yin ta se yin zhl nashn Adakunom dar rizik, dar kuf imaan'e natoon yin,
51001023	ke yin ya yin kashn be kunk katsak yin, ne i nyeseng yin kpa natoon'e. Sang tu won yin a ta ka zuur yin ma ta won yin ku ni te riy riya yin ta min te yin nizen iya yin t fok yin Rif Ritek'e ba. Rif Ritek yin t tsang i fok yin'ong ne a taas koakye kuri nerawe ta se nazatse ne mi aBulus ti te aner itomong'e.
51001024	Mi be riy rikan kyrna be risam mi ta s natoon yin, nong kamok risam'me mi t shining ikng iya i t rusek kayr risam aKiristi t s kamok kurm wu ku ta nye ikilisiya.
51001025	Adakunom ne a ti kasa nong ta te asam ikilisiya nong ta nye awazi rif Adakunom mumak,
51001026	riya ri ta se nunrng ay be ay ne izam izam amma kyrna an ts zhl'e.
51001027	Ba di ye Adakunom t kasa ba nong ta taas ner aya sang nye ner aYahuda ba, ku yiik ku ta se nunrng, ikng iya a ta ren'e ba, nye aKiristi a ta se kayr yin. Iyong tonong ye yin ta sor yin mak be wu kayr kuyiik'e.
51001028	Iyong ne i sak yir ta taas yir itak aKiristi, yir kpam yir koangan ne ibsp yir nerawe'me be koakye kuri kukyem yir nong ta tseng yir be koangan mumak kayr aKiristi.
51001029	Kamok anong ne mi nye itomong ma i ti te isr be kuri agap aya aKiristi tin nk, aya a ta nye itomong didng kayr'i.
51002001	Mi shim yin tu ren yin kuri isr mi ta min te kamok yin ne nerawe ta se na aLaudikiya, ne ya sang ta kun min di cicr ba.
51002002	Mi nye anong, nong as ba ta s kutsesek kayr ay ba, ne kushim kugung rice, kamok a nong ta s agbang kurum'ong, ku ta nye kuren ikng cei, nong ta ren kanyk Adakunom ka ta se nunrng ka ta nye aKiristi.
51002003	Kayr wu ne a nr ayiik kukyem ne kuren ikng cicr.
51002004	Mi ta tak yin ikr na nong fan akak ba ka wrk yin be kanu rm rm.
51002005	Mi ren ye mi se mak be yin nurm ba, gyr tatan amma riy mi se mak be yin. Mi be riy rikan didng mi ta fok ye yin n nyeseng yin gyr ne i naka tsesek yin kayr kunk katsak yin na aKiristi.
51002006	T, kum yin ta shan yin aYeso aKiristi a ta te Agwm gwm yin, ya yin kashn be kusor yin kayr wu.
51002007	Nyeseng yin be agap natoon wu, a ta nye ribor'e ne i ni barang yin kurasak kayr kunk katsak yin, kyndi a t ka bsp yin'e ne i tonong yin riy rikan didng.
51002008	Sak yin riy fan akak ba ka wrk yin be kuri kutrng kuri kufe kazatse na nong ta won yin iren katsak. Kutrng kuri kuyong nye kukpdng'e. Ku nye ign nerawe ne iren kunye ikr kuri kufe kazatse na sang kuri kufe aKiristi ba.
51002009	Kamok kayr aKiristi ne kuse Adakunom sor kayr kurm,
51002010	be anong ne yin shining yin kamok yin ta sor yin kayr wu. Wu ne a nye akk kashn koakye kuri kukyem ne koakye kuri rigwm.
51002011	Kayr wu ne a t nye yin izhak kayr kabik gip, nong ta tun yin kuse kuri kufe rinn. Sang izhak kuri iya anerawe ne a ta nye ba, amma kuri iya aKiristi ne a ta nye.
51002012	Kamok nizen iya a t ka nye yin abatisma ne a t nr yin mak be aKiristi ne a bun a ka dorok yin mak be wu kamok kunk katsak yin kayr kukyem Adakunom aya a t ku dorok nurk be kutser.
51002013	Nizen iya yin ta se yin kyndi ikom'e kayr rinn yin be kuwon dar kunye izhak ife kuse yin kufe rinn, Adakunom sak yin bun i te yin atser kayr aKiristi. A ti rng yir rinn yir cei.
51002014	A birik izibir a t tsang zibir natoon rinn yir, a sok a ta tigak natoon kukon a t ku tigak mo.
51002015	A ti shan ares itsom ba afe kukyem ne fe rigwm ba, nong a t ku nk ba isum nashn nerawe, a tu ku canang ba kamok riku wu natoon kukon.
51002016	Kamok anong tu won yin akak ta ka t yin amok natoon ikng yin ta ya yin ka ikng iya i ta s yin, ka natoon riy rikan ign ner aYahuda, ka natoon riy rikan kunyeseng kufn kufas, ka natoon kunom Asabar ba.
51002017	Ikr na se kyndi nawu ikr i tana b tsek, amma aKiristi ne a nye kunik'e
51002018	Aner akak shim ku tonong kuri kumees rice ba ta be ne tonong ye ba ya maleka iben ne shim ku ka zhsh yin ye kamok yin ta nye yin anong ba, tin daam yin natoon ba ba. ner kuri ayong f ye ba yrk ikng ikak kyndi nabos, amma amaan kutrng ba tu ku sak ba ta ya kuka kpdng tsek.
51002019	Aner kuri ayong n kam be aner a ta nye rice'me, wu aya kurm'e cicr ti fereng natoon wu ne ku se nagung ne ku rasak kyndi Adakunom ta shim.
51002020	Kum i t kus yin mak be aKiristi ma yin kam yin be kukuus amaan nabik kazatse na, aky sak yin bun i ru sor yin kyndi yin ru bun i kuus yin kazatse'me ?
51002021	Kyndi itsi i ta f ye, Sang a tu ra ba! Sang a tu fok ba! Sang a tu yiir ba ?
51002022	Itsi kuri iyuna f natoon ikr iya i tana gang cei, kamok i nye itsi be kubsp nerawe.
51002023	Nashn nerawe ign kuri iyong se kyndi i be kukyem, i bn be ifng didng ne kumees rice nikuus Adakunom ne kunye be kurm kpdng, amma katsak'e ign na be kukyem ku tana tobok anerawe nong a ta won kukuus kushim riy wu ba.
51003001	Kum a t ma ka dorok yin mak be aKiristi, t, ni te yin riy natoon ikr iya i ta se kayr kaza, nar aKiristi ta mu ku sonong nabas kubk riya Adakunom.
51003002	Ni te yin riy natoon ikr iya i ta se kayr kaza sang ife kazatse ba.
51003003	Kamok yin tsang i kus yin, kutser yin se nunrng nufe aKiristi kayr Adakunom.

51003005	Kamok anong ni tun yin riy natoon ikr kazatse na, ikr kyndi, kunye rikuna be kunye kpdng be rinyisi rikan be amaan kuse ne amaan kudi ikng, iyong gip i se kyndi ku kuus itsi.
51003006	Kamok amaan kunye'ong ne riy kubeseng Adakunom sen ni tiik natoon nerawe.
51003007	Yin be rice yin, tsang i nye yin ikr na, nusor yin gbugbang.
51003008	Amma kyrna, kam yin be ikr kuri iyuna cicr dim. Won yin riy kubeseng be riy rife ne amaan kutrng ne ritok be amaan rif.
51003009	Sang tu naka bs yin abs ba, kum yin tan kam yin be kuse yin kufe agbugbang ne amaan kunye'ong,
51003010	nong i ta sok yin kuse kufas. Iyu ne i nye aner afas, aya Adakunom, aner a ta nye'me, yiir shishing'e nong a tu ku tas nong a ta sak yin t ku ren yin didng.
51003011	Kamok anong sang tu yrk yin ye ner aYahuda se zr be ner aya sang ta won dar nye ner aYahuda ba. ya a t mu ku nye ba izhak ka ya a t won dar a ka nye ba izhak ba. Aner aya a ta nye kyr se zr be aner aya a ta won dar a karak rice ba. Asam se zr be igon kari ba, kamok aKiristi ne a nye koakye ne a se kayr koakye.
51003012	Kamok anong, kyndi nerawe ya Adakunom t kasa, zhl'e ne fe riy wu, naka kis yin be kur riy ne kuse kutek be ku mees rice ne kuse tatan ne ku naka tsesek.
51003013	Naka tsesek yin be fudang yin, ke akak kayr yin nye afudang wu rinn ne a ku rng'e. Naka rng yin rinn yin kyndi Agwm gwm ta ka nye yin'e.
51003014	Natoon ikr'ong, nibarang yin kushim iyong ne i gung ikr'me cicr kayr kugung rice kutek.
51003015	Won kameneng riy aKiristi tin nye rigwm kayr ay yin. Kamok kyndi kurm kuzining ne a t yis yin nong ta sor yin fe caang. Sor yin fe kunye riy rikan be Adakunom koakye izen.
51003016	Won rif aKiristi tu nyeseng be agap didng kayr ay yin, ne i naka bsp yin'e, ne i naka nyesek yin ibrng, be koakye kuri kukyem, ne i bom yin abom aZabura, ne i kerek yin Adakunom, ne i bom yin abom afe a ta nye afe Kabik, ne i nye yin riy rikan kayr ay yin be Adakunom.
51003017	Koakye ikng iya yin tana nye yin, ko kayr kuf kanu ko kayr kunye ikng, nye yin cicr kayr riyerek aYeso Agwm gwm, ne i tonong yin Adakunom riy rikan kamok wu.
51003018	Yin nyining iwnng kuus yin ikng iya atek yin ta f be yin, i se gyr ta nye yin anong kamok yin nye yin fikuus.
51003019	Yin tekasa, shim yin nyining yin, tu se yin hash be ba ba.
51003020	Yin inoon, fok yin da be ng yin kuto kayr koakye kuri ikng, kamok ikng Agwm gwm ta shim'ong.
51003021	Yin tek inoon, tu mak i firik yin inoon yin ba, nong fan bu te dar ifeng.
51003022	Yin sam, fok yin atek kasa yin kuto kayr koakye kuri ikng. Sang tu nye yin kamok ba ta min sak anyisi natoon yin ba, ye nong as a ta ka kerek yin tsek ba. Amma nye yin be riy rizining kyndi ner a ta fok inyim Agwm gwm.
51003023	Koakye ne yin ta nye yin, nye yin be riy rizining kamok yin sen nye yin Agwm gwm'me sang anerawe'me ba.
51003024	Kum yin ta ren yin ye Agwm gwm ta ka karang yin ishorong yin be kutse yin tana ya yin. Kamok aKiristi Agwm gwm ne yin sen ku nye yin itomong.
51003025	Aner aya ne a nye amaan ikng iya a t ku karang'e be imaan'e, kamok sang Adakunom be kushim rice ba.
51004001	Yin tekasa nye yin be sam yin gyr ne i se yin whiwh kamok yin ren yin ye yin gip yin be yin Atekasa akak kayr kaza.
51004002	Ni te yin riku ninye aduwa, ne i nye yin tatan ne i nye yin riy rikan be Adakunom.
51004003	Nye yin aduwa kamok yir gip, nong as Adakunom tin karak yir iren kutaas rif wu nong ta taas yir kanyk aKiristi kaya ka ta se nunrng kafe sang akak ta ren ba, kamok anong ne a min te nitsm.
51004004	Ni nye yin aduwa nong mi ta kyem i taas rif na gyr, kyndi mi tana kyem i nye.
51004005	Sak yin riy be kutseng yin kayr ner aya sang ta nye fikuus ba. Ni nye yin itomong be koakye izen ife yin ta s yin.
51004006	Won rif yin tu sas kufok nong as yin ta ren yin kuri iren iya yin tana f yin be koangan aya a tana ka nye yin kurip.
51004007	aTikikus ta ka tak yin koakye kuri ikng iya i ta sen tseng natoon'i. A nye agbang aroneng, aya a ta nye itomong be katsak ne a nye asam afudang itomong'i kayr itomong Agwm gwm yir.
51004008	Mi tu ku tom nufe yin nong yin ta ren yin ikng iya i tin se yir kayr'e ne a ka tsesek yin.
51004009	A t b mak be aroneng yir akak aOnesimus aya yir tu ku shim yir ne a be kuse kutek. Ba ta ka tak yin koakye i ta sen tseng azena.
51004010	Aristakus, aya i ta se yir nitsm mak ta nye yin ashou. aMarkus aronyining rifam aBarnabas ta nye yin ashou gip, wu ne yin kun fok yin itak natoon wu, ku shan yin ibk ifa ke a b nufe yin.
51004011	aYeso, aya a t ku yis ye aZhostus ta nye yin ashou gip, igak ner aYahuda ya a ta se ni itomong rigwm Adakunom mak be mi'ong.
51004012	Abafaras a ta nye azining kayr yin ne a bun a nye asam aYeso Kiristi ta nye yin ashou. A yiir rus ne a ka nye yin aduwa didng koakye izen nong yin ta kyem i nyeseng yin be agap ne i nye yin ikng iya Adakunom ta shim. Kyndi ya a ta min nk katsak na Adakunom be riy rizining.
51004013	Mi be rice mi, mi ta kyem i f natoon Abafaras ye a s risam nong a ta ka tobok yin ne ner aLaudikiya ne fe aHirapolis.
51004014	Aferim yir aLuka aya a t nye abok'e be aDemas cicr ba ta nye yin ashou.
51004015	Nye shou yin roneng ta se na aLaudikiya be angasnyining yir aNimfa ne fikuus ta nyiis kari wu.
51004016	Ke gang yin ku fa yin kufumung na ne i tom yin ner ta se na Ikilisiya aLaudikiya'me nong ba gip ta ma fa. Yin gip ma fa yin kufumung ba tana ka tom yin'e gip.
51004017	Tak yin Akipus ye a ra sak riy nong a ta gang itomong'ong Agwm gwm t ku nk.
51004018	Mi aBulus ne i zibir ashou na be kubk'i, tu tiburum yin ye mi na aze nitsm ba. Ritek Adakunom se mak be yin.
52001001	Mi aBulus be aSila ne aTimoti i ta nye yin ashou yin fikuus aTasalonika ashou, yin ya i ta nye yin fe Adakunom a ta nye Ada yir ne Agwm gwm yir aYeso Kiristi. Ritek be kameneng riy se mak be yin.
52001002	Yir tonong yir Adakunom riy rikan yir yryr kamok yin cicr, nizen iya yir ta sen nye yir aduwa.
52001003	Yir yiir i yiring yir be itomong yin iya i ta tonong kunk katsak yin nashn Adakunom yir ne Ada yir, be kuri kucan yin ta can yin kamok kushim ne kute riy yin ta min te yin natoon Agwm gwm yir aYeso Kiristi didng.
52001004	roneng, ya Adakunom ta shim, yir ren yir ye wu ne a t ka kasa yin,
52001005	kamok sang yir b yir be Rif Ritek'e be rif kanu tsek ba, amma rif'me b be kukyem ne Kabik Kazhl'e sang be agak riy ba amma be katsak cicr. Yin ren yin kuri kusor kuya yir t sor yir be yin nong t ka tobok yin.
52001006	Yin kuus yin an yir ne afe Agwm gwm yir, yin s yin risam gyrtatan, amma yin shan yin rif Adakunom'me be riy rikan riya Kabik Kazhl'e t ka nk yin.
52001007	Kunye anong sak yin sor yin ikng kumaas nufe fikuus cicr ya a ta se niben aMakidoniya ne Akaya.
52001008	Yin sak yin rif Agwm gwm t n koak sang kayr iben aMakidoniya ne Akaya tsek ba, amma koak ren kuri kunk katsak yin ta be yin kayr Adakunom sang ma yir ba bun i f yir ikng ikak natoon'e ba.
52001009	Ba be rice ba f itak kushan niren afe yin tin shan yir, nizen iya yir t b yir nufe yin, ne kuwon kukuus itsi yin t won yin nong i tu ku bun yin Adakunom afe kutser ne afe katsak itomong,
52001010	ne i tor yin izen kub Igon wu a tana ne naza. Adakunom t ku dorok be kutser, wu ne a nye aYeso aya a tanin shesh yir kayr riy kubeseng ri t saase.
52002001	roneng, yin be rice yin ren yin ye kub yir nufe yin se kpdng ba.

53003001	Ni igang'e roneng, nye yin aduwa kamok yir nong as rif Agwm gwm yir t ya kashn zizirik kayr nerawe nong ri ta s kuyiik, kyndi ri ta s kayr yin.
