53003017	Mi aBulus, mi ne i t zibir yin ashou na be kubk'i. Iyu ne i nye izibir'i, i ta kam be ribir'e. A na ne mi nye izibir'i.
53003018	Ritek Agwm gwm yir aYeso Kiristi se mak be yin cicr.
54001001	Mi, aBulus, amanzo aYeso Kiristi, nu kushim Adakunom, Aner Kashesh yir, ne aYeso Kiristi aya yir ta min te yir riy,
54001002	aTimoti, igon'i kafe katsak ni iren kunk katsak. Ritek be kur riy ne kameneng riy Adakunom a ta nye Ada yir ne aYeso Kiristi, Agwm gwm yir se mak be wan.
54001003	Kyndi mi t tsang i f be wan nizen iya mi t se niren kutseng na aMakidoniya ye, wan ri fan kayr kuwp Afisa nong ta tnng ner'ong ta bsp nerawe abs.
54001004	Ku tak ba ye ra won ku foos atin natoon tukop ba agbugbang'e ne ku kuus yrk ba dar igak. Kunye anong ti barang nanaan tsek sang ku t bn kuya kashn kanyk Adakunom kuya a ta s kamok kunk katsak.
54001005	Ikng i ta sak mi ta f anong be agbang kut se ye nong fikuus t shim nerawe be kushim kuri kuya ku ta ne kayr riy rizhl'e ne riy rizining be kunk katsak kufe katsak ba.
54001006	nerawe'me kak n taam an won iren itek t mu ku bun nikuus akpdng rif.
54001007	shim ta tonong'e ye ba nye ner kubsp Itsi Adakunom, amma ren ikng iya ba tin f natoon'e ba, ka ikr iya ba ta yiir ding ding ba.
54001008	Yir ren yir ye Itsi se gyr ke a ti nye itomong niren itek.
54001009	Yir bun i ren yir gip ye, sang a nye Itsi kamok ner ta tseng gyr ba, amma kamok ner aya a ta shonong ne gaar kukuus Itsi'me. Itsi se kamok ya a ta raba iren Adakunom ne fe rinn be ya a ta se zhl ba, ne furin ne fe ku fs nerawe ne ya a t fs ada be ang ba,
54001010	be fe kunye rikuna ne tek ta mereng be tek afudang ba ka nyining ta mereng be nyining fudang ba, ne fe kurs nerawe be fe abs ne ya a ta ya kushu natoon abs ne koakye kuri ikng i ta se zr be kubsp katsak.
54001011	Kubsp na se natoon ayiik Rif Ritek Adakunom aya nerawe tu ku kerek, a tin won'e nubk nong ta nk kak.
54001012	Mi be riy rikan be aYeso Kiristi Agwm gwm yir, aya a tin nk agap. A di ye mi be katsak iyong a ti sak nong ta nye itomong wu.
54001013	Mi tsang i nye aner kuzhsh Adakunom gyrtatan ne i tabak fikuus ne i nye awan kuren, gip be anong Adakunom tin tonong kur riy kamok mi nye kayr kudun kuren sang mi tsang i ni nk katsak na aYeso ba.
54001014	A ti shining be ritek Agwm gwm yir didng, ne a ni nk kunk katsak ne kushim kuya ku ta se kayr aYeso Kiristi.
54001015	Rif a t f ye, aYeso Kiristi b kayr kazatse nong a ta shesh fe rinn, ri nye katsak ne ri nye ikng kushan cicr kamok kayr fe rinn cicr mi ne i nar'e.
54001016	Amma Adakunom ti tonong kur riy didng kamok mi tsang i nar rinn, aYeso Kiristi tonong kutsesek wu didng natoon'i nong ku ta sor ikng kumaas nufe ner aya a tanin nk katsak ni wu ne s katser kafe izen izen.
54001017	Won kuyiik ne nakerek tu sor nafu ma izen izen, wu aya a tana sor Agwm ma izen izen, a ta be igak ba, aya sang a ta kyem a ku di ba. Wu ne a ta nye Adakunom wu zr tsek. Anong.
54001018	aTimoti, igon'i, mi ta nk itabak na be agbang kut nong ta shining iriri kuzarap a t nye natoon wan. Kamok ke wan kuus rif na wan ta kyem ikn, wan ta kn kuren'e kutek kyndi asozha aYeso,
54001019	yiir kunk katsak wan ne i sor be riy rizining. kak shim ikr iyong ba, iyong kunk katsak ba beseng.
54001020	kak kayr ba nye aHimenayus be Alekzanda, ya mi tan won Ishetan'e nubk nong a tu ku tabak ba nong ta won kuzhsh Adakunom.
54002001	Ni imsng'e, mi t nye akusuk ye, a ra yiir iya kashn be kunye izong, ne a nye aduwa, ne a tonong riy rikan be Adakunom kamok nerawe cicr.
54002002	A ra yiir i nye anong kamok gwm cicr ne ya a t be agbang itsik cicr, nong t sor yir caang be kameneng riy kayr inyim Adakunom ne i sor yir zhl'e kayr koakye kuse.
54002003	Anong se gyr, Adakunom a ta nye Aner Kashesh yir fok kusas anong didng.
54002004	Wu shim nerawe cicr ta s kashesh ne ren iren katsak.
54002005	Kamok Adakunom se azining, aner aya a ta n natite Adakunom be nerawe se azining, aner'e nye aYeso Kiristi.
54002006	Wu ne a nk rice wu nong a t sheshek nerawe cicr, ikng ife Adakunom ta tak kazatse nizen i t se gyr'ong.
54002007	Kamok ikr iyong ne a ti kasa nong a ta te amanzo ne aner awazi. Mi te aner aya i ta bsp ner aya a ta nye ner aYahuda ba, itak kunk katsak ne katsak. Katsak ne mi f be wan sang abs ba.
54002008	Mi shim koak, atek ra kok ibk ba naza nong ta nye aduwa dar riy kubeseng ka be nanaan ba.
54002009	nyining gip, ra nye izem iya i ta se gyr be ba, sang be ares ya a tana sak tek tana ka kuus ba ba, sang awan abar ka kutes ares afe a ta nye be izinariya ka ikr i ta gysm ka ares aya a ta be itsm didng tsek ba,
54002010	Amma ra nye kunye kutek, kamok i se gyr be nyining aya a ta f ye ba fok inyim Adakunom.
54002011	Aner abining ra shan kubsp kayr awhiwh ne a mees rice wu gyr.
54002012	Mi nk iren nong aner abining ta bsp aner amitek'e ka a tin nye rigwm natoon wu ba. A ra foos gbik.
54002013	Mi f anong kamok Adakunom nye Adamu ni imsng'e, nizham a t ra nye Iwa.
54002014	Sang Adamu ne a t ku wrk ni imsng'e ba, amma abining'e ne a t ku wrk ma rinn n.
54002015	Gip be anong, aner abining ta s kashesh kamok a tes inoon ke a ya kashn kayr kunk katsak be kushim kuse zhl ne a yiir rice wu.
54003001	Rif a t f ye, Koangan afe a ta be ifeng kute akk kashn ikilisiya, aner'e be ifeng itomong itek, i nye katsak.
54003002	Akk kashn ra nye aner aya a ta be kuraar nashn nerawe ba. A ra nye aner aya a ta be abining azining, ne a se tatan, ne a ren a yiir rice wu, ne a nye aner aya nerawe tu ku sok yiik, a ra nye aner aya a ta shashang tsen ibk ifa, ne a ren a bsp nerawe'me,
54003003	sang a tu nye aner a ta mak a s kugbr ba, sang aner a ta shim kuren ba, a ra nye aner a ta se whiwh sang a tu nye aner a ta mak a shim itsm ba.
54003004	A ra nye aner a ta kyem a ni sak riy na fekari wu, ne inoon wu ku nk kuyiik wu ne ku fok kuto.
54003005	Ke anerawe kyem a ti sak riy na fekari wu ba, t, a ta nye an a tin sak riy na ikilisiya Adakunom ?
54003006	Sang aner'e tu nye aner afas nikuus ba, ke anong ba, a ta tsor kafok ma a n kayr kuri amok a t t Amaan Aner'e.
54003007	Akk kashn ikilisiya ra nye aner aya furin ta f itek natoon wu, fan bu ku te isum ne a kpa nubk Amaan Aner.
54003008	Anong ne dikon gip, ra nye aner aya nerawe tu ku sok ba yiik, sang ya a ta be nanu nafa ba, ka ya a ta mak s kugbr ba, ka a tu nye aner a ta mak a shim itsm ba.
54003009	ra nyeseng be agap natoon kunik kunk katsak a tin tonong yir dim be riy rizining.
54003010	ta ka bmng ba nizham; ke a tu ku s ba be ikng ikak imaan'e ba, t, ne ku won ba nong ta nye itomong dikon'e.
54003011	Anong ne nyining dikon'e, ra nye aner a ta be kuyiik sang ya a ta be imok ba, amma ya a ta yiir rice ba ne be katsak kayr koakye.
54003012	aDikon ra nye aner aya a ta be abining azining ne a ren ku ni sak riy ni inoon wu be fekasa wu gyr.
54003013	ner aya a ta nye itomong ba itek gyr, ss ayerek atek ne f be riy rizining natoon kunk katsak ba kayr aYeso Kiristi.
54003014	Mi n te riy mi ye ke mi b nufuan kayr inom na gyr tatan amma mi ra sen ka zibir itabak na nizham.
54003015	Amma ke mi gum b ba, ne wan ren kuri kuse kuya ku ta se gyr be ner aya a tana se kayr kasa Adakunom tana se, ta nye ner Adakunom afe kutser, ya ne ta nye itsik rink ne ribor katsak'e.
54003016	Akak ta kyem a f kuri kuyiik ku ta se nunrng kayr iren ikuus yir na ba. A tonong rice wu kayr kurm, Kabik ti tonong yir ye a nye afe katsak. maleka t ku di, f itak wu nashn nerawe zr zr, ti nk katsak ni wu kayr kazatse cicr, a tu ku sok a ta tseng'e kayr kaza be kuyiik.
54004001	T, Kabik ti tonong yir kanang ye kayr inom igang'e, nerawe kak ta won kunk katsak kufe fikuus nong ta kuus nabik nafe na ta wrk nerawe ne ikr iya amaan nabik ta bsp nerawe'me.
54004002	Kubsp na ta ne nufe kardak ner afe abs ya ay ba tan kus cei.
54004003	ner kuri ayong roon nerawe kunye kuwnng ne kuya naya kuri nakak. Amma Adakunom nye naya kamok nerawe ya a tin nk katsak ne ren katsak nong t shan be riy rikan.
54004004	Kamok koakye Adakunom ta nye, i nye itek, i ta se gyr ta gaar yir ikng ikak ba, ke i shan yir be riy rikan.
54004005	Kamok Adakunom sak t te zhl be rif Adakunom ne aduwa.
54004006	Ke wan bsp roneng itak na, t, wan ta te aner itomong aYeso Kiristi afe katsak, aya a tan rasak kayr rif natoon kunk katsak be kubsp kutek wan ta kuus'ong.
54004007	Tin te rice wan nifoos kpdng atin fe kashn ba. Amma yiir nk rice wan nong ta bsp kuse kuri kufe Adakunom.
54004008	Kamok kutabak kurm se gyr nizen ikak, amma kutabak kabik anerawe se gyr ne ku nar'e kamok ku ta ka tobok kayr kusor kyrna be kusor kufe kashn nama riku.
54004009	Rif na nye katsak, i se gyr koangan ta shan ibk ifa.
54004010	Ikr'ong ne ri sak yir ta nye yir itomong didng ne i tsesek yir kamok yir ta min te yir riy na Adakunom afe kutser, Aner Kashesh nerawe cicr, abanang fe a ta min nk katsak ba.
54004011	F ikr na be agbang kut ne i bsp nerawe'me.
54004012	Sang tu won akak ta ka zhsh ye kamok wan ta ru nye acam ba, amma sak riy be rif wan be kuri kutseng wan ne kuri kushim wan be kunk katsak wan ne kuse zhl wan nong as wan ta sor ikng kumaas nufe fikuus.
54004013	Nizham mi ta ra b, ya kashn be kufa nerawe afumung rif Adakunom ne i ka nye ba awazi ne i ka bsp ba'me.
54004014	Sang tin yrk be kunang kuya Adakunom ta ka nk ba, kuya wu ta ka nk kayr rif ner kuzarap ta f ne kusonong kk kashn tin saas ibk ritek natoon wan.
54004015	Nye tatan be ikr na, ni te rice wan ninye ikr'me cei nong koangan ta di kuya kashn wan.
54004016	Sak riy be kutseng wan ne i sak riy be ikng iya wan t bsp. Na ka tsesek ta nye ikr'ong kamok ke wan ti nye itomong be ikr'me, wan ta shesh rice wan be fe a ta ka foos.
54005001	Sang tu zhr aner ashn hash ba, amma f be wu kyndi a nye ada wan. Nye be cam kyndi ronyining wan.
54005002	Nye be anyako kyndi nye ng wan, nye be nanamang kyndi ngasnyining wan be kutrng kutek natoon ba.
54005003	Ni sak riy na nyining aya tek ba t kus, ya sang ta be akak ba ko cik.
54005004	Amma ke akumung'e be inoon ka nabon ayi, inoon'e be nabon'e ra kuus ikng iya rif Adakunom ta f nong tin sak riy na ang ba'me. Kamok be anong ne ba tu ku karang ikng iya ng be kaka ba'me t ka nye ba'me. Iyong ne i nye ikng iya Adakunom ta shim.
54005005	Abining aya amitek wu t ku, aya a ta be akak a tana ku tobok ba, a rin te riy wu na Adakunom ne a ya kashn be ku nye aduwa kunom be katuk nong Adakunom tu ku nk ikng wu ta shim.
54005006	Abining aya amitek wu t ku, a ra bun a shim a ta fok kusas kusor wu tsr, a se kyndi a nye atser a ra nye kukom'e kayr kabik.
54005007	Kunk ba itak na be agbang kut nong fan nerawe bu f ye sang tin sak riy na kumung ya a ta se dar akak ba.
54005008	Aner aya ne a ti sak riy na afe iri wu ba, abanang fekari wu ba, aner kuri ayong ton kunk katsak wu. A nye amaan'e ne a nar aner aya afe sang a t min nk katsak na aYeso ba.
54005009	A ta zibir riyerek akumung aya ay wu ta raar isk igataar, aya a t won dar a nye katsak nizen iya amitek ta rusek be kutser, kayr kumung ba.
54005010	A ra nye aner aya a tu ku ren be kunye kutek kyndi ku ni sak riy na inoon gyr ne kuren kushashang tsen ne a nye fikuus Adakunom itomong kayr kumees rice ne a tobok ya a ta se nutser ne a ni sak riy wu ninye ikr i ta nye itek, a tu ku fa kayr kumung.
54005011	Amma tu te riyerek kumung ya a ta ru nye nanamang kayr ayerek akumung ba. Kamok izen iya irm ba kpaan i ku daam ba ta won kunk kut kuya ba t nye be aKiristi ne a nye iwnng.
54005012	Kamok anong Adakunom tu ku t ba amok kamok ba t kyem kuus ikng ba ta tsang f ye ba t nye ba.
54005013	Ke ba nye anong m be akpdng kusor ne tsang kar na nasa. Sang sor kpdng tsek ba, amma tseng nye imok ne tsang ni tes kanu nikr nerawe. tsang f ikr iya i ta taas ke ba f ba.
54005014	Mi nar ku shim kumung ya a ta ru nye nanamang ra nye iwnng nong ta tes inoon ne ni sak riy ninasa ba fan bu nk mudn iren naborok.
54005015	Mi f anong kamok kumung'e kak ya a ta ru nye nanamang'e mu ku bun nufe Ishetan.
54005016	Ke abafikuus akak kuse aya a ta be kumung kayr kuri ba, t, a ru ku tobok sang a tu won fikuus tin furku niba ba. Kamok anong t nk fikuus iren nong tin sak riy na kumung ya sang ta be akak ba.
54005017	A rin sak riy didng na kk kashn ikilisiya ya a ta nye itomong ba gyr, abanang ya itomong ba ta nye awazi rif Adakunom be kubsp nerawe'me ba.
54005018	Kamok kufumung rif Adakunom f ye, Sang tu rosom inyak kanu nong tu ku roon kuya naya nizen i ta se nar kushushu naya ba, ne ri bun rif gbak ye, I se gyr aner a t nye itomong ta s ishorong wu.
54005019	Sang tu shim rif a ta ka tak natoon akok kashn ikilisiya gbashak ba, ma ke ner afa ka ataar ayi kuus kama aner a ta b be rif'me.
54005020	Natoon kok kashn Ikilisiya ya a ta nye rinn, ku zhr ba nashn nerawe nong as kak ta fok inyim kunye'me.
54005021	Nashn Adakunom ne aYeso Kiristi ne maleka a ta kasa, mi ta nye akusuk ye, i ra kuus ikr mi ta f be wan na gyr gyr sang be kushim rice ka ku tonong ye wan shim akak ne i nar'e ba.
54005022	Nye tatan be ku nisaas ibk ritek natoon anerawe ye nong a ta sor akk kashn ikilisiya, tu won rinn akak tin ngarak natoon wan ba. Amma sor zhl.
54005023	Sang tu yiir kus awan ashi tsek ba, amma s ashi anap aya a ta se kpukpa cik kamok kurk kafa wan ne kurk wan yryr'ong.
54005024	Rinn nerawe kak se kanang, ri wor ri se kanang kum dar a tseng'e nar amok, amma rinn rif kak, ma ri sok izen ri ta ra wuruk.
54005025	Anong ne kunye kutek se na akanang gip, kunye kutek kuya ku ta se na akanang ba, a ta kyem a nr ba.
54006001	ner aya ta nye sam cicr ra fok tekasa ba ato ne ka nk ba kuyiik ba nong fan akak bu zhsh riyerek Adakunom ne ikng iya yir t bsp yir.
54006002	sam ya atekasa ba ta nye fikuus, sang sam'me ta ka zhsh ba kamok ta nye roneng ba ba. Amma i se gyr ke asam'me ka nye ba itomong gyr ne nar ingya kamok ner ta ya nubk ba nye fikuus ne shim tekasa ba. Iyu ne inye ikr iya wan tana ka bsp ba'me ne wan ku nk ba itabak nong a ta kuus.
54006003	Ke aner akak bsp nerawe ikng ikak zr be iya Agwm gwm yir aYeso Kiristi t bsp ne kuri kuya ku ta nye kufe fikuus Adakunom ba,
54006004	aner kuri ayong be kuka ne a ra ren ikng ikak ba. A be amaan ise ne a shim nanan be akikar natoon abaan azhizhk rif naya na tana bn be rishishim be kuren ne ritok be amaan kut natoon akak,
54006005	ne ya nanan be ya a ta be akpdng kutrng ne katsak kam be ba. Ba di ye kusor kuri kuya Adakunom ta shim nye iren ikak ife ba tana s itsm.
54006006	Amma ke aner aya a ta sor kusor kuri kufe Adakunom ta shim ne a ni fan be ikng iya wu ta be, aner'e be agbang kurum.
54006007	Kamok sang yir b yir be ikng ikak kayr kazatse ba, yir ta tseng yir be ikng ikak ba.
54006008	Amma ke yir be yir naya be ares kute ikr iyong ti kyem yir.
54006009	Amma ner aya a ta shim ta te arum ti gor ni kon i nye rinn ne ku yiir kayr amaan ikr iduk ife kurm, ife i tana kuman ba ma i ta tseng be ba nar tana ku beseng ne wei.
54006010	Kamok kushim itsm ne kunye ritin koakye kuri amaan kunye. ner kak kamok kushim itsm didng ma won kunk katsak ba nong ta te rice ba kayr amaan risam didng.
54006011	Amma wan, aner Adakunom, kuteng ikr na cei ni te rice wan ni itsr ikng iya i ta se gyr nashn Adakunom, ikng iya Adakunom ta shim, be kunk katsak ne kushim be ku naka tsesek ne kuse tatan.
54006012	Kn kuren kutek kayr kunk katsak. Yiir kutser kufe izen izen kuya a ta ka yis mo nizen iya wan ta f nashn nerawe whr ye wan shan aKiristi.
54006013	Nashn Adakunom afe a ta nk koakye ikng kutser ne aYeso Kiristi aya a ta f katsak natoon rice wu nashn aBuntus Bilatus, a t f atuk katsak. Mi ta nye akusuk ye,
54006014	wan rinye itomong be rif na zhl ka dar narik ma nizen iya Agwm gwm yir aYeso Kiristi tana b.
54006015	Kub aYeso ta se nizen iya Adakunom ta di i tu se gyr. Adakunom ne a nye aya nerawe tu ku kerek, ne wu ne a be kukyem cei, agbang Agwm gwm, Agwm natoon gwm cei.
54006016	Wu zr ne a ku ba a sor na akanang aya akak tana kyem a tseng bubarak be wu ba, aya akak ta kun ku di ka a ta kyem a ku di ba. Kuyiik be kukyem nye kufu ma izen izen. Anong.
54006017	Tak ya a ta be kurum kayr kazatse na be agbang kut ye sang tu ya kuka be kurum ba ba, ka tin te ay natoon kurum ba ba, kuya ku tana gang koakye izen. Amma rin te ay na Adakunom aya a tin nyesek yir koakye ikng kp iya yir tanin fok yir kusas'e.
54006018	Ka tak ba be agbang kut ye ra nye kunye kutek, rin barang kurum kunye kunye kutek didng ne a se washak ne a shim kunk ikng.
54006019	Ke ba nye anong ne a ta tusung ikr itek kamok rice ba kayr kaza ne i sor agbang kanyk kamok izen i ta saase nong as yin ta s yin kutser ku ta nye kufe katsak.
54006020	aTimoti, ni sak riy be ikng iya a ta ka nk amana'me. Kam be akpdng itak ne rif kuzhsh Adakunom ra wan abs a ta yis ye kuren ikng,
54006021	ya nerawe akak ta min kam be iren kunk katsak ba. Ritek ra se mak be yin.
55001001	Mi aBulus, amanzo aYeso Kiristi, nushim aya Adakunom. Adakunom ti tom nong ta tak itak kutser kuya wu t tsang a nk kut kayr aYeso Kiristi.
55001002	Wan, aTimoti, igon riy mi. Ritek be kur riy ne kameneng riy Adakunom a ta nye Ada yir ne Agwm gwm yir aYeso Kiristi se mak be wan.
55001003	Mi be riy rikan be Adakunom aya mi tu ku nye itomong be riy rizining kyndi tukop'i tu ku nye'me. Katuk be kunom mi nye aduwa ne i yiring be wan yr yr.
55001004	Izen iya ne mi yiring be nanyisi wan ne a ni te ke mi ka di nong as riy mi ta men.
55001005	Mi yiring be kuri kunk katsak kufe katsak kuya wan ta be, kuri kufe akaka wan aLoyis ne kufe ang wan, aYunis, mi nk katsak ye wan be kuri'me gip.
55001006	Kamok anong ne mi bun i ka yiring'e ye i rin nye itomong didng be kunang kuya Adakunom t ka nk kum nizen mi tin sak kubk ritek natoon wan.
55001007	Kamok kabik kaya Adakunom ti nk yir nye kabik kufok inyim ba, amma kafe kukyem ne kushim be kuyiir rice.
55001008	Kamok anong sang t fok isum kuf itak natoon Agwm gwm yir ba, ka isum'i kamok a tin te nitsm kamok wu ba. Amma gung rice be mi kayr risam'me kamok Rif Ritek'e ne i ni fereng nukyem Adakunom.
55001009	Wu ne a ti shesh yir ne a ni kasa yir nong ta sor yir kusor kuzhl'e. A ti kasa yir sang kamok yir t nye yir ikng ikak itek ba, amma kamok ikng ife wu t shim'ong ne ritek wu. A tin nk yir ritek'e kamok aYeso Kiristi nizham a ta ra nye kazatse,
55001010	Amma kyrna a ti tonong yir'e be kub Aner Kashesh yir, aYeso Kiristi. Wu ne a canang riku ne a ni tonong yir kutser kufe izen izen kanang be Rif Ritek.
55001011	Kamok Rif Ritek'e ne Adakunom ti kasa mi nong t te aner kunye awazi ne i te amanzo ne i te aner kubsp nerawe'me.
55001012	Ikng i ta sak mi ta sen s risam kuri riyuna'ong. Gip be anong mi fok isum ba, kamok mi ren kuri aner aya mi tin nk katsak ni wu ne i bun i ren tsng tsng ye a be kukyem kufe a tanin sak riy nikng iya a tin won amana'me ma Katuk'ong.
55001013	Yiir kuri kubsp na kufe katsak kuya wan t fok nunaan, i tu sor ikng wan tanin nye kumaas. Yiring ta sor kayr kunk katsak ne kushim kuya wan ta be kayr aYeso Kiristi.
55001014	Ni sak riy be kubsp kufe katsak a t ka won amana'me. Kabik Kazhl'e a ta se kayr ay yir ta ka s mo nong tin nye itomong.
55001015	Wan ren ye koangan niben Asiya ti kirik kama, ma be aFizhilus ne aHamozhanis gip.
55001016	Won Agwm gwm tu r riy fekasa aOnesiforus, kamok koakye izen a yiir ni tsesek a fok isum ye mi se nitsm ba.
55001017	Amma nizen a t se na aRom, a ban a tsang a tsr kar mi t ku s ma a ti s.
55001018	Mi mok ye Agwm gwm ta sak Katuk kayong aOnesiforus ta s ritek nufu. Ei, wan ren tseng tseng kuri itomong iya wu tin nye'me na Afisa.
55002001	Kamok anong, wan igon'i, nyeseng kpa kayr ritek riya ri ta se kayr aYeso Kiristi.
55002002	Cicr ikr iya wan t fok nunaan nashn nerawe whr, bsp nerawe fe a ta be katsak nong ba ta ma kyem a bsp kak'e gip.
55002003	Naka tsesek kayr risam na mak be yir, kyndi asozha atek afe aYeso Kiristi.
55002004	aSozha akak kuse a ta se kayr itomong a tana bun a te rice wu ni ikr kazatse ba, kamok ikng ife asozha ta shim nye a tu karp atekasa wu riy.
55002005	Anong ne i se be aner aya a ta se be kuyrk itsi, a ta s ishorong ba, ma ke a kuus ikng iya a t f ye a ra nye.
55002006	Anong ne aner ikap aya a ta nye itomong rik wu didng, ta s naya wu ni imsng'e, nizen'e gip.
55002007	Ni i nye kutrng natoon ikr iya mi ta sen f be wan kamok Agwm gwm t ka barang mo akanang nong t ren koakye ikng.
55002008	Yiring be aYeso Kiristi aya a t ku dorok nurk, aya a t nye aner kasa aDauda kyndi Rif Ritek riya mi t taas, t f.
55002009	Kamok anong ne mi ti s risam na ma a min te nitsm gip kyndi aner aya a t nye amaan ikng, amma a ta kyem a ta rosom rif Adakunom ba.
55002010	Kamok anong mi tsesek kayr koakye kamok ya Adakunom t kasa nong ba gip ta ma s kashesh na a ta s kayr aYeso Kiristi ne kuyiik kufe izen izen.
55002011	Rif na nye katsak, rita f ye, Ke yir kus yir mak be wu, yir t bun i sor yir mak be wu;
55002012	ke i naka tsesek yir, yir t bun i nye yir rigwm mak be wu. Ke yir ton yir ye sang yir tu ren yir ba, wu t ton'e gip ye sang wu ti ren yir gip ba.
55002013	Ke yir be yir katsak ba, wu t sor afe katsak kamok wu t kyem a ton rice wu ba.
55002014	Ya kashn be kuka yiring ba ikr na. Ku zhr ba nashn Adakunom ye, ra won kuya nanan natoon naban azhizhk rif. Rif kuri riyong ti barang ikng ikak ba, ma ke ri bu beseng ya a ta foos tsek.
55002015	Nye koakye kuri ikng iya wan tana kyem i nye nong ta tonong ye wan nye aner aya Adakunom t kasa. Sang tu sor aner itomong aya a ta fok isum ba, ne i bsp rif katsak gyr.
55002016	Kam be akpdng rif, rif kuzhsh Adakunom, kamok kuse kuri kuyong t tseng be nerawe kayr kuse kuri kuya Adakunom ta shim ba.
55002017	Kubsp ba t ya kashn kyndi kufor ku tan te inyr. Kayr ner kuri ayong'e akak nye aHimenayus ne aFiletus,
55002018	ya a t won iren katsak'e. Ba f ye izen kudorok ikom nark n gor ma sak kak won kunk katsak ba.
55002019	Gip be anong, katsak rif Adakunom'me ri ta nye itsik'e rusek kpa be izibir natoon'e ye, Adakunom ren ya a ta nye fu, be, Koangan aya a ta f ye wu nye afe Agwm gwm a ra won amaan kunye wu dim.
55002020	Kayr agbang kasa a sak awan izinariya ne azurfa tsek ba, amma ikr a ta nye be ikon ne rirp gip. Kamok ikr'me ikak i nye ife itomong i ta nye ife kuyiik ne ikak nye ife kuyiik ba.
55002021	Ke aner aya a kam be amaan ikr'ong mi tin f natoon'e, a ta sor kyndi ikr iya a tin nye itomong iyiik'e, ne a se zhl nong Atekasa wu tin nye itomong be wu. A ta sor be kanyk kamok koakye kuri itomong itek.
55002022	Kam be kushim amaan ikr kuri ife ricam ne i ni te rice ni itsr kusor kuzhl'e, ne kunk katsak be kushim ne kusor caang, mak be fikuus fudang wan ta yis kayr riyerek Adakunom be riy zhl.
55002023	Sang ikng ikak ta ka gung be kuya aduk nanan ba, kamok wan ren anong b be aduk riwng.
55002024	I se gyr aner itomong Agwm gwm ta sor aner riwng ba, a ra se gyr be koangan ne a nye aner a tana kyem a bsp nerawe'me sang afe riy rif ba.
55002025	A ra bsp ya a ta gaar kubsp wu'me whiwh kamok kashim Adakunom ta ka nk ba iren kushishing kuse ba nong ta ren katsak,
55002026	nong ke tu ku bun kayr kutrng ba, ne s ku wher kayr agunung Amaan Aner, aya a t tsang a ka yiir mo ba nong ta kuus kutrng wu.
55003001	Amma yiring ye: Kayr inom igang'e, risam t ku se didng.
55003002	Kamok nerawe t te fe kushim rice, fe kushim itsm didng, ne te fe ku ya kuka ne fe kukok rice naza, ne te fe kukas nar ne gaar kufok tek ba ne te dar kutonong riy rikan ne sor zhl ba,
55003003	ne a te dar ku naka shim, ne naka be kayr ay, ne te fe kubeseng ayerek nerawe, ne te dar kuyiir rice ne f hash ne te awan rishishim ne raba koakye ikng itek,
55003004	ne naka mr ne shim kunye ikr gbashak ne kok rice naza ne shim ikr kazatse ne inar Adakunom,
55003005	a tu ku yrk ba kyndi ren Adakunom, amma raba kukyem Adakunom kuya ku ta tonong kuse kutek ba. Kam be ner kuri ayong.
55003006	Kayr ba kak kuse ta tsr iren ku ns kayr nasa nerawe nong ta wrk nyining ya a ta be ritseng ba, ya rinn tan sok rice ba ne amaan iriri kushim ikr.
55003007	nyining kuri ayu shim kubsp ikr ifas, amma ra kyem ren katsak ba.
55003008	ner'e se kyndi aZhenis be aZhabanis A t shishim aMusa, anong ne ner'ong raba katsak gip, kutrng ba wei cei ne kunk katsak ba te kukpdng'e.
55003009	ta ra b kar ba, kamok koangan ta di rifunam ba zizirik kyndi a t di rif aZhanis be aZhambanis.
55003010	Kyrna wan ren kuri ibsp'i ne kuse mi ne ikng mi ta se be kanyk'e, ne kunk katsak'i, be kuwhiwh mi, ne kushim'i be ku naka tsesek mi ta be.
55003011	Wan ren kuri kutabak ne amaan risam mi ta s, abaan aya mi t s nizen iya mi t se na Antakiya ne na Ikoniya be aListira ba. Gip be anong Adakunom ti shesh kayr'e cei.
55003012	Katsak'e koangan afe a ta shim a ta sor kusor kuri kufe Adakunom kayr aYeso Kiristi ta s risam.
55003013	Amma maan aner ne ner ta sok rice ba ta gor kar ba tu kuse tin barang kute amaan'e didng ma a t wrk nerawe whr ne ma ka wrk ba.
55003014	Amma, wan aTimoti, ya kashn be ikng iya a t ka bsp'e, wan ren kunye katsak kamok wan ren kuri ner aya wan t bsp nufuba.
55003015	Yiring, kum izen iya wan t ru nye igon, wan tsang i ren rif Adakunom rizhl'e, riya ri tana kyem ka bsp iren kus kashesh ke anerawe nk katsak na aYeso Kiristi.
55003016	Koakye ikng iya a t zibir kayr kufumung rif Adakunom nye isong Adakunom. Izibir'e se gyr kamok kubsp, ne kuzhr anerawe ne kunees kuse anerawe be kubsp anerawe iren kuse gyr nashn Adakunom,
55003017	nong as koangan afe a ta nye afe Adakunom ta shining ne a se be kanyk kamok koakye kuri itomong itek.
55004001	Mi f be wan be agbang kut nashn Adakunom ne aYeso Kiristi, aya a tana t atser be ikom amok, a tana bun a b nong a ta te tsik rigwm wu ye,
55004002	wan ri tsesek ninye awazi rif Adakunom, ko be izen ko dar izen. Nees nerawe, kuzhr ba ne i kutsesek ba ne i ka bsp ba'me kayr awhiwh.
55004003	Kamok izen ta b iya sang nerawe tana ba, shim kufoos kubsp kufe katsak ba. Amma ta nar kushim kufoos ikr iya ay ba t shim ne kamok kuwhaan ato ba a tsr ner kubsp nong tu ku taas ba ikr iya ba ta shim ta foos.
55004004	nerawe ta raba kufok katsak, amma ta ban shim kufoos atin afekashn ingya.
55004005	Amma wan sak riy be ikr kuri iyong, naka tsesek kayr risam wan, ya kashn be kunye itomong aner awazi Rif Ritek ne i ni sak riy ni itomong iya a t ka sak'e ye wan ra nye cicr.
55004006	Kamok izen n nye a tanin sok a ta nk kyndi asidaka igang'e, izen kutseng'i n nye.
55004007	Mi n nye ikng ife mi tana kyem i nye, mi n kon kuren kutek, mi n gang itsi'me, mi yiir kunk katsak mi ta be.
55004008	Kyrna makong, a min sak ishorong ife ku se gyr'e nashn Adakunom, iya Agwm gwm, aner kut amok afe katsak tanin nk Katuk'ong. Sang awan mi ne a tin nk tsek ba, amma be cicr ner aya a ta min te riy nub wu gip.
55004009	Nye koakye ikng iya wan tana kyem i nye nong t b nunaan gbashak,
55004010	kamok aDemas min won kamok kushim kazatse na, nong a t be na aTasalonika, aKirishen be na aGalati, aTitus be aDalmatiya.
55004011	aLuka wu zr tsek ne a se mak be mi. Tsr aMarkus nong t b yin mak be wu, kamok wu tin s mo ni itomong'e.
55004012	Mi n tom aTikikus na Afisa.
55004013	Nizen iya ne wan tana b ne i ni cer awn kukpiin'i mi ta won nufe aKarpus na aToruwas be afumung'i kak, abanang fe kukpa kya ba.
55004014	Alekzanda a ta nye atu'me ti mr didng. Agwm gwm t ku nk ishorong wu titr be ikng iya wu t nye.
55004015	Wan gip sak riy be wu, kamok a shik rif yir t f yir didng.
55004016	Nizen iya a t tseng be mi nar amok ni imsng'e, akak ti tobok ba, koangan ti won. Mi mok ye Adakunom t yiir iyong natoon rice ba ba.
55004017	Amma Agwm gwm se mak be mi, ayong a ti nk agap nong as kamok mi rif wu t tseng cei nong ner aya a ta nye ner aYahuda ba, cicr t fok. A ti shesh nanu azaki fan a bin tn amok riku.
55004018	Agwm gwm tin shesh kayr koakye kuri ikng imaan'e i tana b ne tseng be mi gyk gyk ma kayr kasa rigwm wu kayr kaza. Won kuyiik tu nye kufu ma izen izen! Anong.
55004019	Ni nye shou aBiriskila be Akila ne fekasa Onesiforus.
55004020	Arastus rusek na aKoranti, mi won aTaromus be kurk na aMilitus.
55004021	Te gbashak ta b nizham izen kuwun ta ra nye. aYubulus be aPuden ne aLanus be aKalaudiya ne ribir roneng cicr ta nye ashou.
55004022	Agwm gwm ra se mak be kabik yin. Ritek wu se mak be yin.
56001001	Mi, aBulus, asam Adakunom ne i bun i nye amanzo aYeso Kiristi. A tin sak mi ta te amanzo nong ta tsesek kunk katsak ya Adakunom t kasa, ne i kutobok ba nong ta ren katsak kayr ikuus Adakunom,
56001002	kamok kute riy natoon kutser kufe izen izen. Adakunom, wu a ta be abs ba, ne a nk kut natoon kutser kufe izen izen nizham a ta ra san zam.
56001003	Nizen iya wu ta di i ta se gyr, a tana tonong kayr rif wu riya mi ta sen nye awazi'me riya a ti nk amana'me kayer rif wu be agbang kut Adakunom Aner kashesh yir.
56001004	Wan, aTitus, igon'i kafe katsak kayr kunk katsak yir ta be yir cicr yir. Ritek be kameneng riy Adakunom a ta nye Ada yir be aYeso Kiristi Aner Kashesh yir se mak be wan.
56001005	Mi t won na aKirit nong as wan ta gang itomong iya i ta rusek dar kugang ne i te kk kashn ikilisiya kayr koakye kuwp kyndi mi t ka tak.
56001006	Akk kashn ikilisiya ra nye aner aya a se gyr nashn nerawe, aner a ta be abining azining, inoon wu ra nye afikuus sang tu se kprdk ka tu shonong ba.
56001007	Kum akk kashn ta nye aner itomong Adakunom, a ra nye aner aya sang a tana ku s be ikng ikak imaan'e ba. Sang a tu nye aner aya a ta kok rice naza ba, ka afe riy rife ka aner a ta s kugbr ma a ta feng'e, ka aner a ta shim kuren ka aner aya a ta ma ka shim itsm ba.
56001008	A ra ban a nye aner aya a ta shan tsen ibk ifa dim, ne a shim ku nye ikng iya i ta se gyr ne a yiir rice wu ne a be katsak ne a se zhl, ne a mees rice wu.
56001009	Akk kashn ikilisiya ra nye aner aya a tana yiir rif Adakunom riya a tu ku tak be agap kyndi a tu ku bsp'e nong a tin tsesek kak be awazi ne kubsp kufe katsak, ne a gaar ya a ta raba kubsp'e.
56001010	fe kushonong kuse whr ne fe kuf kpdng kuse ne ya a ta wrk nerawe, abanang ner aya a ta kuus kubsp ner aYahuda ba.
56001011	Wan ta roon fe kubsp kuri kufe abs'ong dim, kamok tsang beseng nerawe na nasa ba be kubsp ikng iya i ta se gyr ke ba bsp nerawe'me ba, nong ta s ikng iya ba ta shim tsek.
56001012	Ei, aner aKirit, akak kayr ner kuzarap ba ne a ku f ye, ner aKirit'e be abs, se kyndi maan ikewum, ymng ne mak yas didng.
56001013	Rif'ong nye katsak. Kamok anong ku zhr ba be agap, ne kunk katsak ba ta kpa agap,
56001014	nong t won kufoos atin afekashn ner aYahuda ne ku kuus itsi nerawe ya a ta gaar katsak.
56001015	Koakye se zhl nufe ner aya a ta sok ye i se zhl'e. Amma ikng ikak se zhl nufe ya a be katsak ka ya a ta be agak riy ba, kamok kutrng ba ne ay ba se zhl ba.
56001016	ner kuri ayong f ye ba ren Adakunom amma kunye ba tonong ye ba ren Adakunom ba. Kunye ba se kyr, shonong, kyem nye ikng ikak itek ba.
56002001	Amma wan, bsp nerawe ikng iya i ta se gyr dim be katsak.
56002002	Bsp shn iren kuse tatan, ra be kuyiik, ra be kuyiir rice ne se gyr kayr kunk katsak ba, be kushim kufe katsak ne kutsesek didng.
56002003	Anong ne anyako, kubsp ba'me ye ra nye kusor kuri kuya ku ta tas kufe nyining ya a ta nye afikuus, sang a tu be imok ka ya a ta mak s ikr ma a ta feng'e ba, amma ra bsp nerawe ikng iya i ta nye katsak.
56002004	Iyong ta sak ba ta kyem bsp nyining ya a ta ru nye nanamang nong t shim tek ba ne inoon ba,
56002005	ne yiir rice ba ne sor zhl ne ni sak riy na nasa ba, be kuse kutek ne fok tek ba kuto, fan bu te kyr be rif Adakunom.
56002006	Anong ne cam gip, ku bsp ba'me ye ra yiir rice ba.
56002007	Kayr koakye wan sor ikng ba tanin nye kumaas natoon'e be kunye ikng iya i ta nye itek. Kayr kubsp wan, nye be riy rizining ne katsak,
56002008	ne atuk ica katsak fan kak bu shik. Be anong ne ya a t ka rawan ta fok isum kamok s ikng ikak imaan'e tanin f natoon yir ba.
56002009	Tak sam ye ra fok tekasa ba kuto kayr koakye ne nye ikng iya ba tana fok kusas'e sang tu ya kanu be ba ba,
56002010	ka ta ka nye ba itsang ba. Amma ra ban tonong ye ba se gyr ne be katsak kayr koakye, nong as kayr koakye iren ba t tonong ye kubsp rif Adakunom Aner Kashesh yir se yiik.
56002011	Kamok Adakunom tonong ritek wu nong nerawe cicr ta s kashesh.
56002012	Ritek'e ti bsp yir iren kuf ye, wayo be kuse kuri kuya Adakunom ta shim ba, ne amaan kushim ikr kazatse, nong ta yiir yir rice yir, ne i se yir zhl ne i be yir kuse kuri kufe Adakunom kayr izam iyuna.
56002013	Yir sor yir anong nong tin tor yir agbang kunom kuya yir ta min te yir ay, nizen Adakunom yir ayiik'e ne Aner Kashesh yir aYeso Kiristi tana tonong kuyiik wu.
56002014	aYeso ne nk rice wu nong a tin sheshek yir kayr amaan kunye yir ne a ni kusu yir nong t sor yir fu ne i shim kunye yir ikng iya i ta nye itek.
56002015	Ka bsp ba ikr na. Ka tsesek ba ne i ka zhr ba be agbang kut. Sang tu won akak ta ka zhsh ba.
56003001	Yiir yiring nerawe wan'e ye ra fok kk kashn ne fe gwm kaben ba kuto, ra kuus ikng iya ba ta f ne sor be kanyk kunye koakye i ta se gyr.
56003002	Bun i f be ba ye sang a tu f amaan rif ba, ra shim kusor caang ne se whiwh be nerawe ne mees rice ba nashn koangan.
56003003	Yir gip gbugbang i tsang i nye yir funam'e ne i shonong yir, a tsang a ni wrk yir, ma i te yir sam fe kushim kunye amaan ikr iya ay yir ta shim be kushim kufok kusas kusor. Kusor yir tsang kunye kunye ikr imaan'e ne rishishim. nerawe ti rayir ne yir ma ka rayir ba.
56003004	Amma nizen iya a tin tonong yir ritek ne kushim Adakunom Aner Kashesh yir,
56003005	a ti shesh yir. A nye anong sang kamok i nye yir ikng ikak itek ba, amma kamok kur riy wu. A ti shesh yir, a t kusu rinn yir be Kabik Kazhl'e kaya a tin nk yir kutes kufas ne iren kusor kufas.
56003006	Kabik Kazhl yong ne a ti korok natoon yir nk kamok ikng iya aYeso Kiristi Aner Kashesh yir t nye.
56003007	A nye anong, nong as kamok ritek wu yir ta s yir ku te zhl nashn Adakunom ne i te yir ya a tana ya kutse kutser kufe izen izen kuya yir ta min te yir riy.
56003008	Rif'me nye katsak. Kamok anong mi shim wan ta f rif'me ne i bun i toos'e, nong ya a ta min nk katsak na Adakunom t ya kashn be kunk rice ba nong ta nye ikng iya i ta nye itek. Ikr na nye itek ne i se gyr be koangan.
56003009	Amma kam be akikar afe rifunam ne aduk atin ne kafa iriri zam atukop atukop be kuya nanan ne kuren natoon Itsi kamok ikr kuri iyong nye ikpdng'e, i tin barang ikng ikak ba.
56003010	Aner aya a ta shim ku naka kaas, ke wan tu krk kuto kutak kuzining, kutak kufe afa, ke a fok ba, ne wan kam be wu.
56003011	Wan t ren ye aner kuri ayong nye aruruk'e ne a nye aner rinn. A naka t amok.
56003012	Nizen iya mi tana tom Atemis ka aTikikus ayi nufuan. Nye ikng iya wan tana kyem i nye nong ta b nunaan na aNikapolis, kamok mi shim ta se sor azong nizen kuwun.
56003013	Nye koakye wan tana kyem i nye nong ta tobok aZinas a ta nye aloya, ne Apolos nizen tana shan iren. Sang tu dun ikng ikak iya ba ta tsr ba.
56003014	ner yir ra bsp kunk ace ba dim nong ta nye ikng iya i ta nye itek, ne ren iren kutobok nerawe na agbang ikr ba t tsr. tu sor a kpdng kusor ba.
56003015	fe ta se aze mak be mi cicr ta nye ashou. Nye shou ya a tin shim yir, ya i ta se yir mak kayr kunk katsak kuzining. Ritek Adakunom se mak be yin cicr.
57001001	Mi, aBulus, aya a tin te nitsm kamok aYeso Kiristi ne aronyining yir aTimoti ne i ta zibir wan kufumung na aFilimon, agbang aferim yir ne i bun i nye aferim itomong yir.
57001002	Kufumung'e nye kufe yin mak be ngasnyining yir Afiya ne Akipus ya a ta nye asozha aKiristi be ribir fikuus ya a ta nyiis kari wan.
57001003	Ritek be kameneng riy Adakunom a ta nye Ada yir ne Agwm gwm yir aYeso Kiristi se mak be yin.
57001004	Mi tonong Adakunom riy rikan yr yr ke mi sen nye aduwa ne i yiring be wan.
57001005	Mi fos kuri kunk katsak wan ta be natoon Agwm gwm yir aYeso ne kuri kushim wan t shim zhl'e cei.
57001006	Aduwa mi se ye wan tin barang ifeng ni itaas itak natoon kunk katsak wan, nong as wan ta ren koakye kuri ikng itek yir ta be yir kayr aYeso Kiristi.
57001007	Kushim wan ta be ti karp riy didng ne kuni tsesek didng kamok wan aroneng, wan sak ay zhl'e ta men.
57001008	Kamok kuri kushim afe wan ta shim fikuus ne mi kyem i ros riy kayr aKiristi nong t f be wan ye wan ri nye ikng iya i ta tas ke wan nye.
57001009	Amma kamok mi ta ka shim, mi shim ta ka nye akusuk, mi aBulus, mi t nye ashn ne i bun i se nitsm kyrna kamok aYeso Kiristi.
57001010	Mi ta nye izong kamok igon'i aOnesimus, aya a t shan aKiristi nizen iya mi ta se nitsm.
57001011	Gbugbang a tsang a be itomong nufuan ba, amma kyrna a be itomong nufuan be nunaan didng.
57001012	Mi bun i sen ku tom nufuan, wu aya a ta nye itsam riy mi.
57001013	Mi shim ke wan ku yiir nong a ta sor mak be mi nong as a ta ka shishing ne a ni s mo ne i nye ikr ne mi se nurosom kamok kutaas Rif Ritek Adakunom.
57001014	Amma mi shim ta nye ikng ikak dar kushim wan ba, nong as koakye kuri ritek wan tanin nye'me ta se be kushim riy wan sang kyndi a ta te mo agap ba.
57001015	Kashim ikng i ta sak wu ta kam be wan kayr kaban izen cik nye nong as wan ta bun i ku s nong ta sor yin mak ma izen izen.
57001016	Sang kyndi asam baba ba, amma ner aya a ta nar sam, kyndi aronyining wan aya wan t shim didng. Mi ren wan ku shim didng ne i ni nar kyndi anerawe be aronyining kayr Agwm gwm yir.
57001017	Kamok anong ke wan ti sok ye mi nye afudang itomong wan, t, kushan ibk ifa kyndi wan tanin shan mi.
57001018	Ke a mak ka nye ikng ikak wan t fok kusas'e ba, ka wan tu be kuta ikng ikak ayi ne wan ni won'e.
57001019	Mi, aBulus, ne i sen ka zibir kufumung na be kubk'i, ye mi ta ka karang. Sang tu f i tak kutser kufas wan t s kamok mi ba.
57001020	Aroneng, mi mok ye mi ta s ritek nufuan kamok Agwm gwm. Kusuk, ni tsesek.
57001021	Mi ti nk katsak ye wan t kuus ikng iya mi ta f. Mi ta ka zibir kufumung na ne mi ren tsng tsng ye, wan ta nye ikng ife i ta nar iya mi ta f be wan ye wan ra nye.
57001022	Ikng ikak izining mi ta shim ke wan ren gbak nye, nye kutu tsen kamok mi, kamok mi n te riy kub nufe yin ke Adakunom fok aduwa yin a tin won.
57001023	Abafaras afudang'i, i ta se yir nitsm mak kamok aYeso Kiristi, ta nye yin ashou.
57001024	Anong ne fudang itomong'i, aMarkus be Aristakus ne aDemas be aLuka ta nye yin ashou gip.
57001025	Ritek Agwm gwm yir aYeso Kiristi se mak be kabik yin.
58001001	Gbugbang, Adakunom f kanu be tukop yir ni iren zr zr ne nizen zr zr be aner kuzarap.
58001002	Amma kayr inom igang'e na, a f kanu be yir be Igon wu, aya a t ku sak a ta te a ya kutse ikr cicr. Mak be wu ne a nye koakye.
58001003	Igon'e ne ka nye akanang kuyiik Adakunom, a tas Adakunom kyn. A yiir koakye ikng be kukyem rif wu. Nama a t sak yir ta te yir zhl kayr rinn yir, yong a sonong nubk riya Aya a ta nye a yiik'e kayr kaza.
58001004	Kamok anong ne wu nar maleka be kuyiik kyndi riyerek a tu ku te'me ta nar rifuba.
58001005	Kamok amaleka akak kuse Adakunom t kun f be wu ye, Wan nye Igon'i, katuur mi n te Ada wan ba.  Ka ye, Mi t te Ada wu, ne wu ma te Igon'i ba.
58001006	Nizen iya Adakunom t tom igon wu kafe imsng'e kayr kazatse, a bun a f ye, Won maleka cicr tu ku ya iben.
58001007	Natoon maleka, Adakunom f ye, Adakunom sak maleka sor kyndi kuwun ne a sak sam wu t sor kyndi rigyem kurng.
58001008	A f natoon Igon'e ye, Itsik rigwm wan, Adakunom, t sor ma izen izen. Katsak ne ka ta nye ishn rigwm wan.
58001009	Wan shim katsak ne i rawan amaan kuse kamok anong Adakunom, a ta nye Adakunom wan, t kasa a ta ka korok name rice. A t sak wan ta s kuyiik ku ta nar kufe fudang wan.
58001010	A bun a f ye, Kum ni imsng'e, Agwm gwm, wan ne i barak ribor kazatse, kaza nye itomong ibk wan.
58001011	Ikr'ong cicr t gor, amma wan t sor ma izen izen. Ikr'ong t kop kyndi ares.
58001012	Wan t ka kunung ba kyndi ares, a t yiir ku shishing kyndi ares. Amma wan shishing ba, ay wan be igak ba.
58001013	maleka anyaka ne Adakunom kun f be wu ye, Sonong nubk riya mi, ma mi sak mudn wan te ikng kusak atak wan ?
58001014	maleka cicr nye nabik naya na ta nye ner ta s kashesh itomong.
58002001	Kamok anong, i ni barang yir ku ni sak yir riy natoon ikr i tan fok yir fan i bu te yir titak ta won yir iren'e.
58002002	Kamok ke rif a ta shan nufe maleka be agap, koangan afe a ta shonong a gaar kufok'e t s risam kamok ikng iya wu t nye,
58002003	yir t nye yir an ta wher yir ke yir gaar yir kushan agbang kashesh kuri kuyu ? Agwm gwm yir be rice wu ne a taas itak kashesh na ni imsng'e. ner ya a t ku fok ti tonong yir ye i se anong be katsak.
58002004	Adakunom gip a tonong ye i se anong be kunye ikr azhing ne ife kukyem ne kunang Kabik Kazhl'e t kasap anerawe kyndi wu ta shim.
58002005	Sang Adakunom sak maleka nong tin nye rigwm nizam iyu afe yir ta sen nif yir na ba.
58002006	Nar kakak, aner akak zibir kayr Kufumung rif Adakunom ye, Anerawe nye aky wan tin daam ni wu ? Anerawe nye aky wan tin sak riy ni wu ?
58002007	Wan t ku nye a ti raar cik na maleka, wan t nk rigwm be kuyiik
58002008	ne i ku sak a tin nye rigwm natoon ikr cicr.  Nizen Adakunom t ku sak a tin nye rigwm natoon ikr'me, a won dar a ku won ikng ikak ba. Gip be anong, yir di yir anerawe ti nye rigwm natoon ikr cicr kyrna ba.
58002009	Amma ikng iya yir ta yrk yir nye aYeso, aya a ta tsang a ni raar na maleka, amma kyrna a tu ku nk kuyiik be rigwm kamok a s risam riku nong se ritek Adakunom ta fok risam riku kamok koangan.
58002010	Adakunom ne a nye koakye, kamok wu ne koakye kuse. Kamok anong ke i nye ye Adakunom bn inoon wu whr kuyiik, i ta se gyr a ta tiyiik akk kashn kashesh ba. A nye anong be risam aYeso t s.
58002011	Aya a ta se zhl ne ya a t ku sak ba t te zhl nye ner kasa kazining. Kamok anong, aYeso fok isum a t ka yis ba ye ronyining wu ba.
58002012	A f ye, Mi t f itak riyerek wan nashn ronyining'i, mi t ka kerek be abom, nashn rigwm nerawe wan.
58002013	A bun a f ye, Mi tin fereng ni wan.  Ne a bun a f gbak ye, Mi na mak be inoon Adakunom ta min nk.
58002014	Kum inoon'e ta be rinam be nask, wu gip a sok kuse rinerawe nong as kamok riku wu a ta yirik agap aya riku ta se nubk wu, aner'e nye Ishetan
58002015	ne a turung ya inyim riku ta ma ka te ba nitsm cicr.
58002016	Katsak'e, sang maleka ne wu t ku tobok ba ba, amma kuri Ibrahim ne a t ku tobok ba.
58002017	Kamok anong ne wu te kyndi ronyining wu kayr koakye iren, nong as a t te agbang atsi afe a ta be kur riy ne a nye katsak ni itomong Adakunom. A nye asidaka'ong nong a tin sok rinn nerawe.
58002018	Wu be rice wu s risam nizen a t ku bmng, kamok anong a kyem a ta tobok ya a ta sen ku bmng ba cicr.
58003001	Kamok anong, roneng azhl'e, yin ya i tin se yin kayr kuyis kufe kaza na, t, yin tsik natoon aYeso, a ta nye Amanzo ne Agbang Atsi niren yir ta min nk yir katsak.
58003002	aYeso tonong katsak kayr itomong aya a t ku kasa, kyndi aMusa ta nye katsak ni itomong wu kayr nerawe Adakunom.
58003003	aYeso be kuyiik ne a nar aMusa kyndi aner rink ta be kuyiik ne a nar rink'e.
58003004	Koakye kasa anerawe ne a nk, amma Adakunom ne a nye koakye ikng.
58003005	aMusa tonong katsak kayr itomong wu ife asam kayr anerawe Adakunom, nong i ta sor asheda ikr iya i tana b nashn.
58003006	Amma aKiristi tonong katsak kyndi igon a tu ku nk kukyem a tanin sak riy natoon nerawe Adakunom cicr. Yir ne i nye yir nerawe'me, ke i ya yir kashn be ku naka tsesek ne ku ni te riy kuya i tin tsor yir kafok natoon'e ma nigang'e.
58003007	T, kyndi Kabik Kazhl'e ta f ye, Katuur, ke yin fok yin kut wu,
58003008	tu shonong yin ba, kyndi yin t shonong yin nizen iya yin t bmng yin Adakunom kayr katse.
58003009	Azong ne da yin ti maas ne a ni bmng, ay isk inaas ne yrk ikr iya mi t nye.
58003010	Iyong ne i sak riy mi ta beseng be izam iyong ma mi f ye, Ay ba se gugk be mi koakye izen, a ren ren'i ba.
58003011	Kayr riy kubeseng, mi nye kushu ye, Sang ba t s iren tana n nar kufan'i ba ko cik.
58003012	roneng, sak yin riy fan akak yin bu nye amaan kutrng ne a won dar a ni nk katsak, nong a ta won kukuus Adakunom afe kutser.
58003013	Amma yiir i naka tsesek yin kunom. Ni nye yin itomong be koakye izen iya a ta yis ye, katuur, nong fan rinn bu wk akak yin nong ta shonong.
58003014	Yir ta te yir azining be aYeso ke i yiir yir katsak yir ta be yir kum ni imsng'e kpa ma nigang'e.
58003015	Kyndi a tan f ye: Katuur, ke yin fok yin kut Adakunom, tu shonong yin ba, kyndi yin t te yin ma i te yin shaam.
58003016	ngan ne fok kut Adakunom ne bun shonong ? Cicr ner aya aMusa t ka tun ba niben aMasar.
58003017	Riy Adakunom beseng be ngan ma ay isk inaas ? Riy wu beseng be ner a t nye rinn, fe a t kus kayr katse.
58003018	Be ngan ne Adakunom shu ye sang ta n kayr nawu kufan wu ba ? Mi f ka be ya a ta nye rinn ?
58003019	Kamok anong, yir ren yir ye kyem n ba, kamok kuwon dar kunk katsak ba.
58004001	Kamok anong, kum kunk kut a t tsang a f be yir ye, yir t n yir kayr kar kufan wu tu ku se, t, i sak yir riy fan kak yir bu won dar kyem n.
58004002	Kamok a min taas yir Rif Ritek kyndi a t ka taas ba. Amma rif ba t fok sor ikng ikak nufu ba ba, kamok fe t fok ti nk katsak ba.
58004003	Yir fe i ta min nk yir katsak i n yir kayr kar kufan kyndi Adakunom ta f ye, Riy mi beseng, kamok anong mi shu ye ba t n kayr kar kufan'i ba ko cik.  Adakunom f anong, nama a t tsang a gang itomong kunye kazatse wu.
58004004	Kamok nar kakak a f itak kunom kufe kanataar kayr kufumung rif Adakunom ye, Katuk afe kanataar Adakunom fan be kunye itomong wu cicr.
58004005	amma ayong a bun a f ye, Ba t n kayr kufan'i ba ko cik.
58004006	I rusek anong, kak t n kayr kufan'e, amma ya a t san kufok Rif Ritek s kun kayer'e ba, kamok kushonong ba.
58004007	Kamok anong, Adakunom sak kunom kukak a ta yis ye, Katuur. A fa baan didng ne a f nanu aDauda kyndi a ta tsang a zibir ye, Katuur ke yin fok yin kut wu, tu shonong yin ba.
58004008	Kamok ke a fa f ye aZhoshuwa ta ka nk ba nar kufan'e ke Adakunom ra ba f ikng ikak natoon kunom kukak nashn ba.
58004009	Iyong tonong ye, kufan nama inom kanataar rusek gbak kamok ner Adakunom.
58004010	Kamok aner aya a ta n kayr kufan Adakunom, a ta fan ni itomong'e ifu gip kyndi Adakunom t nye.
58004011	Won i tu nye yir koakye ikng i tana kyem i nye yir nong ta n yir kayr kufan'ong, fan akak bu kuus kuse ba, a t kpa, ta won dar fok kuto.
58004012	Katsak'e rif Adakunom be kutser ne ri be agap itomong. Agap wu nar afe awn iya i i ta ya abas afa. a tm ma kayr kurm nerawe nong a ta kam kutser be kabik ne ikap be isr, ma i ren kutrng riy anerawe be kunye wu.
58004013	Ikng ikak kuse nunrng nazatse nashn Adakunom ba. Koakye ikng se ds, i se kanang nashn wu. Nashn wu ne i ta nyeseng yir nong t taas yir koakye ikng i t nye yir.
58004014	Kamok anong, kum yir ta be yir agbang atsi ayiik'e, aYeso Igon Adakunom, aya a ta tseng naza, won i tu yiir yir kunk katsak yir be agap didng.
58004015	Agbang atsi aya yir ta be yir nye aya a ta r riy yir kayr kuraar yir. A t bmng kayr koakye iren kyndi yir, gip be anong a nye rinn ba.
58004016	Won yir tu b yir nashn itsik ritek Adakunom'me be riy rizining, nong as ta s yir kur riy be ritek nizen iya i ta se yir kayr kutsr.
58005001	Koakye agbang atsi Adakunom ne a tu kasa kayr nerawe fudang nong a t f kanu rice ba natoon ikr Adakunom ne a nye asidaka kamok rinn.
58005002	A kyem a nye tatan be ya a ta taam ne ya a ta dun kuren ikng, kamok wu be rice wu ta be kuraar kuri kuf rinerawe gip.
58005003	Iyong ne isak wu nye asidaka kamok rinn wu be rife nerawe.
58005004	Akak t kyem a tin te rice wu ba, ma ke Adakunom ne a t yis kyndi a t yis aHaruna.
58005005	Anong ne, aKiristi gip, a s kuyiik kusor agbang atsi be rice wu ba. Amma Adakunom ne a f be wu ye, Wan ne i nye Igon mi, katuur mi n te Ada wan.
58005006	A bun a f nar kakak ye, Wan nye agbang atsi ma izen izen, kyndi aMakizadek.
58005007	Nizen aYeso t se aze nazatse, a t kut naza a t nye aduwa ne a nye izong be nanyisi nufe Adakunom aya a tana kyem a ku shesh kayr riku. Adakunom t fok kamok a nye aner a t mees rice.
58005008	aYeso nye Igon Adakunom gyrtatan, amma a ti barang kukuus kut Adakunom kayr risam a t s.
58005009	Nizen iya a t ma shining gyr, ne a ma sor iren kutser kufe izen izen nufe koangan aya a ta kuus ikng iya a ta f.
58005010	Adakunom ne a t ku kasa a ta sor agbang atsi kyndi aMakizadek.
58005011	Yir be yir ikr whr tana f yir natoon iyong, amma i r ta ka tonong yin kamok yin ren yin ikng zizirik ba.
58005012	Katsak'e, a fa gy ke yin ma sen bsp yin kak'e kyrna, gip be anong yin ru shim yin kak afe a tana ka bsp yin ikr izhizhk'e kayr rif Adakunom. Yin tsr yin nabasang, sang akpakarak naya ba.
58005013	Aner aya nabasang ne na ta nye naya wu ru nye izk igon, an m be kubsp natoon kuse azhl nashn Adakunom ba.
58005014	Naya na ta se kpakarak nye nafe ner aya a tan te anerawe, ner kuri ayong ne ninye itomong be kutrng ba nong ta kyem ren ikng iya i ta nye itek be imaan'e.
58006001	Kamok anong, tu bun i beseng yir izen yir natoon ikr izhizhk'e natoon aYeso ba, nong ta ya yir kashn, ta te yir nerawe. Sang tu bun i kubun yir kama ta nye yir kubsp itak kushishing kuse natoon ikr i tana bn riku be itak ku nink katsak na Adakunom ba,
58006002	itak abatisma be ku nisaas ibk ritek natoon nerawe, ne kudorok ikom be amok afe izen izen.
58006003	Ke Adakunom shim yir t te yir anong.
58006004	ya ta tsang ren akanang'e, tan fok kunang Adakunom, ya a ta gung rice be Kabik Kazhl'e,
58006005	ne ya a t kun fok ritek rif Adakunom ne kukyem kufe kashn.
58006006	Gip be anong t ku bun kama kayr kunk katsak ba. ta ba kyem b ba nong ta shishing kuse ba ba, kamok ba t bun tigak Igon Adakunom ne ku te isum kayr nerawe.
58006007	Kaben kaya ka ta s ashi nizen iya iza tin kpas yr yr ne naya te didng, ne ka s ritek Adakunom.
58006008	Amma kaya amaan agam be ikiritsan tin tang nye ka kpdng'e. Adakunom t fiming kar kayong, ne a shosh nigang'e.
58006009	roneng, yir f yir anong gyrtatan, amma yir nk yir katsak ye yin ta se yin anong ba, yin ta s yin ritek ikr iya i ta nye ife kus kashesh.
58006010	Adakunom won dar a nye gyr ba. A t tiburum be itomong ne kushim yin t ku tonong yin kuya yin t tobok yin nerawe wu ba. Ne i ya yin kashn be kunye anong.
58006011	Yir shim yir koangan kayr yin tu ya kashn be ifeng anong ma nigang'e, nong ta ren yin ye yin t s yin ikng iya yin ta min te yin riy.
58006012	Yir shim yin tu ymng yin ba, amma sor yin kyndi ya a tin nk katsak ne naka tsesek ma ya kutse ikng iya Adakunom ta tsang a f.
58006013	Nizen iya Adakunom t nk kut be Ibrahim, a nye be kushu. A shu be riyerek wu kamok akak tu nar yiik nong a tin nye kushu be wu ba.
58006014	Adakunom f ye, Katsak'e mi ta ka te ritek. Mi ta sak kuri wan t te whr.
58006015	Ibrahim t fa mees riy wu, yong a s ikng iya Adakunom t f ye a tu ku nye'me.
58006016	nerawe shu be aner aya a ta ka nar ba yiik, kushu'ong nye agbang ikng ku gang nanan.
58006017	Adakunom shim a ta tonong aner aya a tana di ikng iya wu t f ye wu shishing ba, yong a shu.
58006018	Adakunom nye anong kayr ikng ifa a tana shishing'e ba, iya Adakunom tanin b abs ba. Yir fe i ta te yir gbashak i ta shan yir ikng iya i t min te yir riy ta tsesek yir. In yiir yir ikng iya i t min te yir riy be agap ma ay yir n kpa nafa.
58006019	Kute riy yir ta be yir na ne ku sak yir ta nyesek yir ana dar inyim ka be agak riy ba, ri n tsik ma nama alaple kayr kaza, kar Adakunom tu ku sor.
58006020	aYeso tsang an tseng azong nashn yir kamok yir. An te agbang atsi ma izen izen kyndi aMakizadek.
58007001	aMakizadek na ne a nye agwm aSalim, a nye atsi Adakunom Agbang Agwm gwm. A nyim be Ibrahim nizen a t ne ni iya gwm kak nitsm, yong a t te kuc.
58007002	Ibrahim t nk ikng izining kayr koakye ikng kusk a t ya nar itsm'e. Ife imsng'e, riyerek wu nye Agwm katsak. Riyerek wu a ta yis ye Agwm aSalim'ong sor ye, Agwm kusor caang.
58007003	A be ada ka ang ba, akak ren izen a t ku tes ka izen iya a t ku ba. A se kyndi Igon Adakunom a ta nye atsi ma izen izen.
58007004	Di yin kuri kuyiik a t be, ma atukop yir Ibrahim t ku nk izining kayr koakye ikng kusk wu t ya nitsm.
58007005	Itsi aMusa f ye kuri aLawi aya a ta te tsi, ta shan izining kayr koakye ikng kusk nerawe, ronyining ba gip. Ba nye kuri Ibrahim gip gyrtatan.
58007006	aMakizadek'e nye kunik kasa aLawi ba. Gip be anong, a shan izining kayr koakye ikng kusk nufe Ibrahim ne a ku te kuc, wu afe Adakunom t f ye a t ku nye ikng ikak.
58007007	Katsak'e, aner aya a ta te akak kuc se yiik ne a ku nar aya a tu ku te'me.
58007008	Nabon aLawi naya na ta shashang izining kayr koakye ikng kusk'ong kus kyndi ribir nerawe. aMakizadek shashang izining kayr koakye ikng kusk gip, rif Adakunom ra tak ye a ku ba.
58007009	Aner ta kyem a f ye aLawi afe a ta shashang ikng izining kayr koakye ikng kusk'ong karang nubk Ibrahim.
58007010	Kamok nizen iya aMakizadek t nyim be Ibrahim, a tsang a tes aLawi ba.
58007011	Ke itomong ritsi kuri ife aLawi ta kyem i sak aner ta te zhl (Kamok atsi ne a nye itsi) t, aky sak a bun a shim ke a s atsi akak a ta se kyndi aMakizadek sang aHaruna ba ?
58007012	Kamok ke a shishing atsi, ne a shishing itsi gip.
58007013	Aya afe a tin f ikr na natoon wu a wuruk nuri kukak zr kuya sang akak ba ta kun nye itomong nar kushosh asidaka ba. HK00256b.tif 
Horace Knowles; The British & Foreign Bible Society aBagadi kunye asidaka
58007014	Katsak'e nye aYeso Agwm gwm yir wuruk kayr kuri aYahuda kuya sang aMusa ta kun nif ikng ikak natoon ba ni itomong ritsi ba.
58007015	Ikng iya yir tin f yir min barang kute kanang, atsi akak kyndi aMakizadek n wuruk.
58007016	Aya a ta te atsi sang natoon ign tukop wu ba, amma natoon kukyem kutser kufe ku tana sor ma izen izen.
58007017	A f ye, Wan nye atsi ma izen izen kyndi aMakizadek.
58007018	A won ign ife imsng'e kamok i be agap ikng ikak ba.
58007019	Itsi aMusa kyem i ta sak ikng ikak ta te zhl ba, iyong ne i sak yir nye yir kanyk ikng itek iya yir tin te yir riy natoon'e nong ta se yir bubarak be Adakunom.
58007020	Adakunom nye anong be kushu wu. Ribir tsi n kayr itomong ba dar kushu.
58007021	Amma aYeso te atsi be kushu nizen Adakunom t f be wu ye, Agwm gwm n shu, a ta bun a shishing riy wu ba. Wan nye atsi ma izen izen.
58007022	Kamok kushu Adakunom na, aYeso tonong ye kushu'me nye katsak ne ku nar ribir'e cei.
58007023	tsi tuse whr gbugbang kamok riku ta ka roon ba kuya kashn be itomong.
58007024	Amma aYeso t sor ma izen izen, kamok ritsi wu t gang zr ba.
58007025	Kamok anong, a ta kyem a shesh koangan a ta gor nufu a ta tseng nufe Adakunom, a ta sor ma izen izen ne a yiir nye aduwa kamok ba.
58007026	Atsi kuri ayong ne a tin rng yir rinn yir. A se zhl dar rinn, a be narik ba, a t kam zr be fe rinn, a t ku tiyiik a ta tseng kayr kaza.
58007027	A se kyndi ribir gbang atsi ba, a nye asidaka koakye katuk kamok rinn wu ni imsng'e nizham a ta ra nye kamok nerawe ba. Amma a nye asidaka kamok rinn nerawe cicr kutak kuzining nizen iya a t nk rice wu.
58007028	Itsi aMusa sak nerawe t raar t te agbang atsi, amma kushu kufe ku t b nama itsi sak Igon'e a ta se zhl te atsi ma izen izen.
58008001	Rice rif yir tin f yir se ye, yir be yir agbang atsi akak kyndi ayong afe a t sonong nubk riya itsik rigwm Adakunom ayiik'e kayr kaza.
58008002	A nye itomong wu nar itomong atsi kazhl'e kufe katsak, kuya Adakunom t nye sang anerawe ba.
58008003	A sak koangan agbang atsi ni itomong nong a ta shosh asidaka ikr be ife ikewum. Iyong ne i sak i ta se gyr ayu gip a ta tsr ikng ikak a ta nk.
58008004	A fa f ye a rusek nazatse, ke a sor atsi ba, kamok ner kak kuse ta nye asidaka kyndi itsi aMusa t f.
58008005	Nizen iya a ta nye itomong nar kaya ka ta nar kuse zhl, a maas ne a kuus nawu ikng iya a ta nye kayr kaza tsek. Iyong ne i sak a t kpam aMusa nizen iya a t tsr a t tar kubur a tanin ya Adakunom iben ye, Sak riy nong ta nye koakye ikng kyndi mi ta ka tonong natoon rifan.
58008006	Itomong aYeso t nye se yiik ne i nar ifuba cei, kyndi kushu kufas wu tin n natite nerawe be Adakunom ta nar kuse yiik. Ikr Adakunom t f ye a ta nye nar kunye itek gip.
58008007	A fa f ye ikng ikak won dar i te titeng be kushu kufe imsng'e ba ke a bun a nye kufe afa'me ba.
58008008	Adakunom di nerawe t taam. Ayong a f ye, Izen saase mi tana ya kushu kufas be ner Isarela be kasa ner aYahuda.
58008009	Iyong ta se kyndi kushu mi t nye be tukop ba nizen iya mi t ka krk ba kubk i t ka tun ba niben aMasar ba, kamok ba yiir kushu mi t nye be ba be katsak ba. Kamok anong Agwm gwm f ye, Mi ta ka kirik ba kama.
58008010	Kushu kuya mi tana nye be kasa ner Isarela na: Agwm gwm f ye nama izen iyong, mi t ka te ba Itsi kayr ay ba ne i bun i zibir nay ba. Mi t te Adakunom ba ne ba te nerawe mi.
58008011	Akak t ba bsp afegbak wu'me ba. Akak t ba bsp aronyining wu'me ne a f ye, Ren Adakunom ba, kamok koangan tin ren, inoon'e ba ashn'e cei.
58008012	Mi t ka rng ba rinn ba, mi t ba yiring be rinn ba ba.
58008013	Kum Adakunom t f ye rif kushu na nye Kufas, kufe imsng'e te kuzen. Ikng iya i tan te izen ta gor ne i gang.
58009001	Kushu kufe imsng'e tonong iren a tana ya Adakunom iben, be kar ku kuya iben anerawe ta nye.
58009002	A tar kubur. A nye kar kusaas apitila be atebur ne abiredi azhl'e nutu kufe imsng'e. A yis kar kayong ye Kar Kazhl'e. BK00278b.tif 
Horace Knowles; The British & Foreign Bible Society Ares a t se nar kuya Adakunom iben gbugbang
58009003	Nama alaple afe afa'me, kutu kukak tuse a t yis ye Kar Ka t nar Kuse Zhl.
58009004	Kar a ta shosh name ikn itek a ta nye be izinariya tuse azong, be akpate kushu a t kis be izinariya. Akpate'me be kures a t nye be izinariya, a tin te naya a t yis ye amanna kayr'e be ishn aHaruna i t funung, ne apf ata afa a tin zibir Itsi Adakunom natoon'e.
58009005	Ikr ikak ifa i t tas amaleka a t yis ye aCerubim se natoon akpate'me, a ti ta nawu nar kurng rinn'e. Amma kyrna, yir ta kyem i f yir ikng ikak natoon ikr'me nyk nyk ba. AB02710b.tif 
John Lear; American Bible Society Akpate kushu kufas natuk
58009006	Nizen iya a t saas ikr na cei anong, ne tsi ra ma n nutu kufe kanu'me, t nye itomong ba.
58009007	Agbang atsi tsek ne a n nutu kufe kayr'e, kutak kuzining koakye riy. Izen iya a ta n ma a n be nask a tana nk kamok rinn wu be riya nerawe t nye kayr kudun kuren.
58009008	Iyu ne i sak Kabik Kazhl'e t tonong ye, an karak kar ka ta nar kuse zhl nizham ba, kum ke kubur'e ru kuse.
58009009	Iyu ti tonong yir ikng ikak kyrna. Iyong ti tonong yir ye asidaka a ta nye yr yr t sak ay anerawe ta te zhl nashn Adakunom ba.
58009010	Ikr'ong a t nye se natoon kuyas be kus ne ku naka kusu. Ikr'ong nye ife kurm tsek iya a tin nye itomong ma nizen iya Adakunom ta shishing koakye.
58009011	Nizen iya aYeso t b, wu ta nye agbang atsi afe ikr itek iya i tan b nakuruk, kubur kuya wu tin nye itomong kayr'e se yiik ne ku nar. Ku nar kubur kuya anerawe ta tar zhl, kubur'ong nye kufe kazatse na ba.
58009012	A n be nask izha ka amung ba. A n nar ka ta nar Kuse Zhl be nask wu kutak kuzining tsek nama a tin s yir kashesh kafe izen izen.
58009013	Nask izha be amung be itong inyak ife a ta man a mis fe rinn'e ta sak ta te zhl nama kurm tsek,
58009014	ke nask ikewum kyndi iyong t sak anerawe te zhl shita nask aYeso Kiristi a? Wu afe a t b kayr Kabik Kazhl'e dar rizik nashn Adakunom, a nk rice wu kamok rinn yir. A ti kam yir be ikr iya i ta bn riku nong i ta ya yir Adakunom afe kutser iben.
58009015	Kamok anong, aKiristi ne a se natite kushu kufas nong as fe a ta ma ka yis ba t shan kutser kufe izen izen kuya Adakunom ta f ye a t nk. Kyrna wu ku nong a t ka shesh ba kayr rinn rife ba t tsang nye kayr kushu kufe imsng'e.
58009016	Ke akak ku a t won kufumung natoon aner a tana ya kutse wu, ma a s ikng i ta tonong ye aner'e n ku katsak'e.
58009017	Kamok a ti nye itomong be kufumung natoon kuya kutse ba, ma ke aner a ta zibir kufumung'e ku. Ke aner'e rusek be kutser, a sen kyem a ninye itomong ba.
58009018	Iyong ne i sak a kyem a ninye itomong be kushu kufe imsng'e dar nask ba.
58009019	Nizen iya aMusa t tak nerawe Itsi, a sok nask inoon inyak ne nafe izha a tin gung be ashi. Ne a sok iwhang kakon kakak a ta yis ye aHisop mak be nakuyng tsamang naseng a ta shumung, a tin mis nask'e natoon kufumung Itsi ne nerawe cicr.
58009020	A f ye, Nask kushu i tan shu yin be Adakunom name naya a t f ye i ra yiir yir.
58009021	aMusa ti mis nask'e natoon kubur'e be ikr iya a tin nye itomong cei gip.
58009022	Katsak'e, Itsi shim ye a ra kusu koakye ikng be nask, kamok ke a nyosong nask ba, a ta kyem a rng rinn ba.
58009023	Nizen iyong, a nye anong be ikr ife i t tas ife kaza nong i t te zhl. Amma ikr kaza'me ta te zhl be asidaka aya a ta nar ayu.
58009024	Kamok sang aKiristi n nar itomong atsi anerawe ta nye i t tas ife kaza ba. A n kayr kaza, azong ne a se nashn Adakunom kamok yir.
58009025	Sang a n kayr kaza a t nk rice wu ne a toos'e kyndi agbang atsi ta ns Nar ka ta Nar Kuse Zhl koakye riy be nask naya sang na ta nye nafu ba.
58009026	A fa f ye aKiristi nye anong, ke an s risam ne a toos'e kum nizen iya a t nye kazatse. A b kutak kuzining tsek nigang'e na, a t nk rice wu asidaka kamok rinn yir.
58009027	Kyndi a tan sak,
58009028	anong ne a nk aKiristi kutak kuzining gip nong a t sor asidaka kusok rinn nerawe whr. A t bun a b ife afa nong a t shesh ya a ta sen ku tor, sang kamok nong a t sok rinn baba ba.
58010001	Itsi nye nawu ikr itek i tana b tsek sang atuk kunik ikr'me ba. Iyong ne isak asidaka aya a t yiir nye'me koakye izen, ay be ay t sak ya a ta bs kuya Adakunom iben ta te zhl ba.
58010002	A fa f ye, Itsi ta kyem i sak nerawe ta te zhl, ke a ba nye asidaka'me akak ba. Ke a rng rinn nerawe kazining tsek, ke ay ba se gak natoon rinn ba baba ba.
58010003	Amma asidaka a t nye'ong yiir iyiring nerawe rinn ba koakye riy tsek.
58010004	Kamok nask amung be izha ta kyem i kusu rinn nigaan'e ba.
58010005	Kamok anong, nizen iya aKiristi t b nazatse, a f ye, Asidaka be kunyesek ikr ne wan shim ba, amma kurm ne wan nye kanyk'e.
58010006	Asidaka a ta shosh ne asidaka kukusu rinn, ne wan ti be riy rikan ba.
58010007	Iyong mi f ye, Mi na, Adakunom mi, mi m b nong mi ta nye ikng iya wan ta shim, kyndi i ta se ni izibir natoon'i, kayr Kufumung rif Adakunom.
58010008	Ni imsng'e, a f ye, Asidaka be kunyesek ikr, ne asidaka kushosh be afe a ta nye kamok rinn, wan ti be riy rikan ba. Itsi ne i f ye a ra nye anong.
58010009	A bun a f ye, Mi na, mi n b ta nye ikng iya wan ta shim. Iyong tonong ye a won kushu kufe imsng'e nong a t ku te kufe afa.
58010010	Be kushim Adakunom ne yir n te yir azhl'e be kunk aYeso Kiristi kyndi asidaka kutak kuzining tsek.
58010011	Koakye katuk atsi nye itomong wu, a nye asidaka ne a toos'e koakye kunom. Gip be anong iyong kyem i kusu rinn ba.
58010012	Amma aKiristi t nye asidaka wu kutak kuzining kamok rinn nerawe, a sonong nubk riya Adakunom.
58010013	Kum nizen iyong a sen tor mudn wu ta te ikng kusak atak wu.
58010014	Kamok a t nye asidaka kutak kuzining, a sak fe a ta te zhl t shining ma izen izen.
58010015	Kabik Kazhl'e f be yir anong gip natoon iyu. Ni imsng a f ye,
58010016	Adakunom f ye, iyu nye kushu mi tana nye be ba. Nama anong mi t ka te ba Itsi mi kayr ay ba ne mi bun i ka zibir ba'me nay.
58010017	A bun a ti barang ye, Mi t ba yiring be rinn ba be amaan kunye ba ba.
58010018	Kum a t mi n rng yir rinn yir, asidaka bu kuse kamok rinn ba.
58010019	Kamok anong, roneng, yir ta kyem i n yir Nar ka ta Nar Kuse Zhl be riy rizining kamok nask aYeso.
58010020	Wu ti karak yir iren ifas iren kutser iya i ta gor ikarak alaple, iyong nye kurm wu a t nk.
58010021	Kum yir ta be yir agbang atsi nasa Adakunom,
58010022	Won tu b yir bubarak be Adakunom be riy rizining, be kunk katsak kamok aYeso ti mis nask wu na agak ay yir. A bun a kusu irm yir be ashi a ta se zhl.
58010023	Won yir tu yiir yir ikng iya yir ta min te yir riy, iya i ta taas yir, kamok wu afe a ta f ye wu tin nye yir ikr na shishing rif wu ba.
58010024	Kamok anong, won yir tu naka tobok yir ne i naka tonong yir kushim be kunye kutek.
58010025	Sang yir tu won dar i nyiis yir kyndi kak tan m ne nye ba. Amma i ban naka tsesek yir, ne i ni barang yir kunye anong kamok yin di yin Kunom'me nye ne kub gbugbarak.
58010026	Asidaka akak ba bun a kuse kamok rinn yir ke yir ya kashn be kunye rinn nama a t min tonong yir katsak'e ba.
58010027	Igak'e ma nye ye, a t tor amok Adakunom kayr ikap kutiim be kurng kufe ku tana ya mudn Adakunom.
58010028	Koangan afe a t gaar kukuus Itsi aMusa ku sang a fok kur riy wu ba, kum ke aner afa ka ataar ayi f ye nye rinn'e.
58010029	Ke itak'e se anong, aky kuri ikng ne yin di yin ye a t nye be ner aya a ta zhsh Igon Adakunom ne nye kpdng be nask na t ku kusu ba kyndi na se zhl ba, a f imaan'e natoon Kabik Kazhl'e kafe ritek Adakunom ?
58010030	Kamok yir ren yir afe a ta f ye, Ku kukarang ikng nye kunaan; mi ne i tu ku karang. A bun a f gbak ye, Agwm gwm t t nerawe wu amok.
58010031	I nye ikng inyim didng anerawe tana kpa nubk Adakunom afe kutser.
58010032	Yiring yin kayr inom kama nama, yin ta s yin akanang Adakunom, yin tsesek yin didng, gip be risam i t s yin.
58010033	Izen ikak a ta te yin nisum nashn nerawe ne a ka tabak yin. Izen ikak, yin shim a ta ka nye yin ikr iyong mak be ya a ta sen ku tabak ba gip.
58010034	Yin tonong yin ya a ta se nitsm kur riy. Yin nye yin riy rikan nizen iya a tin shan ikr yin, kamok yin ren yin ye yin be yin ikr i ta nar iyong ife i tana sor ma izen izen.
58010035	Kamok anong, ikap yin tu te gbrk ba kamok ishorong yin nye igbang'e.
58010036	Tsesek yin, ta s yin ikng iya Adakunom t nk kut ye a t ka nk ke yin nye yin ikng iya wu ta shim.
58010037	A tu won cik tsek, Aya afe a ta saase t b, a t sok izen ba.
58010038	Azhl'e anaan tin sor natoon kunk katsak. Ke a tu bun kama, riy mi t beseng be wu.
58010039	Yir nye yir kuri ya a tana kubun kama ne wei ba, amma yir min nk yir katsak, a min shesh yir.
58011001	Kunk katsak nye ku ni te riy dim ye yir ta s yir ikng iya yir ta min te yir riy dim, iya sang yir ta di yir ba.
58011002	Iyong ne i sak a t kerek ner agbugbang.
58011003	Natoon kunk katsak ne yir ti ren yir ye a nye kazatse be rif Adakunom. Kamok anong, a nye ikr yir t di yir kayr kazatse na be ikr iya sang yir ta di yir be anyisi yir ba.
58011004	Natoon kunk katsak ne aHabila ti nye Adakunom asidaka afe a t nar afe aKayinu. Be anong ne a s kushim Adakunom ye wu nye aner atek nashn Adakunom kamok a shan asidaka wu. aHabila n ku, amma kamok kunk katsak wu a ru f kanu ma kyrna.
58011005	Natoon kunk katsak ne a ti sok aEnok be kutser, a di riku ba. A t tsr, amma a t ku s ba, kamok Adakunom t sok. A t ku kerek ye a nye akak kayr fe a t karp Adakunom riy nizham a t ra ku sok.
58011006	Akak ta kyem a karp Adakunom riy dar kunk katsak ba, kamok koangan ne a b nufu ma a ti nk katsak ye wu kuse, ye a nyesek aya a tu ku tsr be katsak ishorong ba.
58011007	Natoon kunk katsak ne aNuhu ti kpa inyim izhl'e nizen iya a t ku krk kuto natoon ikr wu tan di ba. A nk kukpara ashi a tin shesh fekari wu. Kunk katsak aNuhu sak a tak kazatse rinn ba, aNuhu t sor aya kutse kamok a se gyr nashn Adakunom, kuya a ta s natoon kunk katsak.
58011008	Natoon kunk katsak ne Ibrahim ti fok kut Adakunom a t tseng nar kaya wu t ren ba, nizen iya a t f be wu ye a ra tseng nar ka tana te kafu nashn.
58011009	Natoon kunk katsak ne a ti sor kyndi aner atsen nar kaya Adakunom t f ye a t ku nk, niben ikak. A sor nubur mak Ishaku ne aYakub fe a t te ya kutse ikng iya Adakunom t f ye a t ku nk ba.
58011010	Kamok wu tsang a ni te riy nuwp kuya Adakunom t barak ribor'e a t bun a nk be rice wu.
58011011	Natoon kunk katsak ne Ibrahim ti s igon be rikop wu gip, be aSaratu a t kun tes ba. A ti nk katsak ye Adakunom aya a t tsang a f ye a t ku nk, a tu ku nk igon.
58011012	A san'e be aner azining tsek, afe a ta se kyndi aner aya a tan ku, kyrna an te nerawe whr kyndi adar a ta se naza ka rizk kanu agbang ishng ayi.
58011013	ner na kus cicr kayr kunk katsak ba. Ba shan ikng iya Adakunom ta f be ba ye ta ka nk ba be rice ba ba. Igak ta di gugk tsek ne nye riy rikan. shim ye ba nye tsen nazatse.
58011014	nerawe fe a ta f ikr kuri iyuna tonong kanang ye ba shim kaben kafe rice ba.
58011015	I fa f ye ru t itak kaben kaya ba t ku ne, ke f t ku bun.
58011016	tsang ni te riy ba natoon kaben katek, kafe kaza. Kamok anong, Adakunom fok isum a t ku yis ye Adakunom ba ba, kamok a ma ka nk ba kuwp.
58011017	Natoon kunk katsak ne Ibrahim ti nk Ishaku a t sor asidaka nizen Adakunom t ku bmng. Wu afe a t shan ikng iya Adakunom t tsang a f be wu ye a t ku nye'me, a bun a sen sok asuzr igon wu'me a tin nye asidaka.
58011018	Adakunom tsang a f be wu ye, Wan ta s nabon whr be Ishaku.
58011019	Ibrahim ren ye Adakunom t kyem a dorok kukom, kamok anong, yir ta kyem i f yir ye a s Ishaku nama a ta ku.
58011020	Natoon kunk katsak ne Ishaku ti te aYakub be Isuwa kuc natoon kusor ba.
58011021	Natoon kunk katsak ne aYakub ti te inoon aYusufu kuc nizen a tana ku, a ti fereng natoon ishn wu nong a t ya Adakunom iben.
58011022	Natoon kunk katsak ne aYusufu ti f itak kuwuruk inoon Isarela niben aMasar nizen iya a t b barak a t ku. A f ikng ikak natoon ikup wu.
58011023	Natoon kunk katsak ne atek aMusa t nr ma ifn itaar nama a t ku tes, kamok a di igon'e t kam be ribir'e. t ku teng rigwm gum ba.
58011024	Natoon kunk katsak ne aMusa ti rawu a t ku yis ye igon angas aFiruna nizen iya a t te agbang'e.
58011025	A nar kushim a t s risam be ner Adakunom ingya be a tana fok kusas rinn kayr kaban izen cik.
58011026	A nar kushim a t fok isum kamok aKiristi be a tana sor kayr kurum aMasar, kamok a tsang a ni te riy nishorong wu.
58011027	Natoon kunk katsak ne a ti dorok na aMasar dar inyim riy kubeseng agwm. A tsesek kamok a yrk aya sang anyisi tu kudi ba.
58011028	Natoon kunk katsak ne wu ti yiring be aPasova be kumis nask fan amaleka afe a tana fs inoon imsng'e ta fs nafe ner Isarela.
58011029	Natoon kunk katsak sak ner Isarela tar agbang ishng iseng niben ikoor. Nizen ner aMasar t shim t nye anong ashi tseng be ba.
58011030	Natoon kunk katsak ne abar aZheriko kpas nama ner Isarela t gorok kuwp'e kayr kuks kanataar.

58011033	Kunk katsak sak a t kn ne a ya nerawe iben zr zr nitsm. A t nerawe amok gyr, ne shan ikng iya Adakunom t f ye a ta nk. whn nanu zaki,

58012001	Kamok anong, kum nerawe fe ta kuus rif yir kuse whr ta min gorok yir na, won i tu ku barak yir koakye ikng i tanin tnng yir, be koakye kuni rinn ri ta kyem ri tin te yir afartak zizirik. I naka tsesek yir ta teng yir itsi iya i ta se nashn yir.
58012002	Won tin sak yir anyisi na aYeso wu ne a ta nye ritin kunk katsak yir ne a nye aner aya a tana sak kunk katsak yir tanan mumak. A tsesek kayr risam riku wu kamok ikng riy rikan i ta se nashn. A fok isum riku wu natoon kukon ba. Kyrna a se nusonong nubk riya itsik rigwm Adakunom.
