58012005	Ka yin n tiburum yin be rif kutsesek yin kuya Adakunom ta nye, a ta ka yis yin ye inoon wu a? Ye, Igon'i, tu zhsh kunees kuya Agwm gwm ta ka nye'me ba. Ke a ta tigba, a ta ka te gbrk ba,
58012006	kamok Agwm gwm nees koangan afe wu ta shim, ne a nees koangan afe wu ta sok ye a nye igon wu.
58012007	Na ka tsesek yin risam yin ta sen s yin'e kamok kayr risam ne a ta ka nees yin. Be anong ne Adakunom nye be yin kyndi inoon wu. Igon kanyaka ne atek wu tu ku nees ba ?
58012008	Ke a ta nees yin kyndi a ta nees inoon ba, i nye ye yin nye yin inoon rikuna sang atuk inoon kasa'me ba.
58012009	Yir be yir da yir fe kurm ya a tin nees yir, iyong ne i sak yir ta ka di yir ba yiik. Fa gy ke yir tiyiik yir Ada yir afe Kabik a ta be kutser ne i nar yir aa?
58012010	da yir fe kurm ti nees yir nizen cik niren iya ba ta di i se gyr. Amma Adakunom ti nees yir nong as kunees'e tin s mo yir t s yir kanu kafe yir kayr kuzhl wu.
58012011	Koakye kunees r nizen a ta nye kunees'e, amma nigang'e ner ta ka nees ba'me sor kusor kutek ne te zhl.
58012012	Kamok anong, won ikap yin be akuur yin tu te gbugbong.
58012013	Kuus yin iren itek nong fan kutak kuya sang kuta nye kutser baŔ bu te kukun'e.
58012014	Nye yin koakye ikng yin tana kyem a nye yin nong ta sor yin caang be nerawe cicr ne i sor yin zhl kamok aner akak ta kyem a di Agwm gwm ba, sang ke a se zhl ba.
58012015	Sak yin riy fan akak bu ni wei ni ritek Adakunom. Sang tu won yin akak tin wuruk kayr yin be amaan kuse nong a ta sak kak ta wei ba.
58012016	Sang tu won yin akak tu kuus nyining kpdng ka a tu se dar inyim Adakunom kyndi Isuwa t sok rishn wu a t rp acek wu'me kamok naya kakereng kazining ba.
58012017	Nama a t nye anong, a shim atek t ku te kuc ma be nanyisi, a s ba, kyndi yin ta ren yin. Kamok a shim a t shishing ikng iya wu t nye, a ra kyem'me ba.
58012018	Yin n s yin rifan a tana kyem a ra be kubk ba, ka kurng kuya ku ta ya didng, ka kar te whi ne ann nyim whi,
58012019	ka rigba, ka kut ku ta f kanu. Kut ku t f kanu'ong sak fe a t fok nye izong ye sang a t ba f be ba ba.
58012020	kyem tsesek be ikng iya a t f be ba ba ye, Ko a fa f ye ikewum ne i ra rifan'e, a ta ra barak be ata.
58012021	Ikng iya ba t di'me se zhirim ma aMusa f ye, Kurm'i tiim be inyim.
58012022	Amma yin n s yin rifan aSihiyona ri ta nye aUshalima afe kaza, agbang kuwp Adakunom afe kutser ne kanyim riy rikan maleka whrr.
58012023	Yin n b yin kayr fikuus, ya a ta nye inoon nafe ife imsng'e ya ayerek ba ta se nuzibir kayr kaza. Yin n b yin nufe Adakunom aya a tana t nerawe cicr amok ne nufe nabik ner aya a ta se zhl, ya a ta shining gyr.
58012024	Yin n b yin nufe aYeso a ta igaas kushu kufas, ne nufe nask a ta mis na ta be ritek ne na nar nask aHabila.
58012025	Sak yin riy, tu rayin aner a ta f rif na ba. Ke kyem wher nizen ba t raba aner aya a t ka tigba ba nazatse ba, yir ta nye yir an ta wher yir ke yir ti nang yir kama ni wu afe a tin tigba yir naza ?
58012026	Nizen iyong, Kut Adakunom zuur kazatse. Amma kyrna a bun a nk kut ye, Mi ta bun i zuur kazatse kutak kuzining gbak, sang kazatse tsek ba, amma cei be kaza gip.
58012027	Rif a ta f ye, kutak kuzining'ong tonong ye, a ta turung ikr iya a ta zuur'me; i ta nye ikr iya Adakunom t nye, kamok ikr'me ikak iya sang a t kyem zuur ba, kuse.
58012028	Kamok anong kum yir tanan n yir kayr rigwm riya sang a tana zuur ba, won i tu tonong yir riy rikan, ne iya yir Adakunom iben kyndi wu ta shim, be kuyiik ne ikap kutiim,
58012029	kamok Adakunom nye kurng ku ta ya nar.
58013001	Ya yin kashn be ku naka shim kyndi aner be ronyining,
58013002	Sang tu won kushashang yin tsen ba, kamok be anong kak ti shan maleka dar kuren ba.
58013003	Yiring yin be ya a ta se nitsm, nye yin be ba kyndi yin se yin mak. Yiring yin be ya a ta sen ku nk ba risam, nye yin be ba kyndi yin se yin mak.
58013004	Koangan ra tor kuwnng yiik, koangan ra tor kuwnng wu zhl'e, kamok Adakunom t t aner a t nye rikuna be ya a nye kpdng amok.
58013005	Kam yin be kuse kumak shim itsm, ne i ni fan yin nikng iya yin ta be yin, kamok Adakunom f ye, Mi ta ka won ba, ko cik mi ta ka barak nigaan'e ba, ko cik.
58013006	Iyong ne i sak yir ta kyem i f yir be riy rizining ye, Agwm gwm nye aner a tin tobok, mi ta fok inyim ba. Anerawe tin nye ikng ikak ?
58013007	Yiring yin be kk kashn yin ya a ta ka tak yin rif Adakunom. Yrk yin kuri kusor kuya ba ta sor nong ta kuus yin kunk katsak ba.
58013008	aYeso Kiristi afe kure be afe katuur ne afe izen izen se azining, a shishing nigaan'e ba.
58013009	Sang tu won yin kubsp kuduk ta krk ay yin ba. I se gyr ay yir ta s agap kayr ritek Adakunom sang be kukuus itsi kuya naya ba. Kukuus itsi kuya naya ti barang ner aya a ta kuus itsi iyong ikng ikak ba.
58013010	Yir be yir abagadi aya afe, afe a ta nye asidaka nubur tanan kyem ya ikng ikak azong ba.
58013011	Agbang atsi n be nask ikewum kayr kar ka ta nar kuse zhl kamok rinn nerawe, a shosh rinam ikewum'e nama kuwp.
58013012	Anong ne aYeso di risam nama kuwp, nong a ta sak nerawe wu ta te zhl kamok nask wu.
58013013	kamok anong i wuruk yir nong ta be yir nufe nama kuwp, nong ta fok yir isum kyndi wu t fok.
58013014	Yir be yir kuwp kufe ku tana sor ma izen izen aze nazatse na ba, amma yir min te yir riy nuwp kuya ku tana b.
58013015	Kamok anong, won tu kerek yir Adakunom kayr aYeso be abom nanu yir. Iyong ta sor asidaka aya i tana nk yir, tu ku kerek yir ne i tiyiik yir riyerek wu.
58013016	Sang tu won ku naka tobok yin ne i naka nye yir ritek ba, kamok riy Adakunom karp be asidaka kuri ayong.
58013017	Kuus yin ikng iya kk kashn yin ta f, ne i nye yin ikng a ta f be yin, kamok ba ne a ti sak riy natoon yin kamok a ta tak kut itomong ba katuk kakak. Ka fok yin ba kuto nong itomong ba ta ka be ba ifeng sang kyndi acer ba. Ke itomong'e ta sor ba acer, iyong ta ka barang mo yin ikng ikak ba.
58013018	Nye yin aduwa kamok yir. Kutrng riy yir se gyr, yir shim ta nye yir ikng iya i ta se gyr kayr koakye iren.
58013019	Mi shim yin ta nye yin aduwa ne i yiring yin be mi nong Adakunom bun a b be mi nufe yin.
58013020	Won Adakunom aya a ta nyesek kameneng riy, aya a t dorok aYeso nurk kamok nask kushu kufas, won wu afe a ta nye afek atek,
58013021	ta ka nk yin koakye ikng i ta nye itek, nong ta nye ikng iya wu ta shim. Won wu tu nye ikng iya i tu ku se gyr be yir kayr aYeso Kiristi. Won kuyiik tu sor kufu ma izen izen. Anong!
58013022	Kusuk yin roneng, sok yin itabak mi ta ka zibir yin'e na be riy ricaang kamok mi ta zibir yin'e cik tsek.
58013023	Mi shim ta ka tak yin ye an tun aronyining yir aTimoti nitsm. Ke wu gum b, mi ta b mak be wu nong ta ka di yin.
58013024	Ku nye shou yin kk kashn yin, be azhl'e cicr. fe a ta se niben Italiya ta nye yin ashou.
58013025	Ritek Adakunom se mak be yin cicr.
59001001	aYakubu asam Adakunom ne afe Agwm agwm yir aYeso Kiristi, mi nye nerawe irem kusk be afa aya a ta te shaam kayr kazatse ashou.
59001002	Aroneng, sok yin be riy rikan, izen iya yin n yin ni iriri kubmng.
59001003	Kamok yin ren yin ye, kubmng kunk katsak yin ta sak yin tin barang yin Ku naka tsesek.
59001004	Ku naka tsesek yin ta tseng ma nigang'e, nong as yin ta shining yin, ne kyem yin sang ta raar yin nikeng ikak ba.
59001005	Ke akak yin be kukyem kuren ikeng ba, a ra rip Adakunom, afe a ta nk koangan washak. A tu ku nk be riy rizining sang be ay afa ba.
59001006	Amma izen iya ne a rip, a ra nk katsak dim dar agak riy, kamok aner aya a ta be agak riy se kyndi agung ashi ishng kuwun ta kap.
59001007	Aner ayong tu di ye wu ta s ikeng ikak nufe Adakunom ba.
59001008	A nye aner a ta nye ikeng be riy gak, a be kutrng kuzining natoon koakye wu ta nye ba.
59001009	Aroneng aya a ta se ni mees rice, a ra nye riy rikan ni itsik igbang'e wu tin se.
59001010	Amma aner aya a ta nye arum, a ra nye riy rikan kayr itsik ihiir'e wu tin se.
59001011	Kunom tar ne ku joosh ne ku sak naya koor, ne ato'me kpas ne kusas'e gang. Anong ne arum ta kpa nizen ife a ta tsang a tseng ne a tsr kutser wu.
59001012	Aner awng nye aner aya a tana tsesek kayr kubmng, kamok ke a na ka tsesek kayr kubmng'e, a ta se ribong kutser riya Adakunom ta tsang a nisak natoon fe a tu ku shim.
59001013	Izen iya ne wan n nubmng, sang tu f ye, “Adakunom sen ni bmng ba,” kamok a bmng Adakunom be imaan'e ba, ka wu bmng akak ba.
59001014	Amma koangan ne a n nubmng, ke a ti te riy wu na amaan ikr wu ta shim, ne ikr'me sok riy wu.
59001015	T, izen iya ne kushim riy wu nyeseng be agap, a ta yiir nye rinn, ke ri rasak didng, ri ta bn be riku.
59001016	Aroneng'i, tu won a ta ka wrk yin ba.
59001017	Koakye kuri ritek ne kunk kutek kuya ku ta ne naza se gyr nufe Ada afe a ta be akanang aya a ta be kaben, aya afe sang a ta shishing kyndi nawu ta sesek ba.
59001018	Wu ne a di a tin kasa yir a tin tes yir kayr rif katsak, nong yir ta se yir kyndi kutes kufe imsng'e kayr ikr wu ta nye.
59001019	Aroneng'i atek, yiring yin iyu; koangan ra se gbashak nufok rif, amma ne se whiwh nif kanu, be kubeseng riy.
59001020	Kamok kubeseng riy bn kusor kujel'e Adakunom ta shim ba.
59001021	Kamok anong, kam yin be ikr kurisik ne iriri anyas nong ta mees yin rice ta shan yin rif a tan tuus nay yin, riya ri tana ka shesh yin.
59001022	Tu foos yin rif'me tsek ne i wk yin rice yin ba, amma ninye yin itomong.
59001023	Aner aya ne a foos yin rif'me amma a ti nye itomong ba, a se kyndi aner aya a ta yrk kanyisi wu kayr amadobi.
59001024	Nama a ta naka yrk ne a tseng ne a wor a tiburum be kuse kanyisi wu.
59001025	Amma aner aya ne a yrk itsi iya i ta se gyr ife i ta bn kusor nk, ne a yiir kunye anong, a tiburum ikeng wu ta fok ba, amma a yiir nye'me, a tu ku te awng natoon ikeng wu ta nye.
59001026	Ke akak sok rice wu ye wu ren Adakunom ne a ra kyem a yiir kanu wu ba, a wk rice wu, i nye ye kuren Adakunom wu sor ikeng ikak ba.
59001027	Kuren katsak Adakunom kuya Ada yir Adakunom ta sok ye kunye kujel'e nye, ku nisak riy ni nakpiin be akumung kayr risam ba, ne i yiir rice wan fan kazatse ba ka sak ta wondar I se jel.
59002001	Aroneng'i kyndi afe kunk katsak na aYeso Kiristi Agwm Agwm yir, afe kuyiik, tu tonong yin kushim rice ba.
59002002	Ke nye ye aner akak be nar kanyim yin be nanarang nafe itsm didng ne ares atek, ne aner rizor akak gip be kayr'e be agyr ares wu.
59002003	Ke yin ti sak yin riy na aner a ta te ares atek ame, ne f yin be wu ye, “Kar kusonong katek na kamok wan,” amma ne yin f yin be aner rizor ame ye, “Wan nyeseng azong ka sonong kaben nashn'i.”
59002004	Iyu tonong ye yin tonong yin kushim rice aa? Yin t yin amok be amaan kut aa?
59002005	Aroneng'i aya mi ta shim, wesek yin kuto, i se ye Adakunom kasa fe rizor nashn kazatse na nong a ta te arum kayr kunk katsak ne aya a ta ya kutse rigwm Wu ta nye kanyk'e natoon aya a tu ku shim aa?
59002006	Amma yin jsh yin fe rizor. Sang rum ne a ka mr yin ne tsees be yin natu amok aa?
59002007	Sang ba ne nye aya a ta beseng riyerek wu riyiik'e, riya a ta ka yis yin mo aa?
59002008	Ke yin sak yin agbang itsi iya i ta se kayr Kufumung Adakunom nay ye, “Shim aner agbak wan kyndi rice wan.” I se gyr anong.
59002009	Amma ke yin tonong yin kushim rice, i nye ye yin nye yin rinn, ne akak tn yin amok kyndi afe a ta shorop Itsi.
59002010	Koangan ne a tin sak riy nitsi, amma a ta won izining kayr'e, a shorop ribir'e cicr.
59002011	Kamok wu afe a ta f ye, “Sang tu nye rikuna ba,” wu ne a bun a f ye, “Sang tu fr akak ba.” Ke wan nye rikuna ba, amma wan fr akak k, i sor wan shorop Itsi.
59002012	F kanu ne i nye kyndi aya a tana ku t ba amok be Itsi iya i tana bn kusor nk.
59002013	Kamok koangan a ta se dar kur riy, Adakunom tu ku t amok dar kur riy. Kur riy be kusas riy natoon amok.
59002014	Aroneng, aky se gyr azong ? Ke anerawe nye di wu n nk katsak, a ra nye itomong i ta tonong kunk katsak'e ba ? Kunk katsak'ong tu ku shesh a?
59002015	Ke nye ye aronyining ka angasnyining akak se dar ares ne naya kuya.
59002016	Ne akak yin f be wu ye, “Tseng, mi ta mok ritek, te ares ta joosh ne iya naya ta wha,” a ra nye ikeng ikak natoon kudaam wu ba, i nye aky itek ne wu nye ?
59002017	Anong ne kunk katsak gip ke a ti barang be kunye itomong ba, ne kunk katsak'e sor ikeng ikak ba.
59002018	Amma akak ta f ye, “Wan be kunk katsak; mi be kunye itomong.” Ni tonong kunk wan dar kunye itomong, nong mi ta ka tonong kunk katsak'i be itomong'a mi ta nye.
59002019	Wan nk katsak ye Adakunom azining ne a kuse a? I se gyr! Amaan nabik gip a ti nk katsak anong ne inyim.
59002020	Wan afunam akak, wan shim a ta ka tonong ye kunk katsak dar kunye itomong sor ikeng ikak ba a?
59002021	Adakunom sok atukop yir Ibirahim ye a nye ajel'e kamok ikeng iya wu t nye nizen a ta sen nk igon wu Ishaku natoon abagadi aa?
59002022	yin di yin kunk katsak wu, be itomong wu, ta tseng mak, ne kunk katsak wu shining be ikeng iya wu ta nye.
59002023	Ne rif Kufumung Adakunom shining riya ri ta f ye, “Ibirahim ti nk katsak na Adakunom yong kunk katsak wu sak a tu di jel, ne a ku yis ye aferim Adakunom.”
59002024	yin di yin anerawe ye a se gyr kamok ikeng iya wu ta nye, sang I se kamok kunk katsak wu tsek ba.
59002025	Anong ne a di aRahap a ta nye inyak agwm gip ye a se gyr kamok ikeng iya wu ta nye nizen a ta nk atom kar kuks ne a ku tun ba niren ikak zr a?
59002026	Kamok anong, kyndi kurm ta se dar isong nye kukom, anong ne kunk katsak dar kutonong itomong nye kukom'e.
59003001	Aroneng, tu te yin afe kubsp anerawe'me wher ba, kamok yin ren yin ye yir afe i ta bsp nerawe'me, yir ne a tin t yir amok be agap ne nar.
59003002	Yir cei i taam yir niren zr zr, ke akak taam nikeng iya wu ta f ba, i nye ye wu se ryong, a ta kyem a nisak riy rice wu cei.
59003003	Nizen iya ne yir tin te yir atsm nanu itsaap nong se i tin fok yir kuto. Yir ta kyem nye yir ikeng iya yir ta shim yir be itsaap'e.
59003004	ninye yin kumaas be kukpara ashi, ku nye kugbang'e didng gyrtatan, kuwun ku tosom be agap, amma be kaban kutsm kakak aner kutsip'e ti kirik, ne a tseng'e nar wu ta shim.
59003005	Anong ne irem se, i nye ihiir'e kayr ikap kurm. Amma i ta kyem i fo rigwm. T, a ta kyem a shosh agbang kuci be kaban kurong.
59003006	Irem gip i nye kurong, i nye ritin amaan kunye kayr ikap kurm, i beseng aner, i te kutser anerawe kayr kasa kurong. Wu be rice wu i tana ka te kayr kasa kurong.
59003007	Peer iriri ikewum, nanon, ikeng i ta tseng be nafa be ikr kayr ashi te caang, a ma ka sak ba a ta te caang dar inyim anerawe.
59003008	Aner akak ta kyem a nees irem wu ba, i nye amaan ikeng dar kurn, i be amaan nadm.
59003009	Be irem'e ne yir ti tiyiik yir Adakunom yir, be wu ne yir bun i fiming yir anerawe, aya a ta ma ka nye ba di Adakunom.
59003010	Kanu kazining a tin kerek be kanu'me ne a ti fiming. Aroneng'i, i tu se anong ba.
59003011	ashi atek ne ashi itk ta kyem a wk nishng izining a?
59003012	Aroneng, ritin atafo ta kyem rites ica rifar a? Ka ritin anap ta kyem ri tes agba atafo ? Anong ne itop ashi itk ta kyem turung ashi atek ba.
59003013	Angan ne a be kukyem ne a ren ikeng kayr yin ? Won a tu tonong be kuse wu kutek, be kunye kutek ne kumees rice riya ri ta ne kayr kukyem.
59003014	Amma ke wan yiir amaan rishishim ne kushim rice kayr riy wan, tin nye kuka natoon'e ka ta ton katsak'e ba.
59003015	“Kukyem” kuyu ne naza ba. amma kazatse, kuse jel ba, kunye kufe amaan kabik.
59003016	Kamok kar a ta se rishishim be kushim rice, azong ne wan ta se ashangam be amaan kunye.
59003017	Amma kukyem ku ta ne naza, nimsng'e cicr se jel ne kushim kutek be kuto akak, ne kumees rice, be kur riy kunye kutek kufe katsak dar kushim rice.
59003018	fe a ta b be kusor acaang, aya a ta tuus kayr acaang ne a ta nye ishamang ijel'e.
59004001	Aky ne bs be kuren, be riwng nanu kayr yin ? I bs kamok ikr yin ta shim yin iya i ta nye itsm kayr ay yin aa?
59004002	yin shim yin ikeng ikak amma i s yin ba, yin fs ne shim yin ikr ikak didng, amma yin ta kyem s yin ikeng iya yin ta shim yin ba. Yin ras yin riwng ne krng yin, yin s yin ba, kamok yin ta rip yin Adakunom ba.
59004003	Izen iya yin rip yin i s yin ba, kamok yin rip yin be amaan kutrng nong ta wei yin ikeng iya yin ta s yin nikr rice yin.
59004004	yin fe i ta nye yin rikuna, yin ren yin ye rifertseng be kazatse nye rimudn be Adakunom aa? Aner aya ne kasa a ta nye rifertseng be kazatse a te amudn Adakunom.
59004005	Ke yin di yin ye Kufumung Adakunom f tsek ye Kabik wu ta sak ka ta sor kayr yir, be rishishim didng a?
59004006	Amma a ti barang ku ni nye yir ritek, kamok anong ne rif Adakunom f ye, “Adakunom shim afe kuka ba, amma a nye afe a ta mees rice ba ritek.”
59004007	Nk yin Adakunom rice yin, kam yin be Ishetan nong wu ta kam be yin.
59004008	B yin bubarak be Adakunom nong wu ta b bubarak be yin, kusu yin ibk yin, yin fe rinn, nye yin ay yin tu te jel, yin fe agak ay.
59004009	Nye yin riym ne daam yin, tus yin, shishing rimanang yin ri tu te riym, riy rikan yin tu te riy riwe.
59004010	Mees yin rice yin nashn Kunom Wu ta ka tiyiik yin.
59004011	roneng, tu f amaan ikeng natoon fudang wan ba, koangan ne a ti f amaan ikeng natoon aronyining wu, ka a tu t amok ayi, i nye a ti f amaan ikeng natoon rif Adakunom ne a ni t amok natoon'e. Ke wan t itsi amok, i nye ye wan kuus itsi'me ba.
59004012	Adakunom tsek ne a nye afe kunk itsi be kut amok. Wu ne a kyem a shesh ne a fr. Amma wan nye angan tana t aner agbak wan amok ?
59004013	Kyrna wesek yin kuto, yin fe i ta f yin ye, “Katuur ka natson yir ta tseng yir na agbang kuwp kuyu ka kukya nong ta se nye yir riy rizining azong ta ya yir kashn be rijik ne i se yir itsm.”
59004014	Sang yin ren yin ikeng i tana nye natson gum ba, kutser yin se an ? Yin se yin kyndi ishikr na ta wuruk nizen cik ni na bun na wei.
59004015	Gyr ke yin f yin ye, “Ke Adakunom shim, yir ta sor yir ne i nye yir iyu be ikya.”
59004016	Kyndi i ta se, yin nye yin kuka ne i kok yin rice naza, Cicr iriri kuka nye imaan'e.
59004017	Koangan afe a ta ren ikeng itek i ta se gyr ke a nye, a ra nye ba, i sor rinn.
59005001	Kyrna wesek yin kuto, yin arum, tos ni tang yin ikun kamok amaan risam a tana ka s yin.
59005002	Kurum yin nru, ne ajiji n ya ares yin.
59005003	Atsm yin a ta yis ye azinariya be azurfa nbeseng. Kubeseng ba ta f rif natoon yin, ne a ya rinam kurm yin kyndi kurong. Yin tusung yin kurum kayr inom igang'e.
59005004	Di yin, itsm yin ta gaar kukarang yin fe a ta ka nye yin itomong nak yin ta sen tos natoon yin. Nanak fe itomong ishamang'e n tseng nato Ada Adakunom.
59005005	yin n sor yin kayr kusas nazatse ne nye yin ikeng ay yin ta shim. Yin sak yin rice yin i ta ns yin kamok kunom kutsk anerawe.
59005006	yin n t yin aner a ta se dar rinn amok, ne ku fr yin aya a ta ka ra yin.
59005007	roneng, kamok anong na ka tsesek yin ma nizen kunom tana b. Yin di yin aner ikap ta tor rik ta te naya natek be a ta na ka tsesek kum be iza kushik ma ishamang.
59005008	yin gip, na ka tsesek yin ne nyeseng yin be agap, kamok kub Kunom mb bubarak.
59005009	roneng, tu f yin iriri rif nace yin ba, ke anong ba, a ta ka t yin amok. Aner ku t amok'e mb bubarak.
59005010	roneng, di yin Ku naka tsesek nizen risam, di yin ner kuzarap aya a ta f rif riyerek Kunom.
59005011	Kyndi yin ta ren yin, yir sok yir fe a ta na ka tsesek fe awng. Yin n fok yin itak yin itak Ku naka tsesek Ayuba ne di yin ikeng iya Adakunom tu ku nye'me ni gang'e. Ada Adakunom be kur riy ne kuse kutek didng.
59005012	Aroneng'i nama anong, tu shu yin ba, be kaza ka kazatse ka be ikeng ikak zr ba, won a “Ei” yin tu sor a “ei,” ne a “Wayo” yin tu sor a “wayo,” ke a ta ka t yin amok
59005013	Akak yin se nudaam a? A ra nye aduwa. Riy akak n karp a? Won a tu bom abom ku tiyiik Adakunom.
59005014	Akak yin kuse a ta nye atser ba, kayr yin a? A ra yis ashn ikilisiya nong a tu ku nye aduwa ne ni kon name niwu kayr riyerek Agwm gwm yir aYeso.
59005015	Aduwa a ta nye kayr kunk katsak sak aner kurk'e ta te atser. Agwm gwm tu ku dorok. Ke a tsang a nye rinn, a tu ku rng'e.
59005016	Kamok anong naka taas yin rinn yin, ne i naka nye yin aduwa nong a se ta te yin atser. Aduwa aner ajel'e be agap didng ne nye itomong.
59005017	Iliya a nye anerawe kyndi yir ana tsek, a nye aduwa be katsak ye sang iza tu kpa ba, ne iza kpa niben'e ba, ife ay ataar be ribir.
59005018	A bun a nye aduwa, ne Adakunom sak iza kpa, ne kaben te naya.
59005019	roneng'i, ke akak yin won katsak'e, ne akak yin kubun be wu.
59005020	Yiring yin iyu, koangan ne a tu bun be aner rinn na amaan kunye wu, a tu ku shesh riku ne a kis rinn ri ta se gaan.
60001001	Mi, aBitrus, amanzo aYeso aKiristi yin ya i ta se yin kyndi tsen kayr kazatse, ya a ta ka kasa yin i ta te yin shaam koakye niben aPontus be aGalati ne aKapadokiya be Asiya ne niben aBitiniya.
60001002	Yin ya Adakunom a ta nye Ada ne a t ka kasa yin kayr kanyk wu gbugbang, a bun a t ka sak yin nong yin ta te yin zhl'e kamok kukyem Kabik Kazhl'e. Kunyek wu nye nong i t fok yin aYeso Kiristi kuto ne kumis nask wu. Ritek ne kameneng riy Adakunom se mak be yin didng.
60001003	Nakerek nye nafe Adakunom ne a nye Ada Agwm gwm yir aYeso Kiristi, wu ne a r riy yir didng a ta bun a ti dorok yir be riku aYeso Kiristi nurk kute riy kufe katsak kamok kudorok aKiristi nurk.
60001004	Be anong ne yir ti te yir riy nong ta ya yir kutse kuya sang ku tana gang ka ku ta beseng ka ku t te rish ba, amma kuya a ta ka sak yin'e kayr kaza.
60001005	Yin aya kamok kunk katsak yin, Adakunom kayr agbang kukyem wu ta ka fek yin ma yin s yin kashesh na a tana tun katuk igang'e nong koangan t di.
60001006	Kamok anong, nye yin riy rikan didng, katsak yin se yin kayr riy riwe kyrna gyrtatan kamok iriri kubmng kuya ku ta ka ss yin.

61001001	Mi aSiman Bitrus, asam aYeso aKiristi ne i bun i nye amanzo wu, yin ya i ta s yin agbang kunk katsak kyndi yir ta ma s yir kamok kuse kutek Adakunom yir aya a ta nye Aner Kashesh yir aYeso Kiristi.
61001002	Adakunom ta ka barang mo yin ritek ne kameneng riy wu didng kayr kuren Adakunom ne Agwm gwm yir aYeso.
61001003	Adakunom kayr kuyiik wu ti nk yir koakye ikng iya yir ta tsr yir nong ta sor yir kuri kusor kuya wu tana fok kusas'e. Yir s yir ikr na cicr kamok yir ta ren yir Adakunom a tin yis yir kayr kuyiik be kuse kutek wu.
61001004	Kamok ikr iyong ne wu ti nk yir gbang ikr i ta be kuyiik didng iya wu t tsang a f ye wu tin nk yir, nong ta gung yir rice be kuri kuse Adakunom nong ta wher yir amaan kuse kazatse na ku ta bs'e kayr ay yir.
61001005	Kamok anong, nye yin koakye i tana kyem i nye yin nong tin barang yin ritek natoon kunk katsak yin, ne i ni barang yin kuren natoon ritek yin.

61001010	Kamok anong roneng, nye yin koakye ife yin tana kyem i nye yin nong ta tonong yin ye Adakunom ma ka yis yin ne a ka kasa yin. Ke yin nye yin anong yin ta kpa yin ba, ko cik.
61001011	Be anong ne a t ka shan yin ibk ifa kayr rigwm Agwm gwm rif izen izen rif Aner Kashesh yir.
61001012	Kamok anong mi ta yiir kuka yiring yin ikr na, mi ren yin tsang i ren yin gyrtatan, yin nyeseng yin be agap natoon katsak yin ta be yin.
61001013	Mi di ye i se gyr ta yiir kuka yiring yin ikr na kum mi ta rusek nazatse na be kutser,
61001014	kamok mi ren mi m b barak ta won kazatse na, kyndi Agwm gwm yir aYeso Kiristi tin tonong kanang.
61001015	Mi ta nye koakye mi tana kyem i nye nong as ta di yin yiir kuyiring yin be ikr na nizen iya mi ta se kayr kazatse na ba.
61001016	Nizen iya yir t ka taas yin itak kukyem ne kub Agwm gwm yir aYeso Kiristi, sang yir t taas yin atin afe kashn kak t f ba. Wayo, yir di yir agbang kuyiik wu be anyisi yir.
61001017	Kamok wu s kuyiik be nakerek nufe Adakunom a ta nye Ada nizen iya yir ta fok agbang ayiik kut Ada Adakunom ye, Ayu na ne a nye Igon'i, kafe mi ta shim, mi ta fok kusas wu makiyi.
61001018	Yir be rice yir, yir fok yir kut'ong ku ta ne naza nizen iya yir ta se yir mak be wu natoon kawhanang Kazhl'e.

61001020	Agbang ikng mi ta shim yin tu ren yin nye ye kuzarap kukak kuse a t zibir kuya ner kuzarap akak t zibir be kutrng ba tsek ba.
61001021	Kamok kuzarap nye ikng iya i ta ne kayr riy anerawe tsek ba, amma Kabik Adakunom kaya ka t nk kayr ay ba ne ka sak nerawe t f ikr iya ba t shan nufe Adakunom.
61002001	Kyndi ner kuzarap fe abs t ku se kayr nerawe Adakunom'me gbugbang, anong ne ner kubsp fe abs kak t wuruk kayr yin. ta bs be kubsp kukak kyn, ta bsp nerawe abs ma t ku beseng ba ma nerawe t gaar Agwm gwm aya a t ka shesh ba. Ku nye anong ta sak ba be rice ba ta kpa zizirik.

62001001	Yir sen ka zibir yin rif na natoon aYeso Kiristi aya a ta nye Rif Kutser. A tuse kum nizen iya a t nye kazatse. Yir fok yir rif wu ne yir ku di yir, yir t ku yrk yir be anyisi yir ne yir ku ras yir be ibk yir.
62001002	Wu ne a nye aya a ta nyesek kutser, a b nufe nerawe, yir t ku di yir. Kamok anong yir sen ka taas yin rif na natoon wu aya a ta nyesek kutser kufe izen izen. A se mak be Adakunom a ta nye Ada'me, amma Adakunom sak yir t ku di yir.
62001003	Yir sen ka taas yin rif natoon aya yir t di yir ne yir ku fok yir, nong as yir t te yir kyndi aner azining ne kusor yir se kuzining be Adakunom a ta nye Ada'me ne Igon wu aYeso Kiristi.

62001007	Amma ke yir tseng yir na akanang kyndi Adakunom ta nye akanang, ne i gung yir rice be koangan afikuus, ne nask Igon wu aYeso ni kusu yir rinn yir nong t te yir zhl.

62001009	Amma ke yir taas yir Adakunom rinn yir, a tin rng yir'e kamok wu be katsak ne a be kuse kutek, ne a ni kusu yir kayr koakye ikng imaan'e.
62001010	Ke yir f yir ye yir n nye yir rinn ba, i nye ye yir sok yir ye Adakunom be abs ne rif wu kuse kayr ay yir ba.

62003024	Koangan afe a ta kuus ikng iya itsi Adakunom t f a se kayr Adakunom'me ne Adakunom se kayr wu. Yir ren yir ye Adakunom se mak be yir be Kabik Kazhl'e a tin nk yir.
62004001	Ar, yin aya mi ta shim, tin nk yin katsak natoon koakye kuri kabik ba, bmng yin kuri nabik'e nizham nong ta di yin ka na ne nufe Adakunom'me. Kamok ner kuzarap fe abs kuse whr nazatse kyrna.
62004002	Iren yin tana ren yin ye Kabik'e nye kafe Adakunom nye, ke aner'e f ye aYeso b kayr kurm i nye ye Kabik'e nye kafe Adakunom.
62004003	Ke aner'e f ye sang aYeso b kayr kurm ba, i nye ye kabik'e nye kafe Adakunom ba. Aner kuri ayong be kabik kaya ka ta nye amudn aYeso Kiristi kaya yin t fok yin ye ka saase, kyrna gip ka se kayr kazatse.
62004004	Amma yin inoon'i, yin aya mi ta shim, yin nye yin fe Adakunom. Yin n canang yin aner kuri ayong, kamok Kabik kaya ka ta se kayr yin nar kaya ka ta se kayr kazatse'me.
62004005	Ba nye fe kazatse, kamok anong ba f rif kuri rif kazatse, ne nerawe'me ku fok ba.
62004006	Amma yir, yir nye yir fe Adakunom, koangan afe a ta nye afe Adakunom ti fok yir. Aya a ta nye afe Adakunom ba, ti fok yir ba. Anong ne yir kyem i ren yir Kabik kafe ka ta be katsak ne kafe abs.
62004007	Ar, yin aya mi ta shim, won i tu naka shim yir, kamok kushim ne nufe Adakunom. Koangan afe a ta shim nerawe nye igon Adakunom ne a ren Adakunom.

62004010	Iyu ne i nye kushim'e. Sang yir ne i shim yir Adakunom ba, wu ne a ti shim yir, ne a tom Igon wu nong ka t b ku kyndi asidaka kurng rinn yir.

66002005	Yiring be kar afe wan t ku se nizham wan t ra kpa. Shishing kuse wan ne i nye ikr iya wan t nye imsng'e. Ke wan shishing kuse wan ba, t, mi saase t b sok ikng iya a tin te kurng wan nar a tu ku saas.
66002006	Amma ikng ikak itek wan t nye, nye wan t rawan amaan kunye ner aNikolata kyndi mi t ramin.
66002007	Aner aya a ta be ato kufok a ra fok ikng iya Kabik ta f be ikilisiya. Aner aya a ta canang kazatse, mi t ku nk iren nong a t ya kutes kakon kafe kutser kaya ka ta se rik Adakunom.
66002008	Zibir amaleka ikilisiya aSamirna'me ye: Rif na ne nufe aner aya a ta nye Imsng'e ne a nye Igang'e, wu ne a ku a t bun a dorok be kutser.
66002009	Mi ren kuri risam wan tin se. Mi bun i ren rizor wan, amma wan nye arum'e kayr kabik. Mi ren kuri amaan rif riya fe a ta sok ace ba ye ba nye ner Adakunom, amma sang ba ra nye ba, tin f natoon wan. nye ner Ishetan.
66002010	Sang tu fok inyim risam wan tana s ba. Won ta ka tak, Amaan Aner t te kak yin nitsm nong a ta ka bmng yin ne a ka tabak yin ma kuks kusk. Amma nyeseng be agap nong ko a ta ka fr kamok mi, mi t ka nk ishorong kutser kufe izen izen.
66002011	Aner aya a ta be ato kufok a ra fok ikng iya Kabik ta f be ikilisiya. Aner aya a ta canang kazatse, riku rif afa tu ku s ba, ko cik.
66002012	Zibir amaleka ikilisiya aPagamum'e ye: Rif na ne nufe aner aya a ta be awn itsor isp iya i ta ya abas afa didng.
66002013	Mi ren wan sor nar Ishetan tu ku nye rigwm. Gip be anong, wan ti kuus be katsak. Sang wan min kirik kama i ta won ku kuni nk katsak natoon'i ba, nizen a t fr Antipas a ta nye asam'i atek nuwp wan, nar kaya Ishetan t ku se.
66002014	Amma gip be anong, ikr ikak kuse cik mi ta be be wan; ner akak kuse kayr yin a t kuus kubsp aBalam, kuya a ta bsp aBalak'e ta sak ner Isarela t nye rinn, a t ya naya naya itsi ne nye rikuna.
66002015	Anong ne wan se be ner aya a ta kuus kubsp ner aNikolata.
66002016	Kamok anong shishing kuse wan. Ke anong ba, mi t b nufuan zizirik nong t ba ka tsng ba be itsor isp i tan wuruk nanu mi.
66002017	Aner aya a ta be ato kufok a ra fok ikng iya Kabik ta f be ikilisiya. Aner aya a ta canang kazatse, mi t ku nk naya a ta nr a ta yis ye, amanna. Mi t ku nk kuta kukan a ta min zibir riyerek rifas natoon'e. Akak kuse a ta ren riyerek'e ba, ma ke aner aya afe a ta shan kuta'me.
66002018	Zibir amaleka ikilisiya aTiyatira ye: Rif na ne nufe Igon Adakunom, aya anyisi wu ta se kyndi icen kurng ne atak wu gysm kyndi kutsm.
66002019	Mi ren kunye wan, kushim wan be kunk katsak wan. Mi ren itomong wan be ku naka tsesek wan. Mi ren itomong wan ife akyrna nar ife imsng'e.
66002020	Amma gip be anong, ikng ikak kuse mi ta be be wan: Wan won abining'ong a t ku yis ye aZhezebel, aya a t sok rice wu ye wu nye aner kuzarap. Kubsp wu sak sam'i shaam ta n ninye rikuna ne ya naya a ta nye kamok asidaka itsi.
66002021	Mi t nk izen nong a t shishing kuse wu a t won ku kuus tek, a rawu.
66002022	T, mi t ku sak a t nye amaan kurk, ne i sak ya a t mereng be wu t s risam didng sang ke shishing kuse ba ba.
66002023	Mi t fs inoon wu cei nong as fikuus cicr t ren ye, mi ne i nye afe kuyrk ay nerawe be kutrng ba cei. Mi t ku karang koangan yin titr be itomong wu.
66002024	Amma yin ribir'e, i ta se yin na aTiyatira, i ta kuus yin kubsp wu ba, yin bsp yin ikr iya ta yis ye, Ikr Ishetan i ta se tsik, ba. Mi shim t ka tak yin ye, mi ta ka nk yin acer akak ba.
66002025	Yin yiir yin kunk katsak yin tsek ma mi bun i b.
66002026	Aner aya a ta canang kazatse ne a nye ikng iya mi ta shim ma nigang'e, mi t ku nk kukyem a t nye rigwm natoon kazatse cei kyndi mi ta shan kukyem'i nufe Ada mi. Kyndi a ta f ye, A tin nye rigwm natoon ba be ishn kutsm, a t ka fo ba kyndi a ta fo kadonong iben. Mi tu ku nk adar kusetson.
66002029	Aner aya a ta be ato kufok a ra fok ikng iya Kabik ta f be ikilisiya.
66003001	Zibir amaleka ikilisiya aSardis'e ye: Rif na ne nufe aner aya a ta be nabik Adakunom kanataar ne a yiir dar kanataar nubk wu. Mi ren kunye wan. nerawe ta di kyndi wan nye atser aser wan nye kukom'e.
66003002	Dorok, ni barang agap nikng i ta rusek i tan b barak i ta ku, kamok mi di kunye wan shining nashn Adakunom ba.
66003003	Kamok anong, yiring be ikng iya wan ta fok i ta shan. Kuus nong ta shishing kuse wan. Amma ke wan dorok ba, mi t b kyndi akpatang, wan t ren izen iya mi tana b ba.
66003004	Amma gip be anong, yin be yin nerawe cik kayr yin na aSardis ya a tan riir ares ba be rinn ba. ta te ares akan nong ta tseng mak be mi kamok ba kyem ta tseng mak be mi.
66003005	Aner aya a ta canang kazatse, a t ku te ares akan kyndi ba. Mi t birik riyerek wu a ta zibir kayr Kufumung Kutser ba. Nizen iya mi tana nyeseng nashn Ada mi ne maleka wu, mi t f ye aner na nye anaan.

66003007	Zibir amaleka ikilisiya aFiladefiya'me ye: Rif na ne nufe aner aya a ta se zhl ne a be katsak, wu ne a be agbang akarak aDauda. Ikng iya wu ta karak akak ta kyem a whn ba, ikng iya wu ta whn akak ta kyem a karak ba.
66003008	Mi ren kunye wan. Di, mi ma ka won kanukutu kuy kaya sang akak tana kyem a whn ba. Mi ren wan mak i be agap ba, gip be anong wan kuus rif mi sang wan min ton ba.
66003009	Mi t sak ner Ishetan, ya a t f ye ba nye ner aYahuda, amma sang ra nye ba, be abs, mi t ka sak ba ta b kpas natak wan ne ren ye mi ta shim.
66003010	Kum wan ta kuus rif mi natoon kutsesek, mi t ka fek nizen kubmng kuya ku tana b natoon kazatse cicr, nizen iya a tana bmng nerawe kazatse.
66003011	Mi saase kyrna. Kamok anong yiir kunk katsak wan kpa fan akak bin shan ribong ishorong wan.
66003012	Aner aya ne a canang kazatse mi t ku sak a ta sor itsik agbang kutu kuya Adakunom mi iben. A ta won kar'ong ba, ko cik. 66003015	Mi ren kunye wan, wan shirim ba, wan zhoosh ba. Wan fa shirim ka i zhoosh ayi ke i nar.
66003016	T, kamok wan ta se mumk, wan shirim ba wan zhoosh ba, mi m b barak ta ka titu.
66003017	Wan f ye, Mi nye arum mi be kurum didng, mi ba tsr ikng ikak ba. Wan ra ren ba, wan n te riy riy, wan be rizor, wan n te ikng kur riy, wan nye akpatn'e ne i se ica'me gip.
66003018	Mi t ka nk ibrng, shan izinariya aya a tan shirik be kurng nunaan nong ta te rum kayr kabik, be ares akan nong tin kis kurm wan fan i bu fok isum. Shan rikan anyisi nong t di kar gyr.
66003019	ner aya mi ta shim ne mi tu zhr ba ne i ku te nunyi. Kamok anong, dorok be katsak, shishing kuse wan.
66003020	Di, mi na nunyeseng ne i ca kanukutu. Aner aya a fok kut mi, a ti karak'e ne mi n ta ya mak be wu ne wu ya be mi gip.

66003022	Aner aya a ta be ato kufok a ra fok ikng iya Kabik ta f be ikilisiya.
66004001	Nama anong, nashn mi, mi bun i di kanukutu kakak nukarak kayr kaza. Ne mi bun i fok kut kuya mi ta tsang i fok ni imsng'e kyndi rigba ame ye, Ngarak aze, mi t ka tonong ikr a tana nye dim nama iyu.
66004002	Nizen izining, Kabik ti tiik natoon mi ne mi di itsik rigwm nashn mi be aner akak a ta min sonong natoon'e.
66004003	Aner'e gysm kyndi iwrng ikak a ta yis ye aZhaspa ne aKaneliya. Itsereng i ta gorok kar kusonong'e gysm kyndi kuta kukak a ta yis ye aEmeral.
66004004	tsik rigwm kak isk ifa be anaas gorok itsik rigwm'e, be kk kashn isk ifa be anaas tan sosok natoon tsik rigwm'e. kk kashn'e n tes ares akan be abong izinariya.
66004005	Itsik rigwm i ta se natite'me yiir berep kyndi akanang iza t tarang kar be kutasak. Irng apitila kanataar tuse azong i ta gysm nashn itsik rigwm'e, Irng iyong nye nabik Adakunom kanataar.
66004006	Nashn itsik rigwm'e ikng ikak tuse kyndi agbang kudung a t nye be agilas, i ta gysm kyndi amadobi. Ikr ikak inaas i ta be kutser tuse i ta gorok itsik rigwm'e. Ikr'me be anyisi whr nashn be kama.
66004007	Ikng ife imsng'e tas azaki, ife afa se kyndi amung, ife ataar be kanyisi kyndi anerawe, ife anaas'e tas akim.
66004008	Ikr inaas'ong cicr be atsn igataar be anyisi nurm koak ba ma na afabak ba gip. Katuk be kunom a yiir bom abom ye, Azhl'e, Azhl'e, Azhl'e nye Agwm gwm yir Adakunom a ta be kukyem, a t se gbugbang, a kuse se kyrna, a ta bun a b.
66004009	Ikr inaas itser'ong bom abom riy rikan, be nakerek ne a kuyiik, aner aya a ta sonong natoon itsik rigwm'e, wu aya a tana sor ma izen izen'e.Koakye izen iya ba nye anong,
66004010	ne kk kashn isk ifa be anaas ame kpas kaben nashn wu aya a t sonong ni itsik rigwm ame, ne ku ya iben, wu aya a tana sor ma izen izen ame. A turung abong rigwm ba nashn itsik rigwm'e ne f ye,
66004011	Agwm gwm yir Adakunom, wan kyem ta shan kuyiik be rigwm ne kukyem, kamok wan ne i nye ikr cicr, Nu shim wan ne ikr'me kuse kamok anong i be kutser.
66005001	Mi di kufumung a ta min nye izibir cei abas afa nubk riya aner aya a ta se nusonong natoon itsik ame. A rosom kpa be idun kanataar.
66005002	Ne mi bun i di amaleka akak agbang'e, a sen f be agbang kut ye, Angan kyem a ta bisik idun na nong a ta karak kukpa'me ?
66005003	Akak kuse, natoon kaza ka kaben ka kayr iben a tana kyem a karak kukpa'me shita a tana fa ba.
66005004	Iyong mi tos didng kamok a kyem a s akak a tana kyem a karak kukpa shita a ta fa ba.
66005005	Ayong akak kayr kk kashn ame f be mi ye, Sang tu tos ba, Di! Azaki kya kayr ner aYahuda, kunik kasa aDauda, n canang kazatse. A kyem a ta karak kukpa ne a bisik idun kanataar'ong.
66005006	Ne mi bun i di Aturuk akak kyndi an tsr kut'me nunyeseng natite kar itsik rigwm'e. Ikr inaas ame be kk kashn t ku gorok. Aturuk'e be atom kanataar be anyisi kanataar. Ayong ne nye nabik Adakunom kanataar naya t tom'e nazatse cei.
66005007	Iyong Aturuk ame tseng nong a t se sok kukpa nubk riya aner a tan sonong ni itsik rigwm ame.
66005008	Nizen iya a ta sok kukpa, ikewum inaas ife kutser ame ne kk kashn isk ifa be anaas ame kpas kaben nashn Aturuk'me. Koangan be izom wu ne kakereng izinariya nafe name ikn itek kayr'e. Name'me sor kyndi aduwa zhl'e.
66005009	Iyong bom abom afas ne f ye, Wan kyem ta sok kufumung'e, wan kyem ta bisik idun'e kamok a t ka tsr. A ta nyosong nask wan nong i tin shan nerawe a ta te afe Adakunom. Wan shan Adakunom nerawe cicr kayr koakye irem ne koakye izere ne koakye kaben.
66005010	Wan t ku sak ba ta te ner rigwm wan be tsi nong a ta nye Adakunom yir itomong, tin nye rigwm natoon kazatse.
66005011	Mi bun i di ne mi fok kut rigwm maleka izungu natoon izungu whr. gorok ikewum inaas ife kutser ame ne kk kashn ame gip ne itsik rigwm ame.
66005012	tang i t be agap ne bom abom ye, Kukyem nye kufe Aturuk a t tsr, a kyem a tu ku nk rigwm be kurum ne kukyem cei be agap ne nakerek be kuyiik ne ri ritek.
66005013	Ne mi bun i fok koakye ikr i ta se natoon kaza be kaben cei be iya i ta se kayr kaben ne kayr ashi ne ife i ta se natoon'e cei t ta kut na abom ye, Nakerek be kuyiik be rigwm ne agap nye kufe aya a ta sonong natoon itsik rigwm'e be Aturuk'e gip ma izen izen.
66005014	Ne kewum inaas ife kutser ame f ye, Anong. Ne kk kashn ame kpas kaben a t ku ya iben.
66006001	Mi di Aturuk'e ta sen bisik kudun'e kufe imsng'e kayr idun kanataar ame. Ne mi fok ikewum ikak izining kayr inaas ife kutser ame t yis be agbang kut kyndi akparam ye, B.
66006002	Mi yrk ne mi di itsaap ikan. Aner aya a tin ngarak natoon itsaap'e be ka ta nubk wu, a mu ku te ribong rigwm. Ayong a kpaan itsi ni itsaap'e kyndi aner aya a ta tseng a be ni iya kak ni itsom.
66006003	Nizen aturuk'e ta fa bisik kudun kufe afa ne mi fok ikng ife afa t f ye, B.
66006004	Iyong itsaap ikak bun i wuruk iseng zhau. A nk aner aya a t min ngarak ni itsaap'e kukyem nong a t sok kusor caang kazatse ne a sak nerawe ta naka fs. A bun a t nk awn itsor.
66006005	Nizen iya Aturuk'e ta bisik kudun'e kufe ataar ne mi fok ikng'e ife ataar ta f ye, B. Ne mi di itsaap iwe nashn mi. Aner aya a tin ngarak ni itsaap'e be ikng ifa a tin maas kugaar ikr nubk wu.
66006006	Ne mi fok ikng ikak kyndi kut kukak natite ikr ame ku t f ye, Amudu ikpe naya a ta yis ye alikama se kyndi ishorong kuwoso alebura, amudu ataar afe ikpe naya a ta yis ye abale se kyndi ishorong kuwoso alebura. Amma tu beseng name nafar'e ka ashi anap'e ba.
66006007	Nizen Aturuk'e t bisik kudun kufe anaas'e ne mi fok kut ikewum ife anaas'e t f be mi ye, B!
66006008	Mi t fa yrk ne mi di itsaap ikak i ta se kyndi ashi aruron nashn mi. Riyerek aner aya a tin ngarak natoon itsaap'e nye Riku, kar nabik ya a tan kus tu ku sor tsang ka ku kuus nama. t nk ba kukyem a tanin fs ikes azining kayr ikes anaas ife kazatse be itsor ne izong be irk ne maan kukewum.
66006009	Nizen iya Aturuk'e ta bisik kudun'e kufe atoon ne mi di nabik nerawe fe a t ka fs ba kamok a t kuus rif Adakunom be kunk katsak ba, nabik'e se kaben nar a t ku nye asidaka.
66006010	Ne a tang kut be agap ye, Agwm gwm, Atek kaza be kaben, azhl'e, afe katsak, ma nizen inyaka ne wan ta t kazatse amok ne i ku karang ikng iya a tin nye yir ?
66006011	Ayong a nk koangan ba awn kukpiin kukan, ne a f be ba ye ra tor cik gak ma izen iya a tana fs sam Adakunom fudang ba be ronyining ba kyndi a t ka fs ba a gang.
66006012	Aturuk'e ta fa bisik kudun'e kufe igataar ne kazatse wor ka zuur be agap. Kunom wor ku te whi kyndi kukpiin kuwe kuya a ta nye be nakuyng izha iwe. Kufn cicr ku te kuseng zhau kyndi nask.
66006013	Adar kpas kaben kyndi kutes atafo kuya kuwun ta suruk kaben.
66006014	Ne kaza kunung kyndi ta kunung kukpa izibir ne nawhanang be gang dorok a ta wosong nar kusor ba.

66006017	Kamok agbang kunom riy kubeseng ba m b, angan ne a ta kyem'me ?
66007001	Nama ikr iyong, ne mi di maleka anaas tan nyeseng nikes kazatse inaas, ta tnng kuwun iri naas fan i bu fp kaben ka ashi ka koakye kuri kakon.
66007002	Ne mi di amaleka akak t wuruk nabas kuwuruk kunom be iziz kukyem Adakunom afe kutser nubk wu. Ayong a ta kut be agap a t ka nk ba kukyem nong a ta beseng kaben be agbang ishng.
66007003	A f be ba ye, Sang tu beseng yin iben ka ashi ka nakon ba, ma yir ti tsk yir iziz nati sam Adakunom nizham.
66007004	Ne mi fok ye ner aya a t ku tsk ba iziz'me, se ner izungu kusk inyak be isk inaas be anaas kayr nazu ner Isarela kusk be afa.

66007015	Kamok anong, ba sor nashn itsik rigwm Adakunom ne ku ya iben katuk be kunom nagbang kar ku kuya iben. Aner a ta sonong ni itsik rigwm'e ta tarak ikpaar wu natoon ba koakye izen.
66007016	t ba fok izong ba, t fok kut kukoor ba, t fok kuzhoosh kunom ka kuzhoosh ikng ikak ba.
66007017	Kamok Aturuk a ta se natoon itsik rigwm'e t te afek ba. A t tseng be ba nar itop ashi kutser t ku wuruk. Adakunom t ka rng ba nanyisi nanyisi ba cei.
66008001	Nizen Aturuk'e ta bisik kudun kufe kanataar ne kaza te win kyndi ribir awa azining.
66008002	Iyong mi di maleka kanataar ame ta nyeseng nashn Adakunom, a t ka nk ba agba kanataar.
66008003	Amaleka akak, a t be kures a t nye be izinariya b nong a t nyeseng'e nashn abagadi'me. A t ku nk ikr ikn itek didng kayr kures ame nong a tin nye asidaka nong a tin gung be aduwa zhl'e cicr natoon a abagadi izinariya ame ta se nashn itsik rigwm.
66008004	Iyong itsing ikr ikn itek ame mak be aduwa zhl'e dorok nubk amaleka'me nong i t ngarak naza nufe Adakunom.
66008005	Ayong amaleka'me sok kures aturari ame, a tin shining be kurng natoon abagadi ame nong a t misik nazatse. Ne akparam tar ne kar nye berep be akanang kyndi iza ta tarang kar ne kaben zuur gip.
66008006	Iyong maleka kanataar ame nye kanyk nong ta fsm agba'me.
66008007	Nizen amaleka afe imsng'e t fp rigba rifu ne rikarang be kurng ku tin kar be nask kpas nazatse. Kurng'e ya kukyes kuzining kayr itaar ife kazatse, anong ne nakon be agam ashirim kurng'e ya cei.
66008008	Nizen amaleka afe afa t fp rigba rifu, yong a barak ikng ikak kyndi agbang rifan riya kurng tan yiir ku se kpa kayr ashi. Abas azining kayr ataar afe agbang kudung wor ku te nask.
66008009	Anong ne abas azining kayr ataar afe koakye ikng i ta be kutser kayr ashi ame kus. Ne abas azining kayr ataar afe akpara ashi ame beseng cei.
66008010	Amaleka afe ataar fp rigba rifu, yong agbang adar akak a ta se kanang kyndi kurng natoon kaza tikpa kayr abas azining kayr ataar afe agbang adung be itop ashi.
66008011	Riyerek adar'e nye Kurereng. Abas azining kayr ataar afe ashi'me rereng. nerawe whr aya a ta s ashi'me kus kamok kurereng'e.
66008012	Amaleka afe anaas fp rigba rifu, ne abas azining kayr ataar afe kunom te whi, anong ne kufn ne dar te whi gip. Abas azining kayr ataar afe kuwoso se whi anong ne katuk te dar kufn.
66008013	Mi t fa yrk ne mi fok akim akak a ta tseng natoon kaza ta tos be agap ye, Wa tsek, wa tsek, wa be ner ta sor nazatse, nizen iya ribir maleka ataar tana fsm agba ba.
66009001	Amaleka afe atoon fp rigba rifu ne mi di adar aya a ta se naza t kpa kaben. A nk adar'e akarak nong a tin karak ribong rikak ri ta se tsik dar igak ame.
66009002	Nizen iya adar'e t karak ribong'e iyong itsing wuruk kayr'e kyndi itsing kurng a ta kas nagbang kar. Itsing ribong'e sak kunom be kaza te map.
66009003	Ne kubep wuruk kayr itsing ame ku t n kayr kazatse, a t ku nk ba agap nong a ta tang nerawe kyndi inyng.
66009004	A f be kubep'e ye sang a tu beseng agam ka nakon ba, amma igak nerawe ya a ta be iziz Adakunom nanati ba ba.
66009005	A ta ka nk ba agap tin fs nerawe ba, igak tu ku nk ba risam rif ifn itoon tsek. Risam'me ta se kyndi inyng t ta anerawe
66009006	kayr inom iyong nerawe ta tsr riku, t s ba. t shim ke kus amma riku ta b ba.
66009007	Kubep'e se kyndi tsaap a tan sak a tin tseng nitsm. be ikr ikak nace ba kyndi abong izinariya afe rigwm, nanyisi ba se kyndi nafe nerawe.
66009008	Nakuyng ba se kyndi nakuyng rice anyining ne anyi ba se kyndi afe azaki.
66009009	kis nafok ba be ikng ikak kyndi kpaar kutsm. Nawor atsn ba se kyndi nawor tsaap atsm kutseng i ta teng i be nar itsom.
66009010	be arum tin tang nerawe kyndi inyng. A ta kyem nk anerawe risam be arum ba'ong ma ifn itoon.
66009011	Agwm ba nye amaleka aya a t ku nk kukyem natoon ribong riya ri ta be igak ba ame. Riyerek amaleka'me nirem ner Ibrani nye Abadon, nirem ner aHeleni nye Apoliyon, i ta sor ye, Aner a ta beseng ikr.
66009012	Risam rif imsng'e gor'ong, a tu ku won rifa riman'e.
66009013	Amaleka afe igataar'e fp rigba wu ne mi fok kut kukak t wuruk nikes inaas ife abagadi izinariya ame nashn Adakunom.
66009014	Kut'me f be amaleka afe igataar'e, ye, Bisik maleka anaas ame ya a ta ma ka rosom ba nishng aYufiretis.
66009015	Ayong a bisik maleka anaas ame ya a t tsang a ku sak ba kamok izen'e ne kunom'e be kufn'e ne riy'me nong t fs nerawe, abas azining kayr ataar.
66009016	Rigwm sozha ba'me ya a t kn natoon itsaap'e ta se kyndi aMiliyn isk inyak ifa (200,000,000).
66009017	tsaap'e be ner aya a t kn natoon itsaap'e mi t di kayr ikng iya Adakunom tin tonong'e be kpaar atsm iseng ni nafok ba, ife kak se shim shim ne ife kak se kyndi ashi aruron. Ace tsaap'e se kyndi fe azaki, kurng be itsing ne ikng ikak kyndi itong abindiga wuruk ni nanu tsaap'e.
66009018	Be risam na ne a ti fs nerawe abas azining kayr ataar, be kurng'e ne itsing ne ikng ikak kyndi itong abindiga t wuruk ni nanu ba.
66009019	Agap tsaap'e se ni nanu ba ne arum ba kamok arum tsaap'e se kyndi when be ace a tin tm nerawe.
66009020	Ribir nerawe fe sang ta ka fs ba be amaan ikr'ong ba, gaar kushishing kuse ba nong t kam be ikr ba t nye be ibk ba. ya kashn be kuya amaan nabik iben ne ikr ba ta nye be izinariya ne azurfa be atsm ne ata be ikon ba t nye be ibk ba. Ikr'ong di kar ba, i fok kuto ba, i kyem i tseng ba.
66009021	gaar kushishing kuse ba kufe kufs nerawe be kukur be rikuna ne itsang ba ta nye.
66010001	Ne mi bun i di agbang amaleka akak ne naza a sen tisik kaben. A mu ku kis be ann be itsereng natoon rice wu. Kanyisi wu se kyndi kunom ne atak wu seng kyndi atsn kurng.
66010002	Kukpa izibir kukak kuhiir'e se nukarak nubk wu. A nyeseng be kutak riya natoon ashi, kufe rimen se niben ikoor.
66010003	Ne a ta kuto be agap kyndi azaki ta muus. Nizen iya wu ta tar ne kut akparam kanataar ame shim.
66010004	Nizen akparam kanataar'e t f kanu, mi shim ta zibir rif'me, amma mi fok kut kukak naza ye, Sang tu zibir ikr iya akparam'e t f ba.
66010005	Ayong amaleka aya mi t ku di nunyeseng kutak kuzining natoon ashi ne kufe afa niben ikoor ame sok kubk riya wu naza.
66010006	Ayong a shu be riyerek wu aya a ta se ma izen izen, afe a t nye kaza be koakye ikng i ta se kayr'e. Wu aya a t nye kazatse be koakye ikng i ta se kayr'e, wu afe a ta nye gbang shng be ikr i ta se kayr'e cei, yong amaleka'me f ye, A ta ba beseng izen ba.
66010007	Amma nizen iya amaleka afe kanataar tana fp rigba rifu, nizen iyong ne Adakunom ta taas koakye ikng wu ta tsang a f be ner kuzarap wu.
66010008	Iyong mi bun i fok kut kuya mi ta tsang i fok naza ame. Ku f be mi ye, Tseng, ta se shan kukpa izibir ku ta se nubk amaleka a ta nyeseng be kutak kukak natoon ashi ne kukak niben ikoor.
66010009	Iyong mi tseng nufe amaleka'me i t f be wu ye a rin nk ikpis kukpa izibir'e. Ayong a f be mi ye, Se sok'e ta ya, wan ta fok kurereng'e nafa wan amma ku se kyndi ritong nanu wan.
66010010	Iyong mi se sok kukpa izibir'e nubk amaleka'me i ta ya. Mi fok ku t ta kyndi ritong nanu mi, nama mi t wnng ne mi fok kurereng'e nafa mi.
66010011	Ayong a bun a ti tak ye, Wan ta bun i zarap natoon nerawe whr be iwp whr ne rem zr zr ne gwm zr zr.
66011001	Ayong a ti nk ikng iya a tin maas kar kyndi ishn. Ne a f be mi ye, Tseng ta se maas agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben be kar a tu ku nye asidaka ne i fa nerawe ya a ta sen ya Adakunom iben kayr'e.
66011002	Amma tu maas kubang'e kufe imsng'e ba. Sang tu maas ba, kamok an nk furin, ba ne a ta b shesh kuwp kuzhl'e na ma ifn isk inaas be afa.
66011003	Mi t ka nk asheda mi afa kukyem nong a tin zarap ma kuks izungu izining be isk inyak ifa be isk igataar. (1,260) A ta te agyr ares nong ta tonong riy riwe ba.
66011004	Ikr afa'ong nye atin nafar afa ame ne rng ifa ame i ta se nunyeseng nashn Agwm gwm kazatse cicr.
66011005	Ke aner akak nye kyndi a ta ka man ba, ne kurng wuruk kayr kanu ba nong ku ta ya mudn ba'me. Anong ne koangan afe a ta shim a ta ka man ba a t ku fr.
66011006	ner afa'ong, a tu ku nk ba kukyem nong tin whn kaza fan iza bu kpa nizen ba ta sen nye kuzarap'e. be kukyem tana shishing itop ashi nong a ta te nask, bun t ku nk ba kukyem a tana kyem tin nk kazatse koakye kuri risam nizen iya ba t shim.
66011007	Nama t gang i taas kutom'e, ikewum ikak iya i ta wuruk kayr ribong riya ri ta be igak ba ame, tikpa ni ba ma i nar agap ba, iyong i t ka fs ba.

66011009	Kayr inom itaar be ribir, nerawe koakye be irem zr zr ne izere zr zr ne iwp zr zr t bs t yrk ikom'e ma a ta roon'e ye sang tu ku nsk ba ba.
66011010	nerawe kazatse t nye riy rikan didng, kamok rikus tom'ong. ta nye riy rikan ne naka toos be ikr kamok riku ner kuzarap afa'ong ne risam t nk kazatse.
66011011	Amma nama inom itaar be ribir'e, isong iya i ta nyeseng kutser t ne nufe Adakunom i titiik niba. Iyong wor dorok be kutser. Koangan afe a t ku di ba be kutser fok inyim makiyi.
66011012	Ayong ner kuzarap afa ame ta fa fok kut kukak be agap ku ta wuruk kayr kaza ku ta f be ba ye, Ngarak yin aze. Ayong ngarak naza kayr ann ne mudn ba ka yrk ba.
66011013	Dim nizen iyong kaben wor ka zuur, abas azining kayr kuwp'e wor kuyirik. nerawe izungu kanataar kus kamok kuzuur kaben'e. fe t gaar be kutser fok inyim didng yong tiyiik Adakunom a ta se kayr kaza.
66011014	Risam rif afa gor'ong, risam rif ataar saase kyrna.

66011017	ne f ye, Yir shim ta ka tonong yir riy rikan Agwm gwm yir Adakunom afe kukyem cicr, aya a tu ku se gbugbang ne a kuse kyrna. Kamok wan sok agbang kukyem wan i tin nye rigwm kyrna.
66011018	Riy furin kubeseng, izen riy kubeseng wan n b. Izen n nye a tana t ikom amok ne a ku karang sam wan ner kuzarap ishorong ba, ne sam wan zhl'e ne koangan fe a ta tiyiik riyerek wan, inoon be kk kashn. Izen n nye wan tana fs fe a t beseng kazatse.
66011019	Iyong agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben ku ta se kayr kaza karak ne mi di akpate kushu Adakunom kayr'e. Ne akanang akak wuruk be riwng ne kutasak iza be kuzuur kaben ne agbang rikarang.
66012001	Ayong agbang ikng azhing ikak wuruk natoon kaza. Ikng'e nye abining akak a t sok kunom a tin nye ares ne kufn nabas atak wu. Ribong rigwm wu nye dar kusk be afa.
66012002	Abining'e se be kafa yong a yiir tos be kur'me kamok izen kutes wu tsang i nye.
66012003	Kukng kukak bun ku wuruk naza gbak. Kukng'e nye kukewum kukak kuseng ku ta se zhirim kyndi Kuwhen ku be ace kanataar be atom kusk be abong rigwm kanataar natoon ace'me.
66012004	Kurum'e rng dar kaza abas azining kayr ataar a t korok kayr kazatse. Ne Kuwhen ame nyeseng nashn abining ame a tan b barak a ta tes nikum a ta wor a wnng igon abining'e nizen iya a tana tes.
66012005	Abining'e tes igon kamitek'e aya a tana nye rigwm natoon nerawe kazatse cei. A t nye rigwm'e be ishn kutsm. Amma a ti shan igon'e zhar a t tseng'e naza nufe Adakunom nar itsik rigwm wu.
66012006	Ayong abining'e teng a t n katse nar Adakunom ta tsang a ku sak'e nong a t ku fek ma inom izungu izining be isk inyak ifa be isk igataar (1260).

66012010	Iyong mi fok kut kukak kanang natoon kaza ku ta f ye, Kyrname, kashesh be kukyem ne rigwm Adakunom yir ne kukyem aKiristi wu m b. Kamok an barak aner aya a t tsees kukun ronyining yir kaben, wu aya a ta yiir nye kukun ronyining yir nashn Adakunom katuk be kunom.
66012011	ronyining yir t ku canang kamok nask Aturuk'e ne kamok ikng ife ba t f, kamok t ku teng riku ba.
66012012	Kamok anong, nye yin riy rikan naza ne ya a ta sor kayr'e. Amma aw be kazatse ne agbang adung, kamok Amaan Aner n tiik kayr yin. Riy wu kun fuus kamok a ren ye izen wu ba gop ba.
66012013	Nizen iya Kuwhen'e t di a tu barak kaben, iyong a tikup na abining'e afe a t tes igon kamitek'e ame.

66013001	Ne mi di kukewum kukak ku ta sen wuruk kayr agbang kudung. Kukewum'me be tom kusk be ace kanataar ne abong rigwm kusk natoon tom wu'me. A ti zibir riyerek kuzhsh Adakunom natoon koakye rice'me.

66013011	Iyong mi bun i di kukewum kukak, ku ta sen wuruk kayr iben. Ku be tom afa kyndi afe aturuk amma kuf kanu kyndi Kuwhen ame.

66013013	Kukewum kufe afa na nye ikr azhing didng ma ku sak kurng t wuruk naza nong ku ta kpa kaben ne nerawe yrk.

66013016	Kukewum'e sak koangan anerawe ahiir'e be agbang'e, arum'e be afe rizor'e, asam'me be afe a ta se washak, a sak koangan t tsk iziz nubk riya wu ka nati wu ayi.
66013017	Sang akak kyem a shan ka a rs ikng ikak ba ma ke aner'e be iziz'ong nizham. Iziz'me nye riyerek kukewum'me ka izibir wu.
66013018	Rif na shim aner ra be kukyem. Aner aya a ta be kutrng didng ra fa a ta di izibir kukewum'me kamok izibir'e nye ife anerawe. Iziz kukewum'me nye igataar, igataar, igataar (666).
66014001	Mi ta fa yrk ne mi di Aturuk ame nashn'i nunyeseng natoon kawhanang aSihiyona be ner izungu kusk inyak be isk inaas be anaas 144,000 mak be wu, ya a t zibir riyerek Aturuk'e ne riyerek Ada wu ninati ba.
66014002	Iyong mi fok kut kukak t wuruk kayr kaza kyndi ashi ta wk, kyndi iza ta tasak. Kut kuya mi ta fok'e se kyndi ner kak ta sen rom zom.
66014003	se be abom afas nashn itsik rigwm ame be nashn ikr inaas ame ne kk kashn. Aner akak kyem a bom abom'e ba, igak awan ner izungu kusk inyak be isk inaas be anaas 144,000 tu ku shesh ba kayr kazatse ame tsek.

66014006	Ne mi bun i di amaleka akak ta kar natoon kaza, a be Rif Ritek Adakunom rif izen izen nong a ta tak nerawe kayr kazatse cicr, koakye kuri anerawe be koakye kuri izere be koangan irem.

66014010	wu gip a t s ashi riy kubeseng Adakunom, aya a t nye be agap wu kayr kures riy kubeseng wu. A t ku nk risam didng be kurng ne ikng ikak kyndi itong abindiga itong ikak nashn maleka zhl'e ne nashn Aturuk'e.
66014011	Itsing kurng kuya a tana ku nk mo ba risam'me ngarak naza ma izen izen. Koangan ner aya a t ya kukewum ame iben ka ikng iya i t ku tas iben ne a t ku tsk ba iziz riyerek ikewum'e, ta s risam katuk be kunom dar gang.
66014012	Kamok anong, zhl'e ya a t kuus itsi Adakunom ra naka tsesek ne a yir rif aYeso be agap.
66014013	Iyong mi fok kut kukak t wuruk kayr kaza ku ta f ye, Zibir rif na, ner riy rikan ne nye afe a t kus kayr aYeso kyr be nashn. Kabik f ye, Ei t fan kayr risam, itomong ba t ka kuus ba.
66014014	Mi t fa sok anyisi naza ne mi di kunn kukan nashn'i. Mi di aner akak kyndi Igon Anerawe ta min sonong natoon kunn'e. Aner'e be ribong rigwm a t nye be izinariya natoon rice wu. aLauzhe akak a t ya didng se nubk wu.
66014015	Ayong amaleka akak wuruk nutu kuya Adakunom iben nong a t yis aner aya a ta se natoon kunn ame be agap ye Nabak alauzhe wan nong tin tsek naya, izen ishamang n nye, naya nbeen kayr kazatse.
66014016	Ayong aner a ta se nusonong natoon kunn'e ziming alauzhe wu natoon kazatse nong a ti tsk ikng i tan been kayr kazatse'me.
66014017	Iyong amaleka akak bun a wuruk kayr agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben kayr kaza, amaleka ayong be alauzhe aya a t ya nubk wu gip.
66014018	Ne amaleka akak a tin sak riy nurng bun a wuruk gbak, a wuruk na abagadi nong a t yis amaleka aya a ta be alauzhe nubk wu ame be agap, ye Nabak alauzhe wan nong tin tsk kutes anap kayr kazatse kamok an te afe kutsk.
66014019	Ayong amaleka'me ziming alauzhe wu ame kayr kazatse nong a ta kpr kutes anap ame ne a tusung nar Adakunom tana fi ashi'me be riy kubeseng wu.
66014020	A fi ashi anap'e nama kuwp, nask yiir wuruk nar'me ma na teng kyndi kudun a ta rosom nanu itsaap. Kugugk nask'e ta teng se kyndi akilomita isk inyak itaar, ne kutsik'e se kyndi amita azining be ribir.
66015001	Mi di ikng ikak natoon kaza igbang'e ife azhing. Mi di maleka kanataar be iriri amaan risam kanataar rif igang'e. Kamok be ba ne a tin tonong riy kubeseng Adakunom rife igang'e.
66015002	Iyong mi di ikng ikak i ta se kyndi kudung agilas a t min kar be kurng. Ne mi di ner a t canang ikewum ame be ikng i t ku tas ne iziz riyerek wu ame, ba se nuyeseng nukim agbang kudung'e. se be zom Adakunom t ka nyesek ba.
66015003	bom abom aMusa asam Adakunom be abom a ta bom Aturuk'e ame ye, Kunye wan se yiik ne ku nye ikng azhing Adakunom agbang Agwm gwm afe kukyem cei. Iren wan nye iren itek be ife katsak. Wan ne i nye agbang Agwm gwm afe nerawe kazatse cicr.
66015004	Angan ne a ta fok inyim wan ba, agbang Agwm gwm a tana won dar a tiyiik riyerek wan ? Kamok wan zr tsek ne i se zhl. nerawe kazatse cicr ta bs ta ka ya iben kamok wan tonong ye kunye wan nye kufe katsak.
66015005	Nama anong, mi t fa yrk kaza, kayr agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben ne mi di kubur kushu Adakunom kuy.
66015006	maleka kanataar wuruk kayr kutu kuya Adakunom iben be iriri amaan risam kanataar ame. n nyeseng be ares akan aya a t gysm ne rosom nafok ba be idun ikak a t nye be izinariya.
66015007	Ayong azining kayr ikr i ta be kutser ame, nk maleka kanataar'e nakereng a ta nye be izinariya kanataar na ta shining be riy kubeseng Adakunom, wu afe a ta se ma izen izen.
66015008	Ayong agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben ame shining be itsing i ta wuruk kayr kuyiik Adakunom ne kukyem wu. Akak kyem a n kayr agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben'e ba, ma izen iya iriri amaan risam kanataar ife maleka kanataar'e t gang.
66016001	Iyong mi fok kut kukak be agap ku t yis kayr agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben'e, ku ta sen f be maleka kanataar ame ye, Tseng yin ta se korok yin kazatse nakereng kanataar nafe riy kubeseng Adakunom na.
66016002	Ayong amaleka afe imsng'e tseng a ta se korok ikng iya i ta se kayr kakereng kafu kayr kazatse'me. Ayong amaan ifor i ta r didng ti wuruk nirm ner ta be iziz kukewum ame be ya a t ya ikng iya i t ku tas iben.
66016003	Amaleka afe afa tseng a t se korok ikng i ta se kayr kakereng kafu kayr agbang kudung, yong ashi'me kirik a t te kyndi nask aner aya a tan ku, ne ikr iya i t sor kayr ashi'me kus cei.
66016004	Amaleka afe ataar'e tseng a t se korok ikng iya i ta se kayr kakereng kafu kayr ishng ne ninar ashi tu ku wuruk. Ayong ashi'me te nask gip.
66016005	Iyong mi fok amaleka aya a tin sak riy nashi t f ye, Amok na ya wan tan tn se gyr, wan afe i ta se gbugbang ne i bun i ku se kyrna. Wan nye Azhl'e, kamok wan t t amok gyr.
66016006	Kamok ba tan nyos nask zhl'e be fe kuzarap wan, yong wan t nk ba nask nong a t s tr be kunye ba.
66016007	Ne mi fok kut kukak kayr abagadi ame ta f ye, Ei, Adakunom Agbang Agwm gwm afe kukyem cei, amok wan se gyr ne a nye katsak.
66016008	Amaleka afe anaas'e tseng a ta se korok ikng iya i ta se kayr kakereng kafu natoon kunom. Ayong a nk kunom kukyem a tanin shosh nerawe be kurng.
66016009	Iyong kuzhoosh kunom ame ya nerawe ma fiming riyerek Adakunom aya a ta be agap ku tnng amaan risam na. Amma gaar kushishing kuse ba nong a t ku tiyiik.
66016010	Amaleka afe atoon tseng a t se korok ikng iya i ta se kayr kakereng kafu ni itsik rigwm kukewum ame yong awhi whn rigwm kukewum'me cei. nerawe ros irem ba be kur'me,
66016011	ayong fiming Adakunom afe a ta se kayr kaza kamok kur'me be ifor i ta se nirm ba. Gip be anong, a gaar kushishing kuse.
66016012	Amaleka afe igataar se korok ikng iya i ta se kayr kakereng kafu na agbang ishng a ta yis ye aYufiretis. Ashi'me gang cei nong a t nang gwm a tana wuruk nabas kuwuruk kunom iren.
66016013	Ne mi di amaan nabik nataar kyndi kpabor t wuruk nanu kuwhen ame, be nanu kukewum ame ne nanu aner kuzarap afe abs.
66016014	maan nabik'e nye tseng i t nye ikr azhing. tsees nufe gwm kazatse na cicr nong a ta ka tusung ba nar kazining kamok itsom a tana kn katuk agbang kunom Adakunom afe kukyem cicr.
66016015	Di yin, mi saase kyndi akpatang. Aner riy rikan ne a nye aner aya a ta sor be kanyk, ne a sor be ares wu bubarak fan a bu tseng ica'me ne a fok isum kayr nerawe.
66016016	Iyong tseng ame tusung gwm ame cicr nar kakak a ta yis nirem ner Ibrani ye Amagedon.
66016017	Amaleka afe kanataar tseng a ta se misik ikng iya i ta se kayr kakereng kafu natoon kaza. Iyong kut kukak wuruk be agap kayr agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben nar itsik rigwm wu ye, An gang!
66016018	Iyong kar kpaan ku gysm berep berep kyndi iza ta tarang kar, be kutasak ne akparam, ne kaben zuur didng. Kum Adakunom t nye anerawe, kaben kun zuur anong ba, kuzuur kaben'e wor ka nar agap.
66016019	Agbang kuwp ame kabak abas ataar ne gbang iwp kazatse kpas zr zr. Adakunom trng be agbang kuwp aBabila. Ayong a nk aBabila'me kures ashi anap kufe agbang riy kubeseng wu.
66016020	Koakye rizik ri ta se natite ashi be nawhanang cei titei.
66016021	Agbang rikarang riya ri ta gaar didng wuruk naza ri ti kpas natoon nerawe ma nerawe fiming riyerek Adakunom kamok amaan risam rikarang'e ta nar agap.
66017001	Ayong azining kayr maleka kanataar ame ya a t be nakereng kanataar ame b ta f be mi ye, B, mi t ka tonong kuri risam mi tana nk agbang inyak agwm na, aya a ta nye agbang kuwp a t nk bubarak be kar shng t ku se whr.
66017002	gwm kazatse na nye rikuna be wu. nerawe kazatse feng be ashi anap kamok rikuna wu.
66017003	Ayong amaleka'me ti sok kayr Kabik a t tseng be mi kayr katse. Mi di abining akak azong a tan sonong natoon kukewum kukak kuseng ku ta be ayerek ritok nurm wu be ace kanataar ne tom kusk.
66017004	Abining'e te ares akak aseng. Abining'e te ares a t nye be izinariya ne iwrng i ta se yiik. A be kures kus ashi kukak a t nye be izinariya nubk wu. Kures'e shining be ikr akyr be ife i ta be narik rikuna wu.
66017005	A ti zibir riyerek rikak nati wu rif sang akak ta ren ikng i ta sor ba ye,
66017006	Mi di abining'e tan feng be nask fikuus zhl'e wu tan s, ne nafe ner ta nk asheda natoon aYeso. Nizen iya mi t ku di mi fok azhing didng.
66017007	Ayong amaleka'me f be mi ye, Kamok aky ne wan fok azhing ? Mi t ka ts ikpang abining na ne afe kukewum wu tin ngarak na, i ta be ace kanataar be atom kusk.
66017008	Kukewum wan t di, tuse gbugbang, amma kyrna ku kuse ba. 66017009	Rif na nye rif aner aya a ta be kutrng tsik. Ace kanataar'ong nye nawhanang kanataar nar abining'e ta min sonong.
66017010	Ace kanataar'e nye gwm kanataar, atoon kayr ba n kus, azining kuse, akak rusek a ta ra b. Izen iya ayong'e tana b, a ta nye rigwm nizen cik tsek.
66017011	Kukewum kuya ku ta tsang ku kuse gbugbang ame, ku t ra ba kuse ba, ne ku nye agwm afe ikara'me. Wu ti se kayr gwm kanataar t wuruk ame, tseng be nuwei.
66017012	Atom kusk wan ta di'ong nye gwm kusk, fe a tan s rigwm nizham ba. Amma a t ku te ba rigwm rif awa azining mak be kukewum kuseng ame.
66017013	Ba kusk'ong, kutrng ba se kuzining, nk kukewum kuseng'e kukyem ba be rigwm ba.
66017014	A ta kn itsom be Aturuk'e. Amma Aturuk'e t ya gwm na be itsom kamok wu ne a ti nye rigwm natoon gwm ne a nye agbang Agwm gwm. ya wu t yis, ne ya wu t kasa, be ya a t ku kuus be katsak ta se mak be wu.

66017016	Kukewum kuseng'e ne tom kusk'ong t naka sak be inyak agwm'me ba. A t turung koakye a t be nong a t ku won ica'me. t ya rinam wu ne a ku shosh be kurng.
66017017	Kamok Adakunom sak nay ba nong ta shining ikng iya wu t shim. Ba t shim a t nk kukewum'me kukyem ba nong a tin nye rigwm ma izen iya a tana shining ikng iya Adakunom ta f.
66017018	Abining aya wan ta di'me, nye agbang kuwp ku tin nye rigwm nagwm kazatse.
66018001	Nama anong, mi di amaleka akak ta wuruk naza a ta sen tisik kaben. Amaleka'me be kukyem didng ma kuyiik wu samang kayr kazatse cicr.
66018002	A ta kut naza a t f ye, Kun kpa, ayiik kuwp aBabila n kpa! Kun te kar tseng tu ku sor ne kasa koakye kuri amaan kabik be kar kusor koakye kuri akprdk nanon naya na ta se kyr.
66018003	Kamok nerawe kazatse cicr n feng be ashi anap afe amaan rikuna wu. gwm kazatse nye rikuna be wu. gbang zhik kazatse na te rum kamok kushim kusas kusor kazatse wu.
66018004	Iyong mi fok kut kukak natoon kaza, ye, ner'i, wuruk yin kayr kuwp'ong, fan rinn kuwp'e bin ngarak natoon yin, fan i bu s yin amaan risam mak be ba.
66018005	Kamok rinn wu n rasak ma rin ngarak naza, Adakunom n yiring be rinn wu.
66018006	Kamok anong, nye yin be wu kyndi wu t nye, cicr ikr wu t nye ku karang yin kutak kufa. Ashi anap'e wu t sak akak t s, ku sak yin a ta s kutak kufa.
66018007	Ku nk yin risam didng be riy riwe tr be kuyiik ne kushim kusas kusor kazatse wu t shim kunk rice wu. Kayr riy wu a yiir ya kuka ye, Mi sor kyndi agwm. Mi nye akumung ba, mi ta wor i nye riym ba.
66018008	Kamok anong, kayr kunom kuzining risam kurk be riym ne izong tin b ni wu. Kurng t ku ya cei kamok Adakunom Agwm gwm ayiik'e t ku t amok.

66018010	t nyeseng gugk kamok ba t di risam ba, ne f ye, Wa tsek! Wa tsek, Wan agbang ayiik kuwp aBabila, kuwp aBabila ku ta be kukyem! Kayr awa azining a wor a tu t amok.
66018011	gbang zhik kazatse t ku tos ne a nye riym kamok akak ba sen shan ikr ife ba ta rs ba.
66018012	Akak kuse a ta shashang izinariya ba ka azurfa ba ka iwrng ba i ta be kuyiik didng ne ares ba atek be aseng, ne ares kak a ta yis ye asilik, ne iriri nakon nafe ikn itek. Koakye kuri ikng iya a ta nye be anyi izoom ne ikon i ta be itsm didng ne atsm a ta be agap be ata rink akak atek.

66018020	Nye yin riy rikan, yin fe i ta se yin kayr kaza! Nye yin riy rikan zhl'e be manzo ne fe kuzarap, kamok Adakunom n t aBabila amok natoon ikr iya wu t ka nye yin'e.
66018021	Ne agbang amaleka akak a t be agap sok agbang kuta kukak ku ta gaar kyndi agbang ku ta ak nong a ta barak kayr agbang kudung ne a f ye, Ana ne a t barak agbang kuwp aBabila be agap kaben, a t ba di ba.
66018022	A t ba fok riwng izom ka abom ka asharuwa ka rif rigba kayr wan ba. A t ba s akak afe ikng kunye kayr wan ba. A t ba fok akak ta sen k ak kayr ba.
66018023	Akanang ta ba ya kayr kuwp'e baba ba. A t ba fok akak ta sen nye riy rikan kuwnng kufas baba ba. Agbang zhik wan ne nye gbang ner kayr kazatse. Wan ne i bun i wrk nerawe kazatse be kubok wan.
66018024	Anong ne a ti t kuwp aBabila amok kamok nask ner kuzarap ne nafe zhl'e fe Adakunom ne nafe nerawe t ka fs ba nazatse.
66019001	Nama anong ne mi fok kut kukak kyndi riwng nerawe whr kayr kaza ta tasak ne f ye, Adidngng Adakunom, kashesh be kuyiik ne kukyem nye kufe Adakunom yir.
66019002	Kamok amok wu se gyr ne a nye katsak. A t agbang inyak agwm iya i t beseng kazatse be rikuna wu amok. Adakunom mu ku karang kamok a fs sam wu.
66019003	Iyong bun tang kut ye, Adidngng Adakunom, itsing kurng kuya ku tu ku ya ngarak naza ma izen izen.
66019004	Iyong kk kashn isk ifa be anaas ame ne ikewum inaas ame kpas kaben nong t ya Adakunom iben, wu afe a ta sonong natoon itsik rigwm. Ne tang kut ne f ye, Anong! Adidngng Adakunom!
66019005	Ne kut kukak wuruk natoon itsik rigwm ame, ye, Kerek yin Adakunom yir, Yin sam wu cicr, yin ya i ta fok yin inyim wu, kk kashn be inoon!
66019006	Iyong mi bun i fok kut kukak kyndi riwng rigwm nerawe, kyndi ashi ta wk, kyndi iza ta tasak. Mi fok ta f ye, Adidngng Adakunom! Kamok Ada Adakunom yir ayiik'e ne a se be rigwm.
66019007	Won i tu nye yir riy rikan ne i fok yir kusas'e ne i ku tiyiik yir! Kamok izen kuwnng Aturuk'e n nye. Abining wu afas n naka zem.
66019008	A t ku nk ares akan afe itsm a ta forop ma a gysm nong a ta te.  (Ares akan'e sor kyndi kunye kutek kuya zhl'e ta nye.)
66019009	Ayong amaleka'me f be mi ye, Zibir ikr na, ner riy rikan nye ner aya a t ku tak ba riy rikan kuwnng Aturuk na. Ne a bun a f ye, Rif na nye rif Adakunom rif katsak.
66019010	A t fa f anong ne mi kpa kaben nong i t ku ya iben. Ayong a f be mi ye, Sang tu nye anong ba, mi gip mi nye asam afudang wan, wan be ribir fudang wan, ya a t yiir rif aYeso. Adakunom ne wan tu ku ya iben tsek, kamok Rif Ritek aYeso t taas ne ri nk kukyem kunye kuzarap.
66019011	Mi di kaza nukarak ne i di itsaap ikan nunyeseng. A yis aner aya a tin ngarak natoon itsaap'e ye Aner Katsak be Katsak. A t amok natoon katsak ne a nye itsom kamok katsak.
66019012	Anyisi wu se kyndi rigyem kurng, abong rigwm whr se natoon rice wu. A be riyerek rikak ni izibir, riya sang akak ta kyem a ren ba, ma wu zr tsek.
66019013	Kukpiin a t te, a shumung kayr nask. Riyerek wu nye, Rif Adakunom.
66019014	Rigwm Sozha ta se kayr kaza, ne tsang ku kuus natoon tsaap ba. tes ares akan pes fe itsm didng.
66019015	Itsor ikak iwn'e iya i ta ya didng wuruk nanu wu, a ti tm aner kazatse be itsor'e. A tin nye rigwm niba be ishn kutsm. A t fi kutes anap ba kayr ribong a tin fi ashi anap, aya a ta nye afe agbang riy kubeseng Adakunom afe Kuyiik.
66019016	Natoon kukpiin wu be natoon ishurtak'e, a ti zibir riyerek rikak ye,
66019017	Ne mi di amaleka akak tan nyeseng natite kunom. A t ta kut be agap a t yis nanon cicr na t sen kar natoon kaza ye, B yin cicr nar kazining nong t ya yin naya agbang riy rikan Adakunom na.
66019018	B t ya yin rinam gwm na, ne rif gbang asozha na, ne rif fe agap, ne tsaap na be rif ner aya a tin ngarak ne rif nerawe cicr, sam be ya a ta sor nk, be kk kashn ne inoon.
66019019	Iyong mi di kukewum ame be gwm kazatse ne sozha ba t nyim nong t kn be aner aya a ta se natoon itsaap ikan ame be sozha afu.
66019020	Ayong a yiir kukewum ame mak be aner kuzarap abs aya a ta nye ikr azhing be riyerek kukewum ame. Kamok ikr azhing'e iyong ne i wrk fe a t be iziz kukewum ame ne ya ikng kukewum'me ta nye iben. 66019021	A fs ribir sozha ame kak be itsor i t wuruk nanu aner aya ta se natoon itsaap ikan ame. Iyong nanon ti kumung rice ba ni iya ikom'e.
66020001	Ne mi di amaleka akak t wuruk kayr kaza ta sen tiik kaben, be akarak ribong riya ri ta se tsik dar igak ame. A be kudun kutsm kugbang'e nubk wu.
66020002	Ayong a yiir kuwhen ame, kugbazen kuwhen ame, wu ne a ta nye Amaan Aner ka Ishetan ayi. Amaleka ame t ku rosom ma ay izungu izining.
66020003	A t ku barak kayr ribong ri ta se dar igak ame nong a t whn kpa fan a bu s iren kuwrk nerawe kazatse ma ay izungu izining gor. Nama ay izungu izining'e gor, a t ku bisik kayr nizen cik tsek.
66020004	Iyong mi di tsik rigwm whr iya ya a ta ma ka nk ba kukyem kut nerawe amok ta min sosok natoon'e. Ne mi di nabik ner aya a t tsng ace ba ye kamok ba t yiir katsak natoon aYeso ne rif Adakunom. Ba ne gaar kuya kukewum ame iben ka ikng iya a t nye kyndi wu ne gaar a t ka tsk ba iziz kukewum ame nanati ba ka nibk ba ayi. bun dorok be kutser nong ta nye rigwm mak be aKiristi ay izungu izining.
66020005	Iyu ne i nye kudorok ikom kufe imsng'e. (Ribir nerawe ya a t tsang kus'e dorok be kutser ba, ma nama ay izungu izining'e t gor.)
66020006	Aner riy rikan ne a nye ner aya a tin se kayr kudorok ikom kufe imsng'e ne nye zhl'e. Riku rif afa sen ka s ba ba, amma ba ne t te tsi Adakunom be fe aKiristi, ta nye rigwm ba mak be wu ma ay izungu izining.
66020007	Nama ay izungu izining'ong t gor, a t tun Ishetan nar kaya a t ku te nitsm,
66020008	a t wrk nerawe cicr nikes kazatse inaas a ta yis ye aGok be aMagok. Ishetan t ka tusung ba nar kazining nong a t kn itsom. Rigwm nerawe'me ta se kyndi rizk ishng.
66020009	A ta naka tarak kayr kazatse ne a gorok ner Adakunom, kuwp kuya wu ta shim.
66020010	Ne amaan aner, aya a t ka wrk ba ame, a t ku barak kayr icen kurng kuya ku ta cishek didng ne itong ikan kyndi ife abindiga. A t ku barak nar kazining be kukewum ame ne ner kuzarap afe abs ame. t s risam azong kunom be katuk ma izen izen.
66020011	Iyong mi di agbang itsik rigwm rikak rikan be aner akak natoon'e. Kaza be kaben wor ka wei, akak ba di ba.
66020012	Ne mi di ya a t tsang a kus, kk kashn be inoon, tan nyeseng nashn itsik rigwm ame. A karak afumung akak. Ne a bun a karak kufumung'e kukak kuya ku ta nye kufumung kutser. A t ikom'e amok tr be kunye ba, kyndi ikng iya a t zibir kayr afumung'e.
66020013	Iyong gbang adung bs be ner aya ba t kus kayr ba. Riku be kar kaya nabik ya a t kus t ku sor bs be afuba gip. A t koangan amok tr be kunye wu.
66020014	Ayong a barak Riku ame ne kar kaya nabik ya a t kus t ku sor kayr icen kurng ame. Iyuna ne i nye riku rif afa.
66020015	Koangan afe a ta s riyerek wu kayr kufumung kutser'e ba, a t barak kayr icen kurng ame.
66021001	Ne mi di kaza kafas be kaben kafas, kamok kaza kafe imsng'e ne kaben kafe imsng wei, agbang adung ashi tu ku se ba.
66021002	Mi bun i di Agbang Kuwp Kuzhl'e a ta yis ye aUshalima afas. Ku wuruk naza nufe Adakunom ku ta sen tisik kaben. An te ares kususas'e kyndi abining afas a ta be nasa amitek wu.
66021003	Ne mi fok kut kukak t wuruk be agap nar itsik rigwm ame ye, Di yin, Kar kusor Adakunom n tiik kaben mak be nerawe, ka t sor mak be ba. Ba t te nerawe wu ne Adakunom be rice wu se mak be ba ne a bun a sor Adakunom ba.
66021004	A t ka rng ba nanyisi cei. Riku ka riy riwe ka kanak ka kur'me ba sen kuse ba, kamok ikr kazatse izen cicr t wei.
66021005	Ayong afe a t tsang a sonong natoon itsik rigwm ame f ye, Di yin, mi sen nye koakye ifas! A bun a f be mi ye, Zibir rif na, kamok rif'me nye katsak ne ri nye ikng iya a tana kuus.
66021006	A bun a f be mi ye, An gang! Mi ne i nye Alfa ne aOmega. I ta sor ye mi ne i nye imsng'e ne i nye igang'e. Koangan afe a ta fok kut kukoor, mi t ku nk ashi a ta wuruk kayr itop ashi ife kutser nawarak nong a t s.
66021007	Aner aya ne a canang kazatse ne mi t ku nk iren nong a t ya kutse ikr na cei. Mi t sor Adakunom wu ne wu sor igon'i.
66021008	ner aya a t fok inyim be fe a t gaar kunk katsak ne fe amaan kunye ne fe kufs nerawe be fe kunye rikuna be fe a t ya kukur, be fe a ta ya ikr iduk iben cei be fe abs, kar kusor ba se kayr icen kurng be itong ikan i ta se kyndi ife abindiga. Iyu ne i ta nye riku rif afa.
66021009	Ayong amaleka azining kayr maleka kanataar a t be nakereng na t be amaan risam kanataar nafe igang ame b a t f be mi ye, B mi t ka tonong abining afas Aturuk ame tan sok.
66021010	Ayong a ti sok kayr kabik a t tseng be mi natoon agbang kawhanang kakak ka ta se ring ring nong a ta sen tonong Agbang Kuwp Kuzhl'e, a ta yis ye aUshalima. Ku se be kuwuruk kayr kaza nufe Adakunom, ku ta sen tiik kaben.
66021011	Kuwp'e gysm be kuyiik Adakunom, kugysm'me se kyndi kufe iwrng ikak a ta yis ye aZhaspa. Kuwp'e se kanang kyndi agilas.
66021012	Kuwp'e be agbang kubar kukak ku ta se garang didng be nanu kutu kuns kusk be afa be amaleka azining a tan nyeseng nashn koakye kanukutu'me. A tin zibir ayerek izrk ner Isarela kusk be afa ni nanu kutu'me.
66021013	Nanu kutu'me se nataar nabas kuwuruk kunom, nataar nabas rikpa kunom ne nataar nataar ribir ikes kazatse ifa.
66021014	A barak ribor kubar'e natoon ata kusk be afa. A ti zibir ayerek manzo Aturuk ame kusk be afa natoon'e.
66021015	Amaleka afe a t f kanu be mi ame be ishn a tin maas ikng, a t nye be izinariya nong a tin maas kuwp'e ne nanu kutu'me be kubar'e.
66021016	Abar'e se tr abas akak nar afudang ba, kusp'e be kusaa'me se titr'e. Nizen iya amaleka'me t maas kuwp'e be ishn wu, yong a s kuwp'e se kyndi akilomita izungu ifa be isk inyak ifa (2,200). Kusp'e be kusa'me ne kugarang'e se titr'e.
66021017	Amaleka ame t fa maas kukpakarak kubar'e, yong a s ku se kyndi amita isk igataar be igataar. Amaleka'me maas kyndi nerawe ta maas ikr ba.
66021018	A nk kubar'e be iwrng ikak i ta gysm a ta yis ye aZhaspa. A nk kuwp'e be izinariya zhl, i ta se kanang kyndi agilas.
66021019	A zem abor'e be koakye kuri iwrng. Kuta ribor kufe imsng'e nye iwrng a ta yis ye aZhaspa, kufe afa'me a yis ye aSafaya, kufe ataar nye Agat ne kufe anaas nye aEmeral,
66021020	kufe atoon'e a yis ye aOnis, kufe igataar a yis ye aKaneliya, kufe kanataar'e a yis ye aKirisolat, kufe ikara a yis ye aBeril, kufe katonbk a yis ye aTopas, kufe kusk a yis ye aKirisopuras, kufe kusk be azining a yis ye aZhasi ne kufe kusk be afa'me a yis ye Ametis.
66021021	Nanu kutu kusk be afa'me a nye be iwrng ikak i ta gysm kususas'e, a nye koakye kanukutu'me be iwrng'e izining. A nye agbang iren kayr kuwp'e be izinariya zhl kyndi agilas a ta se kanang.
66021022	Mi di agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben kayr agbang kuwp'e ba, kamok Ada Adakunom ayiik'e ne Aturuk'e ne a nye agbang kutu kuya Adakunom iben'e.
66021023	Agbang kuwp'e tsr akanang kunom ka kufn ba, kamok kuyiik Adakunom ne kunye akanang'e ne Aturuk'e ne a nye apitila'me
66021024	nerawe kazatse ti tseng kayr akanang agbang kuwp'e ne gwm kazatse bs be kuyiik ba nufu gip.
66021025	A t whsng nanu kutu kuwp'e nigaan'e ba, kamok katuk tuse azong ba.
66021026	t bs be ikr itek ife kusaas ne kurum nerawe kazatse na cei kayr kuwp'e.
66021027	Amma ikr iya ita se zhl ba, t n kayr kuwp'e ba. fe a t nye ikr isum be fe a t wrk nerawe sen n kayr kuwp'e ba. Awan ya a t zibir ayerek ba nufumung kutser Aturuk'e ne t n kayr tsk.
66022001	Ayong amaleka'me ti tonong ishng i ta be ashi kutser, i se zhl kyndi agilas. Ashi'me wuruk nar itsik rigwm Adakunom be ife Aturuk'e,
66022002	ne a wk natite agbang iren i ta se kayr kuwp'e. Kakon kutser tuse ka ta nyeseng nukim ishng'e nabas afa, ka ta tes kutak kusk be afa koakye riy. Kakon'e tes koakye kufn. Afumung kakon'e nye rikan nufe nerawe kazatse cei.
66022003	Adakunom t ba fiming ikng ikak ba. Itsik rigwm Adakunom be itsik rigwm Aturuk'e t sor kayr kuwp'e ne sam wu ku nye itomong.
66022004	Ba t di kanyisi wu ne riyerek wu se ninati ba.
66022005	Kar ba sen te katuk ba. nerawe t ba tsr akanang kunom ka apitila nong a tin di kar ba, kamok Adakunom, Agwm gwm ne a t nye akanang ba. t nye rigwm ma izen izen.
66022006	Ayong amaleka'me f be mi ye, Rif na nye katsak, i nye ikng iya a tana kuus. Adakunom, Agwm gwm aya a ta nk afe kuzarap kabik wu, tom amaleka wu nong a ta tonong sam wu ikr iya i tana nye sang be kubeseng izen ba.
66022007	Di yin, Mi saase kyrna! Aner riy rikan ne a nye aner aya a ta kuus kuzarap ku ta se kayr kufumung na.
66022008	Mi aYohana, mi fok ne i dis ikr na. Mi t fa gang ku foos ne ku yrk'e cei ne mi kpa natak amaleka ame nong t ku ya iben, wu aya a tin tosong ikr'me.
66022009	Amma amaleka'me f be mi ye, Sang tu nye anong ba. Mi nye asam afudang wan, kyndi ribir ronyining wan ner kuzarap Adakunom cei be ribir nerawe ya a tin sak riy nufumung a ta zibir na. Ya yin Adakunom iben!
66022010	Ayong a f be mi ye, Sang tu whn kuzarap kayr kufumung na ba, kamok izen'e m b barak.
66022011	Won wu aya a ta nye amaan ikr tu ya kashn be amaan kunye wu, aner aya a ta nye ikr isum ra ya kashn be kunye anong. Aner aya a ta be kuse kutek ra ya kashn be kuse kutek wu. Aner aya a ta sor zhl ra ya kashn be kusor zhl.
66022012	Di yin, Mi saase kyrna! Ishorong yin se nunaan, mi t karang koangan titr be ikng ife wu t nye.
66022013	Mi ne i nye Alfa ne aOmega, Imsng'e be Igang'e, Nasan'e ne i nye Igang'e.
66022014	Aner riy rikan ne a nye ner aya a tan kusu akpiin ba nong as ta s iren kuya kutse kakon kutser, ne kuus kanukutu nong ta n kayr kuwp'e.
66022015	fe a tana sor nufang'e ne nye ner aya kunye ba ta tas kufe gabu, fe a ta nye kubok, fe a ta nye rikuna be fe kufs nerawe ne fe kuya ikr iduk iben be fe a ta shim kubs abs.
66022016	Mi, aYeso ne i tom amaleka mi nong a t ka tak kutom na nong yin ta tak yin fikuus. Mi ne i nye Kunik aDauda ne I nye Aner kasa'me. Mi ne i nye Adar Kusetson, aya a ta se kanang.
66022017	Kabik be Abining Afas'e f ye, B! Aner a ta fok rif na ra f ye, B. Aner a ta fok kut kukoor ne a tsr ashi kus, a ra b a ta s ashi kutser warak.
66022018	Mi aYohana ne i f be yin be agbang kuto ye, koangan afe a ta fok rif kuzarap riya ri ta se kayr kufumung na: Aner aya ne a tin barang ikng ikak natoon'e, t, Adakunom t ku barang mo amaan risam wu gip riya a ta zibir kayr kufumung na.
66022019	Aner aya a ta tk ikng ikak kayr ikng iya a ta zibir kayr kufumung kuzarap na, Adakunom t sok ishorong kanu kafu kayr kakon kutser ne kayr kuwp kuzhl'e ame, aya a ta f itak'e kayr kufumung na.
66022020	Wu aner aya tin taas ikr na, f ye, Ei, Mi saase kyrna. Anong. B, Agwm gwm yir, aYeso.
66022021	Ritek Agwm gwm yir aYeso ra sor mak be ner ta nye fe Adakunom. Anong!
